story:
Capability with Agility. Aesthetic beauty with Practicality. 

The Xenxo S-Ring wraps technology around your little finger, thereby making your world smarter, secure and more seamless than ever before. The ring's 360-degree functionality is deliberate though, and we - the company co-founder's, would like you in on the 'big why' of the product. Wrap technology around your little finger, accomplish anything and everything by wearing just one little ring – The Xenxo S-Ring. By having specifically developed 12 applications, the ring vests the control of your life in your hands.

Xenxo is one for you, and you are the one who deserves to be a part of the new Generation.

Smart has never been this Smart.

Expert Technicians let us down saying those complicated components cannot be fitted into a ring, but with a passionate and hardworking talented team, we overcame experience proving them wrong. We have managed to pack a powerful microcomputer with more than 94 micro-components, 4 sensors, and a 32-bit controller while maintaining the size as same as that of an ordinary ring. 

 

Your Safety is in Safe Hands 

 

Xenxo S-Ring: Prototype (Left) : Alpha Version V2.0 (Centre) : Final-End Model (Right).

 
 

Xenxo S-Ring - Alpha Version V 2.0

Xenxo S-Ring: Alpha version V 2.0 (Present Phase, as of April 2018)

Three different shades of the S-Ring you love to look more cool and stylish.

An App To Control, Protect and Secure Your Data. 

 

 

12 applications made customizable to 4 different clicks! Prioritize your needs into clicks!

"We didn't just design the technology, we crafted it with the solutions"  

Created to overcome present technological problems and stay in line with the future. We are happy to announce that we have successfully made one that might just accomplish everything we have ever dreamed of.

 

 

Xenxo S-Ring surpasses 87% of the technological issues that today's world face.

Why struggle carrying those six accessories when “one” can do all that & a whole lot more? Life can be a lot easier!

“It may sound unbelievable to some but adversity often spurs ingenuity”.  

This was the case with us, for you see, the recent spate of unspeakable crimes, especially those towards women, triggered us- the company’s co-founders to invent a wearable device that would promptly and easily address distress SOS calls. But a wearable device offering only an SOS function is not very appealing, is it?

 

 

Back at the drawing board, our company co-founders focused on expanding the ring’s applications to offer multiple solutions in one sleek ring and as our brand name ‘Xenxo’ suggests (Xenxo in old Greek: The protector of the family), the Xenxo S-Ring – Xenxo’s first contribution to the world, commingles a host of multiple features that allows users to live, work and play as freely & safely as one can possibly be!. The invention was solemnized by officially incorporating our firm as RajMall Inventives LLC, at USA & INDIA.  

RMI is created by a group of passionate youngsters, who believe in the power of technology and the influence that it can make in our daily lives. Xenxo, being the first brand of Rajmall Inventives and is a member of Indian Centre for Social, Economic and Environmental Research, which aims to revolutionize the technology world and therefore provide products that actually benefit the end user. One such product is the Xenxo S-Ring, a small and sleek smart ring that is here to revolutionize the smart wearable for a better future.

 

That’s a wrap from Entrepreneurship Business Growth Submit -2018. Was great seeing the users love and excitement towards Xenxo S-Ring.  

 

 

Risks and challenges

1. Available space may be less and it varies due to many factors. A standard configuration uses approximately 500 MB of space (including OS and preinstalled apps). 
2. Size and weight may vary by configuration and manufacturing process. 
3. All battery claims depend on usage and many other factors; actual results may vary.

We 're wrapping up the product development phase for the main features. An on-time delivery date for Xenxo S-Ring is anticipated. Due to the incredibly small size of Xenxo S-Ring, we use very miniature components and intricate tools. Every component is highly integrated into and optimized within the design, and an unforeseen component alteration may occur.

We 've found reliable manufacturing partners, but even with the best manufacturing processes set up, unexpected hiccups can happen. Due to some technical difficulties, any functionalities that are excepted to work out of the box may arrive as updates over the air update only if it imposes the huge delay in the delivery of the product. What you are seeing are prototypes; expect the final product to be more polished and of supreme quality. Logistics issues are also being solved to ensure smooth delivery for when we've exceeded our goal.

International backers: Please note that you will be responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable to your region.

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign, you can always reach us at support@xenxo.pro.

story:
Who are we and what do we need help with?

Hi, I’m Heiko Windisch and I am the person behind Sid Spidersnake. I draw stuff* and then put that stuff onto t-shirts, sweatshirts, hats, and jackets. I make wares for weirdos, witches, and wizards. Now it’s time to get into the PIN GAME.

I’ve yet to succeed in making Sid Spidersnake my full time gig, and I just lost my day job, which is why I’m crowdfunding this endeavour. Don’t feel sorry for me, I’ll be fine. Back to the subject, THERE ARE PINS TO BE MADE.

I've already sussed out a supplier to produce the pins for me, now I just need the funding to get the first batch made, and from the profit from the sale of the first batch I’ll be able to make more pins, other designs, a whole collection, then another collection, a PIN EMPIRE, and one day people will spot your Grumpy Ghost pin and say “wow, old school Sid Spidersnake!” and you’ll say “haha, yeah, I was actually a contributor to the fundraiser that got them started!”, and your clout will immediately rise to 1000 and that cutie you’re talking to will want to date you. Magic.


 

How much do we need?

  • US$150 / AU$200. Yes, that’s all. Don’t judge. The technical minimum for campaigns is $500, tho. Don’t worry, that means just MORE PINS!

What is the funding used for?

  • A batch of soft enamel pins, including the mould for them, and shipping. Good thing is that once the mould is made, we could make an infinite amount of pins from it, saving us money on future orders of the design. 

What’s in it for me?

  • Depending on how much you can contribute, you’ll either get our eternal gratitude, your own Grumpy Ghost Enamel Pin, a phone wallpaper, discounts on the whole Sid Spidersnake range, a handwritten Thank-You note (with a portrait of your pet, if you have one), or inclusion in a very special club of super supporters who will get early exclusive access to new designs, sales, and specials. Sky’s the limit!

What will happen if the campaign overshoots its target?

  • Well, I’ll be seriously chuffed**, but realistically we’d use the funds to launch some ads on Facebook or Instagram or Google. Nothing better to fund more pins than having more sales!

What will happen if you don’t reach your target?

  • We’d be a little sad, but life goes on. We’d reinvest the funds into other aspects of the business. Run ads, set up a new website & storefront, maybe hire some influencers (please don’t let it come to that...). If you have any business advice, get in touch! We’d appreciate any help other than those “10,000 followers for $5” DMs we usually get. We prefer our growth healthy and organic <3

Why should I care?

  • Why so confrontational? Well, you don’t have to care, but let me tell you one thing: I’m a simple guy with a simple dream - I want to make a living doing what I love on my terms. I’ve worked for “the man”, you probably know him, he sucks. I don’t want to spend my life working for him. I wanna make other weirdos, introverts, freaks, and outcasts like me happy with my art. The thing about weirdos and introverts is that they’re not the ones to flaunt their purchases on haul reels on the ‘gram, they buy stuff because they like it, not to show off. Maybe a little. Some of them. That’s a nightmare for business owners like me, because word of mouth don’t work if your customers are the silent type. Which leads me to our next topic...

Are there other ways I can help?

  • Glad you asked! Tell people about this campaign! You might not have a penny to your name (we know the feeling!) but you might have friends or followers who spend $150 on breakfast alone. Help them find us & support us! Indiegogo has plenty of easy share tools for you to make use of, and it could just take a few seconds to share our campaign & another few seconds for that friend of yours with a big heart and a big wallet to find us. Having said that, we’re happy for Every. Single. Cent.

 

Sid Spidersnake loves you. Thanks for reading & thank you for your support!

 

Let’s get those pins made!

 

 

* Oh hello, you know what asterisks are used for! When I write that I “draw stuff”, then it’s code for “I’m an accomplished artist and illustrator who has had shows on three continents and worked with clients like Converse, graniph, TimeOut Magazine, and Salomon Snowboards“, but I’m not confident enough to tell it straight.

** that’s Australian for pleased as punch.

story:
The Most Funded Wallet from Japan is Here

After delivering over 6000 backers in Japan, we bring you Tenuis3 - a slim, durable, flat wallet unlike other minimal wallets out there on the market.

They talk about us...

and our backers...

 

We are a design studio from Japan - a country known for keeping things minimal, organized, and high-quality. The Tenuis3 is also just that. It’s only 6mm or 0.23” in thickness - or rather, thinness. But you won’t have to compromise on how much it can hold. You can fit everything you need including up to 8 cards, and another for contactless use, a key, bills, and even coins. Made out of durable goat leather and sailcloth canvas, the wallet is water-resistant and scratch-resistant. It’s made to last. Here's what we pride in our Tenuis3:

Comes in three colors: Navy, Gray, and Black

 

 

A Closer Look At Our Wallets 

01 Slim & Thin

Thinner than an iPhone 6. 

    Our goal was to retain its slimness even with everything you need inside - and we’ve achieved that goal. Maintain the less-than-iPhone-6 slimness even with 4 of your essential cards, 6 coins, and 8 bills. 

     

    If you have more to fit in your wallet - no worries. You can still maintain a 12mm (.5") wallet. You can also comfortably fit up to 20-30 coins with 4 cards and 8 bills, but it'll also fit more if needed!

     
     

    02 Durable

    It's not only thin, but also durable! Only possible thanks to the materials that make the wallet water-resistant and scratch-resistant: goat leather and sailcloth canvas. 

     

     

    03 Functional

    Fit up to 8 cards!

     
    And another for contactless-use, as well as a key. 
    All of our card slots are sized to fit the cards just right.

    The coin divider is another key aspect to keeping your wallet slim. We also use a special ykk zipper to get rid of any possible bulk and to keep everything within the wallet.

     

     

    04 Japanese Minimal Design 

    We aim to design and create products that are beautiful but practical. Years of tests and feedbacks from our previous models have brought us to just that. 

     

    05 Will Age Well 

    A wallet that acquires more character and looks better with age - just like you.

    As sailcloth canvas age, the surface looks smoother. Here's what 10 years of use looks like.

     

    Why these materials?

    Not only are they highly durable and will age well, they are THIN. These materials are the foundation of our 6mm/0.23” wallets. 

    The wallet might feel a little tight sliding in your cards since it's made out of leather - but give it a week and it’ll soften up to fit everything you need. 


     

    Why Tenuis3, Why Go Slim?

    There're plenty of benefits that come with slim wallets like Tenuis3 but here's why we believe in going slim. Get rid of clutter and a possibly cause of your back pain.

    Sitting with a bulky wallet in your back pocket means sitting in a distorted and uneven position - which may over time cause back pains. So say goodbye to back problems and hello to Tenuis3!

    It's thin enough that it will fit in any of your pockets! 


    Details

    Our wallets fit everything from Japanese bills to American bills. If you're wondering if your currency fits find out here with size details and blue print of Tenuis 3.


    ​*All colors come with black inner goat leather.

    Perks

    Shipping worldwide is $10. 
     

    Schedule 

     

    About the team 

    SOLA is a Japanese design studio that designs and produces bags, wallets, accessories, and other items. Our products are created using superior quality canvas that is coated with a special paraffin wax that creates a leather-like texture.

    The concept of Minimalism has been a great influence on our work, and we specialize in extremely minimalistic items. We believe in pragmatic and beautiful products, and our aim is to design and create goods that feature a practical shape and structure. We hope to share our vision with like-minded people.

As sailcloth canvas age, the surface looks smoother. Here's what 10 years of use looks like.

It's thin enough that it will fit in any of your pockets! 

Details
Our wallets fit everything from Japanese bills to American bills. If you're wondering if your currency fits find out here with size details and blue print of Tenuis 3.


​*All colors come with black inner goat leather.


Perks


Shipping worldwide is $10.  

Schedule 

 
About the team 

SOLA is a Japanese design studio that designs and produces bags, wallets, accessories, and other items. Our products are created using superior quality canvas that is coated with a special paraffin wax that creates a leather-like texture.
The concept of Minimalism has been a great influence on our work, and we specialize in extremely minimalistic items. We believe in pragmatic and beautiful products, and our aim is to design and create goods that feature a practical shape and structure. We hope to share our vision with like-minded people.

story:
Guaranteed Quality and Delivery 

53 PPD (Pixel Per Degree) now is the highest number in the industry. LITE breaks through the ultimate edge and takes it to the next high level. Clear to every edge! With 9 times more dense image than Apple iPhone 12 Pro display (3 times more than other HMD), 2.1 million (1920*1080) pixels crammed into a 0.49 inch (1.2cm), all you will see is a totally higher, sharper and smoother image with more vivid details.

Best Distortion Control < 1.5%Optics is key to a head-mounted display. Most headsets use a single lens (fresnel lens) or aspherical lens, so the distortion is above 15% or even higher. GOOVIS LITE leads a minimum of 10 times lower and makes the color difference within several micrometers thanks to the highest standard lens design, processing and assembly. Now the image edges become stunningly clearer and finally, you can enjoy your favorites more easily, freely.

600 Inches Virtual Screen

600 inches on-the-go virtual screen turns anywhere into your private premium theater with a wide 42° field of view at any time. Dive promptly right into a deeply immersive world like never been before!

2,000,000:1 Contrast Ratio

2,000,000:1 explosive contrast ratio makes every detail of an image stand out vastly! GOOVIS LITE feeds your eyes with a crystal-clear picture with more saturated and vibrant colors without making you feel any eye strain or fatigue.

GOOVIS Wireless Cast supports Type-C and HDMI. Extend your favorites to two displays and enjoy high-efficient working, fluent group meetings, social sharing and more!

 

On-the-go Cast. Wireless. Portable and Unplugged​

Dive into your immersive journey with GOOVIS Cast without carrying tangled wires and power supplies! The integrated exclusive Type-C reinforced power supply design with the GOOVIS Powerbank Base: No power cables are needed anymore. Cast wirelessly, vision freely.

Rock-Solid Dual Band for Ultimate Enjoyment

2.4G+5G Dual Band Technology features large bandwidth, anti-interference. GOOVIS Wireless Cast supports 802.11 ac protocol, which guarantees the fluent dual-band switch according to the signal strength. Greater image quality, more stable and fast data transmission without splash.

*GOOVIS Cast Tutorial:

*GOOVIS Cast Connecting iPhone/iPad

*GOOVIS Cast Connecting Android Devices

*GOOVIS Cast Connecting MAC

*GOOVIS Cast Connecting Windows

 

GOOVIS never goes by the number. As an innovator as always, the true 3D dual M-OLED unlocks an impossible viewing experience. GOOVIS LITE delivers a higher brightness level and contrast ratio, much wider color gamut, more stable without any luminance decay issues: better performance with twice longer life span.

GOOVIS LITE with Cast is versatile across platforms like Android, iOS, Mac OS, Windows and impeccably supports DLAN, Miracast, Airplay, EZMira. Conveniently compatible with your smartphone, laptop, tablet, console, set-top box. Plug in and go deep into the truly immersive gaming and movies, exciting FPV drones, true-to-life EVF and more. Everything is easily within your grasp!

With GOOVIS LITE, you don’t even wear your glasses when playing games, watching movies… Have more fun in a more painless way, it's just that easy. Customized diopter adjustable lenses with ultra-high display accuracy of +2D Hyperopia to -7D Myopia eliminate double vision, bad contrast or any dizziness! (Extra astigmatism glasses are available）

Featherlight. Portable & Comfortable 

200g(7.05oz) only - the undisputed featherweight champ. More than portable, GOOVIS LITE is also extremely comfortable to wear.

Anti-fog & Anti-glare

A top-notch cooling airflow system and special lens structure guarantee the best wearing and viewing experience without sacrificing the clarity and resolution of the displayed images.

Excellent Heat Dissipation

Completely lost in the immersive world? Sure, GOOVIS LITE’s superior heat dissipation even allows you to live in the virtual world for a while without worrying about if the headset is too hot to wear.

*Demo Video for GOOVIS LITE Connection and Set Up

GOOVIS LITE feeds your eyes with a crystal-clear picture with more saturated and vibrant colors without making you feel any eye strain or fatigue.GOOVIS Wireless Cast supports Type-C and HDMI. Extend your favorites to two displays and enjoy high-efficient working, fluent group meetings, social sharing and more! On-the-go Cast. Wireless. Portable and Unplugged​Dive into your immersive journey with GOOVIS Cast without carrying tangled wires and power supplies! The integrated exclusive Type-C reinforced power supply design with the GOOVIS Powerbank Base: No power cables are needed anymore. Cast wirelessly, vision freely.Rock-Solid Dual Band for Ultimate Enjoyment2.4G+5G Dual Band Technology features large bandwidth, anti-interference. GOOVIS Wireless Cast supports 802.11 ac protocol, which guarantees the fluent dual-band switch according to the signal strength. Greater image quality, more stable and fast data transmission without splash.*GOOVIS Cast Tutorial:*GOOVIS Cast Connecting iPhone/iPad*GOOVIS Cast Connecting Android Devices*GOOVIS Cast Connecting MAC*GOOVIS Cast Connecting Windows GOOVIS never goes by the number. As an innovator as always, the true 3D dual M-OLED unlocks an impossible viewing experience. GOOVIS LITE delivers a higher brightness level and contrast ratio, much wider color gamut, more stable without any luminance decay issues: better performance with twice longer life span.GOOVIS LITE with Cast is versatile across platforms like Android, iOS, Mac OS, Windows and impeccably supports DLAN, Miracast, Airplay, EZMira. Conveniently compatible with your smartphone, laptop, tablet, console, set-top box. Plug in and go deep into the truly immersive gaming and movies, exciting FPV drones, true-to-life EVF and more. Everything is easily within your grasp!With GOOVIS LITE, you don’t even wear your glasses when playing games, watching movies… Have more fun in a more painless way, it's just that easy. Customized diopter adjustable lenses with ultra-high display accuracy of +2D Hyperopia to -7D Myopia eliminate double vision, bad contrast or any dizziness! (Extra astigmatism glasses are available）Featherlight. Portable & Comfortable 200g(7.05oz) only - the undisputed featherweight champ. More than portable, GOOVIS LITE is also extremely comfortable to wear.Anti-fog & Anti-glareA top-notch cooling airflow system and special lens structure guarantee the best wearing and viewing experience without sacrificing the clarity and resolution of the displayed images.Excellent Heat DissipationCompletely lost in the immersive world? Sure, GOOVIS LITE’s superior heat dissipation even allows you to live in the virtual world for a while without worrying about if the headset is too hot to wear.*Demo Video for GOOVIS LITE Connection and Set Up

story:
La Femme Petite is an inclusive Australian lingerie label with a passion for petite sizes. It is my mission to create timeless, sensual pieces that inspire petite women to celebrate their individuality and uniqueness. La Femme Petite was brought to life by me (Darni)  to create a space where women can shop comfortably, feeling included.

From this collection, Lucille, La Femme Petite will be able to cater to women with small bodies who have large chests as well as small chests. Lucille goes from as small as AA cups up to DD cups for petite women.

Lucille will not only cater to women with a petite frame but also who are as short as 4'10. Lucille has garter belts in two size ranges to cater to women under 5'2 and above 5'2.

The dream is to one day to create lingerie to fit women of all petite sizes.

 

 

 

 

Glow like a goddess in our fresh, crisp and angelic Lucille in white or bring out the sensual seductress in our sultry, chić Lucille in black.

 

 

At La Femme Petite we are dedicated to ethical trade, manufacturing and working conditions for all of our factories.

I incorporate ethical behaviour in all aspects of our operations, from design, pattern making and sampling here in Brisbane, to production, fabric sourcing and our extremely talented seamstresses in Liaoning, China. 

While this industry we admit isn't perfect, we are constantly looking for ways to improve on our sustainable and ethical standards continuously.

I strongly believe I have found the perfect factory that offers a safe, fulfilling work environment for its employees. I also opted for producing in China because I found that it offers more advanced technology options that can produce the highly intricate design features that I want to incorporate into our collections.  

I work closely with the manufacturers to ensure I continue to work with an ethical and safe facility. I find this is a great way to see with my own eyes where the garments we all love are coming from. While I wait for accreditation by a third party as our business grows, I ensure conditions are abiding by a strict code of conduct for an ethical, safe and happy workplace for our entire supply chain. 

Some things I look for in our factories which might sound simple but make a huge difference to working conditions are good lighting, natural light and windows, temperature-controlled environments with heating and cooling, clear pathways between machines clear of tripping hazards and a safe exit, standard working day hours & living wage with regular breaks in between, necessary safety equipment for certain machines and fabric cutting. 

I can honestly say that the happier and safer the staff in our factories, the better-quality pieces we can provide our customers.

story:
Yes, There's an Easier Way for Women to Use the Bathroom Outdoors!
 

Hi, I'm Kelly, an outdoor lover and founder of ELIRA Apparel. I started ELIRA and created our pants and underwear because I’m on a mission to revolutionize women’s apparel and EMPOWER women to be free to pee when they need to!

Whether you love a long hike with your favorite pup, exploring the cross country ski trails, or a car ride in the middle of nowhere, the last thing you should have to do is hold in your pee and not have your butt in the air when you need an emergency bathroom break.
 

 

It's time for women everywhere to STOP worrying about being caught with their butt in the air, or men walking by when they're relieving themselves outdoors.

 The ELIRA Explorer and Navigator pants give you the freedom to do so without the worry when nature calls. No need to strip just UNZIP!!

Yes, girls...you can finally pee in the woods without pulling your pants down! ?? 

We've got two incredible styles of pants ranging in sizes from XS to 4X and yes we've got you covered...we even created underwear!

 

 Say goodbye to having your butt in the air

 

 

Relieve yourself discreetly when you need to

 

 

Comfortable for adventure + play

 

 

Adventure, anywhere!

 

 

 

What zipper?

Thanks to our patented invisible 2-way zipper technology, women no longer have to drop their pants to go to the bathroom. Bonus! You can't even see the zipper from the back!

 

Then our testers wore them, they didn't even notice the zipper. We had some serious rock climbers wear them and they were concerned the zipper would be a problem. At the end of their climb they were blown away. Their response was the same, Never even noticed... they forgot the zipper was there. The zipper guard is sewn in over the zipper and it’s not going anywhere. Which is why no one feels the zipper!

 

 

Both styles of our ELIRA pants have a patented invisible Zipper with a Auto locking, 2-way zipper pull, that allows you to unzip from the top of your waist to the base of your back.

Our dual action zipper allows you to unzip from the back or unzip from the front.

 

 

You open to your desired opening as wide as you want. This provides you with an advantage if you need more privacy. You literally don't see the zipper and there’s a zipper guard sewn over the zipper inside.

Our high tech fabrics repel moisture, are snag resistant and dry quick.  We guarantee our YKK Zippers and will replace them if they should break.  Our founder Kelly has worn the same 2 pairs for 5 years and they're still good as new.

 

Two Styles Available

 

The first style we have available are The Explorer Pants. The Explorer pants are a cargo style pant with 9 deep pockets, available in tobacco khaki and black and sizes XS-4X.

 

The Explorer Pants have a deep cargo pocket perfect for your cell phone.

 

Thee Navigator Pants are our second style of pants. The Navigator Pants are a sleek and minimal style pant with a secure wide phone pocket and back pockets, available in khaki and black and sizes XS-4X. 

The Navigator Pants - sleek & minimal with a secure wide zipper phone pocket.

 

What's the difference between the two styles of pants? 

The difference between the Explorer and the Navigator pants are two different styles evolving around the pockets. The Explorer is a cargo style and the Navigator is an angled pocket. The  Explorer pants have nine pockets and the Navigator pants with the angled pocket have five total pockets.

 

 

Pants Sizing Chart

 

 

 

 

The ELIRA Freedom underwear are the PERFECT companion for your ELIRA pants! You unzip your pants, squat and gently part the underwear with your hands. FREEDOM! 

 

 

Our Polartec Power Dry underwear sets a high standard for moisture management with a 4-way stretch. This promotes a fast drying, breathable, moisture-wicking performance fabric. 
You unzip your pants, squat and gently part the underwear with your hands.

 

FREEDOM! Because a group of manufacturers control all the manufacturing and women have never been a priority. Guess what? We’re changing that. Women have powerful voices and we’re going to be heard. You can also simply pull regular underwear to the side or go commando.

 Bonus! You can wear the underwear under dresses and skirts as well...think date night?

 

 

 

 

 

 

Imagine all the places you can now adventure and explore without having to have your butt in the air when it's time to go to the bathroom! The outdoors is calling darling and it's calling you! This is what ELIRA is all about...FREEDOM! Which adventure will you choose first with your ELIRA Pants & ELIRA Freedom Underwear?

 

Horseback Riding

 

Rock Climbing   

 

Hiking

 

Winter Hiking

 

And so much more!

ELIRA makes every outdoor activity easier for women, it's about time we have apparel that unzips for our bodies needs!

 

 

Our expected shipping date is October 2021. Shipping & handling costs will be the least expensive option available for your address and will be charged before we ship! We will also keep you up to date on any information we have about shipping throughout the campaign in the FAQ section.

 

 

What’s in a name?

Lots. It’s why we thought long and hard when choosing the name for our apparel company. It needed to represent our community.

Women.

Strong.

Empowered.

Free.

And that is why we chose ELIRA.

It’s Albanian root stands for Freedom, To Be Set Free. Isn't that POWERFUL?

This is not an overnight whim as I started this 2012 with a background in product development and took my time bringing this brand and these amazing products to life. As someone who loves the outdoors, I can’t imagine not having them when I do any outdoor activity!

Thank you for being on this journey with us and backing our campaign! Our hope is that it will empower you to embrace the outdoors in a bigger way and all that nature has to offer!

 

 

 

Marketed and Promoted by 

 

Risks and challenges

While this is our first Indie GoGo project, rest assured that we are very familiar with these pants, as we have been perfecting their design since 2015. Our manufacturing partners are ready and waiting for the order to begin production, as is everyone else. That being said, we understand that there can be challenges with production timelines and shipping delays for any number of reasons. Supply chains can experience bumps from time to time and slow the overall momentum of our project, so we've accounted for that in our production timeline. If it looks like more time is needed, we will be very transparent about that and let you know, but our goal is to work to be ahead of our timeline, not behind it. We are committed to delivering high-quality clothing in a very timely manner so that you can begin enjoying the freedom and mobility these pants and underwear will afford you. We are deeply grateful for your support and encouragement on this journey!

 

Long-lasting design

We choose endurable fabrics, fibers and zippers in our clothing. We use reinforced stitching and weight bearing threads to ensure our clothing lasts. We've been working on the design of our pants for 12 years and can testify to their durability and comfort.

 

Reusability and recyclability

While we don't believe that you'll ever want to let go of these pants, and can't imagine why, our nylon fibers and natural bamboo fibers are recyclable.

 

Sustainable materials

We use sustainably harvested bamboo.

 

Environmentally friendly factories

We use American-based manufacturing facilities to lower our carbon imprint, as well as meeting with each of our manufacturing partners to ensure that they follow equitable and fair work practices and adhere to government standards for labor laws.

 

Sustainable Distribution

We choose environmentally friendly packaging and utilize FedEx for shipping. 100% of FedEx packaging is recyclable and 54% is made from recycled content.

story:
The highest-quality AAA Cabretta leather. Styled for the player. Priced lower than other premium gloves. And delivered to your door. Oh, and we donate a glove to youth golf with every purchase. 

Wake up your golf glove game!

Here’s a wild guess. You’ve spent a ton of money and time researching, demo’ing, and selecting your woods, hybrids, irons, wedges, and putters. And, yet, you’ll pull on a cheapo synthetic glove without a second thought. Stop the madness!

Maybe you’re wearing that cheap glove—or wearing a leather glove way beyond its prime—because you’re trying to save a few bucks. Or think it doesn’t really matter to your game. Trust us, and the pros, it does.

To nail your game, you need to be able to feel your club. You need a glove that fits like a second skin. It needs to have the softest, thinnest, supplest leather, be made expertly, and make you feel (and look) like you’re ready to tee off at The Open.

We believe that a golf glove should help you play, and feel, great. And that everyone—including kids trying the game—deserves to have a great golf glove.

This is why we created Red Rooster.

As you may know, the modern golf industry is dominated by massive companies with multi-million, and in some cases multi-billion, dollar turnovers. But did you know that most high-end golf glove brands are made in just a handful of factories in the same city in Indonesia?

The bottom line is that there is very little difference in the quality of the top brands. You’re paying steep prices for the logo (and all the advertising to support it).

Red Rooster is here to change the game. We use the same process as the biggest brands in golf: in fact, our lineup of gloves will be manufactured at the same facilities in Indonesia with the same methods (except ours look even sharper). You’ll just pay less.

One other thing. There’s a real mission behind Red Rooster. To support a new generation of golfers. Keep reading to find out more.

Most golfers don’t know when to change their gloves and play with a golf glove way longer than they should. We’ve all been there—pulling a crumpled glove from the bottom of a golf bag.

Did you know that golf pros change their gloves after almost every round? It’s better for their game and they have the luxury of having gloves delivered when they need them. Now you can too.

We source our Cabretta leather from an Indonesian supplier with a 55-year history in the game. Tanned for 8 weeks for maximum comfort, buttery feel, and enhanced durability. Assembled by artisans for a fit worthy of the pros. There just isn’t a better glove out there.

Our gloves not only fit and feel great, but they also look great too. Get ready to turn heads with our classic styles and colors, distinctive logo, and quality materials. And with a new glove arriving at your door, you can switch up your look as often as you like.

Just be sure to protect that beautiful glove. A golf glove case is like all essentials. You don’t know it’s essential until you get one (or lose one). 

While you may be paying less, you still want to protect that soft, buttery leather from unnecessary wear and tear. Keep your glove(s) fresh, dry, and flat, while storing your phone, wallet, and keys. Not only will your glove last longer; you’ll swing easier without all that pocket luggage.

Our Red Rooster glove case is the perfect on-course accessory. 

Is it tee time yet?!


Red Rooster gloves were tested by nearly 2,000 golfers.

Here are a few honest, unsolicited reviews from our beta-testers:

Unboxing (and Introducing) Red Rooster Golf Gloves by Club and Resort Business

 

Red Rooster Golf Glove Review by HOOA Golf

 

Red Rooster Golf Glove Review by MrShortGame Golf

 

 

We have an ambitious and worthwhile goal.

Our Play It Forward Program Partners (First Tee Triangle, First Tee Ontario, Kevin Haime Golf Centre) could use 5,000 gloves for their 2021 Summer Youth Programs.

Your pledges will help us ensure those Programs make a memorable and lasting first impression on everyone involved.

I was visiting a range where I saw kids in a youth development group trying out golf for the first time. What a great idea! Underprivileged kids getting a chance to experience this great game that I love so much. The sport of Golf could use a wake-up call, and being more inclusive is a great start. That’s how you find that diamond in the rough that could be dominating the PGA Tour in 15 years. But I noticed something out of place. None of the kids were wearing a glove. 

That obvious part of the golf uniform that’s so important to play. Something so small could make them still feel like outsiders and affect the way they experience swinging a club. I wished there was some way I could give them all one. This made me look at my own glove and saw it was in rough shape and should have been replaced several games ago. This loss of confidence in my glove could affect my game today. Then it hit me. I need to wake up MY golf glove game, and there could be a way to help the kids at the same time. 

That was the day RED ROOSTER GOLF was born.

What a great idea! Underprivileged kids getting a chance to experience this great game that I love so much. The sport of Golf could use a wake-up call, and being more inclusive is a great start. That’s how you find that diamond in the rough that could be dominating the PGA Tour in 15 years. But I noticed something out of place. None of the kids were wearing a glove. That obvious part of the golf uniform that’s so important to play. Something so small could make them still feel like outsiders and affect the way they experience swinging a club. I wished there was some way I could give them all one. This made me look at my own glove and saw it was in rough shape and should have been replaced several games ago. This loss of confidence in my glove could affect my game today. Then it hit me. I need to wake up MY golf glove game, and there could be a way to help the kids at the same time. That was the day RED ROOSTER GOLF was born.

story:
Hello! It's The Pholosopher here. I am excited to announce this month's Pholosopher's Market products: 3 new SHALL NOT BE INFRINGED patches.

Products

In this offering, I have 3 new, AMAZING, 3-inch square patches promoting the right to bear arms: one with a Q5 Match, one with a Q4 Steel Frame, and one with a p99, each sporting the "Shall Not Be Infringed" rallying cry.

They are 100% embroidered with hook and loop backing for easy placement on backpacks and totes.

Production

I have already produced the products and they are ready to ship once the campaign closes fully, so you can back with confidence.

​Shipping

Due to increased shipping costs and difficulties, we are currently unable to ship product internationally or to Hawaii or Alaska. We can only ship to the continental US. We do hope to be able to provide service to those areas in the future. If you support from one of those areas, we will refund your contribution in full.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't have change to spare, you can share the campaign to let others know that there are some AWESOME patches available, the purchase of which helps me produce more content educating others on the right to bear arms and human freedom!

So thank you for your support!

~Pho ^^

story:
About us

We’re a team of travelers. From cities to mountains, we’re adventure lovers that feel in our element away from home. After one successful Kickstarter campaign, we decided to take on our next challenge: turning the down coat into a durable adventure coat.

What we’ve learned

We’re creators and this is going to be our 2nd Kickstarter campaign. The first one was a humbling experience. We learned, the hard way, how to plan production timelines (we were late) and do customer support (we were slow). Especially, we learned to underpromise and over-deliver. In other words, we learned to be a company.

While eventually, we managed to deliver to all of our backers and make more than 85% of them happy, it took way too long. We’re 10X more ready this time around and our goal is to have over 90% customer satisfaction.

That’s our commitment to you.

 Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company

story:
Thanks to 231 backers and with total pledge of over CHF 74'000 we brought the PEARL DIVER on Kickstarter alive. All watches pre ordered get a 3 year warranty!

But our journey is not finished yet, you can have the chance and support the WICKED WATCH CO. and receive your bronze diver at exclusive offerings. In case you haven't heard of us yet, here is our introduction:

Codename: PEARL DIVER

Location: Aesch BL, Switzerland

Brand: WICKED WATCH CO. 

 

THE CASE

The PEARL DIVER is made of CuSn8 Bronze. The dive watch features a uni-directional 120 clicks bezel, screw-down crown, drilled lugs for easy strap removal, and is up to 200 m / 20 ATM waterproof. It comes with 2 variations.

NH35A Case

We keep the case as compact as possible--- 40 mm in diameter (43.80 mm including the crown), lug to lug size is 46 mm and the lug width is 22 mm. The thickness of the timepiece is 13.77 mm including the crystal. The slight domed sapphire crystal with multi layer (5 Layers) anti-reflective coating (blueish) and a fully lumed CusN8 bezel insert, are just two of the highlights.

STP1-11 Case

Thanks to the slimmer movement, we are able to create a thinner watch, this case is 12.50 mm in height, including the double domed sapphire (11.50 mm without sapphire).

 

 

THE BEZEL INSERT

The bezel has a 120 click uni-directional mechanism and feature a bronze insert. The markers at are engraved deeper than usual to be able to hold more lume.

 

 

THE CASE BACK

The screw-down case back features as tribute to our hometown Basel, the "Basilisk Dragon" as motif.

You can read more about the mythic creature here: WIKIPEDIA LINK or here more

The NH35A version will feature a 316L stainless steel case back, while the STP1-11 will have a titanium grade 2 case back. Our Bronze Diver is a limited Edition of 500 pieces per colour and movement. A serial number will be engraved on each case back. 

 

THE SAPPHIRE

NH35A Case

Our sapphire crystal is 3.80 mm thick and 30.00 mm in diameter in the NH35A Automatic Model. The slight domed design gives it a very special look. The crystal features a blue shimmer multi layer antireflective coating (5 layers) on the inside. 

STP1-11 Case

The crystal on the STP1-11 Automatic Model is 3 mm thick and has a double domed structure. The sapphire is 100% made in Switzerland, manufactured by SEBAL SA, a Swiss company with over 40 years of experience in crafting sapphire for famous Swiss watch brands.

The Swiss made sapphire features a very special AR coating called ARunic® by Econorm.

The premium two-sided colourless AR coating provides the sapphire with the following features:

 

THE MOVEMENT

Our mission is to develop stylish yet affordable watches for all watch lovers against the soaring watch prices nowadays. With that goal in mind, we did research on many different movement suppliers such as ETA, Seiko, Miyota, Sellita, etc.; the secret boiled down to one specific movement = SEIKO'S NH35A.

WHY?

The NH35A is a power horse par excellence, within the same price range this movement is unmatched in reliability, accuracy and durability.

Using this mechanical movement allows us to offer the PEARL DIVER at an unbeatable price.

 

BUT

We know some people prefer Swiss Movements, that's why we chose to offer our PEARL DIVER with an upgrade to STP1-11. The mechanical movement is made in Switzerland and offers these specification: 

  • Hours, minutes, sweep second
  • Date, rapid corrector
  • Stop second device
  • Self-winding mechanism with ball bearing
  • 28'800 vibrations per hour, 4 Hz.
  • 26 jewels
  • Power reserve 44 hours
  • average rate; -0/+15 sec/d
  • Producer info: STP

 

This movement from one of the newer supplier (Swiss Technology Production since 2006) was tested by our watch maker and approved. 

You can choose between the following movements: 

  • NH35A (Date)
  • NH38 (No date)
  • STP1-11 (Date)
  • STP1-11 (No date complication, no ghost position)

 

THE STRAPS

Your PEARL DIVER comes with a genuine Italian leather strap with crazy horse treatment. The leather strap is 22 mm wide on the lugs and tappers down to 18 mm at the buckle. Choose between vintage brown or black. 

 

The leather strap is not made for diving as everyone knows. Your timepiece will come with a fluoro rubber (natural rubber) strap with fitted and hardened endlinks. This premium rubber strap allows your watch to enter the darkside of the sea !  

Every strap comes with the bronze buckle with a lumed logo engraved.  

 

 

The last strap that comes with the PEARL DIVER is the high quality nato strap, made of soft woven nylon and bronze hardware. 

 

 

THE DIAL

After a quite intense discussion about our first dial version, we decided to completely redefine it. You will find our dial with the hour glass at 12 o'clock, round pearls on the hours in between and "long" pearls at 9 and 6 (and 3 for no date versions). Our dial bases are made of recycled brass from Switzerland and Japan. The WICKED text will be replaced with our W logo made with Lumicast.

MAGPIE - forged carbon 

 

CROW - black grainy textured dial

 

PHOENIX - forged carbon with gold dust

 

BASILISK - Green sunburst dial

 

CARDINAL - Red fumée dial

 

RAVEN - Black MOP dial (Grade AAA)

 

THE HANDS

Our handsets are coated with N5 rose gold coating. They are brushed and cut with highest precision from our trusted supplier. 

The second hand features our Anchor logo,  with a pointy end and red finish, filled with same lume as the other hands. The arrow hour and sword-like minute hand help you read the time easier and at one glance.

All hands feature the same superior grade Swiss Super-LumiNova® like on the bezel insert and dial. This generates a homogenous look of the lume.

 

THE LUME

The creation of best luminous power/effect of our PEARL DIVER was a core task for us. We want to have lume as bright as possible and clean without shadows. CREATE A WICKED LUME BEAST. We did our research and optimized the design for a great lume effect, for example: Our bezel insert is higher than usual, for deeper engravings = more pigments can fit in = better lume performance.

The default lume will be Swiss Super-LumiNova® C3 ef GL, X1 Superior Grade, but for our kickstarter campaign, we give you the chance to customize your lume to either C3, Old Radium or BGW-9 instead.

 

These parts will have the lume applied: Bezel insert, crown, buckle, dial and hands.

For best glowing results we guarantee that we use the premium products of RC Tritec AG the swiss manufacture of Swiss Super-LumiNova®. Our lume is 100% guaranteed Swiss made. 

BGW-9 GRADE A ef

 

C3 Grade X1 GL ef

 

How good is our lume? The lume battle:

 

 

TEST REPORT AND QUALITY CERTIFICATE

 

 

 

THE LUMICAST

We are proud to announce that, WICKED WATCH CO. will be the first micro brand (as far as we know^^) featuring Lumicast on their dials. Meet the next generation of Lume, today!

Lumicast is used in the haute horology segments in some watches of brands like IWC, H. Moser & Cie., etc. 

For the Lumicast process and application, we are working with Les Cadraniers de Genève SA, Meyrin Geneva (a famous dialmaker from Geneva who enjoys the trust of Vacheron Constatin and many other big brands) and RC Tritec AG (manufacturer of Swiss Super-LumiNova®) together.  

A comparison of the different lume applications:

 

our application:

 

THE COMPANY

Meet the team! Pascal is the designer and the mind behind PEARL DIVER, gathering all his best women and men to create this beautiful timepiece.

About me: I started my "career" in banking business, but after several years of working in different fields in banking, I decided to do something else. Growing up in Basel was a beautiful time. I developed my interests for tennis and watches in early ages and never got tired of them.

We managed to get through troublesome times in 2020, now it's a new era of our brand. I pour my heart into this project. It is more than just "business".

You can read about our brand here: https://www.wickedwatch.ch/about

 

THE WATCHMAKER

The Swiss made watch (STP1-11 Movement) will be assembled by our watchmaker in Bern, Switzerland. Mr. Galeano-Wüthrich has experience in watch business of over 40 years, he has been working for OMEGA, Richemont Group and others. He personally assembled and regulated more than 300 movements of the famous 7750 VALJOUX automatic. 

He and his team will ensure our high quality standards and will assemble the watches carefully with Swiss precision. 

 

THE PRODUCTION

We don't hide the origin of our watches. We are a SWISS brand, with manufacturer partners in Shenzhen, the famous metropolis in Southern China, Switzerland and other countries. We work with professional watch part suppliers that have served various brands from Switzerland or Germany for more than 20 years, some do it for more than 40 years (our Swiss sapphire supplier as an example). We are confident about our quality.

The mix of swiss and international manufactures allow us to offer you the watch on Indiegogo and later for a good price. 

To ensure the quality of every single WICKED WATCH, we sourced and tested all materials ourselves. For example the sapphire crystal, the luminous powder, the movements, just to name a few. We have been on this journey for more than 2 years, and we are just at the beginning.

Our mission has always been: deliver the best quality/price ratio.

THE REVIEWS

Take a look at what independent watch reviewers say about our PEARL DIVER wristwatch.

Random Rob "Wicked Watch Co Pearl Diver" 

 

 

WatchChris "Wicked Watch Co The Pearl Diver - INSANE BLINDING LUME - Bronze Swiss Made Automatic $329" 

 
 
WatchGeek "
 

 

Watch Addiction Watch Reviews

 
Consigli per gli acquisti
 

You can find all reviews here: https://www.wickedwatch.ch/reviews

 

THE TIMELINE

 

FULL SPECS

 

STP1-11

BEHIND THE SCENES

Arranging NH35A prototypes

Videoshooting

Photoshooting

 

THE BOX

We have been thinking long time about the box..... What shall we do, keep the original design with the cork box, or do we completely change it. Eventually we decided to go with the second option. Who uses these big heavy boxes anyway?!

We offer our bronze pearl diver with our hand made, genuine leather travel pouch for up to 3 watches. We selected the vintage brown leather with crazy horse treatment (wax) to achieve a nice vintage look. 

On the inside we covered the leather with a microfiber to protect the watches from rough surfaces. 

Custom made wallets for manual, tools etc.

 

A SPECIAL THANKS

At this point I would like to take a minute and thank some people that supported me so far.... 

First of all my beautiful wife, she is my motivation to keep going and creating beautiful watches! Without her support, I wouldn't be able to make this project happen. Thank you so much my soulmate! I love you!

The next one goes to my team and suppliers, I know it can be very difficult to deal with me and my wishes. So thank you for being patient and deliver what I want, what I really really want! :-D Can't wait for our next project! 

The next shout out goes to the reviewer, they have done a great job testing our prototypes and gave us essential feedbacks for improvements. 

And of course, a big thank you to every backer that supports this project! You will be the ones that make it actually happen at the end. With your support we are able to follow our dreams! 

 

CHANGES

Some features of the watches change on the production version, here you find what:

  • Shorter hour hand, a bit longer second hand
  • Spring bars instead of screw bars for easier strap removal
  • 15 min track on the bezel insert
  • NH35A Sapphire will have a blue shimmer AR-Coating
  • STP1-11 dials will have SWISS MADE printed at 6 o'clock
  • STP1-11 has titanium grade 2 case back
  • Anchor logos on buckle and crown exchanged with our W logo
  • WICKED on the logo disappears and our W logo made with lumicast will replace it

 

If you have any questions please do not bother contacting us, we are glad to help you. 

THE STRETCH GOALS

 

THE SHIPPING

If everything goes smooth as planned, the watches can be shipped in September 2021 (NH-Series) and October 2021 (STP-Series). We are keeping our followers with posts here or in our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/wickedwatchco updated. 

 

THE END

We are keeping our followers with posts here or in our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/wickedwatchco updated.  THE END

story:
VESUVIATE WATCHES wanted to create the ultimate tool-watches that are designed for people who live an active lifestyle, engineered for those inspired by their passion for air, land, and water sports.  Combining with more than three (3) decade of industry know-how specializing in exotic materials for harsh environments, precision engineering/machining, and horological experiences, we are utilizing only the best suitable materials and processes currently available that help to guarantee the performance of our watches in the most demanding environments and yet affordable.

All the pictures and videos taken were from the six (6) pieces of fully working prototypes developed to determine the feasibility of various solutions, to resolve technical risks, evaluate the compatibility of the components, and determine the performance.  Hence, the final product will differ in some ways. Following are some of the preliminary changes for the production model:

  • Lume Super-LumiNova – BGW9 for the hour and minute hands will be applied thicker to brighten the hands lume further.
  • Black dial will retain the original prototype color as per all the feedback I have received, as some referred to as dark chocolate brown or coffee color.
  • The red dial will have chrome second-hand.
  • Miyota 9015 will be Gilt (factory gold plated) instead of standard.
  • Leather straps add-on to Attivo with center links and custom-made genuine leather straps are now available, consist of leather straps, deployant clasp and center links (sold separately, in case you would like extra leather straps), pictures below are for illustration purposes only.

All pictures, technical drawings, renderings and videos belong to Vesuviate, except the Miyota 9015 caliber pictures which belong to Citizen Watch Co., Ltd.

Case & Bracelets:  Stainless steel 316L with case/surface hardening heat treatment.  SS 316L has very low carbon content with a maximum of only 0.035% and has corrosion and magnetic resistance; hence, it is widely used in the food and medical industries, as well as diving equipment and marine applications.  Despite its relatively good hardness @ 222HV (HV = Vickers Hardness) compared to the 904L @ 149HV, we have decided to use case hardening heat treatment to harden the surface of the 316L to the hardness value of 1,100HV +/- 10% to improve the wear resistance further. The thermos-chemical process* diffuses nitrogen into the surface of the 316L, bombarding the surface with energetic nitrogen ions, which allow nitrogen ions to diffuse and form a case-hardened surface (Note: This is NOT a “coating” process per se that merely applying a thin layer of covering e.g. powder, epoxy, electroplating or chrome, which supposes to be a “shell” or “skin” over the metal which will eventually peel, crack or flake off due to lack of adhesion between the covering the substrate).  Through the heat treatment process, the 316L will not only become more scratch-resistant, but its performance, working lifespan, strain limit, and fatigue strength will also be enhanced, other advantages of this process are the low-temperature range to avoid shape distortion and maintaining 316L corrosion resistance properties.

*Note. This heat-treating process has existed since the 1920s; however, it only started gaining popularity in the last three decades. Due to its increasing popularity, further developments were made to create a more efficient process that can be accurately controlled with lower costs.  Vesuviate Watches is neither the inventor nor the proprietary owner of this industrial heat-treating process (Disclaimer – The use of such a process does not infringe the Patents or other intellectual property rights of any Third Party).

Case Dimensions – 39mm width with a lug-to-lug length of 46.2mm.  The overall thickness is 11.00mm measured at the apex of the sapphire (dome height 0.55mm), thus making it a rather slim tool-watch with a thickness of just 10.45mm. (at edge height).

Crown:  7mm diameter, screw-down SS 316L.

Bracelets Dimensions:  24mm connected with central links at 16mm between the lugs with solid links, butterfly deployant clasp – 22mm.  All components SS 316L, case/surface-hardened.

Watch Crystal:  2.55mm thick Domed Sapphire Crystal with five (5) layers of quarter-wavelength interference coatings that give consistently low reflectance over a wide visible spectrum.  (Note. The quality of the Anti-Reflection depends upon the number of layers/stack coatings applied to the crystals).  Sapphire is chosen in favor of mineral crystal for its resistance to scratches and shattering.  Similar to Ceramic, the hardness of Sapphire is 2,000HV.

Lume:  Super-LumiNova – BGW9 (Day - White, Night - Blue-Green), Grade A pigment is chosen for its excellent afterglow performance.  This material is 100% Swiss-made, non-radioactive, REACH compatible, high temperature, environmental resistance, and complies with ISO 3157:1991 requirements.

Water Resistance:  Rating - 10 ATM / 100m / 330ft.  This watch is designed to withstand underwater depths of at least 100 meters which meets the ISO 6425 requirement.  Hence, it is safe for recreational sports such as swimming, free/skin diving.

Case back:  Exhibition flat Sapphire Crystal with inner anti-reflective (AR) coating.

Movement/Caliber – The heart of the watch - Miyota 9015 Gilt caliber, is considered to be the workhorse of the industry. Since 2009, it's been widely considered to be a proven movement that is easy to service; it is also one of the slimmest automatic calibers at just 3.90mm thick.  It is equipped with quick date correction via hacking – i.e. time setting with the second-hand halt mechanism, self-winding – unidirectional, 24 jewels and with a typical power reserve of 42 hours, frequency of 28,800 beats per hour, 4 Hz (Eight vibrations a second, providing a smooth action second hand but unlike the high-beat movements i.e. ≥36,000 vph that are subject to strain on their internal workings that required more frequent maintenance to deal with the added friction), accuracy of -10 ~ +30 second (per day).  Note: Miyota just started offering the fully factory original gilt plated caliber for their 9015 from 2019; you can be assured that you have the newest caliber from Miyota.

Note:  The production model will have the factory gold plated Cal. 9015 Gilt instead of the standard Cal. 9015 as shown in this picture.

Note:  The production model will have the factory gold plated Cal. 9015 Gilt as per this picture of Vesuviate previous model – Doppio.

Warranty:   Our watch is warranted for two (2) years from the date of purchase against any and all manufacturer’s defects.  Any damage resulting from improper handling, extreme use, accident, or negligence is not covered under this warranty.

Original Rendering

Technical Drawing

Technical Drawing

Technical Drawing

Technical Drawing

Technical Drawing

Technical Drawing

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

A poll was conducted with the members of the Micro-Brand Watches Groups to determine the majority sentiment of a wooden presentation box or travel watch case and the vast majority prefer travel watch cases rather than another box. This travel case has been selected as it can hold up to two watches but is also comfortable to carry around with you, yet small enough to fit in your hand luggage.

 

 

How many layers of luminous (Lume) on the dial markers and hands?

Luminous phosphorescent (in short – Lume) comprises pigments and a binder (i.e. varnish).  After mixed, the mixture will be applied with an applicator to “flow” evenly over the hands and markers in one go to achieve a smooth finish (this is unlike paint where you would brush over or spray layers onto the surface, and is more like pouring onto the workpiece like pancake batter).  To achieve a strong lume, larger particle-sized pigments can be used, but this will make it difficult to achieve a really smooth finish; alternatively, we have decided to use top-quality pigments instead.  We have therefore chosen to use Super-LumiNova Grade A.

Is the watch scratch-proof?

No, the watch is scratch-resistant; we have increased the hardness of the 316L from 222HV to the hardness value of 1,100HV +/- 10% to further improve the wear resistance (i.e. almost five times, which is equivalent to the hardness of hard chrome).  In our daily lives, there are many objects that have higher hardness values such as steel tools e.g. the hardened tip of a screwdriver or other tools with applied diamond coating or tungsten carbide (1,600HV) which are as hard as or harder than the watch and are capable of scratching its surface.

Case Diameter – 39mm

A square watch of 39mm has more surface area than a round watch of 39mm. If you just compare the area for both the square and round watches:

•           The area of a 39 x 39mm square is 1,521 mm².

•           The area of a 39mm diameter round is 1,195 mm².

Therefore, if you are not considering the lugs, a 39mm square watch will wear bigger than a 39mm round watch. The diameter of a circle with a 1,521 mm² area is more like 44mm. Hence, a 39mm square watch will have a similar wrist presence (surface area) to a 44mm round watch. But in my opinion, visually it is closer to a 42mm watch.

Integrated Bracelets:

The design of the bracelets is not just for aesthetic but to create the strongest link for the watch since all of our models are intended to be a tool-watch that can withstand daily abuse (Note. The link is the weakest design of the entire assembly which will subject to the twists and turns and generally will be deformed over the years), integrated bracelets are the strongest but with a slight tweak and we have given Attivo hybrid integrated bracelets (see picture). The bracelets is 24mm connected with central links at 16mm between the lugs (all solid) case/surface-hardened to the hardness value of 1,100HV +/- 10% to improve the wear resistance further.

Where are the watches manufactured?

The case, bracelet in Hong Kong, SS 316L raw materials, sapphire crystal, hands and heat treatment from China, dial from Taiwan, caliber 9015 Gilt from Miyota Japan, and final casing up in Hong Kong.

Where are the watches shipped from?

The most effective eCommerce shipping strategy is to ship from China via FedEx (in-lieu of postal services) for the safety and security of your delivery with faster transit times, “track and trace” to your doorstep in the destination country.

How much does shipping cost?

Shipping and handling cost worldwide is included in the price.  However, you are responsible for your own country’s import duty and tax.

Who took the pictures and videos for this campaign?

All the pictures and videos shown in the campaign were taken by me, as a start-up, and to keep my costs as low as possible, I do not have the budget to hire professionals specialized in product photography/videography. 

Many have asked what does the brand name and logo represent? 

The brand name and the logo are registered trademarks of the business, the name was referring to the volcanic eruption of Mount Vesuvius, hence “Vesuviate” and the logo above is to depict the fire flame during the eruption.  The fire flame was revised to a fireball so that it can be used as a 360-degree logo for the watch crown and clasp.  Mount Vesuvius, a volcano near the Bay of Naples in Italy, its most famous eruption took place in the year 79 A.D., where it buried the ancient Roman city of Pompeii under a thick carpet of volcanic ash, two thousand people died, and the city was abandoned until it was rediscovered by a group of explorers in 1748.  Mount Vesuvius last erupted in March 1944 – see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pompeii

How to contact you?

I can be contacted via info@vesuviate.com, please be aware of the time difference UTC/GMT +8 hours (Singapore), there may be a delay in responses.

Delivery Schedule:  The common risks that affect the supply chain fall into two (2) areas i.e. delays and disruptions.  Delays can be transportation issues due to bad weather or quality control with the suppliers.  Disruption risks such as Force Majeure events include natural disasters, riots.  We have taken consideration of all the risks as part of our ongoing risk management process, will actively mitigate throughout the process and passively, we have added buffer into our timeline and will constantly providing updates to the schedule.

Customs:  We will ship your watches worldwide for free; however, you are responsible for your own country’s import duty and tax.  Countries with the highest trade barriers tend to be very slow in processing; you should expect longer delivery times.  For countries with Customs that are very strict with packages that arrive for individuals, we cannot guarantee that they will release the package; if your package has arrived in-country and held at Customs, we will work with you and the courier company to help you prepare the correct documents and for you to pay for the duty on the watch.
