story:
In these current times, it’s more important than ever to use clean makeup tools for maintaining your skin health. However, keeping up with the required regular cleaning is near-impossible with just hand-washing because it is tedious, time-consuming and impractical.

 

With hand-washing still the only cleaning method for makeup brushes and sponges, it's no surprise that only 6.5% of us bother at all. Requiring standing over the sink scrubbing away for several minutes and using several liters of water to clean and rinse your tools, it is a time-consuming, wasteful, impractical and ineffective process that usually ends in failure and frustration.

Persistent makeup stains, rips from nails digging into the delicate surface of sponges, soap residue lodged deep in the pores, shedding brush fibers, dry hands from the prolonged exposure to water and total destruction from suspect hacks are only a few of the failings of the routine.​

 

You use machines to clean your dishes and laundry...

...because they are repetitive tasks, and machines save time, energy and overall hassle. In the same way, cleaning of your makeup tools is a repetitive task that is a machine’s job, which is the reason we created FACE IT 2-IN-1!

FACE IT 2-IN-1 is the world’s first washing machine that cleans both makeup brushes & sponges without hassle & effort.

FACE IT 2-IN-1 conveniently switches between brush and sponge washing, cleaning several brushes within 3 minutes and sponges within 5 minutes, all without damaging the brush hairs or ripping the sponges. It is completely mess-free, kills 99% of germs, removes all makeup stains, rinses out completely without odor and saves water.
 


This is all the evidence you need to see how FACE IT 2-IN-1 effortlessly cleans both makeup brushes & sponges.

Watch how FACE IT cleans your makeup sponges...

 
...and watch how FACE IT cleans your makeup brushes.
 
 
 

 

Never use a grimy, dirty brush or sponge on your skin again. FACE IT 2-IN-1 antibacterial cleanser kills 99% of bacteria and completely removes stubborn makeup stains regardless of the shade.

 

 

FACE IT 2-IN-1 easily switches from brush to sponge cleaning. Simply detach the sponge-cleaning brush, then attach the brush-holder to the lid. Simple!

 

 

The oscillating cleaning mat is gentle on the smooth surfaces of sponges and do not cause rips and tears. They also gently comb through your brush hairs to remove deep stains without distorting or shedding the brush hairs, whether natural or synthetic.

 

 

FACE IT 2-IN-1 uses minimal water compared to hand-washing with a complete cycle requiring only 1 liter of water to wash and rinse thoroughly.

 

 

FACE IT switches between two cleaning modes to do the jobs of two machines, hence saving you the cost of two separate machines.

 

 
 

 

 

FACE IT is a 2-IN-1 washing machine for both makeup brushes and sponges that eliminates hand-washing so you can conveniently clean your makeup tools whenever you want and as often as you like. Just load your makeup tools, add water, antibacterial cleanser, press start & walk away. 

 

The specially formulated antibacterial cleanser kills 99.99% of germs, completely removes all makeup stains and rinses out cleanly without leaving soap residue or odor.

 

Two substantial machines combined into one saves you the cost of buying 2 separate machines and also clutter on your counter top!

 

 

Hand-washing your makeup brushes not only takes effort and time, it also damages and destroys brush hairs because of the aggressive manipulation to remove makeup stains from deep inside the brush hairs.

 

The patent-pending oscillation motion of it cleaning mats allow FACE IT 2-IN-1 to gently remove makeup stains from your makeup tools without damaging them. The consistent motion lifts stains from deep within the tools removing them quickly and effectively without abrasion. FACE IT also removes bacteria during the cleaning process to leave your tools not only clean but sterilized.

 

 

FACE IT cleans brushes in a short 3 minute during which the cleaning mats gently comb through the makeup brush hairs for a deep clean that removes makeup stains even at the center. This gentle process prevents the brush hairs from distortion, shedding and fraying common with hand-washing.

 

 

The cleaning mats gently rub against makeup sponges to remove even deep stubborn stains without damaging the delicate surface. This consistent rubbing is safer for the sponges than the aggressive, pinching and pounding common with hand-washing.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are passionate about conservation of our planet and committed to assisting in global efforts  to preserve the planet for ours and future generations. Firstly, FACE IT helps you easily clean your makeup sponges so that last longer and fewer end up in the environment. Secondly, we will donate 5% of all profits from our campaign to ocean reef conservation to help our planet's dying coral reefs. We are therefore counting on your pledges.  

Please share our campaign on social media and include the hashtag #SAVETHESPONGE to help create awareness to this worthy cause. Thank you so much.

 

It's been 6 years since the idea for FACE IT was first conceived and we've had fun watching its evolution from a mere idea to a final world-first product to be enjoyed by you and millions globally.

The completion of this journey is thanks to our capable and amazing design team at D2M, and equally dedicated manufacturing partners Advanced Bonding Ltd.

We really couldn't have done it without their tireless efforts.

 

FACE IT comes to you by JOI, a brand focused on understanding your daily beauty needs, and providing you with innovative and versatile solutions that solve these real-life challenges.  

Both JOI and FACE IT were founded by me, Andrea Alli, a busy modern woman and (very) restless product engineer. After endless searches and failure to find suitable solutions to some pretty basic daily beauty challenges, I took matters into my own hands...and JOI was born.  

Today, we're a global team of engineers, designers, marketing, sales, manufacturing, and logistics experts. From our London-based R&D HQ, we design and develop beauty tools perfected to provide the level of customization, personalization, and convenience expected of modern day beauty solutions.  

JOI has high expectations of its products and we work hard to deliver multiple benefits that simply your beauty routine. FACE 2-IN-1 is no different.  

 

JOI products based on merit and are currently sold in top nationwide retailers; The Grommet, Amazon.com, Nordstrom, Urban Outfitters, QVC. 

Be sure to join us on our various social media platforms to stay updated about all things FACE IT (click to connect)!



Or, click below to speak to one of our team 24/7 via Facebook Messenger.

We are consumers too and will not return if not treated right where we shop - even if a crowdfunding campaign. Plus, we don’t like mean businesses that can’t stand by the quality of their products.

Like us, our manufacturers are very nice people and we understand that sometimes despite our best intentions, things do go wrong. This is why we offer you our extended 12 months warranty period from the date you receive your reward, during which time we will replace any faulty product free of charge.  

So, if you have any issues with your reward within 12 months of receipt or you just want to reach out to us for anything else, please do so at penpals@JOIbeautyofficial.com. We love to read emails and we promise to respond within 24 working hours (but be warned, we work very strange hours, so don’t be alarmed when you get a reply at strange times).

 

Running a crowdfunding campaign allows us to gather real customer opinions and deliver a product that’s perfect for the people who want to use it. Your funds will allow us to start manufacturing FACE IT 2-in-1 and bring you an automated solution to clean both your makeup brushes & sponges. When you back us on Indiegogo, you cut out the middle-woman and get the product directly from us—the people who dreamed it up. That allows us to pass the savings on to you. When you come on board early on, you get a big discount to say “Thanks” for joining us on the journey to create FACE IT.

Just as a reminder—our manufacturing partner is ready to go, and our prototype is fully tested. Your FACE IT will ship in January 2021, just in time to kick off 2021.

 

 

 

Will FACE IT 2-in-1 damage my premium brushes?

No. The cleaning action of FACE IT is a gentle “combing” process that passes cleanly through brush hairs without pulling or distorting. This helps remove stains quickly without scrubbing that cause brush hair shedding, splaying and deformation.

 

What’s the average use you can get out of sponges with this cleaning system?

Our tests prove that good quality sponges washed 300 times with FACE IT showed no sign of degradation. FACE IT does not damage sponges thanks to the gentle brushes that support and protect during washing. This is unlike hand-washing that tears and rips the sponge from long manicures and the abrasive pressure applied to forcibly shift makeup stains. However, sponges do degrade naturally with use and should be replaced when they start to show signs of wear.

 

What type of cleanser does FACE IT 2-IN-1 use?

FACE IT uses a specially formulated cosmetic-grade antibacterial cleanser that cuts through makeup stains but gentle enough to prevent damage to brush hairs and sponges. It rinses out easily and entirely with minimal water, kills 99.99% of germs and free from fragrance.

 

Will FACE IT clean old makeup stains in my current brushes & sponges?

Absolutely! FACE IT was designed to clean even ingrained stains and is effective against all types of stains. We do however recommend frequent cleaning of your brushes & sponges to prevent makeup drying on as fresh makeup comes off faster. Additionally, we like fresh starts and it may just be a good time to start afresh with a fresh new set of tools? Just saying.

 

Can FACE IT clean brushes with natural hairs?

Yes! The gentle cleaning process of FACE IT combined with the specially formulated cleanser will protect natural hairs while cleaning. FACE IT gently removes makeup stains from the delicate premium hairs without shedding, bending or splaying.

 

What are the ingredients of the cleanser?

Our cleanser is cosmetic-grade formulation suitable for all normal skin types. It has antibacterial properties that eliminates 99.99% of bacteria which in these COVID-19 times is essential for your skincare. The main ingredient list is below. (Feel free to contact us if you require further information.)

 

How frequently can I clean my brushes & sponges with FACE IT?

We recommend after every use because FACE IT makes it convenient to do so. Plus it’s safer for your tools when you wash the makeup out of them after every use before they dry up and become harder to remove.

 

Can I clean my dry sponges and brushes in FACE IT?

No. You should first wet the sponges and brushes in water and squeeze out the excess liquid before putting them into FACE IT. This assists the operation and aids faster cleaning.

 

Does FACE IT dry brushes?

No, because force-drying your brushes damages the brush hairs. Brushes should be air-dried at room temperature when even the thickest brushes will dry within 12 hours. We always advise that you have 2 sets of brushes so that you always have the spare to use while your other set dries out.

 

Does FACE IT dry sponges?

No, because only air-drying is recommended for sponges to preserve their integrity.

 

Can I use shampoos and dish soap in my FACE IT?

No. FACE IT is a washing machine like your dishwasher and laundry washing machine that use specially formulated detergents that are quick to rinse, therefore saving water and time.

 

What are the risks?

With the uncertainty in the world, there is a chance shipping would be delayed slightly. We will keep our crowdfunding community up to date about all stages of the manufacturing process and communicate any (unlikely) changes in shipping schedule promptly.

 

Can I just wait until January and buy FACE IT once it’s on the market?

You can — but you’ll pay full price! When you join our crowdfunding community, you let us know you’re here to support us in bringing FACE IT to market. We appreciate your belief in us. Because you risk a little bit by joining us at this stage (mostly you risk impatience while waiting these few months till January!) we can offer you a special discounted price.
story_txt:
In these current times, it’s more important than ever to use clean makeup tools for maintaining your skin health. However, keeping up with the required regular cleaning is near-impossible with just hand-washing because it is tedious, time-consuming and impractical. 

With hand-washing still the only cleaning method for makeup brushes and sponges, it's no surprise that only 6.5% of us bother at all. Requiring standing over the sink scrubbing away for several minutes and using several liters of water to clean and rinse your tools, it is a time-consuming, wasteful, impractical and ineffective process that usually ends in failure and frustration.Persistent makeup stains, rips from nails digging into the delicate surface of sponges, soap residue lodged deep in the pores, shedding brush fibers, dry hands from the prolonged exposure to water and total destruction from suspect hacks are only a few of the failings of the routine.​ 

You use machines to clean your dishes and laundry......because they are repetitive tasks, and machines save time, energy and overall hassle. In the same way, cleaning of your makeup tools is a repetitive task that is a machine’s job, which is the reason we created FACE IT 2-IN-1!FACE IT 2-IN-1 is the world’s first washing machine that cleans both makeup brushes & sponges without hassle & effort.FACE IT 2-IN-1 conveniently switches between brush and sponge washing, cleaning several brushes within 3 minutes and sponges within 5 minutes, all without damaging the brush hairs or ripping the sponges. It is completely mess-free, kills 99% of germs, removes all makeup stains, rinses out completely without odor and saves water. 

This is all the evidence you need to see how FACE IT 2-IN-1 effortlessly cleans both makeup brushes & sponges.
Watch how FACE IT cleans your makeup sponges...

 
...and watch how FACE IT cleans your makeup brushes.
 

 
   Never use a grimy, dirty brush or sponge on your skin again. FACE IT 2-IN-1 antibacterial cleanser kills 99% of bacteria and completely removes stubborn makeup stains regardless of the shade.   FACE IT 2-IN-1 easily switches from brush to sponge cleaning. Simply detach the sponge-cleaning brush, then attach the brush-holder to the lid. Simple!   The oscillating cleaning mat is gentle on the smooth surfaces of sponges and do not cause rips and tears. They also gently comb through your brush hairs to remove deep stains without distorting or shedding the brush hairs, whether natural or synthetic.   FACE IT 2-IN-1 uses minimal water compared to hand-washing with a complete cycle requiring only 1 liter of water to wash and rinse thoroughly.  FACE IT switches between two cleaning modes to do the jobs of two machines, hence saving you the cost of two separate machines.     FACE IT is a 2-IN-1 washing machine for both makeup brushes and sponges that eliminates hand-washing so you can conveniently clean your makeup tools whenever you want and as often as you like. Just load your makeup tools, add water, antibacterial cleanser, press start & walk away.  The specially formulated antibacterial cleanser kills 99.99% of germs, completely removes all makeup stains and rinses out cleanly without leaving soap residue or odor. Two substantial machines combined into one saves you the cost of buying 2 separate machines and also clutter on your counter top!   Hand-washing your makeup brushes not only takes effort and time, it also damages and destroys brush hairs because of the aggressive manipulation to remove makeup stains from deep inside the brush hairs. The patent-pending oscillation motion of it cleaning mats allow FACE IT 2-IN-1 to gently remove makeup stains from your makeup tools without damaging them. The consistent motion lifts stains from deep within the tools removing them quickly and effectively without abrasion. FACE IT also removes bacteria during the cleaning process to leave your tools not only clean but sterilized.   FACE IT cleans brushes in a short 3 minute during which the cleaning mats gently comb through the makeup brush hairs for a deep clean that removes makeup stains even at the center. This gentle process prevents the brush hairs from distortion, shedding and fraying common with hand-washing.   The cleaning mats gently rub against makeup sponges to remove even deep stubborn stains without damaging the delicate surface. This consistent rubbing is safer for the sponges than the aggressive, pinching and pounding common with hand-washing.          We are passionate about conservation of our planet and committed to assisting in global efforts  to preserve the planet for ours and future generations. Firstly, FACE IT helps you easily clean your makeup sponges so that last longer and fewer end up in the environment. Secondly, we will donate 5% of all profits from our campaign to ocean reef conservation to help our planet's dying coral reefs. We are therefore counting on your pledges.  Please share our campaign on social media and include the hashtag #SAVETHESPONGE to help create awareness to this worthy cause. Thank you so much. It's been 6 years since the idea for FACE IT was first conceived and we've had fun watching its evolution from a mere idea to a final world-first product to be enjoyed by you and millions globally.The completion of this journey is thanks to our capable and amazing design team at D2M, and equally dedicated manufacturing partners Advanced Bonding Ltd.We really couldn't have done it without their tireless efforts. FACE IT comes to you by JOI, a brand focused on understanding your daily beauty needs, and providing you with innovative and versatile solutions that solve these real-life challenges.  Both JOI and FACE IT were founded by me, Andrea Alli, a busy modern woman and (very) restless product engineer. After endless searches and failure to find suitable solutions to some pretty basic daily beauty challenges, I took matters into my own hands...and JOI was born.  Today, we're a global team of engineers, designers, marketing, sales, manufacturing, and logistics experts. From our London-based R&D HQ, we design and develop beauty tools perfected to provide the level of customization, personalization, and convenience expected of modern day beauty solutions.  JOI has high expectations of its products and we work hard to deliver multiple benefits that simply your beauty routine. FACE 2-IN-1 is no different.   JOI products based on merit and are currently sold in top nationwide retailers; The Grommet, Amazon.com, Nordstrom, Urban Outfitters, QVC. Be sure to join us on our various social media platforms to stay updated about all things FACE IT (click to connect)!Or, click below to speak to one of our team 24/7 via Facebook Messenger.We are consumers too and will not return if not treated right where we shop - even if a crowdfunding campaign. Plus, we don’t like mean businesses that can’t stand by the quality of their products.Like us, our manufacturers are very nice people and we understand that sometimes despite our best intentions, things do go wrong. This is why we offer you our extended 12 months warranty period from the date you receive your reward, during which time we will replace any faulty product free of charge.  So, if you have any issues with your reward within 12 months of receipt or you just want to reach out to us for anything else, please do so at penpals@JOIbeautyofficial.com. We love to read emails and we promise to respond within 24 working hours (but be warned, we work very strange hours, so don’t be alarmed when you get a reply at strange times). Running a crowdfunding campaign allows us to gather real customer opinions and deliver a product that’s perfect for the people who want to use it. Your funds will allow us to start manufacturing FACE IT 2-in-1 and bring you an automated solution to clean both your makeup brushes & sponges. When you back us on Indiegogo, you cut out the middle-woman and get the product directly from us—the people who dreamed it up. That allows us to pass the savings on to you. When you come on board early on, you get a big discount to say “Thanks” for joining us on the journey to create FACE IT.Just as a reminder—our manufacturing partner is ready to go, and our prototype is fully tested. Your FACE IT will ship in January 2021, just in time to kick off 2021.   Will FACE IT 2-in-1 damage my premium brushes? No. The cleaning action of FACE IT is a gentle “combing” process that passes cleanly through brush hairs without pulling or distorting. This helps remove stains quickly without scrubbing that cause brush hair shedding, splaying and deformation. What’s the average use you can get out of sponges with this cleaning system?Our tests prove that good quality sponges washed 300 times with FACE IT showed no sign of degradation. FACE IT does not damage sponges thanks to the gentle brushes that support and protect during washing. story:
Overview

 

Hello there! We’re Shoevenir, a footwear start-up based in Porto. For a year and a half, we mixed traveling, art, and sustainability to develop game-changing sneakers.

A Shoevenir is a small treasure that will make you remember the places you visited, the people you met, the routes you took, and the monuments that enchanted you. These memories will be immortalized in a sneaker that can transmit good energy at each step taken.

Sneakers, Art and Love

 

People have been rediscovering the joys of both modern and contemporary styles. It’s time to break free from old conceptions of who and what we should be. Because of that, we have created unisex sneakers.

 

Models

 

Our first shoevenir edition is inspired by Portuguese locations. We are very proud to call home one of the best destinations on the planet and we will reward you if you explore it with us.

 

WEAR IT WITH ANY OUTFIT 

 

Get Rewards

 

Materials

For over a year we searched for the components that better fit our sustainability goals. Call it eco-fashion if you like, we think it’s just common sense.

Details

 

 

Box & Postcard

 

We use 100% recycled boxes and paper manufactured in Portugal with the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) and Programme for the Endorsement of Forest Certification (PEFC) certifications. We hope you can give it a second life after receiving the sneakers – maybe store some other memories in there

The box also comes with a postcard created by a super talented artist that teleports you to an amazing place.

 

 

Production Process

Production will be 100% Portuguese and we guarantee that all suppliers and components comply with the ethical standards of a fair society.

We do not want to contribute to a precarious labor market where the low cost of production is valued to the maximum.

 

                        

                        

 

Our supply chain will be centered in the north of the country so that we can understand the production processes and working conditions of suppliers. In addition, we significantly reduce our ecological footprint by not requiring long trips to bring all the components together.

 

Pre-Order

 

 

Chose any of the perks on the right side of the screen to help us reach our goal. If we don’t reach it, your card won’t be charged, so don’t be afraid to make this project come true <3

 

 

 

Pre-Order

How do I get my sneakers?

1. Choose a pledge 

Choose one of the pledges on the top-right side of this page. You can choose only one pledge.

2. Payment

Enter your payment information. Your payment is secure and you will not be charged until the very end of this campaign.

3. Choose your shoe size, color, and shipping details

You don’t need to worry about that yet. You will choose your shoe size and your shoe color after the campaign ends. We will send detailed instructions to you on how to choose your shoe size and your colors after the campaign ends on October. Right now, if you want to pre-order your shoes, you just need to choose your pledge and proceed with the payment. 

Besides getting a discount you are also getting amazing gifts such as t-shirts or tote bags. That is what you get for believing in this project!

 

The shipping fees may vary according to the delivery destination.
*FREE SHIPPING TO PORTUGAL*

 

When will I get my sneakers?

Crowdfunding works through pre-orders. Once our campaign ends in October, we will start with the production of your sneakers. Deliveries of finished sneakers are expected to start during December - the best Christmas gift!

 

The Team

 

 

We’ve faced many challenges this year. We have risked our savings to get here, in addition to investing a huge amount of our free time outside our normal jobs. Finding a factory that would take a chance on our project was the first challenge. Choosing high-quality materials that matched our brand’s values and creating an eye-catching image to identify us were also challenges that we have successfully overcome. 
We promise to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues that may arise. We will do everything we can to eliminate any possible interruption during production and delivery. If something unexpected happens, we will keep you up to date.

 

VIEWS IN YOUR SHOES

This is just the start of a huge sneaker revolution. If you are an artist that wants to work with us to create a new edition or if you want your own shoevenir customized, reach us via email.  

We have an ocean of possibilities for the next shoevenirs, what should we do next?

                         

 

 Thank you for believing in us and in yourself.

You have the world at your feet!

We will do everything we can to eliminate any possible interruption during production and delivery. If something unexpected happens, we will keep you up to date.

We have an ocean of possibilities for the next shoevenirs, what should we do next?
                          
 
 Thank you for believing in us and in yourself.
You have the world at your feet!

story:
Introducing the first Bugatti Smartwatch

The Bugatti Ceramique Edition One mirrors the unrivaled precision, artistry, and technology of the Bugatti hyper sports cars crafted in Molsheim.

 

The three new Bugatti smartwatch models are named after some of the luxury French brand’s most iconic hyper sports cars made in Molsheim: the Bugatti Ceramique Edition One Pur Sport, Bugatti Ceramique Edition One La Noire, and Bugatti Ceramique Edition One Divo.

 

 

Each luxury smartwatch is a stunning example of the seamless integration of more than 1,000 individual parts working together in perfect harmony to reach new levels of precision in timepiece design. Every piece is made by hand with meticulous attention to detail, produced by a team of renowned watchmakers. In an authentic example of engineering excellence, the brand’s smartwatches represent the same standard of quality and technical innovation of Bugatti’s own hyper sports car models.

 

The bezel and case of each luxury smartwatch are carefully sculpted and milled from scratch-resistant ceramic of the smallest tolerance, made possible by an ultra-precise CNC process. In a second process, the case and bezel are polished, brushed, and refined with special laser technology.

 

Experience the Bugatti Smartwatch with the following un-retouched video:

 
 

Experience the Bugatti Smartwatch app with the following un-retouched video:

 

Experience the Bugatti Challenge Mode with the following un-retouched video:

 

Experience the Bugatti Maps feature with the following un-retouched video:

 

Experience the Bugatti stop watch with the following un-retouched video:

 

Experience the Bugatti activity list with the following un-retouched video:

story:
You can send a personal touch message in two ways:

1. With the bear

 

2. With the iXu mobile companion app

 

The iXu mobile companion app features

 

The iXu App connects your loved one’s iXu bear to your smartphone via the internet. Using the iXu App, you can send a touch to your loved one by caressing your iXu bear’s back or stroking your smartphone touch screen.

Alternatively, you can send a recorded touch to be received later whenever your loved one wants. This is especially useful when your loved one is in a different time zone. You can also chat easily through the iXu App.

The iXu App is compatible with Android and iOS.

 

Summary of the iXu features

  • Mirroring touch anywhere in the world
  • Receiving and sending touch messages using the iXu bear
  • Two modes of operation: Real-time communication & recorded touch message
  • Two ways of sending a touch: Stroking iXu bear’s back & using a smartphone touch screen
  • On-line chatting with text messages
  • USB battery charging
  • Automatic sleep mode
  • Save your latest touch for later

 

 

 

 

 

 

“Humans have a deeply rooted craving to touch and be touched by another person - it’s known as touch hunger. It’s how we share feelings, bond with loved ones, and even relieve stress and pain. By developing iXu, we help families and couples live happier and healthier lives by growing and nurturing the feeling of closeness between people who are not together,” says JoyHaptics CEO and Co-founder Dr. Jussi Tuovinen.

“The JoyHaptics iXu Bear is the best possible way of realistically reproducing this form of required touch across long distances given the current technology available,” says Dr. Ajay Prabhu, an Advisor for JoyHaptics and COO of global engineering services giant QuEST Global.

“Decades of engineering have gone into transmitting sounds and pictures to help us feel connected with our loved ones, but it doesn’t capture the irreplaceable need we have to be touched and touch others. JoyHaptics is pioneering a new way forward with science-based, C-Tactile touch devices to create an even fuller and more personal experience for those people in long-distance relationships,” continues Prabhu. 

 

All about iXu 

 

Featured

 

 

 

 

 

Founded on an ambitious goal and a big heart

In 2014, Jussi Tuovinen, an award-winning engineer and scientist, found himself in a long-distance relationship. While he was working in Dublin, Ireland, his family lived in Espoo, Finland.

Despite the variety of options to stay in touch with his wife, Jussi noticed he was still missing something. The feeling of true closeness just wasn’t fully deliverable through mere words and seeing each other on screen.

Jussi saw this as a challenge, and where there’s a problem, there’s a solution. Jussi, together with his co-founder, Kai, went on to research different types of technical solutions and human psychology to create a humane, real-life experience of touch that can be sent over distance.

So began the story of JoyHaptics in 2015. To this day, Jussi and Kai have been perfecting the product to convey a true experience of caress and closeness. 

 

The science behind iXu by JoyHaptics

"We all need touch - How science and technology are helping long-distance relationships and beyond ", is the title of our whitepaper, which describes the science behind iXu by Joyhaptics.

Humans have a fundamental psychological, physical and social need to touch and to be touched by another person.... Read more READ MORE 

 

Our jorney through iXu`s product development

 

Follow us in

“The JoyHaptics iXu Bear is the best possible way of realistically reproducing this form of required touch across long distances given the current technology available,” says Dr. Ajay Prabhu, an Advisor for JoyHaptics and COO of global engineering services giant QuEST Global.
“Decades of engineering have gone into transmitting sounds and pictures to help us feel connected with our loved ones, but it doesn’t capture the irreplaceable need we have to be touched and touch others. JoyHaptics is pioneering a new way forward with science-based, C-Tactile touch devices to create an even fuller and more personal experience for those people in long-distance relationships,” continues Prabhu. 
 
All about iXu  Featured    
 
Founded on an ambitious goal and a big heart
In 2014, Jussi Tuovinen, an award-winning engineer and scientist, found himself in a long-distance relationship. While he was working in Dublin, Ireland, his family lived in Espoo, Finland.
Despite the variety of options to stay in touch with his wife, Jussi noticed he was still missing something. The feeling of true closeness just wasn’t fully deliverable through mere words and seeing each other on screen.
Jussi saw this as a challenge, and where there’s a problem, there’s a solution. Jussi, together with his co-founder, Kai, went on to research different types of technical solutions and human psychology to create a humane, real-life experience of touch that can be sent over distance.
So began the story of JoyHaptics in 2015. To this day, Jussi and Kai have been perfecting the product to convey a true experience of caress and closeness. 
 
The science behind iXu by JoyHaptics
"We all need touch - How science and technology are helping long-distance relationships and beyond ", is the title of our whitepaper, which describes the science behind iXu by Joyhaptics.
Humans have a fundamental psychological, physical and social need to touch and to be touched by another person.... Read more READ MORE 

 Our jorney through iXu`s product development Follow us in

story:
*If you are viewing this on mobile, you can swipe right through all the "perks" above to make a custom donation*

Hi! 

We're so happy you've stopped by! Here at Not Famous we have been very intentional about creating visual content for you to learn more about our brand. So.. before you read on, we encourage you to check out our videos! 

Our mission is to use sustainable fashion to raise awareness about how our daily lifestyle choices contribute to the climate crisis and encourage the necessary change for a cleaner environment. 

When we think about climate change and green house gas emissions we often think about cars, planes and giant power plants.. but what about the small things we do on a daily basis? The food we eat, the clothes we buy, the plastic we use... how does that affect climate change? 

Studies show Animal Agriculture as the #1 contributor of greenhouse gas emissions! The Fashion industry is the second largest polluter of water globally and plastic is killing our seas at an alarming rate! 

Simple lifestyle choices like, switching to a more plant based diet, ethical consumerism, buying sustainable fashion, switching to reusable water bottles and so much more, all help create a cleaner environment. 

"We want to make these things that aren't  Famous into something we're all conscious of because collectively, if we all make these small changes, we can change the world."

-Founder, Nick Norman

We have chosen fashion as a way to do this for a few reasons:

  • Every hat purchase is tackling the global waste crisis as it diverts discarded materials (plastic buckets, water bottles, soda cans and dead-stock fabric)  from going to landfills and oceans and instead getting transformed into Not Famous hats! 

  • Our ethical manufacturing also supports local artisans with fair working wages. 

 

  • Our unique and fun designs are totally different then the standard repetitive things you often see with sustainable fashion brands. These hats are something you will be proud to show off and a great conversation piece to spread the message!                                              Your Contribution will do 3 things:
  1. No more waiting! As these hats are each handmade, they take longer to produce. Your contribution will allow us to make a big initial order so going forward, nobody will have to wait for our hats!
  2. Cut Costs! This money will allow us to make an order size big enough to cut our costs, which in turn allows us to sell them at an affordable price! 
  3. DONATE. Each hat has a separate organization that it donates to (See Photos). For each hat purchase, you'll also be supporting a different environmental cause!

story:
Forsheer: Hosiery For Us 

My name is Porsha Tenea and I'm the founder of Forsheer -- that's hosiery for us.  I am a solopreneur and I love using my creativity to create products that aren't currently on the market. 

With that being said, this hosiery line is like no other. Being able to showcase our culture and unique style like never before is so exciting. Imagine making a statement without ever having to say one word? I assure you, you will not want to complete your fall and winter looks without our one-of-a-kind sheer hosiery. 

This is a passion product for me! In a world where many companies are capitalizing off our culture and ingenuity, this product is made by us and for us. Bringing this product to market has not been an easy feat, but we're finally gaining ground. I would love for you to contribute and become an early adopter.  This way, you'll be one of the first to own a pair of our gorgeously pretty, fashion hosiery.

With your help, I'll be able to complete production and launch our product in the Fall just in time for the holidays.  As an aside, this hosiery makes for a great gift. *winks*

I cannot express how grateful I am for you partnering with me. It means so much. Thank you!! I sincerely hope my story encourages someone not to give up, because with all the obstacles I faced, I surely wanted to walk away. I'm glad I persevered. 

With the help of my team, a quality, beautiful, comfortable, and sturdy hosiery product was produced with you in mind; one that is designed for an active lifestyle. I can't wait to see all the reviews and pictures of you in our lovely hosiery.

story:
Hi, again. Our new Smart Wallet collection. After our a previous successful campaign on Kickstarter, we are starting on Indiegogo!

We are now back with something special.

Today ，we have Good News for you guys. 

 

Quick to GET

Put in and get out coins in 1sec. Do you still fumble with a coin pouch or dig for the coins in your zipper wallet or empty your pocket? No worries, PLEI Wallet has your back!

       Open the side flap to remove only the coins in 1 second.

Simply drop the cash and coins into the big slot without separating them. It keeps a lot of coins safely without getting in the way. 

 

Quick to FIND

Your best life deserves the finding capacity of our most powerful and durable trackers. The smart front slot design of PLEI wallet is a perfect match for Tile slim tracker.

         

Just press twice on the wallet to make your phone ring even when it's on silent.

To find the wallet, just open the app.

Ring it if it's nearby or check the map for its last known location. 

Quick to ACCESS 

Open the front and the side flap at the same time to access the entire wallet to get the cash or card you need exactly and quickly.

PLEI has one big slot for all your cards, cash and coins. You can put all of them in together to save time without separating. Open the front and the side flap at the same time to get exactly the cash or card you need.

 

Quick to FILL

One big slot for all your cards, cash, coins, and more. 

You can put all of them in together to save time without separating.

 

Quick to TOUCH

A prime additional slot for your contactless card. The advantage of this slot is that you don't need to open your wallet every time you need to use your contactless card.

 

Minimalist Design

Elegant simplicity inspires our design, we tried to make it as simple, functional and beautiful as possible: no zipper, no threading, no glue.

Finally, we did it, one piece of leather + four snap fasteners= PLEI

 

Quality Materials

We choose the finest full grain leather from reputable suppliers. The leather is vegetable tanned using bark, branches and leaves. which minimizes the impact on the environment.

6 colors: black, red, green, tan, brown and dark blue. We choose the finest full grain leather from reputable suppliers. The leather is vegetable tanned using organic matter. This minimizes the impact on the environment. Because we use original leather without chemical treatment, the leather retinas its natural characteristics. Therefore each wallet will look slightly different in color, leather grain, etc.The 2 new colors! With Autumn approaching we've added brown and dark blue to replace pink and blue for a more seasonal look.

2 colors: pink and blue. Waxed/vintage leather is robust smooth leather to which an oily - waxy finish is applied. This provides the wallet a self-maintained feature, this soft and scratch-sensitive finished leather quickly gets a vintage-patina, which is the desired effect. Polish by dry clothes can make the leather darker which shows on the light pink and light blue sample wallet. The cost is little bit higher what you can see reflected in the perks.

Pocket Size and Big Capacity

 

It fits any pocket, but has a large capacity thanks to its unique square shape. It supports all sizes of  common currencies so its prefect when you travel. 

 

Key Ring

Same color to match your wallet.

Personalize Your Own Wallet

We can personalize your wallet with a custom monogram of up to 5 letters or numbers. No logo just a free monogram of your choice and remember! this is for FREE !!

 

RFID Blocking Card – a Gift for You

Simply insert the slim RFID blocking card into the big slot of the wallet. You can then use the contactless card in the front slot by blocking the RFID signal of all the other cards behind it or place it in the front pocket to protect against mobile scanners.

 

Risks and challenges

Throughout the past year, we have been working around the clock in refining our designs. Numerous prototypes have been developed, and countless hours have been spent making sure that PLEI Wallet will be as good as we intend it to be.

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life. Fortunately after extensive research, we have established a good relationship with a manufacturer that has many years of experience in the field and is able to work to our exact specifications.

During the production process, we expect to make minor changes to optimize the design for mass production.

We will be using a professional fulfillment company to handle the logistics of shipping, in order to ensure that that side of the operation is well covered.

If any issues arise, we'll contact you as timely and openly as possible.

About

Let us enjoy the wallet champions Competition

Round One  "Fill The Wallet"

Round Two "Remove The Coins Only"

Meet Our Winner: PLEI Wallet

Put in and get out coins in 1s

As a Londoner who lives in the busy city, I use cash, cards, and coins every day, it is really frustrating to keep the change. Do you still fumble with a coin pouch or dig for the coins in your zipper wallet or empty your pocket? No worries, the PLEI wallet gets you!

Simply drop the cash and coins into the big slot without separating. It keeps a lot of coins safety without getting in the way. Open the side flap to remove only the coins in 1 second.

Perfect for all daily transactions

Easy to keep and use cash and cards

PLEI has one big slot for all your cards, cash and coins. You can put all of them in together to save time without separating. Open the front and the side flap at the same time to get exactly the cash or card you need.

A prime additional slot for the contactless card

The advantage of this slot is that you don't need to open a wallet every time when you need your contactless card.

We include an RFID blocking card for free, simply put it in the main slot and it will protect all the cards behind it.

  Minimalist Design

The culture of elegant simplicity inspires the design, we try to make it as reliable and beautiful as possible: no zipper, no threading, no glue.

Finally, we did it, one piece of leather + four snap fasteners= PLEI

Quality Materials

We choose the finest full grain leather from reputable suppliers. The leather is vegetable tanned using bark, branches, and leaves. which minimizes the impact on the environment.

Pocket size and big capacity 

It fits any pocket but has a large capacity due to a unique square shape. It supports all common currencies size when you travel.

story:
About Me

Welcome to my Her Universe Fashion Show 2021 funding page!

My name is Kathryn Henzler, and I am what I like to define as a Renaissance Woman. I am a translator, composer, performer, designer, athlete, nerd, and animal-rights activist from the good old state of Ohio. I developed an interest in fashion in junior high school and started cosplaying a few years later. After 4 years at USC, where I got a B.A. in East Asian Languages and Cultures, I started doing costume and fashion design for independent films, museum exhibitions, figure skating, and theatre productions. Even after I got my MMus in Music Technology and Digital Media, I still make space in my career for fashion and sewing. Geek Couture is a large part of what I currently design, whether it is for runways, ice rinks, or conventions. I have used only vegan fabrics and other materials that are also organic, fair-trade, and eco-friendly whenever possible.

I am a veteran of the Her Universe Fashion Show, having competed in 2014, 2015, and 2019, and I can't wait to get to work on this year's look! Any little bit to help will be much appreciated in order to make this garment look the best it possibly can.

 

Fantasy + History + Gender Neutral

I envisioned a look for this year's show that will showcase elements of fantasy, historical dress, and would look great on people of any gender.

 

Material Cost Breakdown

Fabric: $200ish

Handmade Jewelry & Accessories: $200ish

Specialized Patterns (not for the main garment itself): $25ish

Notions: $25ish

 

Other Ways To Help

Even if you can’t contribute, I would be so, so grateful if you could spread the word around to your friends and followers on social media. The more support I can get, the better the outfit will be.

Thank you for your love and support, and enjoy the virtual show!

<3 Kathryn

story:
Feel The Power

Now you can focus on targeting unwanted fat, bulges, cellulite, skin lumps and bumps all in the comfort of your own home.

 

Powerful Micro-Vibration

The Fat Blaster uses powerful but gentle micro-vibration and micro-compression technology to target stored up fat hiding below the skin. Plus the Turbo smoothing waves gently spin to help smooth the skin surface for improved appearance.

 

 

 

Use the Cryotone Round head for controlled cooling. Then apply to help freeze unwanted fat cells and let the Fat Blaster do all the work. This helps to reduce bumps and lumps in your skin.*

 

The Cellulift head targets unwanted cellulite. The Lifting Rollers help activate the fat cells below the skin surface to use on your legs to help firm and sculpt.

 

 

The Smoothing Head for Skin smoothing & toning. The soothing  micro-fingers gently massage and help target your saggy arm skin – a problem area for many.

 

The Dry Brushing System has 3 different Fat Blasting cloths.

 

The Orange with Tourmaline for naturally generated heat therapy. The gentle friction creates Heat that activates and soothes your muscles at the same time.**

 

The White for skin smoothing and toning works to strengthen and tone muscles while firming the deeper layers of the skin.

 

And finish with the Blue to target bumps and bulges to massage your abs and love handles to help minimize the appearance of wrinkles, and imperfections.

 

 

 

Unlock Your Potential

The Fat Blaster cleverly combines both micro-vibration and micro-compression technology targeting fat cells. The treatment uses multiple rotating spheres, at an impressive 2300 rpms. But the Fat Blaster System goes beyond ordinary rotation, by adding triangular motion as well which creates a pulsating effect that blasts the fat from multiple angles and helps to contour the treated areas of your body. The fat has nowhere to hide.

 

Target Unwanted Fat

Now you can focus on targeting unwanted fat, bulges, cellulite, skin lumps and bumps all in the comfort of your own home.

The Fat Blaster brings the salon to you. Similar technology is being used in high end salons all around the world. The Compact design makes it simple and easy to use right in your own home. With the Fat Blaster, you save time and save money…

 

 

 

 

 

Fat Blaster Product:

Dimensions: 11 x 9 cm
Power Supply: AC100-240~50/60HZ
Output voltage / current: 12v / 2A
Power: Max 28W
Vibrations: Max 2300 rpm

 

Fat Blaster Includes:

  • 1x Massage device
  • 1x power cable
  • 1x Cryotone head
  • 1x Cellulift head
  • 1x Smoothing head
  • 1x Orange Cloth
  • 1x White Cloth
  • 1x Blue Cloth
  • 1x Instruction Manual

 

Warranty & Disclaimer Notices:

*Cryotone Head must be put in freezer overnight before use to maximize cooling benefits

** Heat Generated Naturally Via Friction

Damage caused by failure to follow the instructions, human factors, force maneuver, etc. is not covered by warranty. Maintenance cost will be charged for product out of warranty.

This is not a weight loss system. Cool Slim Inc™ does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use the FatBlaster due to many factors that can influence health and weight loss. Individual results may vary.

If you have the following conditions, please consult with your physician before using the unit.

  • Pregnant women or individuals who have undergone surgery and have inflamed or unhealed wounds.
  • Person who currently has an acute disease; has a history of heart problems; or has bone fractures that not healed completely; and other abnormal health conditions.
  • While using this unit, if you start to feel dizzy, lightheaded or uncomfortable, please stop the unit at once and consult your physician.

Do not continue use until you have the permission of your doctor.

In the process of the preparation of this page, we sought to make the content correct and complete. However, there is no guarantee that there are no errors or omissions in the page. We reserve the right to change specifications of the products mentioned in this page at any time without prior declaration. No part of this page shall be reproduced, transmitted, transcribed or stored in a searchable system or translated into any other languages without the written authorization of our company. The company is not responsible for the loss caused by non-standard or wrong operation. FDA Registration via Teleshop Inc.

THIS UNIT IS NOT A MEDICAL DEVICE.

FatBlaster is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease, illness, or medical condition. No individual result should be considered typical or guaranteed.

Product model, shape, design and color may vary

Backer is Responsible for ALL VAT & Customs charges that may occur.

But the Fat Blaster System goes beyond ordinary rotation, by adding triangular motion as well which creates a pulsating effect that blasts the fat from multiple angles and helps to contour the treated areas of your body. The fat has nowhere to hide. Target Unwanted FatNow you can focus on targeting unwanted fat, bulges, cellulite, skin lumps and bumps all in the comfort of your own home.The Fat Blaster brings the salon to you. Similar technology is being used in high end salons all around the world. The Compact design makes it simple and easy to use right in your own home. story:
What if you could have a mask that is comfortable to wear as long as you want to and protects you with a tailored fit? What if you could wear it out of pleasure like a pair of sunglasses.

Nuo 3D Mask is individually tailored with the help of AI to fit everyone, including kids, so you can wear it comfortably with style. It also comes with replaceable N95 filters that filtrates 98%+ particles to ensure that you are always breathing fresh air. 

 

 

Why Do You Need It?

 

3D Printed Mask - AI Tailored to you

Our mask is available in white, black, and blue.

 

Benefits:

Nuo Mask is stylish and comfortable to wear daily just like your sunglasses

 

As Seen In

 

 

 

 

Why Do You Need It?

 

Our mask is reusable with a replaceable filter system.​

Countless prototypes to ensure we deliver the best fit.

AI Designed and 3D Printed Prototypes for different facial profiles​ .

We use computational design and AI to transform measurements into a bespoke mask that fits you.​

A bespoke mask for each individual​

Problem With Current Masks:

Cotton masks often have leakage problems and filter only twelve percent of pollution particles, Disposable masks have leakage problems and they are uncomfortable to wear. 

Air Leakage is very common for disposable masks.

Our Solution:

We are creating a mask that is comfortable to wear and protects you with a tailored fit, more importantly,  we want you to wear this out of pleasure like a pair of sunglasses.

Our mask is 3D printed to fit perfectly and rest comfortably on your face with minimum leakage.

 

Replaceable filter offers four layers of filtration for clean and fresh air​.

 

Nuo 3D Mask comes with a replaceable filter that filters 99% of micropollutant particles, so you can always enjoy the fresh air. 

 

Dual Valve system, ergonomically designed for an easy breathing experience.​

Nuo 3D Mask is reusable and washable.

More importantly, Nuo 3D Mask can be personalized with a fully customizable label to make you special, so everyone can wear a stylish mask with a personal or family brand.

 

How Is It Done?

*The process is simple. Following our online smart guide, we will take your measurement and generate a bespoke design made just for you. The model will be 3D printed through our trusted partner: Shapeways in NYC and delivered to your door.

Step 1. Take Measurement

Step 2. Bespoke Design Generation​

Step 3. Your model will be printed through our trusted partner: Shapeways in NYC and delivered to your door.​

The mask is 3D Printed with high precision at Shapeways, NYC​.

Mask is 3D Printed from industrial grade printer that cost six-figures

The material has flexibility. But please don't do this with your mask!

 

Nuo 3D Mask is bespoke, tailored to fit.

Nuo 3D Mask fits kid just as well.

Nuo 3D Mask allows you to have an easy conversation over the phone while having the mask on.

Wear Nuo 3D Mask on different occasions.

Nuo 3D Mask with elegance and comfort can be worn out of pleasure just like sunglasses.

 

 

 

Trusted Partner:

Stretch Goals:

 

TimeLine:

See Our Past Projects:

Team:

Back us up now: We are working on a mission to bring the bespoke experience to everyone. We have finished the design prototype and sourced the manufacturing, so back us up today to bring this project alive.

Upgrade your Charging game with Baraddy!

Put your phone in the same pocket with Baraddy and get your extra charge!!!
Baraddy's thin design makes it comfortable. 

 


Baraddy comes with reversible QI.  It gives you wireless it gets wireless.

Baraddy works with a large variety of devices.

Customized 10w QI charger allows to charging be more efficient and effective.

Baraddy was designed with precise attention to details while utilizing genuine leather. The batteries of Baraddy are protected with safety chips. The output ensures maximum efficiency when charging. story:
BONUS ADDED TO ALL BACKERS

With 8 days left and 170% funded, I want to give a little bonus for all early backers who are helping us getting the new Seko NH35 movement upgrade before we relaunch the big crowdfunding campaign in March 2020.

BONUS ADDED

F14 Tomcat model + 50% discount voucher

(Model size 1:100 - the voucher is for future use in our webshop on any products)

 

The first campaign we did on Indiegogo, we used the funds for building four prototypes and the video of watches and the link to the previous campaign can be seen below: 

  • Jolly Rogers in black/yellow with the skull and bones
  • Blue PVD inspired by Maverick's helmet
  • Ice blue inspired by Iceman's helmet
  • Maverick inspired in brushed case

 

Below is an insight into our development.

story:
What does the BackOsage Lumbar Decompression Belt do?

 

 

Technology that's built to help you heal

The belt inflates with air which stretches and retracts the lower back. This gentle traction helps decompress the spinal discs and allows the spine to align to its natural position.

 

 


Release spinal pressure

The decompression helps relieve pressure off degenerative, herniated, bulging discs and pinched nerves such as sciatica. This allows degenerative discs to get the water, oxygen and nutrients it requires for faster healing. 

 


Ease of use, ease of pain

Stretches and retracts the lower back as it inflates with air. This gentle tractions helps decompress the spinal discs. Use it anywhere, anytime. 


The BackOsage Lumbar Decompression Belt inflates from a width of 5 inches to a width of 8 inches, placing your spine in an upright position and providing support to your lumbar spinal cord. By returning your spine to it's natural position and taking some weight off, the BackOsage Belt provides room for your vertebrae to stretch and for your intervertebral discs to return to their original position. This reduces the back pain that originates from herniated / bulging discs which can be very painful as they hit the nerves in your spinal cord. 

 

The BackOsage Belt uses the same therapeutic principles used by chiropractors to decompress the spine and relieve lumbar pressure to help relieve back pain. 

 

 

Ultimate back pain solution combining 8 back treatments in 1 light portable unique belt

 

 

BackOsage Brace Back Pain and Support Lower Lumbar

Providing clinical grade traction and decompression therapy. Decompressing the spine allowing for discs to return to normal. Decompress lower back joints and spinal discs while lifting the upper body weight off of your lower back. It stabilizes the lower back and improves posture

 

Pump and go, to stabilize the lower back for a taller, straighter posture

INFLATABLE DECOMPRESSION BELT

Inflatable belt rises against the lower back, correcting the curvature of the spine and loosening up the tension of the vertebrae pressing against each other.

 

 

 

Massage Therapy stretches tight muscles to relieve stiffness and soreness

 

 

BackOsage has Cold therapy for Inflammation, cold pack pockets for whenever you need to reduce inflammation and target the pain relieving painful pressure naturally for several days after use.

 

 

 

Graphene produces far infrared wavelength from 6-14 um when generating heating, which can be easily absorbed by our body

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

Magnetic therapy can be known to help as a complementary process with added magnets

 

 

You are sitting for 9 hours a day, why not do it right?

Many of us are sitting down everyday and working in an office chair, you likely will have some kind of back issues that need to be worked out. With Backosage, you can do just that at the office or in the comfort of your own home.

 

 

Back pain can be the end of productivity, getting in the way of all the things you need to do

 

 

 

 


 

 



 

Simple, easy to setup and use

Backosage can work handsfree, without being noticeable, unlike other massagers that are bulky, awkward and need your attention.

Many massagers aren't as portable as they say, because they require being plugged in, unlike Backosage which is rechargeable for use anytime, anywhere. So don't just use at home or the office, strap on easily and move freely.

 

 

Warranty & Disclaimer Notices:

Damage caused by failure to follow the instructions, human factors, force maneuver, etc. is not covered by warranty. Maintenance cost will be charged for product out of warranty.

This is not a weight loss system. IGIA™ does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use the Back-O-Sage™ 8-in-1 Massager due to many factors that can influence health and weight loss. Individual results may vary.

If you have the following conditions, please consult with your physician before using the unit.

  • Pregnant women or individuals who have undergone surgery and have inflamed or unhealed wounds.
  • Person who currently has an acute disease; has a history of heart problems; or has bone fractures that not healed completely; and other abnormal health conditions.
  • While using this unit, if you start to feel dizzy, lightheaded or uncomfortable, please stop the unit at once and consult your physician.

Do not continue use until you have the permission of your doctor.

In the process of the preparation of this page, we sought to make the content correct and complete. However, there is no guarantee that there are no errors or omissions in the page. We reserve the right to change specifications of the products mentioned in this page at any time without prior declaration. No part of this page shall be reproduced, transmitted, transcribed or stored in a searchable system or translated into any other languages without the written authorization of our company. The company is not responsible for the loss caused by non-standard or wrong operation.

THIS UNIT IS NOT A MEDICAL DEVICE.

Back-O-Sage™ 8-in-1 Massager is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease, illness, or medical condition. No individual result should be considered typical or guaranteed.

This product has not been evaluated by the FDA.

Product model, shape, design and color may vary

Backer is Responsible for ALL VAT & Customs charges that may occur.

story:
FAQs

So what do you mean, "they last for days"?

We've still got loads of power management optimisation to do, but we're estimating, under normal use you'll get several days before needing to recharge. However, the battery life should get you 12 hours continuous music playback, so enough for a full day before recharging at night.

How waterproof are they?

It's going to be post campaign before we can confirm the level of waterproofing. However, the body has been designed from the ground up to be water resistant, with a unibody silicone skin and IP67 rated USB socket.

The ports in the earpiece, however, expose some delicate components, and whilst they will definitely be water resistant to a degree, we need to verify their integrity under water pressure, and are testing multiple options to achieve maximum waterproofing.

How well do they stay in place?

Very well. Incredibly well. Running, jumping, headbanging, fierce disagreement - nothing we've tried will make them budge.

Can you wear them with glasses?

Absolutely! We've designed them to avoid problems with glasses, and whilst some arm designs work better than others, on the whole you can wear Hy with glasses without any problems.

That earpiece is pretty long. Is it safe? Do they feel weird to wear?

The earpiece is quite long by earbud standards, but we've designed it to fit over 90% of ear canal lengths, and it's one-size-fits-all. It comes very short of going anywhere near your ear canal, though we will always advise care, and to discontinue use if you experience any discomfort.

As for weirdness? That seems to depend on the person. We've tested it *a lot* and it's very comfortable - in fact, we've had people testing it who forget to give it back because they've forgotten it's there. Of course, the ear canal is a delicate place and you don't want be rough when you're putting it in, but on the whole, it feels so natural it's effortless.

Hy's materials are all certified biocompatible, so they're completely safe for your skin. We recommend however, that you don't wear them 24/7, as your ear needs to clean itself of dust and dirt, a process which Hy may slow down.

Finally, a small proportion of you may already have experienced the "Cough Reflex" when you clean your ears (including a member of our team!) Be aware that Hy may trigger the same reflex.

 

Credits

This page, our video and other materials contain many Creative Commons licensed assets. We are working on collating the correct attributions and will add them here shortly, but thank you to everyone who has contributed via pexels.com, nounproject.com, and especially the guys from the "silent disco" article on Wikipedia. Sorry, but the picture was too perfect.

story:
After 3 crowdfunding projects by OVD, our teammates believe there is still 1 kind of functional watch missing - the "DIVE WATCH". Therefore, We have been started to develop this design over 6 months in last year. 

Finally the Titanic X was born.

 

 

 

 

Far beneath the ocean waves, nestling silently on cold and dark sea beds at a depth of 3,800 meters underwater, lie the remains of about three million shipwrecks, an enormous vessel, the “RMS Titanic” can be found. The Titanic was the largest and most luxurious ocean liner in the world when it was completed in 1912. It sank on its maiden voyage from Britain to New York when it hit an iceberg on April 14, 1912, killing 1,500 passengers and crew. About 750 others were rescued. Research on the Titanic has provided scientists with confirmation that by the year 2030, the ship may be completely eroded and disappear due to “hungry” bacteria in the ocean.

This Titanic X holds an important mission to explore and discover new information about the Titanic under the deep sea before it is gone forever.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Titanic X timepiece is powered by Miyota 8215 automatic movement. The watch has a harmonious design featuring a rotor inspired by the rusty anchor of a shipwreck and symbolizing the passing of time in which the Titanic has been eroded by the sea. Embossing, debossing, and some specialized craftsmanship are the processes of creating a raised or recessed relief pattern and design in the rotor’s surface. The case back is built to maximize the view of the movement, itself based on the principle of transparency. This highly unique rotor design is unlikely to found on any timepiece in the world.

 

 

 

 

The Titanic X Seeker has two large hands along with a highly visible luminous area. Swiss Superluminova is used on the Titanic X Seeker. Other prominent features include a calendar disc, large indexes and a big date-frame. Despite its rather substantial content layout, the watch is actually very easy to read, especially under water and in the dark. The luminous material used for the hands offers more than twice the afterglow brightness (even after five hours) compared to conventional materials.

There are multiple grades of Superluminova. The exceptional performance of BG W9 with blue light and C7 with green light, are used depending on the color combinations of the dial. Those grades are significantly higher than C1 which is the standard used in other watches.

 

 

 

 

RAW STEEL CASE // BLACK DIAL // GRAY LEATHER STRAP

 

 

PVD BLACK CASE // BLACK DIAL // BLACK LEATHER STRAP​

 

 

PVD BLACK CASE // YELLOW DIAL // BLACK LEATHER STRAP​

 

 

PVD BLACK+ ROSEGOLD CASE // BLACK DIAL // DARK BROWN LEATHER STRAP​

 

 

 

PVD ANTIQUE BROWN CASE // BLACK DIAL // DARK BROWN LEATHER STRAP​

 

 

 

 

A slightly domed sapphire crystal with anti-reflective coating protects the dial. Highly reliable and reputable raw materials are selected from European sources. The sapphire crystal is scratch resistant and very hard glass with a rating of 9 on the Mohs mineral hardness scale. Sapphire crystal delivers the best possible scratch resistance and shatter proof protection for our watch.

 

 

 

 

The feature buckle comes with a satin finish along with a leather case with an engraved logo. The inspiration for the selection of these materials and designs is drawn from the seat belt of the vessel.

 

 

 

In theory, a dive watch (or any diving instrument) can never be built to be too safe. The screw-down crown that comes with the Titanic X Seeker can definitely be described as an essential feature, ensuring high performance under 200 meters depth.

 

 

 

It is surely worth your while to peer through the mineral window in the case back, which is held securely in place by six screws. Seen from the rear, this solid case back is inspired by the porthole of the ship.

 

 

 

Miyota 8215 is one of the reliable & powerful movement which had been used by most of watch markers for many years. This consists of a jewel three hand with date movement, unidirectional winding system, an accuracy of -20 to +40 seconds a day and a minimum power reserve of 40 hours. Its diameter is 25mm with 5.67mm thickness, and sects at six-half cycles per second.  It keeps the time of this Titanic X in high accuracy and perfect condition.

 

 

 

The Titanic X Seeker has a dark brown/ grey/ black Italian leather strap with a pleasing mock patina. The strap has eight closely spaced holes and quick-release spring bars, helping to assure a comfortable & easy fit. The lugs are 22 millimeters apart. We can proudly say that this watch looks great on a range of strap types and colors.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

R M S . 0 1

 

 

R M S . 0 2

 

 

R M S . 0 3

 

 

R M S . 0 4

 

 

R M S . 0 5

 

 

It had been worked from sketch idea to the final for nearly 6 months.  Upon the technical drawings entirely achieved, it has been necessary to prepare the 3D rendering. Though this development steps, we would have more information to modify the the details specifically by multi-angles. 

 

 

In addition to pushing the creative limits for watch development and design, our Chief Designer, Ricky Lam also specializes in handcraft leather products. This handy and elegant leather watch holder wallet is minimalist in design, highly practical, and 100 percent handmade. It is hand-sewn, finished with wax, and the embossed logo is presented in an understated, yet, luxurious fashion. The watch holder wallet is crafted with the intention to last a lifetime, not only to protect the watch, but also for other possible uses as well. The watch holder features two slots which fits the Titanic X Seeker watch, instruction manual, and the warranty card. 

 

 

This project came to begin in 2017 with development for over a half of year of design, meetings with different specialist companies and thanks to compliment from the backers who supported our previous timepieces.  We’re very proud to have successfully met the production schedule on time.  As our prototypes are well prepared and have been passed all testing process by assembly center. What we are waiting for it's just your SUPPORT!!

 

 

 

 

We have worked very hard over the past one year to reach that stage. We will continue to do our best until those are delivered. Therefore, we sincerely need your support! Let us bring this Titanic X to become a real story!!
story_txt: After 3 crowdfunding projects by OVD, our teammates believe there is still 1 kind of functional watch missing - the "DIVE WATCH". Therefore, We have been started to develop this design over 6 months in last year. Finally the Titanic X was born.    Far beneath the ocean waves, nestling silently on cold and dark sea beds at a depth of 3,800 meters underwater, lie the remains of about three million shipwrecks, an enormous vessel, the “RMS Titanic” can be found. The Titanic was the largest and most luxurious ocean liner in the world when it was completed in 1912. It sank on its maiden voyage from Britain to New York when it hit an iceberg on April 14, 1912, killing 1,500 passengers and crew. About 750 others were rescued. Research on the Titanic has provided scientists with confirmation that by the year 2030, the ship may be completely eroded and disappear due to “hungry” bacteria in the ocean.This Titanic X holds an important mission to explore and discover new information about the Titanic under the deep sea before it is gone forever.      The Titanic X timepiece is powered by Miyota 8215 automatic movement. The watch has a harmonious design featuring a rotor inspired by the rusty anchor of a shipwreck and symbolizing the passing of time in which the Titanic has been eroded by the sea. Embossing, debossing, and some specialized craftsmanship are the processes of creating a raised or recessed relief pattern and design in the rotor’s surface. The case back is built to maximize the view of the movement, itself based on the principle of transparency. This highly unique rotor design is unlikely to found on any timepiece in the world.    The Titanic X Seeker has two large hands along with a highly visible luminous area. Swiss Superluminova is used on the Titanic X Seeker. Other prominent features include a calendar disc, large indexes and a big date-frame. Despite its rather substantial content layout, the watch is actually very easy to read, especially under water and in the dark. The luminous material used for the hands offers more than twice the afterglow brightness (even after five hours) compared to conventional materials.There are multiple grades of Superluminova. The exceptional performance of BG W9 with blue light and C7 with green light, are used depending on the color combinations of the dial. Those grades are significantly higher than C1 which is the standard used in other watches.    RAW STEEL CASE // BLACK DIAL // GRAY LEATHER STRAP  PVD BLACK CASE // BLACK DIAL // BLACK LEATHER STRAP​  PVD BLACK CASE // YELLOW DIAL // BLACK LEATHER STRAP​  PVD BLACK+ ROSEGOLD CASE // BLACK DIAL // DARK BROWN LEATHER STRAP​   PVD ANTIQUE BROWN CASE // BLACK DIAL // DARK BROWN LEATHER STRAP​    A slightly domed sapphire crystal with anti-reflective coating protects the dial. Highly reliable and reputable raw materials are selected from European sources. The sapphire crystal is scratch resistant and very hard glass with a rating of 9 on the Mohs mineral hardness scale. Sapphire crystal delivers the best possible scratch resistance and shatter proof protection for our watch.    The feature buckle comes with a satin finish along with a leather case with an engraved logo. The inspiration for the selection of these materials and designs is drawn from the seat belt of the vessel.   In theory, a dive watch (or any diving instrument) can never be built to be too safe. The screw-down crown that comes with the Titanic X Seeker can definitely be described as an essential feature, ensuring high performance under 200 meters depth.   It is surely worth your while to peer through the mineral window in the case back, which is held securely in place by six screws.
