The strap has eight closely spaced holes and quick-release spring bars, helping to assure a comfortable & easy fit. The lugs are 22 millimeters apart. We can proudly say that this watch looks great on a range of strap types and colors.            R M S . 0 1  R M S . 0 2  R M S . 0 3  R M S . 0 4  R M S . 0 5  It had been worked from sketch idea to the final for nearly 6 months.  Upon the technical drawings entirely achieved, it has been necessary to prepare the 3D rendering. Though this development steps, we would have more information to modify the the details specifically by multi-angles.   In addition to pushing the creative limits for watch development and design, our Chief Designer, Ricky Lam also specializes in handcraft leather products. This handy and elegant leather watch holder wallet is minimalist in design, highly practical, and 100 percent handmade. It is hand-sewn, finished with wax, and the embossed logo is presented in an understated, yet, luxurious fashion. The watch holder wallet is crafted with the intention to last a lifetime, not only to protect the watch, but also for other possible uses as well. The watch holder features two slots which fits the Titanic X Seeker watch, instruction manual, and the warranty card.   This project came to begin in 2017 with development for over a half of year of design, meetings with different specialist companies and thanks to compliment from the backers who supported our previous timepieces.  We’re very proud to have successfully met the production schedule on time.  As our prototypes are well prepared and have been passed all testing process by assembly center. What we are waiting for it's just your SUPPORT!!    We have worked very hard over the past one year to reach that stage. We will continue to do our best until those are delivered. Therefore, we sincerely need your support! Let us bring this Titanic X to become a real story!!

story:
300 days – sufficient time for a spacecraft making the journey from earth to the 5,500km-away Red Planet, Mars.  

Human missions to Mars is not a new idea throughout the humankind history. The possibility of human missions to Mars has been being studied since 1950. The same goal is shared among many government space agencies including NASA and ESA. NASA even topped its priority over moon mission in 2010 expecting a manned Mars mission in the 2030s.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The dial is certainly the most ambitious move of Mars Mission. A 3D Mars coated with red Swiss luminescent Super-Luminova is implanted in the centre of the dial. Upon light absorption, the implanted 3D Mars glows in reddish iron in darkness. The implanted Mars is filled with aluminum, covered with embossing techniques to create a rugged surface effect. The dial is surrounded by 3D indexes to further energize the watch. Random Brush technique together with vintage effect is applied onto the dial ring to resemble the rocky appearance of Mars.  

 

“How are the Hands assembled?” This is the most commonly asked question we faced in the past year and the reason why countless hours were spent in the development process. Instead of following the existing norm like others, our designer has embraced the technical challenge with the revolutionary idea - placing the Hour Disc underneath the 3D Mars and the curvy Minute Hand on top of the 3D Mars. Via the glowing 3D Mars in the dark, the shadow of Minute Hand laying on top tells the minute while the luminescent-coated Hour Disc underneath tells the hour.  

 

The frustum-like crown is etched with layers of scaling grids. The design concept comes from the unique appearance of NASA’s Orion-MPCV. The Orion-MPCV is a NASA spacecraft built to take humans farther than they have ever gone before. 

 

Simply by looking at the wrist, wearers could find where the case perfectly joints with the Sapphire Crystal. This concept is derived from the UFO’s streamlined design. The 43.5MM case Diameter is fitted with 316LStainless steel material to demonstrate the perfect scale design. Inspired by “The Mars Rover Concept Vehicle” by NASA, both sides of the case are embossed with a unique honeycombed pattern. 

 

A blue sunray dial is assembled into the case back. Through the skeleton case back, you could take a glimpse and enjoy the rotor movement. This design is derived from the solar arrays of NASA’s Insight Mars Lander. The Mars Mission logo is etched through in the centre of the case back. 

 

The craziest ideal comes to the thrilling reality as the Sapphire Crystal curve exquisitely accomplishes the case angle like a dream. It forms an almost seamless curve on the dial. The double-layered dome is made of raw European Sapphire materials following by a special cold grinding procedure to achieve such an extreme curve. In order to reduce excessive reflection, the crystal is treated with an anti-reflective coating which enables wearers to read the crystal clear dial from any angle. 

 

 

A huge enhancement is made in the movement. Mars Mission is powered by NH70A movement from Seiko. This automatic movement features a hacking function. (A hacking function means the second hand stops when the crown is pulled out.)  

 

This Seiko NH70A movement is credited for its reliability and fair accuracy in automatic movement which makes it one of the most popular automatic movements in the industry. 

 

A soft and tender leather strap handcrafted with German nylon stitching lays comfortably around the wrist. Three selected strap color options (distressed black, bronze and ash grey) are offered to go with your choice of different dial. We believe you would enjoy the combination. A lot of thought was put in the leather material selection. We come up with two special options; one is natural Full Vegetable leather which looks organic and effortless, good in durability and strength while the Crazy Horse leather option delivers a vintage vibe with unique and real texture. 

 

Leather strap with quick release-spring bars 

 

 

 

 

 

Packaging is one key part of our product design. Mars Mission comes with a deluxe box embossed with Mars Missions 3D initial “MM” on top. Each box carries a detailed and delicate instruction manual complemented with a metallic warranty card. 

 

 

 

 

That's why we could never stop to create new designs. What we have, it's your amazing compliments to our previous campaigns!! 

 

We stand firmly behind our watches; OVD offer a 2-year limited warranty on Mars Mission which covers movement manufacturing defects. The warranty does not cover damages that may occur from wear and tear and daily use. For more information please see www.ovd.com.hk

  

Back this project and, save up to 40% OFF the special Indiegogo price + Get some incredible unlocked strength goals of backer deals. Backers get in first. All watches in this project are Limited Editions. 

 

This is our fifteenth year in the manufacture of high quality-watches, and we have been designing and developing unique timepieces for many of the world's leading brands for 15 years. In addition to development and design, the most important point is that the components procurement and production processes are all handled by ourselves. With this advantage, we can guarantee that the campaign would not have serious delays in delivery, and we believe that it can be delivered successfully. 

 

We are obviously counting on the courier service to take excellent care of our precious package.  Global reach and local teams ensure fast delivery with end-to-end tracking.  Please be ensured that Importing duties and fees are the responsibility of the backers. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

OVD was started from a passion to push the boundaries of design and create unique, yet affordable timepieces. Mars Mission is one of the most important campaign with high confidence for us in this year. Now all we need is your great support!! 

 

 

If you would like keep in touch on social, please follow the relevant links below.

With this advantage, we can guarantee that the campaign would not have serious delays in delivery, and we believe that it can be delivered successfully. 
 

We are obviously counting on the courier service to take excellent care of our precious package.  Global reach and local teams ensure fast delivery with end-to-end tracking.  Please be ensured that Importing duties and fees are the responsibility of the backers. 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

OVD was started from a passion to push the boundaries of design and create unique, yet affordable timepieces. Mars Mission is one of the most important campaign with high confidence for us in this year. Now all we need is your great support!!

story:
We’re Airhead. We’re building a community of people who love getting outside for their physical and mental health. We're helping people to move more in cities by protecting them from air pollution, because we all deserve to clear our heads with cleaner air.  To pre-order your Airhead mask, select a perk now. 

91% of the global population are exposed to air pollution. As keen cyclists in London, we’re certainly familiar with pollution, and, despite a lot of searching, we never found a mask that met our needs. So we set out to create one.

Before we get into it, we wanted say this: we understand it’s not the most natural thing to put a mask on your face. We also know that all the other masks out there are so hot, uncomfortable, embarrassing (Darth Vader effect is real), and sometimes they have little gaps in the side, so they don’t even work properly!

So almost a year ago, we teamed up with some incredible partners, including industry-leading experts at Brunel University, to create a mask that’s more comfortable, cleaner and smarter. Meet the Airhead mask.

Updated design, August 2020: 

We're so proud of the mask we've created and what you see here is our latest prototype, which was made slightly larger than the finished product will be. The real deal is going to be noticeably smaller than this (woah, even slicker) so if you're worried about it looking too big on your face, we want to put those fears to bed. Not only that, the colours will match the GIF below. The colours were selected based on over a thousand (kind) survey responses.

 

The activated carbon layer removes harmful gases, including nitrogen oxide, sulphur dioxide and ozone. They also remove unwanted smells and vapours from organic compounds.

 

Our filter provides effective filtration of natural pollutants such as fine particulate matter from smoke and dust.

 

The mask can effectively block pollen particles - don’t let your seasonal allergies prevent you from exercising outdoors! 

 

Through the entire design process, we've relentlessly focused on what customers (in our loyal Airhead community) want. Not only has this enabled us to create something we're very proud of, it's produced some wonderful feedback. 

Okay, let’s go deeper into what makes the Airhead mask so great:

Keep cool, keep calm.

With our innovative team of designers at Brunel University, we went the extra mile to make this mask as comfortable as possible. We used a design-led innovation process to create a mask that maximises breathability through the filters and valves (more on that below), then we carefully selected textiles that are kind to your skin. 

Ditch the Darth Vader Image

Nobody wants to look or feel silly, but everyone wants to be safe. We’ve bombarded our early Airhead community with questions to find out exactly what people want. We’ve been listening every step of the way. We’re delivering a mask that you’ll be proud to be seen in, and we’re changing the perception of what it means to be protected against pollution.

 

Above and beyond what you expect

We wanted to create a product that we’d recommend to our nearest and dearest. The Airhead mask leaves no stone unturned, and provides users with outstanding protection against air pollution. Firstly we have our unique airtight seal. Secondly, our filters exceed the top European regulatory standard; they block 99% of PM2.5 particulates, and even remove particles down to PM0.3. The activated carbon layer stops gases such as nitrogen oxide, sulphur dioxide and ozone.

Brought to life by trusted British manufacturers. 

We’ve gone to great lengths to find the best possible suppliers of each component of our mask. It’s so important to us that we provide you with a product that meets the highest quality standards. By being geographically close to these key partners, we’re also able to foster better relationships, can run a tighter ship and ultimately deliver a superior product to you. 

 

 

The World Health Organisation (WHO) states that 91% of the global population are exposed to air pollution. On average, 16 people die every minute around the world due to air pollution. That’s 8.8 million human beings every year. 

 

If all of these numbers feel difficult to comprehend, a study by scientists at the University of California helped visualise the effects of air pollution by comparing it to the equivalent number of cigarettes smoked.

Average daily air pollution levels in the US are the equivalent of smoking 146 cigarettes a year. In the EU, it's more like 584 cigarettes. In China, it's 1,460.

That is a LOT of cigarettes!

Major causes of air pollution are power generation, vehicle emissions and natural disasters.

 

It’s designed to fit your face perfectly, with an airtight seal so that no dirty air can leak through the sides. The highest quality medical grade silicone makes the mask feel incredibly soft and cool on your face. Then there’s the filtration technology. It exceeds the top European standards. With our unique valves and filter we make breathing easier and cleaner than you might expect.

 

We’ve solved a problem and our mask will fit your face like no other. We’ve used the most advanced technology to analyse a range of faces and create a unique design with one size to fit all. Our medical grade silicon will maximise filtration efficacy in polluted cities.

 

Our valves are truly different. They are rear-facing, they rapidly move hot air away from the face and they prevent glasses from steaming up. Moving the valves has also maximised the surface area of the filter, which makes it easier to breathe and keeps you cool.

 

If you’re cycling or running up a hill as fast as you can, you'll probably get hot, we won’t pretend otherwise. This unique feature gives you a quick cooling breeze, or a chance to have a drink, snack or chat. When you're ready, simply clip it back in place to resume full protection.

Change the colour of your mask with ease.

Grey, black or blue, choose a style to suit you. With our design, you can remove the AirSkin® and replace it with a different one to suit your style or mood. In the future, we plan to have many other colours and designs to choose from.

 

Our modular design will let you take the mask apart, to allow you to give it a thorough clean. You won’t be able to wash the filters, but these will be replaced periodically, depending on your usage (more on that below!).

 

We recommend that you replace the filters after approximately 60 hours of use to ensure maximum filtration efficiency is maintained. This duration is influenced by the amount of pollution you’re exposed to, so you may need to replace them more frequently in highly polluted areas. 

 

Cyclists. Runners. Walkers. Commuters.

 

 

We teamed up with Dr Sanja Potgieter-Vermaak, who is a Senior Lecturer in Analytical Chemistry at Manchester Metropolitan University and an air pollution expert. She explains clearly what to look out for when choosing an effective pollution mask.

 

 

 

Airhead was selected for a government-funded programme to work in collaboration with industry-leading design experts at Brunel University. We are also an award-winning member of the NatWest Entrepreneur Accelerator, where we receive expert coaching and mentorship. Since inception, we've made an effort to constantly surrounded ourselves with the best possible support to deliver the most advanced innovation.

 

"Airhead represents the fusion of design and science that has been lacking in the air quality mask space, until now. I think the first truly effective air quality mask will be a game-changer for people living in polluted cities and I am happy to support this great innovative business."

 

Particulate Matter 

The mask physically blocks particulate matter from passing through a non-woven particulate filter and into the user's airways. 

Once we have produced the first batch of masks, we aim to secure FFP3 certification through independent test houses. We know the filters will be capable of this, but we will need to do rigorous testing of the mask (filter plus its seal) to confirm its ability to block at least 99% of PM2.5. We are confident we can achieve this. 

Harmful Gases

The activated carbon layer removes gases - including nitrogen oxide, sulphur dioxide and ozone through adsorption. Pollution compounds in the air, stick to the outside of activated carbon molecules, preventing them from passing through the filter.

Three friends, on a mission to defeat air pollution.

As keen cyclists and city lovers, we understand the problem.

We met whilst studying at university and quickly became great friends. Since then, it's been a journey with many exciting twists and turns. We even lived together in a 1-bedroom flat for a whole year to get Airhead off the ground! It's still unclear how we managed to get through that unscathed...

Before Airhead became a thing, we realised there was a problem. As we discovered more about the effects of air pollution, we started looking for face masks and found absolutely nothing that we liked. Every other mask was so hot, uncomfortable and downright embarrassing to wear. Lots even had little gaps that would let dirty air in at the sides! Then we found out that there were so many other people with the same problems. 

So we quit our jobs (scary stuff!), collaborated with some incredible partners and created an innovative new pollution mask.

We’re now an award-winning member of the NatWest Entrepreneur Accelerator and we recently won a competition to help launch Airhead in India. With our growing Airhead community, we’re taking the fight to air pollution, together.

 

Thank you for helping us to bring Airhead to life. 

For media requests:

Contact Natasha Krstic-Howe / press@airhead.cc

Like our video? For any enquiries, drop our incredible collaborators Harry & Seb a message at harryiddon28@gmail.com.

 Okay, let’s go deeper into what makes the Airhead mask so great:
Keep cool, keep calm.With our innovative team of designers at Brunel University, we went the extra mile to make this mask as comfortable as possible. We used a design-led innovation process to create a mask that maximises breathability through the filters and valves (more on that below), then we carefully selected textiles that are kind to your skin.  Ditch the Darth Vader ImageNobody wants to look or feel silly, but everyone wants to be safe. We’ve bombarded our early Airhead community with questions to find out exactly what people want. We’ve been listening every step of the way. We’re delivering a mask that you’ll be proud to be seen in, and we’re changing the perception of what it means to be protected against pollution.  
Above and beyond what you expectWe wanted to create a product that we’d recommend to our nearest and dearest. The Airhead mask leaves no stone unturned, and provides users with outstanding protection against air pollution. Firstly we have our unique airtight seal. Secondly, our filters exceed the top European regulatory standard; they block 99% of PM2.5 particulates, and even remove particles down to PM0.3. The activated carbon layer stops gases such as nitrogen oxide, sulphur dioxide and ozone. 
Brought to life by trusted British manufacturers. We’ve gone to great lengths to find the best possible suppliers of each component of our mask. It’s so important to us that we provide you with a product that meets the highest quality standards. By being geographically close to these key partners, we’re also able to foster better relationships, can run a tighter ship and ultimately deliver a superior product to you.   
The latest prototype. Final mask will be smaller and AirSkin® colours will vary.
  The World Health Organisation (WHO) states that 91% of the global population are exposed to air pollution. On average, 16 people die every minute around the world due to air pollution. That’s 8.8 million human beings every year.  If all of these numbers feel difficult to comprehend, a study by scientists at the University of California helped visualise the effects of air pollution by comparing it to the equivalent number of cigarettes smoked.Average daily air pollution levels in the US are the equivalent of smoking 146 cigarettes a year. In the EU, it's more like 584 cigarettes. In China, it's 1,460.That is a LOT of cigarettes!Major causes of air pollution are power generation, vehicle emissions and natural disasters. 
 
 It’s designed to fit your face perfectly, with an airtight seal so that no dirty air can leak through the sides. The highest quality medical grade silicone makes the mask feel incredibly soft and cool on your face. Then there’s the filtration technology. It exceeds the top European standards. With our unique valves and filter we make breathing easier and cleaner than you might expect. 
 We’ve solved a problem and our mask will fit your face like no other. We’ve used the most advanced technology to analyse a range of faces and create a unique design with one size to fit all. Our medical grade silicon will maximise filtration efficacy in polluted cities. 
 Our valves are truly different. They are rear-facing, they rapidly move hot air away from the face and they prevent glasses from steaming up. Moving the valves has also maximised the surface area of the filter, which makes it easier to breathe and keeps you cool. 
 If you’re cycling or running up a hill as fast as you can, you'll probably get hot, we won’t pretend otherwise. This unique feature gives you a quick cooling breeze, or a chance to have a drink, snack or chat. When you're ready, simply clip it back in place to resume full protection.Change the colour of your mask with ease.
 Grey, black or blue, choose a style to suit you. With our design, you can remove the AirSkin® and replace it with a different one to suit your style or mood. In the future, we plan to have many other colours and designs to choose from. 
 Our modular design will let you take the mask apart, to allow you to give it a thorough clean. You won’t be able to wash the filters, but these will be replaced periodically, depending on your usage (more on that below!). 
 We recommend that you replace the filters after approximately 60 hours of use to ensure maximum filtration efficiency is maintained. This duration is influenced by the amount of pollution you’re exposed to, so you may need to replace them more frequently in highly polluted areas.  Cyclists. Runners. Walkers. Commuters. 
  We teamed up with Dr Sanja Potgieter-Vermaak, who is a Senior Lecturer in Analytical Chemistry at Manchester Metropolitan University and an air pollution expert. She explains clearly what to look out for when choosing an effective pollution mask. 

 
 Airhead was selected for a government-funded programme to work in collaboration with industry-leading design experts at Brunel University. We are also an award-winning member of the NatWest Entrepreneur Accelerator, where we receive expert coaching and mentorship. Since inception, we've made an effort to constantly surrounded ourselves with the best possible support to deliver the most advanced innovation. 
 "Airhead represents the fusion of design and science that has been lacking in the air quality mask space, until now. I think the first truly effective air quality mask will be a game-changer for people living in polluted cities and I am happy to support this great innovative business." Particulate Matter The mask physically blocks particulate matter from passing through a non-woven particulate filter and into the user's airways. Once we have produced the first batch of masks, we aim to secure FFP3 certification through independent test houses. We know the filters will be capable of this, but we will need to do rigorous testing of the mask (filter plus its seal) to confirm its ability to block at least 99% of PM2.5. We are confident we can achieve this. Harmful GasesThe activated carbon layer removes gases - including nitrogen oxide, sulphur dioxide and ozone through adsorption. Pollution compounds in the air, stick to the outside of activated carbon molecules, preventing them from passing through the filter.The latest prototype. Final mask will be smaller and AirSkin® colours will vary.
  
Three friends, on a mission to defeat air pollution.As keen cyclists and city lovers, we understand the problem.We met whilst studying at university and quickly became great friends. Since then, it's been a journey with many exciting twists and turns. We even lived together in a 1-bedroom flat for a whole year to get Airhead off the ground! It's still unclear how we managed to get through that unscathed...Before Airhead became a thing, we realised there was a problem. As we discovered more about the effects of air pollution, we started looking for face masks and found absolutely nothing that we liked. Every other mask was so hot, uncomfortable and downright embarrassing to wear. Lots even had little gaps that would let dirty air in at the sides! Then we found out that there were so many other people with the same problems. So we quit our jobs (scary stuff!), collaborated with some incredible partners and created an innovative new pollution mask.We’re now an award-winning member of the NatWest Entrepreneur Accelerator and we recently won a competition to help launch Airhead in India. With our growing Airhead community, we’re taking the fight to air pollution, together.  
We took to the streets of London to raise awareness, this was fun!
 
 Thank you for helping us to bring Airhead to life.     For media requests:Contact Natasha Krstic-Howe / press@airhead.cc Like our video? For any enquiries, drop our incredible collaborators Harry & Seb a message at harryiddon28@gmail.com.

story:
Why using your hands, if you can use your head? Capsbee is the reinvention of the flying disc combined with a solid and high quality bucket hat. Throw it up to 30 meters and become addicted to the feeling of catching it with your head. And don't worry for sure you can catch your Capsee with your hands, too. 

You will never forget your sporting utensil any more, cause you will always have it with you, as a comfortable, cool and innovative bucket hat. Start playing everywhere, with anyone, anytime.

 

 

You can throw your Capsbee like a flying disc. Become better and better and expand your throwing distance up to 30 meters. Invent your personal throwing techniques and share it with the Capsbee community. There are no limits regarding the diversity of throwing techniques.

People around you will be astonished watching you catching your Capsbee with your head. Improve your physical agility and anticipation and become addicted to this unique feeling catching your Caspbee with your head. And don't worry. For sure you can also catch your Capsbee with your hands.

How many situations can you remind yourself, being somewhere with your friends and wanted to become active and do some sporting, but had nothing to play with you? Carrying a bag for your sport utensil is a back number. Just wear your Capsbee on your head as a normal bucket hat and start playing whenever and wherever you want to.

 

Capsbee is fun made for really everyone! No matter where you are: Capsbee can be played everywhere! No matter who you are: Capsbee is made for everyone! No matter if you are on your own: With Capsbee you immediately build new friendships and connect with other people! People around you will beg for joining and trying to catch your Capsbee with their head.

 

When executing a forehand, hold the Capsbee parallel to the ground at about shoulder height. Use the doorknob motion to pull your wrist as far back as you can then release it forward.

When executing a backhand, the Capsbee is pushed back behind the body and then fully extended outward. The Capsbee needs to travel a long distance from point A to point B, before being released.

To do a Capsbee hurrier, your playing partner needs to start running from where you stand and just a second later you throw the Capsbee in the running direction. The catcher needs to catch the Capsbee seemingly blinded while running. 

For a long shot you need to have good conditions (weather and wind) and to find out what is the right throwing angle. You can throw your Capsbee easily up to 30 meters. Our internal record is about 50 meters.

For a double shot and catch you need two Capsbees and two catchers. You need to throw them all in one with a bit more acceleration.

 

Your kids will love Capsbee. Capsbee is the perfect way to get kids up, moving, becoming active and playing with each other. And it’s designed with their safety in mind, so you can let them play worry-free. The material is surprisingly soft and light, so getting a bump from the Capsbee is like a pat on the shoulder.

They can start catching with their hands, but will try to catch it with their heads. Like in every game, becoming a master needs some practices. If it is too easy, motivation will decrease. As their is such a high diversity in throwing, catching and playing alternatives, your kids will play the whole day long. Best thing: They can wear Capsbee the whole day long as their sun protector.

 

When designing Capsbee safety and robustness were our first priorities… Right after fun. 

As it will take some training to catch the Capsbee with your head the brim is very flexible and safe, even if you catch your Capsbee not exactly with your head. We had been playing for hours and days and tested and retested the best material to make playing Capsbee absolutely safe and fun for children and adults. Have a look at some main features of your Capsbee:

 

 

As a token of appreciation, we have 2 referral programs for our backers here. Come and join us!

Program 1: Copy your personal referral link on the top right of the campaign page and share it with your family, friends and colleagues. Share it on Facebook, Twitter, Email or other social media platforms you like. For 2 backers you refer successfully, you'll take part at our sweepstake and have the chance to win Apple AirPods Pro. For 3 or more backers you refer successfully, you have the chance to win a Apple iPhone 12 Pro!

Program 2: Sign up on Kickbooster to get your unique referral link. Share it on Facebook, Twitter, Email or other social media platforms you like. For every backer you refer successfully, you'll receive a 10% of their pledge amount!

Share the fun and win your rewards!

 

The world around us is speeding up! Time for fun, activity, team sports and emotional experiences is getting more and more scarce, for all of us. That’s why we reinvented the classic game of a flying disc to give people around the world the opportunity to celebrate and have fun with others even more, enjoy a new way of playing and sporting and create joint memories. 

We are a diverse group of dreamers who believe that connecting people, overcoming boundaries and bridging cultures are the most important thing now and in the future, no matter who and where they are.

We build a product, which you will never forget, if you want to get to know new people, play together with them and connect from the heart. Our dream is that Capsbee becomes the product which guarantees unity in diversity, no matter where you are.

 

 

 

 
 
 
 
 

 

The shipment will start from July 2021. All the packages will be sent out individually to your address. You will get the tracking number as soon as your package ist sent. You will be able to check the shipping status on your Indiegogo account. The estimated time of delivery will be around 7 to 14 days. For remote areas, it may take 30 days. Please note that the exact delivery time will vary depending on your shipping address and the local logistics.

How to check the tracking status?

You can check on your Indiegogo account. Please note that the detailed tracking info may be delayed in both systems. Thanks for your patience and support.

story:
Here at Coalatree, we design eco-minded gear and apparel for the adventurer in everyone. To order our denim, click above on Back It, or scroll below to learn more about our campaign!

 

 

After four years of in-depth design and engineering, we have finally hit our mark; The Decaf Denim is here. The Decaf Denim is the perfect combination of technical jeans, maximum comfort, and sustainable manufacturing.

 

Spent coffee grounds are mixed and melted with recycled plastic bottles, then extruded into the fibers that create our Decaf Denim. The process requires minimal resources and utilizes sustainable technologies such as solar power, gray water recycling, and more! 

 

Our partners across the globe have worked for years to perfect the technique of turning coffee into clothes. First, coffee grounds are collected from local shops. Often this is done by employees on their way to work in the morning, so there’s no need to haul in the grounds with trucks that run on fossil fuels.

Next, the coffee is dried and the oils are separated out. Often these oils are given more life as soaps, cosmetics, and more. The dried coffee is further ground into nano-sized particles, that are then combined with plastic fibers and turned into cloth!

Decaf Denim is also made from recycled plastic bottles. Instead of discarded bottles going into the waste stream and often finding their way into oceans, the bottles are shredded into flakes and dried. Those flakes are melted down and extruded through a sieve into small fibers. The coffee is then mixed in to create yarn, giving the fabric natural protective features without chemical additives. 

 

 

 

Our comfort and sustainability factors are really something to brag about, but let us not forget that our jeans are also stocked with features such as UV protection, odor resistance, and water-wicking properties.

 

 

To make one pair of denim it takes 3,800 gallons of water from start to finish. By using recycled materials, organic cotton, and a waterless dye method, we save thousands of gallons per pair of denim. With these production techniques we are revolutionizing the denim production process! 

 

 

 

Cool Tech fabric keeps heat from gathering against your skin, keeping you comfortable all day.

 

Curious to how it works? Thermo-conductive threads work their magic by gathering and releasing heat, keeping you cool. Other jean fabrics trap heat between the skin and pant often causing an uncomfortable build-up of sweat and moisture.

 

 

 

Love jeans, but tired of wearing rigid and constricting pants? Our fabric features a four-way stretch that moves with your body, without any restrictions. You’ll almost forget you’re wearing pants.

 

 

 

Liquids don’t stand a chance against these bad boys - these jeans are water wicking and stain-resistant. Liquids and stains bounce right off the material, no longer will a spilled drink ruin your day, just brush it off and carry on.

 

 

Do

 

Do you ever get that searing heat feeling from wearing a pair of jeans in direct sunlight? With the Decaf Denim, you won’t have to worry about this any longer. The special fabric in these jeans blocks UV rays and keeps your skin protected while facing the abrasive rays of the sun while outside.

 

 

Leave the house worry free when you're wearing our denim. Keep your wallet safe with out secret zippered pocket. Thieves don't stand a chance!

 

 

 

These aren’t your average pair of jeans. Our denim can go anywhere with you, look fresh, and won’t restrict your movement. Whether it’s dressing up for a night on the town or relaxing indoors for Sunday night football, the Decaf Denim are made to perform. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 When Coalatree was founded in 2010, one of our goals was to give back to the environment and to our community. Those goals ring true today more than ever, and your support makes these programs possible. Here's what we're doing to make a difference.

 

Risks and Challenges

This will be Coalatree's 11th crowdfunding campaign, and by now we've nearly got it nailed down to a science. However, things can always happen that are beyond our control, and we do our best to communicate those challenges upfront, and as they arise. These include unforeseen shipping delays, problems in our factory partners, government shutdowns, and more. We promise to do our best to keep our customers updated with the progress and satisfied with the final product. Your support means a lot to us and we want to ensure you’re happy with the product, people, and company you’ve backed!

Reusability and Recyclability

We use compostable packing slips and envelopes, as well as recycled paper in our packaging. Our denim as discussed in detail, is made from recycled plastic, coffee grounds, and organic cotton. We have also implemented a waterless dye system that saves thousands of gallons of water per pair of pants.

Sustainable Materials

Traditional denim consumes thousands of gallons of water from growing cotton to the dyeing process. We use organic cotton which eliminates the need for pesticides, as well as recycled plastic and coffee grounds to make our textiles. This keeps waste out of landfills, and eliminates the need for excess cotton growth.

Environmentally Friendly Factories

Our factories are Fairwear and Bluesign certified. This ensures our factory workers and their environments are safe and healthy places to work. Our factories also participate in wetland preservation and water conservation efforts, keeping their local environment clean and healthy.

Sustainable Distribution

We offer carbon neutral shipping and compostable packaging within our distribution systems.

story:
The Groove Belt™ is perfect for:

  • Sitting at a desk
  • Racing through the Alaskan bush, being chased by a grizzly
  • Grilling hot dogs on the Traeger you got for Father’s Day
  • Beasting your next free-climb
  • Rapid response when nature or love calls
  • Bending down to pick up every #$*% kid’s toy

 

What makes the Groove Belt™ so awesome?

Snap-Tech™

The correct term is ne·o·dym·i·um magnets. Yeah...they’re awesome, even if you can’t pronounce it. The magnet snaps the buckle in perfect place...oh and you can unlatch with one hand.. Just listen to that SNAP. If you have an ASMR fetish, try to hold it together. These bad boys snap and latch instantly. Honestly, latching your belt is now more addictive than Joe Exotic’s tiger meth.   

 

 

Stretch-Tech™ (aka just the right amount of stretch)

You know the deal. Your belt is either too tight or too loose (neither is a good situation). The Groove Belt™ is comfier than the sweatpants you wore for 3 weeks during the Corona Pandemic.  These bad boys have just the right amount of stretch to keep you feeling comfortable and flexible.

 

 

Secure-Tech™

Set it and forget it design. Once you adjust the belt to the proper length, never worry about it again. Unless you go really crazy next Thanksgiving, just use our easy adjust to give yourself a little extra. 

 

 

Stiff-Tech™ (aka won’t fold in your belt loops)

You know that belt you bought last time? The one that folds over at the back of your pants? The Groove Belt™ doesn’t. Whether you’re climbing Mount Everest, attaching your tactical gear, or just grilling hotdogs in your backyard (let’s be honest, the most likely), this belt is made with the perfect blend of durable, stiff webbing and stretch. It’s going to stay on you like that bad tattoo from your last bro-country concert, without losing its form. 

 

 

Space-Tech™

Made from recycled space shuttle cladding...Okay maybe not but we used the best materials on earth to make this the best belt EVER. Between our proprietary webbing, rare-earth neodymium magnets and A380 aluminum alloy buckle, you’re basically ready for an apocalypse. Or for simply pulling up your pants an average of 5.24x per day.  

 

 

Won't flap and get all loosey-goosey Tech™

No one likes the end of a belt flapping around all loosey-goosey (please put that away.) That’s why we designed the end to neatly tuck behind the belt. For the occasional rogue fly-away, we’ve added our secure keeper loop. No more flap. 

 

 

94-Year Warranty

Yep! Just like our rings and watch bands, this belt is covered with a lifetime guarantee. So if you break it, you’re good for a return free of charge for life (unless you make it past 94 years from now, but let’s be honest—your diet is not up to par for that).  

 

Just in case you thought we threw this together over the weekend... here’s a glimpse into the last 12 months. 

 

 

If everything else didn't convince you to back the Groove Belt™ maybe some photos of this sexy, beast of a belt below will seal the deal. 

 

 

Here are a couple videos of Happy Groove Belt Early Testers, including MMA Champion Michael Chandler.

 

 

Country Music Star Josh Gallagher

 

 

And Matt Drury of Drury Outdoors & DeerCast

 

 

Stock Car Driver Jeb Burton
story_txt:
The Groove Belt™ is perfect for:
Sitting at a desk
Racing through the Alaskan bush, being chased by a grizzly
Grilling hot dogs on the Traeger you got for Father’s Day
Beasting your next free-climb
Rapid response when nature or love calls
Bending down to pick up every #$*% kid’s toy
 What makes the Groove Belt™ so awesome?Snap-Tech™The correct term is ne·o·dym·i·um magnets. Yeah...they’re awesome, even if you can’t pronounce it. The magnet snaps the buckle in perfect place...oh and you can unlatch with one hand.. Just listen to that SNAP. If you have an ASMR fetish, try to hold it together. These bad boys snap and latch instantly. Honestly, latching your belt is now more addictive than Joe Exotic’s tiger meth.     Stretch-Tech™ (aka just the right amount of stretch)You know the deal. Your belt is either too tight or too loose (neither is a good situation). The Groove Belt™ is comfier than the sweatpants you wore for 3 weeks during the Corona Pandemic.  These bad boys have just the right amount of stretch to keep you feeling comfortable and flexible.  Secure-Tech™Set it and forget it design. Once you adjust the belt to the proper length, never worry about it again. Unless you go really crazy next Thanksgiving, just use our easy adjust to give yourself a little extra.   Stiff-Tech™ (aka won’t fold in your belt loops)You know that belt you bought last time? The one that folds over at the back of your pants? The Groove Belt™ doesn’t. Whether you’re climbing Mount Everest, attaching your tactical gear, or just grilling hotdogs in your backyard (let’s be honest, the most likely), this belt is made with the perfect blend of durable, stiff webbing and stretch. It’s going to stay on you like that bad tattoo from your last bro-country concert, without losing its form.   Space-Tech™Made from recycled space shuttle cladding...Okay maybe not but we used the best materials on earth to make this the best belt EVER. Between our proprietary webbing, rare-earth neodymium magnets and A380 aluminum alloy buckle, you’re basically ready for an apocalypse. Or for simply pulling up your pants an average of 5.24x per day.    Won't flap and get all loosey-goosey Tech™No one likes the end of a belt flapping around all loosey-goosey (please put that away.) That’s why we designed the end to neatly tuck behind the belt. For the occasional rogue fly-away, we’ve added our secure keeper loop. No more flap.   94-Year WarrantyYep! Just like our rings and watch bands, this belt is covered with a lifetime guarantee. So if you break it, you’re good for a return free of charge for life (unless you make it past 94 years from now, but let’s be honest—your diet is not up to par for that).   Just in case you thought we threw this together over the weekend... here’s a glimpse into the last 12 months.   If everything else didn't convince you to back the Groove Belt™ maybe some photos of this sexy, beast of a belt below will seal the deal.   Here are a couple videos of Happy Groove Belt Early Testers, including MMA Champion Michael Chandler.  Country Music Star Josh Gallagher  And Matt Drury of Drury Outdoors & DeerCast  Stock Car Driver Jeb Burton

story:
Started from Glasses...

CES 2020, Las Vegas, NV. With MAD Gaze Glasses

What's Next!


 

Ultra-intuitive Gesture Controls.

Gain greater control over your daily digital lives with the MAD Gaze Watch.

Reply Text Messages

Tapping messages, snapping to send.

Control Your Music

Tapping to play and control volume.

Motion Tracking

Moving or turning your arm for remote control.

 

And so much more...

 

Smartwatches and mobile phones have powerful features that we rely on throughout our day but they can be inconvenient to use while on the go. The MAD Gaze Watch lets users conveniently control their digital lives with simple hand, wrist, and finger gestures to trigger apps, photos, music, and many other smart features.

MAD Gaze Watch is powered by advanced hand gesture controls that can be fully customized for any watch function. For instance, tapping a surface, snapping different fingers, turning your wrist, or simply tapping the back of your hand can trigger different actions such as taking pictures, answering and declining phone calls, playing music, controlling volume, setting timers, sharing locations.

MAD Gaze Watch also works as an accurate gesture control device for playing games in AR and VR using advanced motion sensing. Using your arm and wrist makes for more natural gameplay and lets you level up fast!

Streamlines your life using hand, finger, wrist movements and gestures to do almost anything on the watch such as check messages, calendar reminders, Facebook and access digital assistants with simple movements. It adds convenience and speed to essential daily tasks and lets you get more done in your busy day.


 

MAD Gaze Watch is designed to keep you seamlessly connected to your most essential work tasks. Use simple hand gestures to reply to messages, view emails and answer important business calls.

Take advantage of your daily commute without opening your laptop – check your business calendar, set important timers and take notes anywhere. With MAD Gaze, your workflow remains uninterrupted even while on the go.

Unlike other devices with rudimentary gesture features, MAD Gaze Watch uses an incredibly advanced gesture control system with a cutting-edge 9-axis gyro and acceleration sensor which accurately captures the different vibration waves and movements of the hand and analyzes them with an advanced intelligent algorithm that triggers any number of customized functions.

MAD Gaze watch goes beyond simple gestures and gives you a variety of ways to control functions including snapping fingers, tapping on the forearm, tapping the back of the hand, and other movements that can define up to 33 control & shortcut functions.

 

*Better Price Plus Better Technology

 

MAD Gaze Watch is focused on fitness and healthy lifestyles for busy people and includes 10+ activity modes for running, biking, yoga and more that deliver real-time stats during sports and exercise, helping users stay informed about their physical activity.

What gets measured gets managed! Therefore, the GPS-enabled system records data based on pace, distance, calories burned and more. It’s perfect for sports, exercise and is IP67 water resistant for use during outdoor activities in all weather conditions.

When finger taps on the hand, two separate forms of vibration, Transverse wave and Longitudinal wave, are produced. Transverse wave translates along the hand surface while Longitudinal waves transform into and transform out of the bone through soft tissue.

MAD Gaze Watch actively analyzes your sports performance based on live heart rate, actual calories burned, live workout pace. Helps you build a customized workout style.

 

MAD Gaze Watch has a walkie-talkie app built-in for instant contacts and location sharing. No more missed calls form your loved ones. It makes connecting with friends easy by staying on top of the latest social posts and messages and when it’s time to meet up, MAD Gaze Watch can share locations with your favorite group to get together faster.

 

MAD Gaze Watch is made with your modern digital lifestyle in mind. It keeps you going longer with 1-2 days of battery life so you don’t need to charge it constantly. MAD Gaze Watch is here for a smarter lifestyle solution.
 

 

MAD Gaze Watch rises above the typical tech watch with 16 vibrant colors of interchangeable straps to suit any occasion. Keep it casual for the week and dress it up on the weekend. With MAD Gaze, your unique personality and style come shining through.

*You can add extra band($9 USD) to your cart in the MAD Gaze check-out page.

 

*Scan our customized QR code for user manual

*The price you see might appear in Hong Kong Dollar or your country's currency.

*The color options for extra watch band are yellow, purple, hot pink, mint green,navy blue, denim blue,olive, burgundy, white, apricot, light gray, dark gray, vanilla purple, nude pink, light blue. We will send you a survey collecting the color preference after the campaign ends.

Get Your Hands On MAD Gaze Watch!

 

Production Ready

 

MAD stands for our passion for pursuing innovative gadgets. Gaze stands for our brand origin-smart glasses. MAD Gaze has been dedicated to designing and developing a completely different smartwatch, an actual smartwatch that is controlled by your simple snap. Unlike other dull and same smartwatches now on the market, MAD Gaze Watch represent our concept of improving day to day efficiency and actively interactive with hand gestures. Hope MAD Gaze Watch can become your next favorite fashion gadget. 

Let's meet the team!

 

 

Warranty Policy：

We want to make sure you are satisfied with the product you purchased from MAD Gaze Mall, therefore, we provide all-round Three Guarantees Service.

Please refer to the Quick User Guide which comes along with the product you purchased for the warranty details. You should follow the instructions for using the product. The warranty period will be counted from the day the product is activated. If the product is malfunctioned, a return, replace or repair will be provided for free by providing valid supporting or maintenance records.

Warranty services are valid under normal usage or application only. The following conditions are excluded from the Three Guarantees and there will be a reasonable charge for the warranty service:

(a) the free maintenance period of the product has expired;

(b) mechanical failure due to application of fittings not recognized by our company;

(c) damage caused by failing to operate the product according to the manual, or incorrect or improper handling of the product;

(d) the malfunction caused by improper use, maintenance or storage;

(e) products natural wear and tear (including, but not limited to the outer case, display, attachments);

(f) damage caused by force majeure;

(g) all the losses and damage caused by environmental factors, such as rough handling, temperature, and other factors which beyond MAD Gaze’s control;

(h) if the user cracked the Android system, or illegally obtained the root privileges, causing the malfunction of this product, we reserve the right to refuse to provide warranty service.

Exchange Policy

1. Standard Exchange Policy

We believe you make the final and right decisions when placing an order or making a purchase at the MAD Gaze Mall after exploring and evaluating our product. No exchange, returns or refund of items will be accepted. Returns are only accepted subject to the additional terms and conditions of Warranty.

2. Additional Product Terms

The purchase and use of MAD Gaze products are subject to additional terms and conditions of Warranty.

We strongly do not recommend you to make unauthorized modifications to the software on MAD Gaze products. Should you be unable to use your MAD Gaze products due to an unauthorized software modification, its repair will not be covered under the warranty.

Stay Tuned And Be The First To Hear From Us 

Press Kit

story:
Hurry To Get The Best Deals!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Active Carbon Filter Inside

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Considering what’s available in the market we developed and enhanced PM 2.5 filter to provide additional 5 layer protection to our initial 2 layer protection.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Layax is knitted with a high quality blend of spandex and nylon, the same material is used by NASA to craft their Space Suits. This material gives ultimate flexibility and body temperature control adaptability.

 

 

Exterior layer of high-performance nylon for stylish look and long endurance and multiple reusage.

 

 

 

First Layer, Moisture-wicking material mix of spandex and polyester. Water repellant and yet breathable built. Always have a fresh breeze when running in hot weather.

 

Second Layer, Surgical-grade cotton filter for advanced filtration and protection against the smallest particles and pathogens Also protects from sun, dust and wind sand.

 

 

 

 

Considering what’s available in the market we developed and enhanced PM 2.5 filter to provide additional 5 layer protection to our initial 2 layer protection.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Layax and others

 

 

 

Layax For Sport

 

 

 

 

Layax is made with special dust and sweat resistant knit, which makes Layax perfect for people who are into active sports! Add to that breathable coverage and you are good to go... and run!

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that people continue to wear face coverings in public settings. Now wear a mask that is not only safe, but also fashionable. Wear it both for sport activities, workouts or just general use with much more comfort!

 

 

 

 

 

EASY TO WEAR

 

 

We have turned a mask into a piece of fashion. People are tired of ordinary and common type of masks that do not outline person’s individuality.

 

 

Sizes

 

You will select your sizes and color, in a survey prior to the shipping.

 

 

 

 

UV Reflective - High-tech fabrics in Layax don’t just make you look great. It also blocks harmful UV radiation that can come from direct sunlight and Layax is an effective form of protection against sun damage. The polyester used in Layax is highly protective because it reflects radiation.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Microclimate control-  airflow you need, a cool feel, all day wearable, compromise protection for breathability. 

 

 

Adjusts to the body and external temperature. Layax is breathable and contains a natural odor prevention mechanism. The result of wearing it in summer and winter is the same.

 

 

 

Adjustable and comfortable sizes. Snug fit that wraps around the ears and won’t shift around a lot during activity. It stays on your ears longer than air pods. Special spandex allows for stretchability and easily adjusts to any size.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Durable materials for multiple use. Layax is made of high quality soft and comfortable materials, unlike other cheap materials that are easy to pull or tear. Layax will serve you for a very long time. All the materials are skin friendly and fully protected from health hazards. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

It is machine-washable as well as hand washable for daily use. Wash it in semi-warm water and it will not lose elasticity and stretchability over a long time, one mask covers all your needs.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Layax is at the very middle of its production process as the very first batch of 2000 units of Layax soon to be ready to ship! Hurry up to get your Layax delivered in January!

story:
Meet FIBR.

The radically fair alpaca sweater. FIBR makes sweaters with a radically fair value chain, from the raw materials all the way to your closet. Soft on your skin as it is easy on your conscience. 

The fashion industry has some of the most complex and unfair supply chains in the world. Today, only 7% of fashion brands know where their materials come from.

Some room for change, if you ask us. 

FIBR is Fairchain knitwear, fairness to the next level, all the way through the chain. FIBR connects three strong local players in PERU, all doing their part to make the Peruvian alpaca sector more fair. By connecting these dots, we managed to set up our own value chain and bring you a product of which we know exactly who made it, where it has been and of which we can be sure that everyone is treated fair. Discover our full value chain and price transparency on the FIBR website.  

Meet the FIBR sweater

100% NATURAL MATERIALS

Your new FIBR sweater is made of 100% natural materials, from the alpaca yarn to the labels and the sewing threads (100% cotton). As the world's fashion industry is dominated by synthetic fibres (up to 60%), this is pretty unique.

BASIC, LONG LASTING DESIGN

This sweater is made to last. And if not, a repair kit will teach you all the tricks. 

4 SEASONS, 4 COLOURS, 4 SIZES

The FIBR sweater is warm, light and finely knitted, which makes it suitable for many occasions. Both female and male models are available in 4 colours (beige, light grey, dark grey, black) and 4 sizes: S,M,L,XL. 

Check the female or male measurement tables to be sure which size to chose.

RADICALLY FAIR

100% produced in Peru - the origin of the raw material. 100% transparent value chain.

 

What your support means

We need a minimum of EUR 5.000, equivalent to about 35 sweaters to realise the FIBR value chain and produce the radically fair sweaters. Every sweater counts. By supporting FIBR you proof that honest fashion is 100% possible. Leading by example, we tell the clothing industry to dive into their supply chains and create transparency. 

 

The available FIBR perks

More info in the details of the perk or on www.fibrknitwear.com. Any help needed? Don't hesitate to reach out to us via Indiegogo, via our website or via hello@fibrknitwear.com.

Shipping & Ordering

Pre-order now (via the perks on the right side) and your FIBR product will be:

Want to know more? 

This page is getting long! Have a look at the website for more on the FIBR value chain, transparency and team!

Know someone who is always cold? Refer the project to friends and family and add people to the FIBR fabric. Thanks <3!

story:
Tofiq is a simple and yet very unique pair of Sneakers with a water resistant surface, universal design and other key features. You can wear it anywhere with any piece of clothing. It is perfect for official dinners and workouts at the same time.

 


 

With the capabilities of heavy boots and comfort of home sleepers, the Tofiq Sneakers are all year wearable. Add to that design that matches literally everything and wear it with all types and mixes of Clothes.

 

 

 

NOW AVAILABLE IN BLACK!!!

 

For just $57 you can now order Tofiq Black edition. Hurry up as you know the offer is Limited!!! Needless to mention that Tofiq Black edition has the same features as the regular Tofiq with the neat and slick black look!!!

 

Get the Tofiq slick Black Edition with 34% discount!!!

 


 

 

 

Also GET YOURSELF

Receive your perk as soon as next week!!! Get your order in 1 (7 days) week time after you get a RAPID SHIPPING perk. Rapid shipping works for multiple orders as well.

 

 

 

Breathable knit upper technology and high-strength fibers create lightweight and breathable sneakers. The special flexible knit also provides for targeted areas of support for feet. The Hill fixation will ensure the most comfort and feet support.

Tofiq is made of Multiple layers of upper part for sneakers. Ultra breathable knit for upper technology and high-strength fibers create lightweight, water resistant, breathable uppers with targeted areas of support for feet. Your feet stay dry and fresh.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Reduce pain in your arcs and feet. With a mix of EVA and foam Tofiq’s insole will adapt to your feet and provide maximum cushioning and long durability.  Thanks to EVA foam the cushioning of Tofiq remains intact even after long use.  You will be able to use Tofiq for very long time! 

 

 

Maximum Cushioning and Energy Return is guaranteed with Tofiq. EVA ( ethylene-vinyl acetate copolymer) foam comes with special thermoplastic elastomers which make a completely foam type that improves both cushioning and energy return.

It is perfect for official dinners and workouts at the same time.  With the capabilities of heavy boots and comfort of home sleepers, the Tofiq Sneakers are all year wearable. Add to that design that matches literally everything and wear it with all types and mixes of Clothes.   NOW AVAILABLE IN BLACK!!! For just $57 you can now order Tofiq Black edition. Hurry up as you know the offer is Limited!!! Needless to mention that Tofiq Black edition has the same features as the regular Tofiq with the neat and slick black look!!! Get the Tofiq slick Black Edition with 34% discount!!!    Also GET YOURSELFReceive your perk as soon as next week!!! Get your order in 1 (7 days) week time after you get a RAPID SHIPPING perk. Rapid shipping works for multiple orders as well.   Breathable knit upper technology and high-strength fibers create lightweight and breathable sneakers. The special flexible knit also provides for targeted areas of support for feet. The Hill fixation will ensure the most comfort and feet support.Tofiq is made of Multiple layers of upper part for sneakers. Ultra breathable knit for upper technology and high-strength fibers create lightweight, water resistant, breathable uppers with targeted areas of support for feet. Your feet stay dry and fresh.      Reduce pain in your arcs and feet. With a mix of EVA and foam Tofiq’s insole will adapt to your feet and provide maximum cushioning and long durability.  Thanks to EVA foam the cushioning of Tofiq remains intact even after long use.  You will be able to use Tofiq for very long time!   Maximum Cushioning and Energy Return is guaranteed with Tofiq. EVA ( ethylene-vinyl acetate copolymer) foam comes with special thermoplastic elastomers which make a completely foam type that improves both cushioning and energy return.

story:
Spent coffee grounds are mixed and melted down with recycled plastic bottles to create the fibers for our incredible Evolution Hoodie. The result is a hoodie packed with features and perfect for all your upcoming travel and outdoor adventures, yet so soft and supple you’ll never want to take it off!  

 

Never worry again about losing your passport! The Evolution Hoodie has a secure zippered pocket so you can safely stash your valuables, plus a loop to clip your keys. No matter where in the world your travels take you, pick-pocketers don’t stand a chance at getting your phone, wallet, or other valuables. Keep your mind at ease so you can relax and explore!

 

 

 

We’ve transformed your morning cup and kept the life cycle of coffee going strong! Coalatree works hard to bring you the most innovative technology that supports a healthy you and a healthy planet. By utilizing discarded materials like coffee grounds and plastic bottles, we’re keeping our waste streams small and making our impact big!

 

Pack it down small and keep it stashed in your pack. The Evolution Hoodie will keep you comfortable on summer nights or crisp days. With quick dry and moisture-wicking technology, you can be sure the Evolution will be ready to go whenever you are.

Choose your reward level now. To double-up on a reward level, just double your pledge! You can choose your color and size once we send backer surveys in a few months.

The Evolution Hoodie will be offered in sizes XS thru 2XL. Because of enormous backer support in our previous campaigns, we're now able to make these expanded sizes possible. So thank you!

 

Looking for more Coalatree swag? Grab one of our bundles that feature some of our best-selling eco-minded goods. Many of these items were made possible through crowdfunding! Learn more about each product below.

 

 

Thanks to previous backer support, we're able to expand into more sizes! Please note that these measurements are for the garment, and not for your body. Because it is a hoodie, the sizes may look big. The hoodie fits nice and loose, like you would expect from a standard hoodie! We suggest not worrying too much about how you measure up to these numbers, and to choose whatever size you would normally wear.

 

Spent coffee grounds are mixed and melted with recycled plastic bottles, then extruded into the fibers that create the Evolution Hoodie. The process requires minimal resources and utilizes sustainable technologies such as solar power, gray water recycling, and more!

 

FROM CUP TO CLOTH

Our partners across the globe have worked for years to perfect the technique of turning coffee into clothes. First, coffee grounds are collected from local shops. Often this is done by employees on their way to work in the morning, so there’s no need to haul in the grounds with trucks that run on fossil fuels!

Next, the coffee is dried and the oils are separated out. Often these oils are given more life as soaps, cosmetics, and more. The dried coffee is further ground into nano-sized particles, that are then combined with plastic fibers and turned into cloth!

 

FROM PLASTIC TO PRACTICAL 

The Evolution Travel Hoodie is also made from recycled plastic bottles. Instead of discarded bottles going into the waste stream and often finding their way into oceans, the bottles are shredded into flakes and dried. Those flakes are melted down and extruded through a sieve into small fibers. The coffee is then mixed in to create yarn!

 

 

The Evolution Hoodie's pick-pocket proof kangaroo pouch is what sets it apart from your average hoodie. Unzip the pouch to uncover two organizing pockets with velcro closures, both large enough to hold your passport, phone, or wallet. Use the interior loop to clip your keys so you’ll never have to worry about losing them again. This pouch is built into the interior of the hoodie and is separate from the traditional handwarming pocket, so you can keep your valuables safe and secure! 

 

Traditional hoodies are bulky and awkward, and usually not very eco-friendly. Here’s how the Evolution Hoodie compares.

 

The Evolution Hoodie is designed to be worn on-the-go. The material is constructed with microscopic pores which increase its surface area. This means moisture is spread throughout the hoodie and the drying process is accelerated!

 

 

Play hard and stay worry-free! Coffee is a naturally odor-absorbing material and by weaving the grounds into the fibers, odors are trapped as you sweat. Because the grounds are embedded into the fabric, this feature is permanent and will never wash out!

 

 

Keep your skin healthy from the sand to the slopes! The tiny pores in the fabric trap and block UV rays, turning the Evolution Hoodie into a chemical-free shield.

 

 

The Evolution's fleece fabric is not only functional, it's also incredibly featherweight. Traditional fleece hoodies can be well over a pound, but the Evolution measures just 13 ounces... a fraction of the weight!

 

 

We’ve been there: your phone magically falls out of your pocket, onto the sidewalk, and suddenly your screen is shattered. With the Evolution Hoodie you can worry no more! The zippered kangaroo pouch will keep your phone secure and shatter-free.

story:
A Minimal Carry Obsession

Smartphones, keys and wallets are the bare essentials on our person everyday, if not all day. But we might also have to carry sunglasses, Airpods, charging cables/block, an external battery, notepad, pens or pocket knife, etc. 

Bolstr is obsessed with carry options that are perfectly sized and minimal. Whatever we design has to make both style and utility sense.

 

The Problem

Most men are creatures of simplicity and habit, especially when it comes to everyday carry. They want their smartphone, wallet, keys, Airpods, and sunglasses (everyday essentials) on them at all times without the need for a larger bag or backpack to carry them.

While clothing pockets seem like a friendly companion for everyday carry, most end up getting overstuffed, which wears on clothing, inhibits access, results in things getting misplaced, and does not look good. Men need a new way to carry.

 

bolstr Aux Pocket

Smaller than a sling pack. Larger than a wallet.

An innovation in minimal carry, Aux Pocket (AKA Utility Pocket) is a breakthrough future-classic in design. There is nothing else like it on the market. It is that extra pocket for everyday essentials that can be uniquely worn, carried, or stored for fast access and security.

Whether worn, carried, or stored - keep everything in one spot at all times.

 

Aux Pocket: Carry

 

Aux Pocket: Materials

 

Aux Pocket: Details

 

Aux Pocket: Colorways

IMPORTANT NOTE: Aux Pockets are available as add-on items when completing your pledge. Save 40% on all add-on Aux Pockets, Small Carry bags and Face Masks.

 

bolstr Small Carry

Smaller than a laptop bag. Larger than a holster.

Upgraded with a cleaner appearance and new colorways, Bolstr Small Carry 3.0 provides the same easy access to your smartphone, sunglasses, Airpods, wallet, keys and a few extras. It proved we cracked the code on overcoming the man purse stigma.

 

Small Carry

 

Small Carry: Materials

 

Small Carry: Details

 

Small Carry: Colorways

IMPORTANT NOTE: Small Carry are available as add-on items when completing your pledge. Save 40% on all add-on Aux Pockets, Small Carry bags and Face Masks.

 

XHIBITION Dyneema (X-DYM)

bolstr is pleased to be teaming up with streetwear boutique Xhibition to offer a Dyneema, also known as Cuben Fiber (CTF3), version of the bolstr Aux Pocket 1.0 and Small Carry 3.0 dubbed “X-DYM.” Dyneema is one of the lightest and toughest non-woven fabrics known to man, and stronger than steel. It was first developed for use in yacht sails, eventually making its way into high performance applications for the military, windsurfing, mountaineering etc.

 

X-DYM: Details

 

X-DYM: Materials

 

Face Mask (Add-On)

The bolstr Face Mask is available as an add-on when pledging for any of the perks. Save 40% at the time of your pledge. Available in two colorways: Stealth and Disruptive Camo..

 

Face Mask: Details

 

Face Mask: Colorways

 

NiteIze (Add-On)

The NiteIze SlideLock stainless steel carabiner features an innovative slide-to-lock mechanism on the gate to keep your items secure. With a low profile that is slim to feed through openings, it is the perfect alternative to bulky tubular designs. Available as an add-on when pledging for any of the perks. Available in black only.

 

NiteIze: Details

 

Stretch Goal: New Colorways

If we meet our stretch goal, bolstr Small Carry (Righty and Lefty), and Aux Pocket will be available in new colorways for spring and summer 2021: Stealth, Storm Trooper, Lunar Blue and Disruptive Camo.

 

 

Production

bolstr is proudly Made in the USA. With three decades of experience in soft goods our manufacturer has the capability of large production runs with small batch care. They are committed to ethical manufacturing and to the highest standards in the industry.

After an exhaustive search for a qualified domestic maker of soft goods, we were drawn to our manufacturer because of their mission.

We found this to be undoubtedly true through the prototyping phase and are confident in their ability to meet the needs of our backers.

In Production:

  • bolstr Small Carry 3.0: Stealth and X-DYM (Dyneema) in both right and lefty carry options.
  • bolstr Aux Pocket: Stealth and X-DYM (Dyneema).
  • If we meet our stretch goal of $50,000 all colorways will be unlocked. 

 

bolstr Design

Why bolstr? BA7ANCE™

BA7ANCE is bolstr's Pocket Research philosophy backed by half a century of cognitive research that proved "chunks" of information longer than seven (7) become significantly harder to remember. For this reason, we do not design bags and accessories with more than seven pockets.

"Guys want better options for carrying their bare everyday essentials without the need for pockets. Something that gives them fast-access and the functionality to be used in many ways. And it has to make style sense. Our goal was to make something with flexibility, multi-use, and minimal aesthetics that transcends on-trend. We are aiming for future classics. Bolstr Aux Pocket and Small Carry were meticulously designed with all of this in mind. There isn't anything else like them on the market," says Jay Yoo, founder of bolstr.

Bolstr combines minimalism, functionality, and asymmetrical geometries into useful everyday objects with BA7ANCE™. Our bags and accessories fit "in-between" other carry options that are either too simple or overly complicated for the modern man. We use military grade materials for style, performance and utility.

Coming up with perfectly sized bags and accessories that make style, performance and utility sense is no easy task. The considerations are endless and must be considered fully; getting to the essence of a product with good form and functionality is a painstaking discipline that we love. In the end our products have lifestyle crossover, from travel, adventure and work to active, musing and everyday

 

About the Team

We are a creative collective, multi-disciplined in the arts who love the process of designing products with purpose, creating culture and fashion. We do this for fun and livelihood.

While most of us have full-times jobs, other interests and families, we all are driven to create and make the world better through the use of products. We believe that the love for what we do (creative process) can be felt at an extrasensory level;  in "the spirit of things."

 

About the Founder

Tech, nature, art, music, fashion, food, enthusiast. Sucker for culture. Devoted Father, minimalist, creator, athlete. 

Jay is the founder of Bolstr LTD, which is his latest venture following the success of his bolstr 1.0 Ultimate EDC Bag Kickstarter. He is passionate about many things in life and particularly curious about minimal living and everyday carry.

Prior to starting Bolstr LTD, Jay traveled the globe marketing industrial products for Swagelok, while designing the minimal travel apparel and accessories he wanted. Eventually Jay ventured on his own to start Koyono where he designed and brought to market BlackCoat travel wear and Slimmy® wallet alternatives.

Jay was one of the first designers of wearable tech making a BlackCoat Made for iPod worn by several celebrities including The Beastie Boys, Public Enemy, Tom Cruise, Lee Quinones, and others.

He has extensive experience in product development, manufacturing, and ecommerce operations. Jay is an ecommerce advisor to Xhibition and Next Stores.

 

How You Can Help

By backing our Kickstarter, you get first access to a product that is defining a new category of men’s carry. Also we need your help to get the word out about bolstr Aux Pocket. Help us continue to find ways to innovate around minimal carry. Without your help we wouldn’t be able to make the Aux Pocket and Small Carry 3.0 a reality! Thank you for your support.

 

Risks and Challenges

The biggest challenge of the bolstr Aux Pocket and Small Carry project is getting our message out to the world. We can use your help to get over this hurdle! Jay has been designing and manufacturing niche apparel and accessories for over 15 years and has three successful Kickstarters under his belt. While Kickstarter projects do not always go as planned, he has a proven track record of getting them done and delivering as promised.

  • Bolstr Small Carry 1.0
  • Slimmy Wallet Redux
  • Bolstr Small Carry 2.0

All orders will be fulfilled in-house or by a third party fulfillment company. If required, a small team is prepared to ship orders directly from the factory in order to decrease transit times.

Stretch Goals: Please note that if the $50K stretch goal is not met, we do not plan to produce Lunar Blue, Storm Trooper, or Disruptive Camo colorways for both the bolstr Aux Pocket and Small Carry, and will send the Stealth as an alternative,

Stealth and X-DYM are currently in production. Please be sure to pledge the X-DYM separately. Thank you.

Media Kit

If there are assets you do not see or need please email us and will be happy to help.
