story:
Have you ever wanted to check on your pet’s location and health while at work? Have you ever lost your pet? Do you forget to get your pet their medications? Have trouble keeping them in the yard? 

Have you every felt overwhelmed by the ever-expanding technology for pet care? Those high prices add up to be quite expensive.

For that reason, we've created an all-in-one solution to pet care:

 "This smart collar will make pet care a walk in the park" - Mashable

Scollar Mini - Sleek, lightweight, and expandable

 No longer do you have to outfit your pet with multiple collars for pet tracking, training, activity monitoring, health monitoring, pet door opening, food dispensing, communicating, anti-bark reminding and perimeter barriers.

Scollar Mini is a smart cat and small dog collar built on an open hardware and software platform that includes GPS tracking with no monthly fees, a tappable display, up to 30-day battery life, expandable functionality and so much more!

Tap on the screen for up to date pet info!

Scollar is the all-in-one pet collar that is perfect for every stage of your pet's life!

 

"...looks great on small dogs and cats" - Coolest Gadgets

 "...combines a ton of features into one smart collar..." - Brit + Co

"Designed with sophisticated technology within..." - Trendhunter

The Scollar Mini smart collar is designed to be very intuitive and easy to use alongside the Scollar app (more on this below). Simply download the Scollar app and enter your pet's information. 

Scollar Mini is automatically paired with your phone when you power it up.  the Scollar app makes it easy to keep track of all of your pets in one place.

All your pets in one place.

The Scollar app will then prompt you to enter feeding, flea/tick and medication reminders, and set up a home zone for your pet in case they get lost. 

Set up all of your daily pet care routines in the Scollar App!
 
 
Here is what a reminder looks like on Scollar Mini!
 

Scollar functionality is expanded through modules, which are easily inserted and then seamlessly integrate with the collar. In the case of the perimeter barrier module you can assign a beacon disc as a barrier to keep your pet off of the kitchen counter or keep them away from an other pet's food bowl.

 

 

Here is how you insert a module into the Scollar Mini!

Perimeter barriers create keep away zones.

 

Demo of Scollar Mini and perimeter beacon interaction.
 

The Scollar Mini has crowdsourced GPS tracking technology to find your lost pet in your neighborhood or many miles away. 

Find one pet or know where they are all hanging out.

Finding a pet using the Scollar App.

 

You can keep track of the current and past locations of your pet. The Scollar Base Station is even equipped with WiFi so you can keep track of your pet while you are away! 

Scollar extended range Bluetooth illustrated!
 

If your pet is begging for food, simply tap on the screen to find out if they have already been fed. 

Be sure your pet has been fed when they beg for an extra meal.

You can also ensure flea/tick treatments are up to date, and if medications have been administered by simply tapping on the collar screen.

The LED lights on the collar make the pet visible at night and can help you find the collar if it breaks away from your cat or dog. The LEDs and beeper alert you to a notification on the collar. These notifications also show up on your phone. 

Here is how you check the status of your pet's daily routine.

The Scollar app keeps track of all of your pets' information.

The battery can be charged without removing the collar from your pet. Simply attach the portable magnetic charging block to the bottom of the collar and in an hour the collar is fully charged. The portable battery charger can provide two full collar charges. With the added Base Station, the collar battery can last up to 30 days.

Scollar integrates with Amazon Alexa to make keeping track of your daily pet care routine even easier.

 
Amazon Alexa integration with the Scollar Cloud Service
 
 

 "...this collar does it all when it comes to your pet." - The Gadget Flow

The Scollar app allows you to train your pet through videos that you can favorite, rate and rank. Customize your training feed with the highest ranked videos; poop on the ones you never want to see in your feed again.

Never lose your pet again. Set up a home area for your pet and get an alert any time they wander outside of it. The app supports tracking of multiple pets at once and even allows you to keep track of them while you are away with the Base Station connected to your WiFi!

With how busy we are its easy to forget the simplest of things. The Scollar app is customized by you to remind you to feed your pets. So the next time they come begging for food, you can simply check the collar and know if they have been fed.

A healthy pet is a happy pet. The Scollar app allows you to set reminders so you won't forget or miss giving your pet their flea/tick treatments or medications. No more scratching at 3am!

The Scollar Mini is built on an open hardware and software platform, meaning independent developers are always working to improve the product and expand functionality. Since the Scollar is open source it is always expanding and making life easier for you and your pets.

"Scollar smart collar is a sleek little device." - Gambit Magazine 

 

 

 

 "The Scollar Mini is the comprehensive solution for you and your pet." - Jebiga Design & Lifestyle

 

John and Lisa are long time business partners with complimentary skill sets. They have started several businesses including an engineering cloud service that was acquired by the largest CAD vendor on the planet and incorporated into their flagship AEC product. 

Bryant has designed and delivered multiple consumer electronics with million plus units shipping.

Terry has delivered several consumer electronic products from NPI through to million plus shipping units.  

John has deep experience in programming, software development and mechanical engineering and has coordinated multiple globally dispersed teams to deliver time sensitive projects on time.  

Lisa has deep experience in financial planning, business strategy and development, enabling her to create a roadmap and then execute on it, keeping the team motivated, moving forward and on track.  

The Scollar team and development partners are the brightest, most talented, dedicated and passionate experts in their fields.  These teams work together in a highly collaborative way and are aligned towards delivering a truly revolutionary smart collar to market.

 

Risks and challenges

As with every consumer electronic, manufacturing can be complex and exacting. We have throughly vetted and selected an excellent manufacturing partner to mitigate any issues we may encounter on that front. The only piece of the puzzle that’s left is your support. With you behind us, anything is possible!
story_txt:

Have you ever lost your pet? Do you forget to get your pet their medications? Have trouble keeping them in the yard? Have you every felt overwhelmed by the ever-expanding technology for pet care? Those high prices add up to be quite expensive.For that reason, we've created an all-in-one solution to pet care: "This smart collar will make pet care a walk in the park" - MashableScollar Mini story:
On April 10, 1912, Titanic began her maiden voyage to New York, which happened to be her only time conveying passengers. Amongst those passengers laid some with the deepest pockets on earth desiring to explore new opportunities in USA. The voyage ended up an epic catastrophe amidst the ice-strewn waters of the Atlantic with a death toll of more than 1,500 out of 2,224 crew members on board. Captain Edward Smith also went down with the ship together with the chief designer Thomas Andrews.

After the previous collection of TitanicX, positive feedback and high demand from the backers have been received. OVD team decided to let this legendary story set sail again-"TITANICX-II" is officially onboard.

 

 

To pay tribute to the TitanicX, the rust-like-effect rotor part of the movement is retained. It is inspired by the rusty anchor of a shipwreck. The design of the solid case back embarks the porthole on hull in a rust-like-effect with a protection coat to symbolize the passing of time in which the Titanic has been eroded by the sea.

 

The design inspiration of buckle comes from the vintage appearance of instruments and vessel-related components on board. The unique two-stage shape and ergonomic design makes it more convenient and comfortable for users to wear. We're confident no identical buckle could be found in the market given its uniqueness.

 

Calendar is placed in between 2 and 3 o’clock to commemorate 2:20am, the time that Titanic sank. The calendar frame is made with diamond-cut chamfered surface to go with this concept.

 

 

 

 

 

 

After the experience of TitanicX, our team has brought TitanicX-II movement to the next level, upgrading to SII NH35A. This specification of movement allows 21,600 vibrations (per hour) and provides a power reserve that lasts for 41 hours. What really sets TitanicX-II apart is the special rotor design of its movement. Taking the inspiration from the shipwreck anchor, we have in-house modified to distress the rotor to bring an old and sturdy appearance.

 

 
 

 

The dial of the TitanicX-II and the hands are coated with a Swiss SuperLuminova to ensure the legibility even in the dark environment. The glowing "X" logo imprinted on the Sapphire crystal surface is as striking as a lighthouse at sea. In the darkest time, there is always room for a little light. TitanicX-II is always here for you, guiding you home.

 

 

Dual leather materials are used in the belt. CODE.01 is equipped with a nylon strap with strong distressed effect to create an antique vibe. The other 4 models are paired with high-quality Vegetable tanned leather strap and iconic hot stamping, true unique timepieces. All watch straps are entirely handmade, including hand-wrapping the wax thread to embody the weather-beaten-feeling.

 
 

 

From the initiating the concept to the second production of a solid prototype, from numerous of design modification to product shoot and layout design, we proudly present you with TitanicX-II after this 1-year voyage. We did not make any compromises despite the increasing production cost. We want the best for our wearer, and we make sure you are getting the best. Take material selection as an example, we insist on using imported raw materials for the double-dome sapphire crystals from Europe even when it costs much more comparing to other options.

 

 

 

As usual, we insist on the importance of the role that packaging design plays in telling the whole story behind. The box is made of walnut undergoing a special burning process to create an antique effect. It is just like a lost underwater treasure chest. To be consistent with the design concept, the package comes with a bronze warranty card and a vintage manual.

 
 

 

 

 

 

We have completed seven campaigns in three years, and all were delivered before the expected and promised time. We value and respect to timeline commitment as we believe it is key to a good crowdfunding platform. Taking in charge of all the procedures internally, including material purchase, material follow-up, watch assembling, and packaging processes, it allows us to be able to keep abreast of the production timeline.

 

"You may call me a dreamer, but I always want to create something so unique that people would actually talk to each other about it. It creates an opportunity for a communication, and I would like to keep creating those opportunities. This is exactly the reason why I don’t insist on putting OVD LOGO on every watch. I rather let the watch tell the story a little bit more itself.'' said designer Ricky.

story:
The 1st denim jacket that enables you to swap between art and even the original denim fabric.
PATENT PENDING

 

From rock & roll to hip-hop, the concept of customizing jackets reached a variety of communities. Although art styles differed across communities, they all used custom jackets as a form of self expression. As artists in the hip-hop community, we saw painted art on the back of clothing often at competitions and parties. Unfortunately, the paint on the jackets cracked, peeled,  and people grew tired of continuously wearing the same art. 

We wanted to innovate the jacket to one that kept up with its history, supported artists, and is sustainable. We envisioned a jacket with art that would last a lifetime and enabled you to create again and again — hence “The Endless Canvas”.   

 Customization is an exclusive feature we are allowing for Indiegogo. 

 

We've spent over two years researching and developing an attachment system that finally passed the test. We discovered that using both zippers and velcro with strategic pattern making was crucial to success.

Artist designs from across the globe!

All selections and customizations will take place on our website post campaign. (Jacket colors & sizes, art panels, custom panels) 

 

We created over 25 prototypes, wore them outside, danced in them, and improved it to the jacket you see today. Premium quality, comfort, and beautiful art - all seamlessly integrated.

 

We're Jane So and Lake Siva, and we founded Creator in 2017.  We're Canadian born artists and entrepreneurs, with a passion for urban art and creative design. For over 2 years, we've spent every waking minute learning the ins and outs of the denim jacket. After 25+ prototypes, the Creator jacket was born.

The name Creator stems from our desire to bring something new to the table.

story:
OLLO created the first ever footwear designed specifically for Parkour and Freerunning in 2012. We're back with an entirely new collection of shoes, informed by continued testing with superhuman athletes, and now hoping to hit the streets and keep you moving. 

The ALPHA and SAPIEN X

After two years of design, development and testing with our Global Athlete Team, the ALPHA and SAPIEN X are ready to move with you. Whether you're training, competing, or discovering a new city, you can be confident that the ALPHA and SAPIEN X can take whatever your environment dishes out.

 

What's the Difference?

The Sapien X and ALPHA are entirely different from each other. Each with it's own personality and critical performance criteria. Most of our athletes prefer..., well BOTH. See below for an introduction to the features of each model. 

 

The LAST comes FIRST

The true performance of any shoe begins with proper fit and form. The foundation of all footwear is the LAST, the form that shoes are built on.  OLLO worked closely with the fabled American last maker Jones & Vining to create custom lasts for the ALPHA and SAPIEN X. We discussed with them the needs of our athletes, how they move, and what demands they put on their shoes. They put their 90 years of knowledge and experienceto work to create two masterfully rendered lasts. One to capture the dynamics of the ALPHA and the other to enhance the function of the SAPIEN X.

Engineered from the Inside out.

Not just a pretty face. We consider every surface of every component when we design OLLO shoes. Intelligent engineering doesn't cost more, it just takes a little more time.

 

Built to Last

We engineer and test all of our materials and components to be lightweight AND very durable. You get BOTH with the ALPHA and SAPIEN X. 

 

A brief History of Parkour

The word Parkour is derivative of Parcours Du Combatant, which refers to a challenging military program to master obstacles. Parkour was born in France in 1988, and is now a global activity enjoyed by people of all ages and skill levels. It's a practice that focuses both the mind and body, and encourages movement as a way to stay healthy and strong. Watch Yoann Leroux in Paris, in the video below for a great look at the ALPHA and SAPIEN X.

 

Pledge Levels

The best time to order a pair the remarkable OLLO models is now. Maybe the 4-PACK would be the fit for you?  

 

*EVERY BACKER will have the opportunity to choose their desired style(s), color(s) and size(s). We will email you a survey at the end of the campaign requesting your choices.

 

 Our Athletes Speak-

Yoann Leroux - "Think before you jump, jump without thinking. This is my motto. The trust I've built up in OLLO after wearing their shoes for 8 years, allows me to live that."

Jb Ninjaboy - "It's great to have a shoe that has good grip, flexibility, and is light to wear, not to mention some stylish looks. I definitely recommend OLLO's to anyone looking for an athletic shoe that provides!"

Simon Nogueira - "OLLO makes the most suitable shoes for freerunning. I have never found a better combination of lightweight, flexibility, ankle support, and grip in another shoe."

Bob Reese - "I've worn OLLO's for over 6 years. I'm excited to continue using the new styles!"

Fernando Arce - "From their first Kickstarter in 2012 I knew OLLO was going to do BIG things. Each new design is an improvement upon the last because OLLO listens to its consumers and athletes and takes their feedback to develop even more superior parkour footwear."

Timeline

November 2020  - Production Begins

February 2021- Production Complete

March 2021 - Orchestrate Fulfilment

April 2021 - Ship to Backers 

Behind the Scenes

OLLO is a small company launched in 2012 and run by an experienced, dedicated team of experts and professionals.  We are based in Los Angeles where OLLO co-founder and director, Chip Howes, resides.  We develop our shoes with athletes from around the globe, and our manufacturing team has been making top quality athletic footwear for 28 years.

Chip has been designing and bringing footwear to market for 25 years. He has worked primarily in the action sports and street fashion arenas, creating best selling product for brands including, Burton, DC Shoes, REEF, O'Neill, FEIT and others. He and his team are  now focused on the challenge of making shoes for the new generation of 'movement' athletes, whose only equipment requirement IS shoes. Footwear design has been his passion since winning a Reebok sponsored design competition as a student at the prestigious Art Center College of Design in Pasadena, California, and spending the following summer doing a design internship at Reebok headquarters in Massachusetts.

International Backers

We will ship the ALPHA and SAPIEN X worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. 

Need help? We're here for you.

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at question@OLLOpk.com

Please Spread the Word and THANK YOU!

We need your help to spread the word about the ALPHA and SAPIEN X. The success of this campaign will guarantee future great shoes from OLLO. Every post, share, and pledge counts!

We're here for you.If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at question@OLLOpk.comPlease Spread the Word and THANK YOU!We need your help to spread the word about the ALPHA and SAPIEN X. The success of this campaign will guarantee future great shoes from OLLO. Every post, share, and pledge counts!

story:
The Legacy Footwear Collection features two sustainable upper options so you can tailor your shoes to your style! 

 

Our ultra-fine Merino Wool Upper is soft, breathable, temperature-regulating, and moisture-wicking to keep you comfortable all day long.

Our shoes are crafted with certified Merino wool from New Zealand farms that is ethically sourced and traceable.  

 

 

Our Woven Bamboo/Nylon Mesh upper resists moisture to create shoes that keep your feet cool and dry through any weather condition. The bamboo is sustainably sourced and the nylon thread is made from recycled plastic bottles, to carry out our mission to reduce plastic in landfills.

 

The Legacy Footwear Collection features two outsole options so you can pick the positive impact of your purchase.

 

 

To craft our first outsole option, we’ve combined sugar cane (a renewable resource that captures CO2 to reduce greenhouse gas emissions), with recycled rubber to create a tough outsole that can withstand any terrain.

 

 

Our algae outsole takes harmful algae bloom from vulnerable lakes and waterways and turns it into plant based performance foam that reduces the dependency on non-renewable resources. Combined with recycled rubber, the Algae foam creates a performance outsole that is light, flexible and adventure ready.

 

Our insoles are good for your feet and for the planet!

The insoles of our shoes are sustainably crafted with an algae foam that offers all-day comfort and support. 

 

 

The production of the insole removes algae bloom from the waterways and releases clean air into the environment. This innovative material and production is a great way to join a global movement to seek out sustainable solutions and materials.

Our insoles are also made with castor oil — a bio-oil that reduces our dependency on petroleum and uses less natural resources.

 

 

In an effort to find new ways to use material that already exists, and keep that material out of landfills and our oceans, we’ve crafted our laces from recycled ocean plastic .

By utilizing this recycled material, we’ve crafted laces that are strong, long-lasting and durable.

 

 


 

Back in 2018 while Jeremy was on a beach in Maui with his daughter he saw blue flecks in the sand. On closer discovery, he realized the flecks were microplastic waste. He asked the question WHY is all this pollution happening, and WHY does it have to be this way? 

“I want the beach to be pristine as it was when I first visited Maui 20 years earlier so my children and children’s children can enjoy nature as I have.” 

At that moment Jeremy started on a journey to create the sustainable footwear brand YY NATION, shoes that leave a good environmental footprint. He told his story to a good mate Darryl that had visited that same beach with Jeremy to windsurf 20 years earlier. Darryl joined the team along with Kim and Olaya, an experienced shoe designer. Over the past 2 years, YY Nation has been designed and developed with a desire to change the shoe world and the way shoes are made.

“These are the least sustainable shoes we will ever make, we will only keep getting better!”

 

 

Why YY? Well, why not? We are a New Zealand-based business, surrounded by natural beauty. We know how lucky we are, and we want to pass on that treasure to future generations.

We ask ‘why’ and ‘why not?’ a lot. Through questioning we continue to discover new possibilities and evolve better solutions to the environmental challenges facing our planet. We are inspired by nature and powered by curiosity

YY or ‘Waewae’ in Te Reo Maori – the first language of Aotearoa New Zealand – means foot or footprint. We are conscious of how we bring things into the world, but more careful of what we leave behind.

We just didn’t set out to create another pair of shoes, we set out to have a positive impact. This extends from how we source and grow our raw ingredients, how the workers and makers along our supply chain are treated, how we get our product to market, where they end up, and what plans we have at ‘end of life’. We don’t have all the answers, but we are devoted to asking questions and creating solutions that help to restore and preserve our planet for all to enjoy.

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make the Legacy Footwear Collection a reality. 

 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order the Legacy Footwear Collection, if you’re a supporter of the Legacy Footwear Collection, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
Why? We're sick of pants that are too big in the waist, too tight in thighs, and have no shape. We're over fabric that rips because it isn't made with the stretch we need to bend over and strap in. We are strong, confident women who love to ski and snowboard, and we need pants that can keep up with us and make us look as good as we feel.

We should be worrying about how to land our next trick, not worrying about our pants!

Nobody's Princess was born in 2020 when founder Maria finally got her sh*t together after years of struggling to find well-fitting snow pants. As an Australian size 12 to 14, she was constantly ripping the crotch of her snow pants because the fit just was never quite right. 

We launched Nobody's Princess for one reason - to make great snow pants for women like you. Women who have no time for insecurities when trying snow pants. Women who don't like being left feeling humiliated when their pants split halfway down a run. Women who don't like being forced to wear ill-fitting and unsightly shaped men's snow pants because our snow sport industry doesn't cater to us.

You can read more about our story here. 

Over 400 women have completed this survey so far, helping us determine what is wrong with their snow pants. They have provided critical measurements so we can analyse their sizes and shapes. They have told us what they honestly expect out of a great pair of snow pants. Our pants will be designed using real statistics from snowboarding and skiing women from all over the world.

Using communities like Miss Snow It All #showusdagirls we've spoken to countless women who are all yearning for the same thing - pants that fit, and they've spoken loud and clear!

We are going to provide you with the features YOU want.
This is what you've told us you want:

We've secured the talents of a world-class technical fashion designer, who has worked with some of the biggest snowsports companies in the world. She is bringing her years of expertise to the (snow) field, and still cannot believe these issues haven’t been addressed - until now!

These pants are going to be made for women, by women. Our first pant will be black, and available in AU8/US4, AU10/US6, AU12/US8, AU14/US10, AU16/US12, AU18/US14, AU20/US16 and AU22/US18! 

We don't have a big savings account or fancy-schmancy investors helping us to fund the dream. Our process that leads to creating a fully-functioning prototype to test includes paying for a few things along the way.

Our costs include; sourcing a quality manufacturer and the right fabrics, pattern making, designing new concepts to solve issues, sewing fit garments, creating prototype samples, product testing, and doing a bit of self-promotion to get the word out.

We aren't paying ourselves, making a profit, or anything like that - every cent we get our hands on is going into make you the best fitting snow pants, ever. 

Our pants are due to be available for sale to the general public by the beginning of August 2021. We are working to a strict timeline so that the Southern Hemisphere will be able to get their legs into our incredible pants during the 2021 season, and there will be plenty of time for the Northern Hemisphere to get slip into theirs for the 2021/22 season. 

We will launch a new crowdfunding campaign when our prototype is ready and has been tested, so you can place your pre-order and help us get our minimum order requirements.

It all started back in 2018 on a chair lift when founder Maria felt an odd, cool sensation in her crotch. 

It's true, a ripped crotch on her brand new snow pants is what spurred this brand. And it's sad to say, that wasn't the only pair. And as she told this story, she found out she wasn't the only one. In the search to find a pair of pants that fit better,  a chorus of women spoke up and chimed in, about their frustration in the elusive search. They'd lift up their jackets and show the gaping in their backsides. They'd show the inside lining on their pants ripped through. 

And this just fueled the fire. So, this is why we're doing something about it.

We need this. We need to change the game. Change the standard. We head to the snow to have fun, socialise, and energise ourselves with that mountain air. We shred and ski all over that mofo. And we are there for ourselves, we don't go for anyone else. We don't go to conform, we do it to express ourselves. We don't try to fit in, we go to be better than we were the day before. We are there for the snow.

Our main motto and driver behind our idea is that comfort = confidence. And we stand by that statement. If you've spent your day on the snow wondering if your pants are going to split if you bend over, if you're going to get snow down your pants next time you fall; if you live in fear or doing up your bindings because your crotch might give out, or sitting in the lift chair hurts because that phone in your pocket is digging into your hips; if you wonder if you hit that kicker are your pants going to fall down 5 inches..... then you are the reason why we are doing this. 

Those issues and problems SHOULDN'T be on the forefront of your mind every time you hit the snow, and having your mind focused on the wrong things ruins your confidence. Comfort = confidence. And confidence = fun.

story:
Order on Our official website: https://mpmagicsocks.com

Featured by The Times, click here for full report

Featured by Daily Mails, click here for full report

Featured by Little Things, click here for full detailed review

Very detailed testing by ELSPETH VELTEN from TripSavvy, click here for full review

We are the MP Team. We seek out to design and develop innovative and high quality lifestyle products. This spring, we successfully launched the MP Glovax Gloves, delivering pairs to more than 1300 backers all over the world! The feedback was overwhelmingly positive. Now, we are back and proud to launch the world's best odorless socks with three metal infused. The MP Magic socks incorporate a super comfortable design, with silver, copper and zinc-infused, antibacterial fabrics that work hard to make your feet odorless! These innovative socks are odorless, comfortable, antibacterial, super durable, and breathable. More crazy, we added one beta version of this socks to every package of glovax, that means, these socks will be improved based on 1300 users' feedback! No other campaign has been able to perform this type of cost development and interaction with their backers! Until the MP team!

Color & Styles

Featured by Mashable, click here for the full review

Check the detail testing by Chris Ellis from Ergohacks, click here for full review

By Vanessa chan from Asia361, check out the full review

---------By Josh Orth, Apocalypse equipped, click here for full review

What causes foot odor? Feet smell when bacteria breaks down sweat as it comes from the pores. A pungent smell is released as the sweat decomposes. Silver, Copper, and Zinc kill bacteria and prevent them from generating foot odor.

The key to the effectiveness of the MP Magic socks is their unique composition. This fabrics are infused with three metals: Silver, copper and zinc. Multiple metals can kill more types of bacteria, making these socks extra antibacterial. The metal infusion technique was developed for the aerospace industry, but we have repurposed it for everyday use.

When deal with odor control, we are super proud about our fabrics and technology. We are the world's best! Silver is known as a great antibacterial metal, copper can kill bacteria and is a key component of many enzymes, and zinc can reduce the bacteria that contributes to odor! We use special technique to infuse all the three metals with the fabrics, never wash away! 

With these functional fabrics, you can take off your shoes without any hesitation. MP Magic socks are equipped with metal circulation wire zones, making them 100% conductive, boosting foot circulation and reducing stiffness! In addition to the unique fabrics, we’ve specially designed the socks at the toe and heel area to perfectly match the human foot shape, increasing breathability and durability.

With the metal infusion, these socks can transfer heat more efficiently, and exhibit an increased durability! With MP Magic socks, it feels like you’re not even wearing socks. Free your feet!

The MP Magic Socks come equipped with a top face mesh area. When you wear our ankle socks, you will never worry about the dreaded slip down into your shoes. The socks just grip your feet and no slip.

Compare

By Karen Kuzsel, MPI – Greater Orlando Area chapter; MPI Meeting Professionals Advisory Board 2016-2017; ILEA Orlando; Society of Professional Journalists, read the full review article here

By Dilip Mutum from Adamok.net, click here for full review

Referral Program

If you have backed one perk, and refer a backer to our campaign, and they pledge more than one perk, you will get one pair of Crew Socks for free! 

If you do not back our campaign, but your shares bring at least 80 USD purchase, we still send you one pair of Crew Socks for free!

There are several ways to win, and we suggest you try them all! There is no share time limits, and the more you share, the higher chance you have of winning free awards!

Method 1:

Log in to indiegogo, Click these share buttons

Method 2:

Log in to indiegogo, visit the MP Magic indiegogo campaign page: https://igg.me/at/mpmagicsocks/x/16458430

Find the share button and share directly

For mobile users, just click the “share,” and share directly to social media.

Method 3:

You will also find your unique link to the right of our video by clicking the “Link” button. Share this link around:

Method 4:

You can also take two steps to refer our campaign to more people:

Step 1: Login your indiegogo account, and go to our campaign page, copy the link with the series number. 

Step 2: Paste that link to anywhere with large viewership, like your emails, facebook groups, Linkedin groups, personal blogs, or some forums, anywhere. The more you share, the better your chance is of winning the free awards.

Size Chart

Perk list

Timeline

MP's Product History

Everyone desires a pair of good socks. Regular socks can be hot and uncomfortable, prone to developing odor quickly after just one use. After a sweaty workout, long travels, or a fitful night sleep, you could definitely use a great pair of odorless and comfortable socks. When you search for the best socks online and in-store, it is a frustrating experience with the overwhelming number of options that lack description and viability. How are consumers supposed to make an educated decision? That's why you need check out MP products! We are a group of people with renowned design, engineering and supply chains expertise. We only find the world’s best and most innovative technique to engineer our products. This spring, we successfully launched the MP Glovax Gloves, delivering pairs to more than 1300 backers all over the world! The feedback was overwhelmingly positive.

 

You can google "glovax gloves", and can easily find many reviews and feedback!

Additionally, we added one beta version of this socks to every package. That means, these socks will be improved based on 1300 users' feedback! No other campaign has been able to perform this type of cost development and interaction with their backers! Until the MP team! 

MP team develops innovative lifestyle products. United States are good at design and development, Japan usually can provide high quality and innovative raw fabrics and yarn, China is famous on fabrication. We have set up several offices and partnerships in different global areas, and bring the best products to all!

We have built a great community of supporters, and every member can enjoy our continually developing product innovations. This is MP, we love what we are doing, so join us, and work with us so together we can improve.

We are super proud and confident with our delivery and customer supports! We will usually start shipping in about one month, and deliver to all over the world around 10~15 days. That's the timeline of Glovax gloves, what we did this summer! We will continue this rate for MP Magic Socks, in order to deliver the great MP products to our lovely backers!

A good product is not only the product good, but also a good customer support and experience!  Our business logic is that we provide the extreme good customer support to build super great reputation and brands, then we will earn more money post crowdfunding with our distributors and E-Commerce. We do not plan to earn money from crowdfunding, we invest a lot to achieve our branding goal. Some backers value our supports:

If you check our glovax campaign comment section, you will find that by yourself:)

We are super proud and confident with our delivery and customer supports! We will usually start shipping in about one month, and deliver to all over the world around 10~15 days. That's the timeline of Glovax gloves, what we did this summer! We will continue this rate for MP Magic Socks, in order to deliver the great MP products to our lovely backers!
A good product is not only the product good, but also a good customer support and experience!  Our business logic is that we provide the extreme good customer support to build super great reputation and brands, then we will earn more money post crowdfunding with our distributors and E-Commerce. We do not plan to earn money from crowdfunding, we invest a lot to achieve our branding goal. Some backers value our supports:


If you check our glovax campaign comment section, you will find that by yourself:)

story:
Meet main()

 

 

The Dress that suits your lifestyle

 

 

We live in a time where technology makes our lives easier.  Our interactions with the world become easier. The technological progress is here to take our minds off routine tasks and focus on what really matters. We took this approach and applied it to clothing.

 

 

Main() is one versatile dress, that will help you minimize the overthinking and maximize your concentration. Our main purpose is to provide the confidence of looking appropriate in every possible occasion. It's made from high-performance fabric which is durable, breathable, wrinkle-free and water repellent.

 

 

Perks

 

 

 

Stretchable Goals

In order to make ideal dress we created it together with women. So please don’t hesitate to tell us about your needs! Let’s create the ideal dress you really need together!

Feel free to share your ideas in comments section, or contact us via email all@themaindress.com 

 

Our Story

 

When I was overloaded with work, study and personal life, I wore similar dresses to minimize the decision-making part in what to wear. However, one day I decided to create my own dress to make modern women’s lives a little easier.

After 5 years in the tech field, building my career path from developer to executive, I realized that all we do depends on things with which we interact with daily.

In order to create new concepts, new ideas, and work productively worldwide, it is necessary to feel comfortable and confident. It is necessary to be sure that you look appropriate on every occasion, and people perceive you correctly. Yes, we still care about how people perceive us!

When I was beginning  to create the main() dress, I interviewed a lot of women during customer development, and looking appropriate and acceptable was the main point.

So, it was developed in close collaboration with women, and it is the main reason to start with crowdfunding.

 

 

Sizing

 

And now, back to the dress. It’s not enough just to fit into the style. For every successful pitch, every speech, every sincere open smile you have to feel comfortable. No distracting thoughts! This is exactly why we made the dress loose fit — you don’t have to worry about pulling in your stomach.

Our patterns are made in a way, that you will only need to know your top size. The bottom will fit you right. The way the top of the dress is sewn in a way that it looks elegant and fits your shoulders perfectly due to hidden cutouts.

 

 

Right now we have two standard lengths: 36"(91 cm)  and 39"(96 cm) (to fit heights below 5'5" (165 cm) and above 5’5" (165cm) respectively). Length of the sleeve is 16"(40cm) and 17"(43cm).
The length of the dress is tailored to be one inch above your knee – the length that is acceptable with any office dress code.
Also if you want the longer one - you may choose «above 5’4" height».
New lengths are coming soon.

 

Contact us at all@thremaindress.com with your dimensions and we can recommend you a size.

 

 

Why people love it

 

Main() dress is quintessence of women needs...

We didn't just come up with this idea, we talked to ≈ 1000 females, performed usability research and discovered some important insights before prototyping

  • 83% of interviewed women at least once thought about universal ”save the day” outfit
  • 67% need a clothing item that would look appropriate both in the work space and during leisure activities
  • 80% of respondents chose a black dress as the most uniform choice of clothing
  • 85% of respondents wanted their perfect dress to cover their arms from shoulder to elbow. Yes, in the summer too

 

 

More Photos

 

How to Pre-Order

 

 

Sustainability & Ethical Production

 

We believe that the future is all about conscious consumption and minimalism, when people purchase only what they need, and these items last as long as you need them. That is why we concentrate on one versatile model now to provide the highest quality. We produce our dress ethically on small local productions. Main() dress is produced by happy people who have different interests and support our values.

 

 

Our Team

 

 

 

Timeline

 

 

 

Press kit

For all enquiries please email all@themaindress.com

https://themaindress.com/press-kit

story:
The Only Type Of Cloth Diaper You'll Ever Need!

There are so many types of cloth diapers out there, which can take hours of research to figure out the best fabrics, absorbency, styles, covers, type of enclosure etc.  We made it easy with our ultimate all-in-one diaper that will fit a newborn up to a 40-pound child.  No trial and error needed and no headaches with leakage problems. 

We've tested it on many newborns and toddlers, and parents love the fit, absorbency, ease of use & quality.  We've gathered feedback from countless avid cloth diapering Moms, so we can offer you the best diaper!  Our diapers are backed by a lifetime warranty!

We've used this platform for pre-orders so we can gain more momentum in launching a high-quality and affordable diaper for all.  36 diapers are recommended if you plan to launder 2-3 times/ week.  You won't find a better-priced diaper with so many hemp layers!  Please join us to help save the environment for our kids and grand kids!   We 100% guarantee you will receive a high quality product!  

Impact

Choosing to cloth diaper one child will stop about 7000 disposable diapers (one ton) from going into landfills.  Studies indicate that diapers in landfills take up to 500 years to degrade, creating methane and other toxic gasses in the process, and the manufacture uses volatile chemicals that also end up in the eco-system.  The solid waste in diapers also introduce harmful pathogens into the environment.

The super gel and dyeing agents in disposables can cause skin irritation and allergies.  You can have peace of mind with our cloth diapers as the inner absorbency layers are all-natural.  

 

Inside our Diaper:

Your Child Won't Wake Up From A Leaking Diaper!

It's been tested by many "heavy wetters" of all ages, and it did NOT leak throughout the night!    Adding the hemp booster gives 14 layers of nighttime protection!

You have a choice of Snap or Velcro enclosure.  Velcro snaps, are similar to disposable diapers and can be easier for beginners, caregivers and grandparents. 

Our Cloth Diapers Vs Disposable Diapers

 

 

Free 13" X 18 Bag(s) with 12 Pack

 

Purchase Options:

1 Diaper & 1 Hemp Booster - 10 Options:

 

3 Pack Diapers & 3 Boosters - 6 Options:

6 Pack Diapers & 6 Hemp Boosters - 4 Options:

 

12 Pack Diapers, 12 Hemp Boosters & 1 Wet Bag - 2 Options:

About Us

MOM & BAB is owned and operated by Angela Tran, who is a mother and is very passionate about preserving the environment.  Since 2015, MOM & BAB's mission is to help reduce the overload of plastic in our landfills and oceans, by producing quality reusable and affordable products that easily replace single-use items.  MOM & BAB is a proud supporter of Plan International and Plastic Oceans, which supports ending plastic pollution and fostering sustainable communities worldwide.

We stand by our products and superior customer service 100% and offer a lifetime product replacement guarantee.  We talk the talk and walk the walk.

story:
Short Summary

In the 25 years I’ve been Bboyin, finding the perfect shoes to Break in has always been a problem for me. Every good Breakin shoe has a few good qualities that make them ideal for dancing in, but wouldn’t it be great to have a shoe that is designed to have all the best qualities that a Bboy needs?

In my Bboy Journey, I tried breakin in every type of popular shoe for Breakin, took me a while to finally find  sneakers that I’d love to break in. Those shoes were hard to come by.  I always end up buying more than one pair, because I never know when I would see them next. 

Strangely, I knew that even my favorite sneaker types I had worn for years, could and should be better for Breakin. The problem was that these shoes weren’t made for Breakin, and it’s nearly impossible for these huge brands to notice of us, let alone make a better breakin sneaker for us. Also, what really bothered me was despite how huge our Bboy & Bgirl community spends on sneakers, while making these big brands become famous through hip hop and Breakin’s explosion since the 80’s, how much do these Brands give back to our Breakin community? 

Sure, sometimes they sponsor us here and there, but for them, they don’t care if Bboyin lives or dies, unlike skateboarding shoe companies who know that if skating dies, so does their brand! Therefore, they give back a lot to keep developing and building up the Skate culture... but who do we have?

So, when I was approached by the owner of a sneaker factory and asked if I would like to create a Bboy shoe, I told them that I could design the best Bboy sneaker shoe in the world if they could make it. I’ll never forget the day they handed me the alpha Bboy sneaker prototypes, my heart almost stopped, and I knew right there and then that these were the best Breakin sneakers I have ever laid my eyes on. 

With that said, I am now releasing the pre-sale for the first design called the “Numbawonz”. Why? Because

  1. they’re the first sneakers designed specifically for Breakin, they are the prototypes
  2. So far, they are the best shoes for Bboyin ever!

Those are pretty bold claims to make, and yes I’m sure there are Bboys out there who the shoe won’t fit (pun intended), but this sneaker was created for the  culture, by the community, and will be continued to be developed and refined by the Bboys and Bgirls. 

So here are the top 10 Bboy Qualities & Benefits of the Dyzee Numbawonz!

  1. Very light, but not too light
  2. Durable double stitched high-quality materials
  3. Comfy as can be
  4. Flexy Soles (for crouching floorwork)
  5. Non-Bulky Thin Soles (for the threaders)
  6. Soft insoles (for the flippers) 
  7. Soft outsoles (for the arm steppers)
  8. Good grip, but not too grippy
  9. Visually eye drawing 
  10. Hip Hop Culturally inspired & represented (by graffiti arrows)

 

The Dyzee Bboy sneakers are more high quality than all the other famous sneaker brands who if they matched these qualities would need to significantly raise their prices. Now a lot of people may wonder, is the Bboy & Bgirl community even ready for a high quality Breakin shoe? With the rapid rise of a Pro-Breakin battle industry and it's inclusion into the 2024 Paris Olympics, I sincerely believe that now is the time for the Breakin culture to finally have a product of its own that can be also sold to the general audience. The formula is simple, the Bboys and Bgirls make the brand famous (like it did to the other famous sports brands) and the brand gives back to support the Bboy community like it should be!

What We Need & What You Get

The sneaker factory owner has invested significantly in the research and development of the beta prototypes according to the 10 required qualities, forgoing the huge design and development costs. Now that we  have the working prototypes, we need to raise the capital to start the business and production, and further more pay for the minimum factory order of 3000 pairs.
Therefore, I have their approval to organize a community “Pre-sale”, for the first 150-300 pairs of sneakers to test and prove that there is a desire for Breakin to have our own kicks!

If minimum 150 pairs are pre-sold ($15,000 USD), then the first batch will be made for only the testing and feedback before starting the company.

If 300 + pairs get pre-sold ($30,000 USD), then the sneaker factory will begin the full mass production of the Numbawonz and further invest financially as a partner in the creation of the first ever Bboy Sneaker & Battle wear company!

"Breakin" it down in more detail:For the Dyzee Threadz & Footworks Sneaker company "Numbawonz" presale supporters, I have set up some perks just for you!

  1. Be the first to rock the first Breakin Sneaker in history! It won't be until 2020-2021 until the brand officially launches. 
  2. 20% off all future Dyzee Threadz sneakers
  3. 3M reflective material arrow option and animal cruelty free materials (black sneaker only)
  4. 10% the for the first 10 early bird supporters

    OPTIONAL (if you "like" the sneaker)
  5. Join the official Research, Feedback group. Help shape the evolution and progress of the ultimate Breakin Shoe
  6. Vote on the proposed upgrades and changes. Each presale sneaker you purchase = a vote!

    LASTLY (If you really LOVE the sneaker) 
  7. Join the future Cultural Marketing Program. Earn extra income for telling your Bboy and Bgirl friends "watz gooood"

 

Sizes

The factory creates their molds according to European sizes. When selecting your size, please refer to this chart below.  

Note: We only have size 36 - 46 Eur sizes (no half sizes available)

(I normally wear size 8 1/2 US but here I wear size 8 US and fits comfortably)

 

The Impact

 

The launch of a Breakin Sneaker Brand will be not just the beginning of a shoe, but the beginning of a sustainable Breakin industry. With Breakin set to go to the 2024 Paris Olympics, it will be just a matter of time before the big brands take an interest once again in the Bboy & Bgirl culture. However, these brands only come around when there is media attention, and when the hype dies down, I'm afraid they will abandon the culture like they did in the 80's, and in the mid 2000's in Korea. 

For the people in the Bboy & Bgirl Breakin culture that know me, I have dedicated my life to building a better Breakin future for Bboys and Bgirls worldwide. In 2010, I told the community I would launch a criteria based judging system and was the first to launch and execute an objective system with standards in over 30+ countries worldwide through the late beloved R16 World Championships sparking the movement towards a professional Breakin sports industry.

In 2017, through my vlog, I announced that I would launched a Bboy Battle Business prototype that could give Breakin crews an opportunity to earn a living from their passion, which by the community was dubbed "The Plan".  In just 4 months after officially launching a Bboy social club, mini battle arena & multi-purpose venue, I have successfully proven that I can turn a Bboy crew "Dream Runnerz" into an official city recognized Pro Breakin team who has monthly showdowns against rival cities, in the small city of Chiayi in Taiwan.

With that said, majority of my money is tied up in the Bboy Battle Business and developing the league. However, I was approached with this amazing opportunity to build the perfect Breakin sneaker, which has always been a dream of mine.

Breakin saved my life when I was a teenager growing up in a rough neighborhood, from a broken family, hanging out with the wrong crowd. I believe in the power of this dance, artform, street culture and will continue dedicating my life to building, promoting and developing it. If this sneaker will one day force other brands to fully support our culture by spending millions for a piece of the growing market share like they've done with skateboarding, then whether this sneaker succeeds or fails, it will be all worth it to me.

But if this sneaker brand succeeds, my dream is to build a brand that will treat the Breakin culture way that skate brands treat their skaters. According to the international Association of Skateboard Companies, a healthy skateboarding community = a healthy skateboarding business.

 

Risks & Challenges

One of the biggest challenges that we face is the existing sneaker brands ingrained in the culture, and the community support for them, despite the brands not making sneakers specifically designed for Breakin, nor no longer supporting the culture and if so at a minimum.

Our goal to overcome this will be the constant education of the Bboy culture and the continuous development of a Breakin industry, which has been the life mission of Karl Dyzee Alba, who has contributed heavily into the development of the pro-Bboy industry through the development of the first criteria based judging system, his educational Breakin vlogs, and his rival city Breakin League developed in Taiwan and promotion of his Bboy Battle Business.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with everyone you know that might be interested. Any help or publicity is very much appreciated!

Our goal to overcome this will be the constant education of the Bboy culture and the continuous development of a Breakin industry, which has been the life mission of Karl Dyzee Alba, who has contributed heavily into the development of the pro-Bboy industry through the development of the first criteria based judging system, his educational Breakin vlogs, and his rival city Breakin League developed in Taiwan and promotion of his Bboy Battle Business.


 

 

Other Ways You Can Help
Please share this campaign with everyone you know that might be interested. Any help or publicity is very much appreciated!

story:
The Bathrobe (& Slippers) You've Been Waiting For

We all know how important the feeling is, getting home after a hard day and sinking into a sense of comfort. Hotels have long known everyone loves that luxurious feeling, and bathrobes have always been that choice.

It can be difficult to understand how underrated a quality bathrobe is unless you have experienced the comfort before. Having an ideal bathrobe waiting for you at any time transforms your ordinary everyday experience into one of sheer comfort and relaxation.

Everyone needs a Bathrobe

Never be surprised by unexpected visitors again as you are always ready to receive them in style. Wear your robe for pleasure when relaxing around the house or collecting your mail.

Great for moving from a nice hot shower, or leaving the warmth of your bed, helping your body to stay warm and prevent the cold chill.

 

Meet Sento Bathrobe, a delightful creation of luxury combined with Japanese design and craftsmanship.

Durable, yet soft and luxurious design with 100% Japanese cotton. Our materials will aid in drying thanks to the intricacy of the weaving. We have created two styles, one made from a textured cotton waffle weave, and the other a quilted cotton filled padding.

 

 

To complete the experience we have created matching Sento slippers, one to match our waffle robe and another to match our quilted robe.  

Both styles provide that ultra plush feel and are among the most comfortable slippers ever created.

 

 

 

QUILTED ROBE FEATURES

PLUSH & SUPER SOFT

100% High Quality Cotton throughout, including the padding (no polyester or other harsh fibers), making this a unique and ultra-soft robe.

Feels great on your skin, like you're wearing your favorite blanket.

PERFECTLY WEIGHTED

Our Bathrobe has a higher GSM than most other bathrobes, designed to promote relaxation and reduce stress.  

With the daily tension of work and life, you know you can always come home to a snug and comfy robe that will help you feel at ease and recharge.

DOUBLE STITCHED HOODIE

Always have a hoodie when you need one during those extra cold nights.

HAND WARMERS (BUILT IN)

Built-in hand warmers that easily slide in and out of the sleeves, to keep you warm and cozy.

WARMTH + INSULATION

Rated for cold temperatures, 100% cotton padding provides insulation that keeps you warm during winter. NO MORE COLD MORNINGS! 

INSIDE POCKET (FOR YOUR PHONE)

Always have your device in reach with our inside pocket.

 PLUS MATCHING QUILTED SLIPPERS

Your feet are the foundation for your entire body, so they deserve the absolute best. That's why these are not your average hotel slippers, we designed them to be long lasting and extremely plush.

Padded closed-toe slippers to keep you warm, double-stitch lining for care free durability, anti-skid sole with grip so you can walk outside with confidence, plush foam inner to keep you comfortable, and it's machine washable.

WAFFLE ROBE FEATURES  

PREMIUM WAFFLE WEAVE

The deep waffle weave is not only timelessly elegant, but also soft, light, absorbent and durable enough for everyday use. Our robe combines elements of the Japanese Yukata with modern bath robe styles to create something new and unique. 

The advantage of waffle is its unique softness. It has the added benefit of being machine washable and, yes, it gets even softer with every wash.

ODOR AND SMELL RESISTANT

Unlike other fabrics and tightly knit dense cotton weaves, water and sunlight can penetrate deeply into the fabric. Easily rinse out 99% of germs, bacteria & mold with warm water. Dries fast for that clean and fresh feeling every time.

LIGHT & BREATHABLE (PERFECT FOR SUMMER)

Just like the Yukata our waffle robe is perfect for summer and bathing. However this lightweight, yet cozily woven waffle cotton robe is a fine choice for year round comfort.

 

INSPIRED BY THE WORD'S FINEST SPAS

The waffle weave robe is most like the robes used at 5 star spas and luxury hotels.

JAPANESE CRAFTSMANSHIP

The core of our waffle robe is a combination of the best Japanese and western designs and styles.

PLUS MATCHING WAFFLE SLIPPERS

Your feet are the foundation for your entire body, so they deserve the absolute best. That's why these are not your standard hotel slippers, we designed them to be long lasting and extremely plush.

With all the features of the quilted slippers but with an open heel for maximum freedom allowing you to glide into and out of your plush slippers with minimal effort. Includes anti-skid sole with grip so you can walk outside with confidence, plush foam inner to keep you comfortable and machine washable.

FEATURES FOR BOTH

UNISEX SIZES

We designed all our robes and slippers to be unisex. Check our sizing charts below for more details.

HANGING HOOPS

Ready to hang up anywhere!

100% JAPANESE COTTON

Sento is made with 100% Japanese cotton which use longer, more-fibrous threads, meaning that each robe and slippers will have more moisture-wicking loops per inch.

 

We are dedicated to bring Japanese products to your hands as well as its hidden beauty. Every experience you will leave you satisfied and blissful.

Sento connects you with Japanese crafts and combines it with the best of western textiles to bring you the very best of both worlds.

For the past year we've been working with experts developing multiple prototypes and perfecting our designs to utilize world-class craftsmanship. It's time for you to experience the joy of pure comfort, style and luxury.

Our Bathrobes and slippers are woven from fine cotton threads on slow-speed, weaving machines – the secret to their softness. 

Sento fabric is ultra-soft, super-fluffy and designed for high-end spas and hotels with it's luxurious look and feel.

 

We’ve done the leg work and found the best features so you get the most amazing bathrobes.

Many Bathrobes are made of cotton, but the look and feel of bathrobes largely depends on what type of cotton is used. Bathrobes designed and priced for everyday use are made of sub-standard cotton.

Sento is made with 100% Japanese cotton which use longer, more-fibrous threads, meaning that each bathrobe and slippers will have more moisture-wicking loops per inch.

If you enjoy luxury, then you will enjoy Sento Bathrobe and slippers. 

 

 

Unsure of which size to order? If you find yourself between sizes, we recommend going for the larger size, as most people prefer their robes a little looser.

EXCHANGE POLICY: If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the bathrobe and slippers shall fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your products for any reason, we will allow you to do that, just pay for return shipping and we'll exchange your robes and slippers. 

Sento was born and raised on Kickstarter. In 2016 we launched the Sento Towel. Thanks to our incredible backers and supporters, over 10,000 people worldwide are now enjoying our products every day.

Where We Are  

We have a design that has been heavily tested and refined at every step along the way. We have partnered with craftspeople, factories and raw material suppliers in Japan and built a strong supply chain network. We are ready to go!  

What We Need  

We need your help to raise $20,000 in order to fund the first production run of the Sento bathrobe sets. More specifically, this money will go towards the initial bathrobe run, raw materials and skilled labor required.

 

By backing this project you are helping make it a reality so as an added bonus any backer who shares this project will receive a free sleep mask! Extra large and super comfy, it's the perfect addition for snoozing on the couch in your Sento Bathrobe.

 

So please share this project via social media, email and word of mouth to tell your friends and family about our campaign. Thank you in advance!

Click the share button at the top of the page! Then message us to let us know you have shared.

 

 

We are a group of designers and entrepreneurs with a connection to Japan. We love making quality products and hope to bring minimalism and craftsmanship to all our designs.

Join us on our journey to bring great products to the world.

 

 

December/February - Kickstarter Launch!  

March/April - Production Run  

May - Assembly/Packing, quality control and testing  

June - Shipping out all rewards!

 

We believe garment care should be a simple and easy process.

Machine wash with cold water and mild detergent. Do not bleach or use fabric softeners. Hang dry away from direct sunlight or tumble dry on a low setting. 

Strong threads will keep your robes lasting a long time, while the natural fibers are absorbent and quick to dry. 

The high quality cotton fabric will become softer, fluffier, and gentler as you continue to use them.

Thank you!

story:
Introducing Wallex, the brand pays precise attention to every important detail. Each and every wallet made by Wallex is unique and unparalleled. Over time it adjusts to your needs and becomes better and better.

 

 

We combine the conservative style upon which the wallet craftsmanship is based and we add up style, innovation and design of the trends of the 21st century. Wallex is made to be elegant, comfortable and practical.

 

 

We have tried many different materials and eventually we found the perfect choice. The Crazy Horse leather provides flexibility in use, while at the same time it maintains the elegant style.

 

 

We make sure that the Crazy Horse leather is of high standard, soft  and rightly prepared. With the help of customized leather processing system we ensure the longevity of our wallets.

 

 

At Wallex we do everything by our hands. The knit of Wallex is separately processed under several levels before being used. Special coverage combined with customized patented knit ensures the longevity and endurance 

 

 

The Wallex crafts wallets with the specially personalized and customized system.Unlike all the other wallets, Wallex will not get shabby and old after a couple of months of use. We ensure high endurance and provide our warranty for a long life of Wallex.

We took care of everything, that is why we diversify our production. So here we introduce you  the XL version of Wallex. The only thing you’d hate is it is too comfortable to be true. The size of Wallet XL is perfect for people who love to have everything with them. Put as much cards, bills and even phones into Wallex XL.

 

 

The Crazy Horse Leather is proven to be perfect choice for the large size wallets. Putting all the credit cards and money bills, it will maintain its slick design and it won’t bother you when you put it in your pocket!

 

When developing the concept of Wallex our designers were seeking inspiration in the sights of nature, that is why the design of Wallex is the most delightful, elegant, and satisfying. With its unparalleled  design Wallex is an excellent choice for everyone.

 

 

Every line and every knit was counted. We put effort into everything to ensure all our promises will become reality. We combined high end design, style and innovation and eventually we came up with the excellent line of superior wallets by Wallex.

 

 

Thanks to the customized and separately developed  wax we  enhance the leather fibers and that way when Wallex is scratched or rubbed, the leather's natural color changes its shade that gives the antique, vintage appearance. 

Wallex provides a new solution to very old design. Nothing special and nothing fancy, we simply took a pocket of wallet and we have turned it around. Now You have more convenient system and comfortable usage.
