story:
Mindset is the first all-natural way to improve your concentration.

Mindset tracks your focus throughout the day, and alerts you whenever your concentration drops. Over time, these alerts train your mind and rewire your brain to better tune out distractions. The same technology used to treat ADHD, improve creativity in Olympic figure skaters, and train NASA astronauts, is now accessible to you.

 

 

 

 

 

We designed Mindset with a single goal: to create the perfect work headphones.

 

 

We’re as tired of wires as you are. Connect Mindset to your computer or phone via Bluetooth to listen to your favorite music, completely wire-free. And don’t worry - if you run out of battery, you can plug in an AUX cable to keep the tunes going.

Nothing replaces peace and quiet. Mindset listens to your environment and actively cancels out distracting noise. What’s left is pure, pristine silence.

Great products take expertise. We partnered with Onkyo, pioneers in high quality audio, to bring you a crisp, uncompromising sound. We’re working with their engineers to tune and craft the perfect listening experience.

 

 

Great ear cups make all the difference. Mindset’s gyroscopic hinge ensures the cups gently cradle your head - no more headaches from uneven pressure. Soft microfiber stays cooler than traditional leather, creating a fit you can comfortably wear all day.

Tech shouldn’t get in the way of comfort. Small spring-loaded electrodes fit through your hair, and sit gently on your head. Mindset’s upper band is flexible, designed to distribute the weight over your head. The result is a feeling of weightlessness.

 

 

 

 

 

Mindset is more than just state-of-the-art headphones. EEG sensors measure your concentration level in real time.

 

Embedded in Mindset are five electroencephalography (EEG) sensors, which measure the electrical activity in your brain. EEG has been used for over 50 years in hospitals for brain imaging and diagnosis.

The EEG signal contains profound insight into a user’s state of mind. Sophisticated processing techniques can be used to infer emotional states, anxiety levels, concentration, and more.

 

 

 

The first ever tool to measure your concentration in real time. A world of potential self-improvement.

 

 

Using advanced machine learning, Mindset recognizes the patterns in the EEG signal that represent a deep, focused mind. Mindset measures your concentration level in real time, tracking your changes throughout the day.

With Mindset, you can schedule deep work sessions to get in the zone. During deep work sessions, Mindset can alert you whenever you get distracted, so you can return to task immediately. No more getting sidetracked, when what you really want is to be crossing things off your to-do list.

Over time, each alert trains your mind to better recognize when it becomes distracted, leading to lasting improvements in concentration. Deeper, longer concentration that persists when you take the headphones off. Imagine how this could change your life.

 

 

 

Your workday is as unique as your fingerprint. The more you use Mindset, the better it understands how your concentration changes throughout the day. Over time, Mindset can give suggestions on how to improve your productivity: schedule emails during your downtime, and save your best hours for your deep work sessions.

For additional improvement, schedule a neurofeedback session. Think of it like a gym for your mind: use proven clinical methods to train your brain and further strengthen your concentration muscle. Watch as your concentration grows over time.

 

 

 

In a world of open-concept offices, constant emailing, and social media, we are more distracted than ever. Even in the absence of distraction, we’re having a hard time paying attention to anything for more than a few minutes. 

And it’s getting worse.

 

 

 

 

 

Neurofeedback is a widely used technology that trains your mind to better focus. CEOs, professional athletes, military leaders, and other high performers are using neurofeedback to achieve their full potential.

However, it’s simply not accessible - it’s expensive, uncomfortable, and takes hours to use. Mindset makes this technology affordable for everyone.

 

We spent the last 4 months in Shenzhen, China, the manufacturing capital of the world. We’ve gone through dozens of prototypes, making sure to get each element just right. The result has simply blown us away.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Measuring concentration via EEG

Berka, Chris, Gene David, Richard E. Olmstead, and Patrick L. Craven. "EEG Correlates of Task Engagement and Mental Workload in Vigilance, Learning, and Memory Tasks." Aviation, Space, and Environmental Medicine 2nd ser. 78.5 (2007): 231-43. Pubmed. Web. 19 Mar. 2016.

Neurofeedback as effective as Ritalin

Fuchs, Thomas, Niels Birbaumer, Werner Lutzenberger, John H. Gruzelier, and Jochen Kaiser. "Neurofeedback Treatment for Attention-Deficit/ Hyperactivity Disorder in Children: A Comparison With Methylphenidate." Applied Psychophysiology and Biofeedback 28.1 (2003): 1-12. Web. Mar. 2016.

Distraction and Mind Wandering Hinders Learning

Smallwood, Jonathan, Daniel J. Fishman, and Jonathan W. Schooler. "Counting the Cost of an Absent Mind: Mind Wandering as an Underrecognized Influence on Educational Performance." Psychonomic Bulletin & Review 14.2 (2007): 230-36. Web. 17 Mar. 2016.

Neurofeedback for Performance Enhancement

Gruzelier, JH. "EEG-neurofeedback for Optimising Performance. I: A Review of Cognitive and Affective Outcome in Healthy Participants." Neuroscience & Behavioral Reviews 44 (2014): 124-41. PubMed. Web. 12 Mar. 2016.

Neurofeedback for Professional Athletes

Perry, Frank D., Lindsay Shaw, and Leonard Zaichkowsky. "Biofeedback and Neurofeedback in Sports." Biofeedback 39.3 (2011): 95-100. Web. 15 Mar. 2016.

 

 

Using gold cup electrodes and conductive paste yields a great signal, but it has one limitation: it’s extremely inconvenient. Mindset collects high quality EEG with a form factor you can wear all day. Hundreds of hours of data, with absolutely no setup time, unlocks potential for big data analysis never before possible. This is the next step in BCI.

Free with Mindset, you’ll get full access to our developer SDK. Raw data from A1-C3-Cz-C4, calculated concentration metrics, easy remontage, computed features - you’ll get it all. Run your own experiments or build the BCI application of your dreams, all through a comfortable, great-sounding headphone. The sky is the limit.

 

You spoke, and we listened! Thank you for helping us unlock our first stretch goal: an embedded microphone for hands-free voice calls. Respond to calls quickly without taking off Mindset, so you can get right back into your flow. 

Now that we reached $600K, we’ll be taking Mindset to the next level: train your brain to improve your calm, and enhance your creativity. These medically validated protocols will help you train like the pros, from Olympic athletes to professional musicians.

Now that we’ve reach $750K, Mindset will integrate automatic play/pause functionality. When you take off the headphones, the music will pause – when you put them back on, it will play again. A simple, intuitive experience that will seamlessly integrate into your work flow.

Music is a huge part of concentration! Now that we've hit $900K, we’ll include concentration soundtracks built directly into the app - white noise, binaural beats, nature sounds, and more! Using Mindset’s EEG, track your progress and find out which soundtracks improve your concentration the most! 

Big milestones mean big features. Because we reached $1M, we’ll make all the electrodes removable! You’ll be able to wear the headphones without electrodes when concentration isn’t the goal, for maximum comfort. You can also swap in new electrodes when they wear out for improved signal quality, or even use custom electrodes!

 

That is our responsibility - we’re putting everything we have into designing the perfect workplace headphones, tuning the sensors, and perfecting our algorithms. But we need your help - your feedback, suggestions, and above all, excitement - to help us build Mindset up to the potential it can be.

We’ve come a long way since we first began, but now we need you, the Kickstarter community, to join us on this journey. With your support, we’ll be able to scale up manufacturing, and make Mindset the experience we all want. 

Back our project, share our page, and let’s make this happen!

 

 

  

 

   

 

   

 

We're a team of engineers-turned-entrepreneurs, who are incredibly passionate about tech, performance, and well-being. We've seen the transformative power of EEG, and we live for the day when it’s accessible to everyone. Our combined experience spans biomedical devices, neuroscience research, and artificial intelligence. Along with our team of advisors, partners - and you, our backers - we're more excited than ever to make Mindset a reality.

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

Sensors

  • 3 active dry electrodes: C3, Cz, C4
    ~200k impedance
  • 2 active dry reference electrodes: A1 & A2
    ~100k impedance
  • EEG signal processing chipset
    1uVPP noise floor
    Actively shielded wires
    Up to 16kHz sampling rate 
  • Accelerometer

Battery

  • Rechargeable 800mAh
  • 8 hours continuous playback, ANC, and data streaming

Connectivity

  • Optional 3.5mm audio cable
  • USB-C connector
  • Dual-mode Bluetooth 4.2 + 2.1

Audio

  • 40mm audio driver
  • Active Noise Cancellation

 

Acknowledgments

Thank you to our families, friends, and mentors who have made Mindset possible. Thank you to The Next Canada and HAX accelerator for their guidance. A special thanks to our videographer Antony Bui, to our industrial designers Tomas Rosen and Nicol Boyd at Office for Product Design, to our PR agency Proper Propaganda, to CCMEDIA for web support and select photography, to our campaign graphic designers at Detraform, to our online marketing consultant Samit Patel, to Woke studio for their UI/UX design, and to our direct response online advertising agency Gil Shterzer and Iddo Sternberg at Jellop Crowdfunding. Thank you also to La Gare, Sainte-Catherine Library, Ryerson DMZ, and SmartHalo for their help!
story_txt:
Mindset is the first all-natural way to improve your concentration.Mindset tracks your focus throughout the day, and alerts you whenever your concentration drops. Over time, these alerts train your mind and rewire your brain to better tune out distractions. The same technology used to treat ADHD, improve creativity in Olympic figure skaters, and train NASA astronauts, is now accessible to you.     We designed Mindset with a single goal: to create the perfect work headphones.  We’re as tired of wires as you are. Connect Mindset to your computer or phone via Bluetooth to listen to your favorite music, completely wire-free. And don’t worry - if you run out of battery, you can plug in an AUX cable to keep the tunes going.Nothing replaces peace and quiet. Mindset listens to your environment and actively cancels out distracting noise. What’s left is pure, pristine silence.Great products take expertise. We partnered with Onkyo, pioneers in high quality audio, to bring you a crisp, uncompromising sound. We’re working with their engineers to tune and craft the perfect listening experience.  Great ear cups make all the difference. Mindset’s gyroscopic hinge ensures the cups gently cradle your head - no more headaches from uneven pressure. Soft microfiber stays cooler than traditional leather, creating a fit you can comfortably wear all day.Tech shouldn’t get in the way of comfort. Small spring-loaded electrodes fit through your hair, and sit gently on your head. Mindset’s upper band is flexible, designed to distribute the weight over your head. The result is a feeling of weightlessness.     Mindset is more than just state-of-the-art headphones. EEG sensors measure your concentration level in real time. Embedded in Mindset are five electroencephalography (EEG) sensors, which measure the electrical activity in your brain. EEG has been used for over 50 years in hospitals for brain imaging and diagnosis.The EEG signal contains profound insight into a user’s state of mind. Sophisticated processing techniques can be used to infer emotional states, anxiety levels, concentration, and more.   The first ever tool to measure your concentration in real time. A world of potential self-improvement.  Using advanced machine learning, Mindset recognizes the patterns in the EEG signal that represent a deep, focused mind. Mindset measures your concentration level in real time, tracking your changes throughout the day.With Mindset, you can schedule deep work sessions to get in the zone. During deep work sessions, Mindset can alert you whenever you get distracted, so you can return to task immediately. No more getting sidetracked, when what you really want is to be crossing things off your to-do list.Over time, each alert trains your mind to better recognize when it becomes distracted, leading to lasting improvements in concentration. Deeper, longer concentration that persists when you take the headphones off. Imagine how this could change your life.   Your workday is as unique as your fingerprint. The more you use Mindset, the better it understands how your concentration changes throughout the day. Over time, Mindset can give suggestions on how to improve your productivity: schedule emails during your downtime, and save your best hours for your deep work sessions.For additional improvement, schedule a neurofeedback session. Think of it like a gym for your mind: use proven clinical methods to train your brain and further strengthen your concentration muscle. Watch as your concentration grows over time.   In a world of open-concept offices, constant emailing, and social media, we are more distracted than ever. Even in the absence of distraction, we’re having a hard time paying attention to anything for more than a few minutes. And it’s getting worse.     Neurofeedback is a widely used technology that trains your mind to better focus. CEOs, professional athletes, military leaders, and other high performers are using neurofeedback to achieve their full potential.However, it’s simply not accessible - it’s expensive, uncomfortable, and takes hours to use. Mindset makes this technology affordable for everyone. 
We spent the last 4 months in Shenzhen, China, the manufacturing capital of the world. We’ve gone through dozens of prototypes, making sure to get each element just right. The result has simply blown us away.        Measuring concentration via EEGBerka, Chris, Gene David, Richard E. Olmstead, and Patrick L. Craven. "EEG Correlates of Task Engagement and Mental Workload in Vigilance, Learning, and Memory Tasks." Aviation, Space, and Environmental Medicine 2nd ser. 78.5 (2007): 231-43. Pubmed. Web. 19 Mar. 2016.Neurofeedback as effective as RitalinFuchs, Thomas, Niels Birbaumer, Werner Lutzenberger, John H. Gruzelier, and Jochen Kaiser. "Neurofeedback Treatment for Attention-Deficit/ Hyperactivity Disorder in Children: A Comparison With Methylphenidate." Applied Psychophysiology and Biofeedback 28.1 (2003): 1-12. Web. Mar. 2016.Distraction and Mind Wandering Hinders LearningSmallwood, Jonathan, Daniel J. Fishman, and Jonathan W. Schooler. "Counting the Cost of an Absent Mind: Mind Wandering as an Underrecognized Influence on Educational Performance." Psychonomic Bulletin & Review 14.2 (2007): 230-36. Web. 17 Mar. 2016.Neurofeedback for Performance EnhancementGruzelier, JH. "EEG-neurofeedback for Optimising Performance. I: A Review of Cognitive and Affective Outcome in Healthy Participants." Neuroscience & Behavioral Reviews 44 (2014): 124-41. PubMed. Web. 12 Mar. 2016.Neurofeedback for Professional AthletesPerry, Frank D., Lindsay Shaw, and Leonard Zaichkowsky. "Biofeedback and Neurofeedback in Sports." Biofeedback 39.3 (2011): 95-100. Web. 15 Mar. 2016.  Using gold cup electrodes and conductive paste yields a great signal, but it has one limitation: it’s extremely inconvenient. Mindset collects high quality EEG with a form factor you can wear all day. Hundreds of hours of data, with absolutely no setup time, unlocks potential for big data analysis never before possible. This is the next step in BCI.Free with Mindset, you’ll get full access to our developer SDK. Raw data from A1-C3-Cz-C4, calculated concentration metrics, easy remontage, computed features - you’ll get it all. Run your own experiments or build the BCI application of your dreams, all through a comfortable, great-sounding headphone. The sky is the limit. You spoke, and we listened! Thank you for helping us unlock our first stretch goal: an embedded microphone for hands-free voice calls. Respond to calls quickly without taking off Mindset, so you can get right back into your flow. Now that we reached $600K, we’ll be taking Mindset to the next level: train your brain to improve your calm, and enhance your creativity. These medically validated protocols will help you train like the pros, from Olympic athletes to professional musicians.Now that we’ve reach $750K, Mindset will integrate automatic play/pause functionality. When you take off the headphones, the music will pause – when you put them back on, it will play again. A simple, intuitive experience that will seamlessly integrate into your work flow.Music is a huge part of concentration! Now that we've hit $900K, we’ll include concentration soundtracks built directly into the app - white noise, binaural beats, nature sounds, and more! Using Mindset’s EEG, track your progress and find out which soundtracks improve your concentration the most! Big milestones mean big features. Because we reached $1M, we’ll make all the electrodes removable! You’ll be able to wear the headphones without electrodes when concentration isn’t the goal, for maximum comfort. You can also swap in new electrodes when they wear out for improved signal quality, or even use custom electrodes!  
We want Mindset to be a life-changing product.That is our responsibility - we’re putting everything we have into designing the perfect workplace headphones, tuning the sensors, and perfecting our algorithms. But we need your help - your feedback, suggestions, and above all, excitement - to help us build Mindset up to the potential it can be.We’ve come a long way since we first began, but now we need you, the Kickstarter community, to join us on this journey. With your support, we’ll be able to scale up manufacturing, and make Mindset the experience we all want. Back our project, share our page, and let’s make this happen!                We're a team of engineers-turned-entrepreneurs, who are incredibly passionate about tech, performance, and well-being. We've seen the transformative power of EEG, and we live for the day when it’s accessible to everyone. Our combined experience spans biomedical devices, neuroscience research, and artificial intelligence. Along with our team of advisors, partners - and you, our backers - we're more excited than ever to make Mindset a reality.        Sensors
3 active dry electrodes: C3, Cz, C4~200k impedance
2 active dry reference electrodes: A1 & A2~100k impedance
EEG signal processing chipset1uVPP noise floorActively shielded wiresUp to 16kHz sampling rate 
Accelerometer
Battery
Rechargeable 800mAh
8 hours continuous playback, ANC, and data streaming
Connectivity
Optional 3.5mm audio cable
USB-C connector
Dual-mode Bluetooth 4.2 + 2.1
Audio
40mm audio driver
Active Noise Cancellation
 AcknowledgmentsThank you to our families, friends, and mentors who have made Mindset possible. Thank you to The Next Canada and HAX accelerator for their guidance. A special thanks to our videographer Antony Bui, to our industrial designers Tomas Rosen and Nicol Boyd at Office for Product Design, to our PR agency Proper Propaganda, to CCMEDIA for web support and select photography, to our campaign graphic designers at Detraform, to our online marketing consultant Samit Patel, to Woke studio for their UI/UX design, and to our direct response online advertising agency Gil Shterzer and Iddo Sternberg at Jellop Crowdfunding. Thank you also to La Gare, Sainte-Catherine Library, Ryerson DMZ, and SmartHalo for their help!

story:
Tomorrows’s sunglasses from yesterday’s waste. 

Lazlo: sustainable sunglasses that offer a completely different view —quite literally— on the role of waste in our society.

When Yuma Labs says circular we are not just talking round lenses or John Lennon frames. 

Our recycling process goes full circle, and our design never out of style. 

 

 

The economy of the future

The economy of the future runs in circles. We believe that true sustainability goes beyond just recycling. Yuma Labs sunglasses last a lifetime, though when they ever meet their end-of-life, we’d like to see them back for recycling.

 

 

Each pair comes with a special Send Back Case that will protect your sunglasses day in, day out. When you are ready to recycle your sunglasses, simply fold out the integrated free shipping label and put the case in a mailbox, just like a normal postcard.

We get our precious materials back, you receive a discount on your next purchase and together we keep materials away from landfill. When you have used your glasses for one year you get €15 discount on your next purchase. Do you use them for two years? Then we reward you with a €20 discount!

 

 

"Lazlo", a timeless unisex design

This unique, minimalistic design represents awareness and self-esteem. A contemporary frame that complements an endless array of styles and outfits. 

 

 

Perks

You can choose from two kinds of perks:

  • Solid (sunglasses from recycled PET bottles, colour coated)

  • Transparent (sunglasses from recycled PET bottles; raw colours of PET)

 

 

Need prescription glasses? We have a solution for you. Check the FAQ!

 

 

Do you want to know if our Lazlo fits your face? Check our Instagram filter!

 

 

Team

We consider ourselves a laboratory that designs iconic products that spark the conversation about a circular economy. Yuma Labs was founded with a rebellious spirit to experiment and rethink the way we make and use our everyday products. 

We have made a pledge to work against the stream, come up with disruptive business models and demonstrate that there are ways to build an economy without the need for planned obsolescence or continuous depletion of natural resources. We wish to offer a positive alternative to fast-consumption and slow down ever the accelerating mill of product disposal.

We regularly team up with like-minded companies to build new exciting collaborations.

 

Where your money goes

With 'Lazlo' we start a new production technique and with it a new important step for our company. All proceeds will go towards increasing the quality of the production, including the purchase of the mould. Support us in this new step please. 

 

Timeline

 

If you have any question, reach out to us!

story:
This campaign is important for us to raise funds and awareness which will allow us to escalate more than we would by launching immediately on our online store and help us produce the actual demand, avoiding overproduction and encourage a more responsible production.

We are looking to make HUMBS available and recognized worldwide and you can be an integral part of our success, whilst getting exclusive discounts and perks. Our vision is to see people calling each other Humbs in the street when seeing someone using our shoes! Just a simple "Hey, Humbs!". Imagine... A group of innovators who choose vegan over animal materials, recycled over polluting materials, innovative over outdated functionalities, modern/trendy over old designs. Join us early in our journey to revolutionize the footwear industry!

After the campaign is over, with the funding raised, we are aiming to produce our next model Humbs Two, plus additional campaigns, always with innovation, sustainability and comfort in mind. All will be reinvested in the business as our goal for now is not to get money ourselves, but to increase the awareness of the brand and this movement we are aiming to expand.

If by any chance we do not achieve our goal, we will still produce and deliver the pre-orders of HUMBS ONE, but will look to re-evaluate our plan going forward. However, after working hard on this project for several months, and after several experiences selling products in markets and creating a patent for socks, we expect our crowdfunding campaign to run smoothly. Any challenges we will face hands on to provide the best experience to our customers.

If you can't support, please  make some noise about our campaign by sharing it on social media!

Thank you!

 

Key Words:

story:
Have you heard the screaming in the trees? Have you seen our fat little friends flying about, looking to get lucky? Then do I have the shirt for you. 

Get yours now because the next batch isn't going to come out for 17 years :) 

I am only taking orders for the next two weeks. The shirts will be ordered the day after the campaign ends. They will arrive about a week and a half after that. You'll be able to pick your shirt up at St. Vincent on Wednesdays and Fridays for 2 weeks after they arrived. After that we can arrange individual pickups according to my schedule. 

I'll keep updating everyone here!

 

:) -Peyton

PS. $30 for a tee shirt seems expensive, but I needed to price the shirts so that it would cover the cost of printing the minimum order of shirts AND Indigogo's fees. I'd make them free if I could.

story:
Man has always been fascinated by how things work, especially regarding the beauty of complex engines and complicated mechanisms. 

Rather than conceal the inner workings behind a characterless exterior, we believe it’s time to bring things out into the open. 

To see the precise and beautiful mechanics of a watch at work.

 

 

This is the watch with nothing to hide. 

A sophisticated transparent fully automatic timepiece made from Titanium and Sapphire Crystal that affords its wearer and those around him a chance to marvel at its inner workings and inherent strength.

 

 

​

 

 
 

 

Containing the precise mechanics is a shell of Grade 2 Titanium, one of the strongest and most distinctive metals.

It has unparalleled corrosion resistance and is 40% stronger and 30% lighter than stainless steel—the current standard for watchmakers.   

 

 

The Seagull AAA automatic self-winding mechanics keeps your watch charged without the need of batteries. The natural movement of your wrist literally energizes your watch and makes its wheels and gears move. As you move, a spring winds, storing energy for up to 40 hours. No manual winding required!  

 

 

 

Smooth, curvaceous and incredibly strong, just like you need your watch to be. The glass face is fashioned from 1.2mm hyperboloid artificial sapphire for ultimate scratch resistance.
Only diamond is stronger.

 

 

Splashes and rain won’t stop the time. CIGA is water-resistant to 3 ATM waterproofing standards.

 

 

Curious about how the intricacy of watch works inside out? Our fully hollow design allows you to see through every part of the mechanics. Giving you the ownership to admire the craftsmanship of the watch at a deeper level. Through our watches, we want you to see, feel and own the watch at work on your wrist.

 

 

Customized SEAGULL AAA-Class movement ST2553JK

• Energy storage of 40 hours

• Movement frequency of 21,600 times/hour

• Movement error range: -15 to +30 seconds/ 24 hours

SEAGULL is one of the largest manufactures for movements. The brand is known for its advanced technology and precision. CIGA Design is proud to own a customized version for the watches.

 

 

Wear it all the time.

Titanium is skin-friendly and hypoallergenic and is widely used in medical, jewelry and other manufacturing industries.

 

 

 

 

 


 

 
 
 
 

CIGA Design is committed to creating simple and innovative designs that define watches as a designer item, that show sophistication with a different perspective. We desire to express the personality of the new generation, especially young adults.

Just like our transparent watch’s mechanics, we want you to see who we are and how we work. In short, we are a team of designers who, over the past six years, have scooped numerous awards, including:

 

  •  2 x IF awards
  •  3 x German design awards
  •  8 x Red Dot awards
  •  Red Dot Best Of The Best Awards
  •  IF Gold Award
  •  Top 10 Design Studios

We hope you agree that this watch comes from a team with an impressive pedigree as we design to be different. To help people express who they are. And we hope you see our Z-series timepiece as a worthy addition to our portfolio of top quality products.

 

 

In 2014 we were named as one of the Top 10 Design Studios by the Red Dot Award: Design Concept announced in Singapore. We appreciate the recognition we received from these achievements, and those awards encourage us to continue creating more outstanding products in the future.

 

 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

We have made many upgrades to Z-Series Titanium version. Asides from the material, we have upgraded the appearance and texture, straps, and packaging.
Overall, this version is lighter, slimmer and more comfortable to wear.

 

 

 

​

    We have made many upgrades to Z-Series Titanium version. Asides from the material, we have upgraded the appearance and texture, straps, and packaging.Overall, this version is lighter, slimmer and more comfortable to wear.   ​

story:
[Versione Italiana - for English version scroll down]

WABI SABI - il progetto

Il progetto nasce da donne per le donne; incoraggia l’amore per il proprio corpo e per la vita.

Nasce da un’esperienza personale e da un incontro tra due realtà al femminile: Feeling Nova, community dedicata alla rinascita delle donne dopo un percorso oncologico e Textilross srl, azienda tessile specializzata in tessuti per intimo.

La sfida del progetto Wabi Sabi è creare una collezione di abbigliamento intimo innovativo con tessuti funzionali, per supportare la protezione e la guarigione della pelle da un lato e, grazie al design valorizzante, femminile e colorato, l’immagine dall’altro.

L'obiettivo è sostenere le donne che hanno affrontato la diagnosi di cancro al seno e non solo, a rinascere e vivere senza limiti, aiutandole a ritrovare di nuovo l'intimità, la fiducia in sé stesse e la femminilità. 

CHI SIAMO

FEELING NOVA - la community

Feeling Nova è una community fatta di collaborazione tra donne e giovani a sostegno del Made in Italy.

Un blog dove si parla di rinascita a 360 gradi, attraverso la moda, la fotografia, il make-up, i viaggi, lo sport, l’arte e molto altro.

Un portale ricco di indirizzi utili, associazioni, progetti, consulenze e iniziative che parlano di vita.

Feeling Nova nasce da Chiara Pasini, Designer e Creative Content Creator di 25 anni, laureata con 110 e Lode alla NABA di Milano in Fashion Design e con un Master in Fashion Trend Forecasting al POLIMODA di Firenze.

Nel 2015 la madre della fondatrice si è ammalata di cancro al seno. Chiara ha deciso di portare l'idea di rinascita dopo la diagnosi e le cure, alla discussione di tesi di laurea nel 2017, sviluppando la primissima bozza di quello che oggi è un progetto concreto. 

Cercando i materiali da utilizzare per la linea di intimo post-operatorio che voleva sviluppare, conosce Eleonora, proprietaria della Textilross, azienda italiana tessile specializzata nella produzione di tessuti innovativi per intimo.

Dopo un periodo di studio e ricerca, Chiara decide di creare un punto di incontro per il “dopo”, così nasce Feeling Nova.

Durante questo periodo il rapporto con Textilross si è rafforzato sempre di più ed insieme ad Eleonora decide di portare avanti e sviluppare la collezione di intimo che prende il nome di Wabi Sabi.

TEXTILROSS - l’azienda

Textilross è una piccola azienda storica nella produzione di tessuti per intimo e collant, dislocata tra la provincia varesotta e bresciana. Con Eleonora, la seconda generazione, si è particolarmente dedicata alla ricerca di fibre e filati innovativi, affiancando tessuti funzionali e sostenibili alla produzione più classica.

La filosofia dell’azienda è quella di promuovere un abbigliamento che si prenda cura sia del benessere della persona, grazie all’estremo comfort dei tessuti a contatto con la pelle e alle proprietà dei filati impiegati, sia che sia attento alla sostenibilità dal punto di vista ambientale e sociale.

I tessuti sono prodotti ad hoc per le esigenze del cliente, evitando il più possibile sprechi e rimanenze, collaborando con fornitori italiani sempre attenti alle innovazioni e alla qualità della materia prima. 

LA NASCITA DEL PROGETTO

Il cancro al seno è il tumore più comune nelle donne e il secondo tumore più comune in generale. Ci sono stati 54.976 casi in Italia nel 2020.

Le donne che incontrano questa malattia così diffusa molto spesso devono fare i conti con interventi chirurgici al seno e una lunga serie di terapie (chemioterapia, radioterapia, ...). In questo periodo stressante, pieno di check-up e visite mediche, le donne spesso perdono la fiducia nel corpo, nell'autostima e nell'intimità.

I prodotti abitualmente usati dopo l’intervento come i reggiseni post-operatori, la maggior parte delle volte contribuiscono al loro disagio.

Dopo molte ricerche di mercato e dopo molte interviste a medici, pazienti ed ex pazienti per comprenderne le esigenze, Chiara ed Eleonora hanno sviluppato reggiseni post-operatori con un design studiato tenendo conto di tutti gli accorgimenti consigliati dagli esperti e con caratteristiche a sostegno dell’estetica, della bellezza e delle differenti forme di ogni donna, per poter ritrovare fiducia in se stesse.

LA MISSION

  • Creare un reggiseno adatto alle donne che hanno subito un intervento di asportazione parziale o totale del seno.
  • Impiegare materiali che supportano il processo di guarigione e benessere, utilizzando fibre tessili con capacità antibatteriche, lenitive delle irritazioni e con proprietà benefiche per la pelle.
  • Utilizzare un design valorizzante a supporto della femminilità e unicità.
  • Scegliere soluzioni ecosostenibili nella scelta del packaging e dei materiali utilizzati

Grazie a questa raccolta fondi e al raggiungimento dell’obiettivo prefissato, Chiara e Eleonora potranno produrre la primissima collezione Wabi Sabi da proporre sul mercato.

La collezione prende in prestito il nome dal mondo Giapponese. 

“Wabi Sabi” è una visione fondata sull’accettazione della transitorietà e imperfezione delle cose, talvolta descritta come “bellezza imperfetta”.

La collezione prevede un trattamento “BIFASICO”, ovvero composto da due step fondati rispettivamente sul concetto di rinnovo cellulare e di protezione:

  • Fase uno: Re-Start
  • Fase due: Re-Birth

COSA SERVE E COSA DANNO IN CAMBIO

Per raggiungere l’obiettivo della prima produzione della collezione Wabi Sabi, Chiara e Eleonora si sono segnate come traguardo iniziale, la copertura parziale o intera del costo della confezione pari a 5.000€.

Questi soldi andranno interamente al confezionista per la produzione dei reggiseni. 

Chiara e Eleonora hanno pensato di chiedere un sostegno concreto a chi è interessato al progetto, a chi ha toccato con mano la malattia o chi semplicemente crede nell’innovazione e nel lavoro di due donne giovani.

Gli altri costi che si andranno a sostenere dopo il raggiungimento dell'obiettivo prefissato sono:

  • 7.000€ di tessuti
  • 600€ di accessori (spalline, pizzi,...)
  • 2.000€ di costi di gestione (trasporti, e-commerce, packaging,...)
  • 1.000€ di costi di comunicazione 

In cambio del supporto danno la possibilità di:

  • Acquistare tutta la collezione di intimo ad un prezzo vantaggioso (15% di sconto sul prezzo reale); 
  • Fare una donazione acquistando le 3 box con il merchandising della collezione Wabi Sabi (maglietta+borsa, maglietta+sacca, maglietta+maglietta); 
  • Fare una donazione acquistando le 5 magliette con le illustrazioni realizzate da cinque artiste selezionate da Brillo Magazine: Alessia Epifani, Clara Fois, Giada Maestra, Gioia Ghezzo, Giulia Rosa. (Capi disponibili dal 15 Maggio)
  • Fare una donazione libera

Se non si raggiungerà l’obiettivo minimo di 3.000€ Chiara, il progetto Feeling Nova, Eleonora e Textilross si prendono l’impegno di portare ad ogni costo avanti l’iniziativa, perchè credono fermamente che, grazie a questi reggiseni sia chi sta affrontando o ha affrontato un percorso oncologico, sia chi ha semplicemente il piacere di indossare un capo che sia valorizzante, possano ritrovare la forza e la voglia di guardarsi allo specchio e amarsi.

LA COLLEZIONE

Nel 2020 Chiara e Eleonora hanno partecipato e vinto la 3° Call del Bando Europeo “Worth Partnership Project”; grazie a questo hanno avuto l’opportunità di essere inserite in un programma di incubazione, ricevendo supporto finanziario e di mentoring per finalizzare la fase di prototipia. 

Grazie al Worth Project, hanno partecipato al Fuorisalone 2021, nella sezione Innovazione e Inclusione.

Wabi Sabi nasce da una necessità, da una mancanza.

Tornare a guardarsi allo specchio dopo un intervento di asportazione parziale o totale della mammella a volte può essere doloroso; bisogna educare la mente a una nuova consapevolezza di sé.

La linea Post-Surgery ha un design delicato e con caratteristiche tecniche studiate per un periodo appena successivo alla fase post-operatoria.​

Forme semplici e strutturate, realizzate per sostenere senza stringere.

I reggiseni hanno l’apertura frontale per agevolare i movimenti; nelle coppe, grazie a specifiche taschine interne, c’è la possibilità di inserire una protesi esterna; la vestibilità é studiata analizzando le possibili operazioni effettuate.

I tessuti impiegati hanno la particolarità di essere naturalmente antibatterici e sono adatti alle pelli più sensibili e delicate. La presenza di Crabyon, contenente Chitina, supporta ulteriormente la persona con una funzione lenitiva e rigenerante per la pelle favorendone la cicatrizzazione.

La nostra linea Lingerie ha un design più femminile e forte senza perdere gli accorgimenti tecnici che supportano il post-surgery.

Dettagli e stampe impreziosiscono il design pulito valorizzando la semplicità delle forme. I colori giocano un ruolo speciale: sono accesi e dinamici per affrontare con la giusta grinta questa nuova vita.

Le forme sono morbide ma sostenute da tagli e cuciture, senza perdere mai femminilità e comfort. Trasparenze e pizzi non sono lasciati in disparte, valorizzano le nuove forme del corpo mantenendo una linea pulita ma seducente.

I tessuti impiegati sono morbidi e freschi, e grazie all’impiego della fibra Q-SKIN® by Fulgar contenente ioni d’argento, regolano la proliferazione batterica con un’efficacia duratura. Q-SKIN® infatti si prende cura della pelle offrendo, a chi l’indossa, traspirabilità, igiene, comfort e freschezza in qualsiasi situazione.

ALTRI MODI PER SOSTENERE WABI SABI

Si può sostenere questo progetto anche diffondendo il link del crowdfunding a tutti gli amici e i parenti, parlare di questa iniziativa, fare passaparola e aiutare Chiara e Eleonora a far conoscere la loro mission!

Segui Wabi Sabi anche su Instagram:

@feeling_nova

@textilross

e Facebook:

@feelingnova

@textilross

Grazie!

[English version]

WABI SABI - the project

The project was born from women for women; encourages love for one's body and for life. 

It was born from a personal experience and a meeting between two female realities, Feeling Nova, a community dedicated to the rebirth of women after an oncological diagnosis and Textilross srl, a textile company specialized in underwear fabrics.

The challenge of the Wabi Sabi project is to create an innovative underwear collection with functional fabrics to support the protection and healing of the skin on one side, and thanks to the enhancing, feminine and colorful design, the image on the other side.

The goal is to support women who have faced a breast cancer diagnosis helping them to rebirth and live without limits, to regain intimacy, self-confidence and femininity.

WHO WE ARE

FEELING NOVA - the community

Feeling Nova is a community made up of collaboration between women and young people supporting Made in Italy. 

A blog that talked about rebirth at 360-degree, through fashion, photography, make-up, travel, sport, art and much more.

A data-base full of useful addresses, associations, projects, consultancy and initiatives that talk about life.

Feeling Nova was born from Chiara Pasini, 25-year-old Designer and Creative Content Creator, graduated with honors at NABA in Milan in Fashion Design and with a Master in Fashion Trend Forecasting at POLIMODA in Florence.

In 2015, the founder’s mother fell ill with breast cancer.

Chiara decided to bring the idea of ​​rebirth after diagnosis and treatment to the to the graduation thesis in 2017, developing the very first draft of what is now a concrete project.

Looking for the materials to use for the post-surgery underwear collection she wanted to develop, meets Eleonora, owner of Textilross, an Italian textile company specialized in production of innovative fabrics for underwear.

After a period of study and research, Chiara decided to create a meeting point for the "after": Feeling Nova.

During this period the relationship with Textilross has been strengthened more and more and together Chiara and Eleonora decides to carry on and develop the underwear collection that takes the name of Wabi Sabi.

TEXTILROSS - the company

Textilross is a small historic company in the production of fabrics for underwear and tights, located between Varese and Brescia, Italy. With Eleonora, the second generation, the activity is particularly dedicated to the usage and search of innovative fibers and yarns, combining functional and sustainable fabrics with the historical production.

The company's philosophy is to promote a fashion industry that takes care of people well-being, thanks to the extreme comfort of the fabrics in contact with skin and to the properties of the yarns used, whether it is attentive to sustainability, intended both by environmental and social point of view.

The fabrics are produced ad hoc for the customer's needs, avoiding wastes and deadstocks as much as possible, collaborating mostly with Italian suppliers who are always looking for innovations and quality of raw material.

THE BIRTH OF THE PROJECT

Breast cancer is the most common cancer in women and the second most common cancer overall.

There were 54.976 cases in Italy in 2020.

Women who encounter this widespread disease very often have to deal with breast surgery and a long series of therapies (chemotherapy, radiotherapy, ...). In this stressful time, filled with check-ups and doctor visits, women often lose confidence in their body, self-esteem and intimacy.

The products usually used after surgery, such as post-operative bras, very often contribute to their discomfort.

After market researches and after many interviews with doctors, patients and former patients to understand their needs, Chiara and Eleonora have developed post-surgery bras with a design studied taking into account all the precautions recommended by doctors and with features to support the aesthetics, beauty and the different shapes of each woman, helping them to feel self-confident and feminine.

THE MISSION

  • Creation of suitable bras for women who undergone to partial removal or surgery total breast.
  • Usage of material that support healing and well-being process, using textile fibers with antibacterial and soothing properties, and with beneficial properties for both skin and comfort.
  • Usage of a flattering design to support femininity and uniqueness.
  • Choosing eco-sustainable solutions, i.e. of packaging and all materials.

Thanks to this fundraising and the achievement of the set goal, Chiara and Eleonora will be able to produce the very first Wabi Sabi collection to launch on the market.

The collection borrows its name from the Japanese world.

"Wabi Sabi" is a vision based on the acceptance of the transience and imperfection of things,

sometimes described as "imperfect beauty".

The collection provides a "BIPHASIC" treatment, that consist of two well-founded steps

respectively on the concept of cell renewal and protection:

  • Phase one, Post Surgery: Re-Start
  • Phase Two, Lingerie: Re-Birth

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

To achieve the goal of the first production of Wabi Sabi collection, Chiara and Eleonora have set as an initial goal, the partial or full coverage of the cost of the package equal to € 5,000.

This money will go entirely to the garments maker for the production of the bras.

Chiara and Eleonora decided to ask for a concrete support to who may be interested in the project, those who have experienced the disease firsthand or those who simply believe in innovation and in the work of two young women.

The other costs that will be incurred after this goal are:

  • € 7,000 of fabrics
  • € 600 of accessories (straps, laces, ...)
  • € 2,000 of other costs (transport, e-commerce, packaging, ...)
  • € 1.000 of communication costs

In exchange they give the possibility to:

  • Buy the entire collection of underwear at an advantageous price (15% discount on the real price);
  • Make a donation by purchasing the 3 boxes with the merchandising of the Wabi Sabi collection (shirt + bag, shirt + bag, shirt + shirt);
  • Make a donation by purchasing the 5 t-shirts with illustrations created by five artists selected by Brillo Magazine: Alessia Epifani, Clara Fois, Giada Maestra, Gioia Ghezzo, Giulia Rosa. (Items available from May 15th)
  •  Make a free donation

If the minimum goal of € 3,000 would not be reached, Chiara, Feeling Nova, Eleonora and Textilross will carry on the project and follow their mission in any case, because they firmly believe that, thanks to these bras,  who is facing or simply have the pleasure of wearing a garment that is enhancing, could rediscover easily its strength and self love after an oncological path.

THE COLLECTION

In 2020 Chiara and Eleonora participated and won the 3rd Call of the European Call “Worth Partnership Project”; thanks to this they had the opportunity to be included in an incubation program, receiving financial and mentoring support to finalize the prototyping phase.

Thanks to the Worth Project, they participated in Fuorisalone 2021, in the Innovation and Inclusion section.

Wabi Sabi was born from a need, from a lack.

Looking ourselves in the mirror after a partial or total breast removal operation can sometimes be painful; it is necessary to educate the mind to a new self-awareness.

The Post-Surgery line has a delicate design and technical features designed for a period just after the postsurgery phase.

Shapes are simple and structured, made to support without tightening.

The bras have a front opening to facilitate movement; in the cups, thanks to specific internal pockets, there is the possibility of inserting an external prosthesis; the fit is studied by analyzing the possible operations carried out.

The fabrics used have the particularity of being naturally antibacterial and are suitable for the most sensitive and delicate skins. The presence of Crabyon, containing Chitina, further supports the person with a soothing and regenerating function for the skin, promoting its healing.

Our Lingerie collection has a more feminine and strong design without losing the technical precautions that support post-surgery.

Details and prints embellish the clean design enhancing the simplicity of the shapes. Colours play a special role: they are bright and dynamic to face this new life with the right determination.

The shapes are soft but supported by cuts and seams without ever losing femininity and comfort.

Transparencies and laces are not left aside, they enhance the new shapes of the body while maintaining a clean but seductive line.

The fabrics used are soft and fresh, thanks to the usage of  Q-SKIN® by Fulgar fiber containing silver ions, they regulate bacterial proliferation with lasting effectiveness. Q-SKIN® takes care of the skin, offering the wearer breathability, hygiene, comfort and freshness in any situation.

OTHER WAYS TO SUPPORT WABI SABI

You can also support this project by spreading the crowdfunding link to all friends and relatives, talking about this initiative, spreading word of mouth and helping Chiara and Eleonora to make their mission known!

Follow Wabi Sabi on Instagram:

@feeling_nova

@textilross

and Facebook:

@feelingnova

@textilross

Thank You!

bisogna educare la mente a una nuova consapevolezza di sé.La linea Post-Surgery ha un design delicato e con caratteristiche tecniche studiate per un periodo appena successivo alla fase post-operatoria.​Forme semplici e strutturate, realizzate per sostenere senza stringere.I reggiseni hanno l’apertura frontale per agevolare i movimenti; nelle coppe, grazie a specifiche taschine interne, c’è la possibilità di inserire una protesi esterna; la vestibilità é studiata analizzando le possibili operazioni effettuate.I tessuti impiegati hanno la particolarità di essere naturalmente antibatterici e sono adatti alle pelli più sensibili e delicate. La presenza di Crabyon, contenente Chitina, supporta ulteriormente la persona con una funzione lenitiva e rigenerante per la pelle favorendone la cicatrizzazione.La nostra linea Lingerie ha un design più femminile e forte senza perdere gli accorgimenti tecnici che supportano il post-surgery.Dettagli e stampe impreziosiscono il design pulito valorizzando la semplicità delle forme. I colori giocano un ruolo speciale: sono accesi e dinamici per affrontare con la giusta grinta questa nuova vita.Le forme sono morbide ma sostenute da tagli e cuciture, senza perdere mai femminilità e comfort. Trasparenze e pizzi non sono lasciati in disparte, valorizzano le nuove forme del corpo mantenendo una linea pulita ma seducente.I tessuti impiegati sono morbidi e freschi, e grazie all’impiego della fibra Q-SKIN® by Fulgar contenente ioni d’argento, regolano la proliferazione batterica con un’efficacia duratura. Q-SKIN® infatti si prende cura della pelle offrendo, a chi l’indossa, traspirabilità, igiene, comfort e freschezza in qualsiasi situazione.ALTRI MODI PER SOSTENERE WABI SABISi può sostenere questo progetto anche diffondendo il link del crowdfunding a tutti gli amici e i parenti, parlare di questa iniziativa, fare passaparola e aiutare Chiara e Eleonora a far conoscere la loro mission!Segui Wabi Sabi anche su Instagram:@feeling_nova@textilrosse Facebook:@feelingnova@textilrossGrazie!
[English version]WABI SABI - the projectThe project was born from women for women; encourages love for one's body and for life. It was born from a personal experience and a meeting between two female realities, Feeling Nova, a community dedicated to the rebirth of women after an oncological diagnosis and Textilross srl, a textile company specialized in underwear fabrics.The challenge of the Wabi Sabi project is to create an innovative underwear collection with functional fabrics to support the protection and healing of the skin on one side, and thanks to the enhancing, feminine and colorful design, the image on the other side.The goal is to support women who have faced a breast cancer diagnosis helping them to rebirth and live without limits, to regain intimacy, self-confidence and femininity.WHO WE AREFEELING NOVA - the communityFeeling Nova is a community made up of collaboration between women and young people supporting Made in Italy. A blog that talked about rebirth at 360-degree, through fashion, photography, make-up, travel, sport, art and much more.A data-base full of useful addresses, associations, projects, consultancy and initiatives that talk about life.Feeling Nova was born from Chiara Pasini, 25-year-old Designer and Creative Content Creator, graduated with honors at NABA in Milan in Fashion Design and with a Master in Fashion Trend Forecasting at POLIMODA in Florence.In 2015, the founder’s mother fell ill with breast cancer.Chiara decided to bring the idea of ​​rebirth after diagnosis and treatment to the to the graduation thesis in 2017, developing the very first draft of what is now a concrete project.Looking for the materials to use for the post-surgery underwear collection she wanted to develop, meets Eleonora, owner of Textilross, an Italian textile company specialized in production of innovative fabrics for underwear.After a period of study and research, Chiara decided to create a meeting point for the "after": Feeling Nova.During this period the relationship with Textilross has been strengthened more and more and together Chiara and Eleonora decides to carry on and develop the underwear collection that takes the name of Wabi Sabi.TEXTILROSS - the companyTextilross is a small historic company in the production of fabrics for underwear and tights, located between Varese and Brescia, Italy. With Eleonora, the second generation, the activity is particularly dedicated to the usage and search of innovative fibers and yarns, combining functional and sustainable fabrics with the historical production.The company's philosophy is to promote a fashion industry that takes care of people well-being, thanks to the extreme comfort of the fabrics in contact with skin and to the properties of the yarns used, whether it is attentive to sustainability, intended both by environmental and social point of view.The fabrics are produced ad hoc for the customer's needs, avoiding wastes and deadstocks as much as possible, collaborating mostly with Italian suppliers who are always looking for innovations and quality of raw material.THE BIRTH OF THE PROJECTBreast cancer is the most common cancer in women and the second most common cancer overall.There were 54.976 cases in Italy in 2020.Women who encounter this widespread disease very often have to deal with breast surgery and a long series of therapies (chemotherapy, radiotherapy, ...). In this stressful time, filled with check-ups and doctor visits, women often lose confidence in their body, self-esteem and intimacy.The products usually used after surgery, such as post-operative bras, very often contribute to their discomfort.After market researches and after many interviews with doctors, patients and former patients to understand their needs, Chiara and Eleonora have developed post-surgery bras with a design studied taking into account all the precautions recommended by doctors and with features to support the aesthetics, beauty and the different shapes of each woman, helping them to feel self-confident and feminine.THE MISSION
Creation of suitable bras for women who undergone to partial removal or surgery total breast.
Usage of material that support healing and well-being process, using textile fibers with antibacterial and soothing properties, and with beneficial properties for both skin and comfort.
Usage of a flattering design to support femininity and uniqueness.
Choosing eco-sustainable solutions, i.e. of packaging and all materials.
Thanks to this fundraising and the achievement of the set goal, Chiara and Eleonora will be able to produce the very first Wabi Sabi collection to launch on the market.The collection borrows its name from the Japanese world."Wabi Sabi" is a vision based on the acceptance of the transience and imperfection of things,sometimes described as "imperfect beauty".The collection provides a "BIPHASIC" treatment, that consist of two well-founded stepsrespectively on the concept of cell renewal and protection:
Phase one, Post Surgery: Re-Start
Phase Two, Lingerie: Re-Birth
WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GETTo achieve the goal of the first production of Wabi Sabi collection, Chiara and Eleonora have set as an initial goal, the partial or full coverage of the cost of the package equal to € 5,000.This money will go entirely to the garments maker for the production of the bras.Chiara and Eleonora decided to ask for a concrete support to who may be interested in the project, those who have experienced the disease firsthand or those who simply believe in innovation and in the work of two young women.The other costs that will be incurred after this goal are:
€ 7,000 of fabrics
€ 600 of accessories (straps, laces, ...)
€ 2,000 of other costs (transport, e-commerce, packaging, ...)
€ 1.000 of communication costs
In exchange they give the possibility to:
Buy the entire collection of underwear at an advantageous price (15% discount on the real price);
Make a donation by purchasing the 3 boxes with the merchandising of the Wabi Sabi collection (shirt + bag, shirt + bag, shirt + shirt);
Make a donation by purchasing the 5 t-shirts with illustrations created by five artists selected by Brillo Magazine: Alessia Epifani, Clara Fois, Giada Maestra, Gioia Ghezzo, Giulia Rosa. (Items available from May 15th)
 Make a free donation
If the minimum goal of € 3,000 would not be reached, Chiara, Feeling Nova, Eleonora and Textilross will carry on the project and follow their mission in any case, because they firmly believe that, thanks to these bras,  who is facing or simply have the pleasure of wearing a garment that is enhancing, could rediscover easily its strength and self love after an oncological path.THE COLLECTIONIn 2020 Chiara and Eleonora participated and won the 3rd Call of the European Call “Worth Partnership Project”; thanks to this they had the opportunity to be included in an incubation program, receiving financial and mentoring support to finalize the prototyping phase.Thanks to the Worth Project, they participated in Fuorisalone 2021, in the Innovation and Inclusion section.Wabi Sabi was born from a need, from a lack.Looking ourselves in the mirror after a partial or total breast removal operation can sometimes be painful; it is necessary to educate the mind to a new self-awareness.The Post-Surgery line has a delicate design and technical features designed for a period just after the postsurgery phase.Shapes are simple and structured, made to support without tightening.The bras have a front opening to facilitate movement; in the cups, thanks to specific internal pockets, there is the possibility of inserting an external prosthesis; the fit is studied by analyzing the possible operations carried out.The fabrics used have the particularity of being naturally antibacterial and are suitable for the most sensitive and delicate skins. The presence of Crabyon, containing Chitina, further supports the person with a soothing and regenerating function for the skin, promoting its healing.Our Lingerie collection has a more feminine and strong design without losing the technical precautions that support post-surgery.Details and prints embellish the clean design enhancing the simplicity of the shapes. Colours play a special role: they are bright and dynamic to face this new life with the right determination.The shapes are soft but supported by cuts and seams without ever losing femininity and comfort.Transparencies and laces are not left aside, they enhance the new shapes of the body while maintaining a clean but seductive line.The fabrics used are soft and fresh, thanks to the usage of  Q-SKIN® by Fulgar fiber containing silver ions, they regulate bacterial proliferation with lasting effectiveness. Q-SKIN® takes care of the skin, offering the wearer breathability, hygiene, comfort and freshness in any situation.OTHER WAYS TO SUPPORT WABI SABIYou can also support this project by spreading the crowdfunding link to all friends and relatives, talking about this initiative, spreading word of mouth and helping Chiara and Eleonora to make their mission known!Follow Wabi Sabi on Instagram:@feeling_nova@textilrossand Facebook:@feelingnova@textilrossThank You!

story:
This Jacket Defies the Elements! 

 WHO IS TREKKA

Trekka Designs is an adventure travel gear company focused on great design. We make the gear we’ve always wanted but have never been able to find. Our newest creation is a premium puffy jacket that can’t be damaged around the campfire. 

 Puffy Jacket Features: 

THE ONLY CAMPFIRE-PROOF JACKET – An outdoor jacket needs to be as light and breathable as possible, even campfire-proof ones.  We worked with fabric manufacturers to develop a lightweight laminated Nomex® fabric that is fire resistant and waterproof.  Nomex® is a naturally fire resistant fiber that is used on everything from the Mars Rover to Flight Suits, from firefighting gear to industrial apparel that is now making its way to the outdoor industry.  Finally a jacket that won't melt around the campfire!

Our exterior fabric is tear-proof. Not only is our Nomex® fabric fire resistant and waterproof, but as Kevlar®'s little brother, Nomex® is as strong as it is comfortable. We've searched far and wide to find the perfect fabrics & materials to make this jacket  tough-as-nails.  

Most puffy jackets claim to be waterproof by applying a durable water repellency (DWR) coating that lets water bead up and run off the jacket.  That's great, we did that too.  But we went a step further – our exterior fabric, a 3-layer laminate material, is designed to be waterproof up to a 10 meter water column, with breathability of 10000g/m2. That's the quality and waterproof-ness in most $200+ rain shells. 

Since the fabric we selected for our exterior material is waterproof it also is inherently wind proof.  Most jackets on the market are wind resistant which means that they block some of the wind, but not all... Ours blocks ALL the wind – keeping you warmer. 

Most insulated puffy jackets use a baffled design.  They do this because their insulation is loose and and they have to keep it in place.  This reduces the warmth and let's be honest, it doesn't look good.  We went with a structured insulation which allows us to design the jacket using large panels.  This creates uniform insulation coverage – reducing cold spots & increasing warmth.  Not to mention it looks way better.

 Polartec® Power Fill™ is a premium insulation made from 100% post-consumer recycled (PCR) content

This proprietary insulation provides greater warmth retention in colder conditions, without added weight or bulk– ideal for a variety of activities where body heat can’t ensure proper warmth. Polartec® Power Fill™ is a soft and pliable matrix of polyester fibers engineered with a distinct geometric shape. A unique process bonds the hollow fibers, which gives Power Fill™ unmatched warmth, durability & comfort. This matrix forms thousands of small air pockets that continuously capture and contain body heat, while maintaining a resilient, equalized thermal layer between the colder air on the outside and the warmer temperatures inside. The polyester fiber's inherent hydrophobic properties also work to ensure that Polartec® Power Fill™ resists moisture absorption and dries quickly, while maintaining a high warmth to weight ratio.

What are the benefits of our insulation?   

 

We pride ourselves on making highly-functional apparel. The Element comes with eight hidden pockets - four outside and four inside. The four exterior pockets are on either side of the chest and waist and zippered with premium YKK zippers. Two of the interior pockets are staggered in-between the exterior pocket pairs to prevent bulky spots. They’ve got premium YKK zippers, too. Lastly, we’ve stitched in two interior stash pockets on either side of the main zipper, both big enough to store a 13’’ Macbook Air.

The interior of hip pockets are lined with micro fleece.  Not only does this increase the warmth, but feels so much better than the plastic feeling pockets in other puffy jackets. 

At Trekka we love symmetry.  Most companies out there only give you one chest pocket.  We gave you 4, and there is a reason for that.   Whether you're left or right handed you will find a pocket placement that is natural for you.  Exterior pockets are great if you want to put something in your pocket with out unzipping the jacket letting out precious heat.   

If you have two chest pockets already why do you need two more? Great question. The exterior pockets are to be used if you don't want to lose heat. But what if what you are storing needs to be warm? That is why we have interior chest pockets as well. Phone batteries can die when exposed to the cold, placing them in the interior pockets allows them to be insulated from the cold weather while your body heat keeps it warm.  

Sometimes you just need to quickly throw some stuff in pockets and get moving. Maybe you just bought a couple 40's and don't feel like carrying them in your hands out to the car.  Hey, no judgement here.   Or maybe you are sick of carrying your laptop under your arm.  whatever the case is we've got you covered.  

This jacket should be about YOU not us.  We are not a fan of being a billboard for every large outdoor brand and we don't want you to be a billboard for us.  We know if you love the jacket your friends will know what brand it is without staring at your chest.

Unlike most insulated jacket on the market we used a 4 way stretch fabric for maximum movement.  This gives the jacket some extra movement without the need to make it overly baggy to compensate.  

Even though this jacket doesn't let water in, it will let water out.  Thanks to a 3 layer outer fabric that is laminated with a membrane that is permeated with tiny holes that are big enough to let water vapor from your body out, but small enough to keep the water droplets out. 

DWR is that magical coating all advertisers love to show off with wine rolling off that beautiful white T-shirt.  Of course we added it to our jacket too.  But when it will diminish with time just remember your jacket is still waterproof.

Most jackets in the outdoor industry are tailored to absurdly loose fitting. There is no performance reasoning for this.  Instead it just makes us look like a frumpy doofus.  We went a different route with a tailored fit that actually makes you look great while still being loose and comfortable enough to take on any adventure.  

Because they're the best.

 This jacket is meant to be taken on any adventure.  And for that to happen it has to be packable.   The insulation and lightweight materials allow this jacket to compress to an extremely small size while being warmer than the competition.   

 Even though we have packed this jacked with features.  Our jacket comes in weighing only 2oz more than the leading competition.  Well worth the weight for fire resistance, waterproofness and abrasion resistance.

In case the weather is extremely cold and you need every precious atom of warm air inside your jacket there are two waist drawcords that can be operated with just one hand reducing any air from escaping from the bottom.  

 Single hand use drawcord for if you need to change the fit of the hood  

 The Three-Panel Hood has been design to more comfortably fit your head and if necessary a helmet. This allows for a more natural fit and doesn't leave a seam in the middle causing irritation. 

 THE “WHY” OF THE JACKET 

Almost every premium outdoor jacket is built to conquer big mountains, high winds, low temps, and all the rain and snow you can throw at it. But when they come up against a tiny spark from a campfire...it’s like an arrow right into the heel of Achilles. Time spent around a campfire should be worry-free. But if you’re not quick enough to adjust to a change in wind direction or forget to take your jacket off before tending the fire, your high-priced jacket soon starts to look like a failed Chia pet. Those new holes don’t help with heat-retention either.

We wanted a jacket that could conquer both the mountain and the campfire - one that could literally stand up to all the elements and still look great and feel great to wear. If you’re like us and love to spend hours around a campfire after a long day on the trail, this jacket is made for you.  

IT’S ALSO EVERYTHING-ELSE-PROOF

It doesn’t make sense to have a campfire-proof jacket if it can’t stand up to everything else you have to face to get there. That’s where our outer material comes in. We chose a heavy-duty technical fabric that’s waterproof and windproof without the use of special coatings. It’s resistant to the wear and tear that comes from friction hotspots, jagged rocks, and thorns. It’s also breathable and only comes in at 2oz heavier than the leading premium outdoor jacket. An extra 2oz is worth it when the jacket is campfire-proof.

KEEPING YOU WARM BEFORE THE CAMPFIRE

Traditional puffy jackets have a baffled insulation design, which means lots of extra holes from the stitching. More holes means less heat retention. Instead, we designed the Element with large insulation panels, giving you more coverage and less stitching for heat to escape through.

The panels are a high-quality Polartec™ insulation that’s made from 100% post-consumer recycled water bottles and that keeps 85% heat retention when wet. Nobody ever plans to take a polar plunge during a stream crossing. But just in case you do, we’ve got you covered.

KEEPING YOU COMFY

A lot of premium outdoor jackets like to show off all their bells and whistles with exposed drawstrings, fabrics, and webbing. You won’t see any of that on the Element, but that doesn’t mean it’s bells-and-whistles-free. A few of our favorite features are the micro-fleece lining of our exterior waist pockets, giving your hands a little extra warmth and comfort. The zipper has a micro-fleece hood right below the chin – to reduce chafing & prevent the zipper from bouncing around on long hikes.

Keeping your heat from escaping out the top and bottom is also crucial to comfort. We’ve included two cinches on either side of the waist for extra heat retention as well as a cinch at the back of the hood. No more dangling drawstrings. The hood is big enough to go over a climbing helmet, but the cinch system will keep you dome dry and warm when you go au natural.

FROM THE CAMPFIRE TO THE CITY

Just in case you oversleep after a winter weekend in the woods, the Element is stylish enough to keep you warm and looking good on your way to the office Monday morning. Trekka Designs is all about clean, smooth, minimalist lines. Our jacket has a tailored fit without sacrificing room for layering. The cuffs are a custom cut that does away with uncomfortable and unsightly elastic to give you a little extra coverage on top of your hands.

story:
MyCause Awareness Shoes was founded on caring about people, supporting causes, offering hope, and finding cures. We’re a real goody-two-shoes.

Our MyCause Shoes are made from durable EVA-recyclable, eco-friendly material that is super comfortable—making them good for the planet and great for your feet. All funds from the Indiegogo campaign will go specifically towards this project.

NOTICE: Don't worry about your size or cause colors at this time. We will contact you after the Campaign is over to get your details. We are making all causes.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Need help with sizing? Click Here

NOTICE: Don't worry about your size or cause colors at this time. We will contact you after the Campaign is over to get your details. We are making all causes.

IndieGogo is to find out what package and how many of each item you want. 

Once you decide on your package, if it does not have exactly what you want, you may choose which Add-On Items you would like to add to your package. There are three Add-On Items to choose from:

- MyCause Paracord Ribbon Keychain

- MyCause Strength Cloud Blanket

- MyCause 30oz. Tumbler

*Do not worry about what color tumbler or cause, or anything right now, except to decide what package and how many items you want. We will gather details of the order once the IndieGogo Campaign has concluded.

 

Size, Color & Shipping Information:

Don’t worry about that yet! You will get to select your

Size, Color choice and submit your Shipping at the very end of this campaign.

story:
We are back for another run of crowndfunding. Once again we would like to give you the chance to become the first ones to get your hands on the new, re-designed version of our beloved Moo:D sunglasses. With an even wider selection of colors and an increase of quality we are absolutely sure that we have at least one pair that will suit you.

Don´t worry. Just because this new version is better than the last one we won´t charge you more for them. Just like last time we are practically giving away hundreds of sunglasses because we feel like this is the right platform to do so. This campaign is about getting our new product out there, not to make big bucks. 

So let us become a part of your journey. Let us get you in the right mood.

We have been on a mission since day one - to show the world that you don't have to pay a fortune for a product that will last a long time, with designs that competes with the top brands and with quality that matches. Now, about 5 years in the game we know that we have a lot of products that are loved by people all over the world. We have so many returning customers that lets us know just how much they love what we do and how good they feel going out wearing sunglasses from Zerpico. We thank you.

And now the time has now come for us to introduce our new version of colorful sunglasses, that anyone can afford and that we believe will soon become your new favourite accessory in all of your upcoming adventures. 

 

One of our true passions is to find a balance between great materials, affordability and class.

To begin with, we have selected 10 different color combinations that we think will be good to start of the new collection with. We have every intention to widen the collection further as well as making some cool limited edition sunglasses as well. As you will see further down you will also be able unlock a couple of more amazing models by helping us reach the set out stretch goals. So let's go for that!

 

 

 

 

We have been in the game long enough now to have a sense of what works and what doesn't and we feel very positive about our new Moo:D's. We know that with your help we can do great things and that no goal is too far away. We wouldn´t be anything if it wasn't for all the great people out there, people that believe in us. We do what we do because of you and we want to show our gratitude by giving you the best possible prices for products that stand out.

As we always try or best in finding the best solution for our sunglasses we came to the conclusion that the best way to go for our adventure oriented MOO:D collection is a TR90 polycarbonate frame and scratch resistant, polarized lenses that gives you superior glare reduction and 100% UV protection.

For our new collection we have even upgraded the packaging. Instead of the paper box we now decided to go for a case made out of synthetic leather. We figured that this is a much more appreciated way to carry your sunglasses as it easily can be stored in your bag, purse or in your car. As always your new Moo:D's also come together with a sticker, pouch and a wiping cloth.

 

We would't be what we are if it wasn't for crowdfunding and the fans we have recieved because of it. We have built lasting bonds through medias like these and are grateful for being able to bring ideas into reality and to live in an age where this is possible.

We are on a mission to show you all that there is more than the big corporations out there. That you don't have to pay such high prizes just because they are established brands. We try our best to promote and provide our products at a fair price and by selling directly to consumers through social media and our own website we can accomplish just that. 

This campaign is yet another steppingstone and on this road we have come in contact with a lot of awesome people that were happy to work with us and together make something we all can be proud of. This project wouldn't be what it is today if it wasn't for them.

If you´re interested in knowing more about us and what we have accomplished so far you are more than welcome to check out our social media channels! And of course you can always find us at www.zerpico.com
