story:
Welcome to Artemis Time Art.

 

Over $32,000 raised on Kickstarter!

 

At Artemis Time Art, we fuse quality watch-making with beautiful creative dials, using a range of lost artisanal techniques. For our first collection, we are drawing inspiration from the centuries-old art of Hand-Painted Champlevé Enamelling, to create beautiful and meaningful timepieces for the individual.

Are you tired of the standard fashion watches on the market these days, where "minimalism" is a cover for lack of design effort? If so, read on, and find out what we are doing differently!

 

VISIT OUR GALLERY FOR HIGHER RESOLUTION IMAGES

If pictures are your thing, visit our full image gallery in higher resolution (KS's compression is pretty heavy) here, before coming back to read the details in-depth:

https://artemistimeart.com/pages/gallery

 

Below are amazing pieces we admire, from some prestigious brands. We have always loved the idea of Champlevé Enamel in watches, but could never come close to affording one.

Because of the tedious and lengthy process of enamelling, and due to the scarcity of appropriate talent, such watches usually command a respectable price in the market.

For a long time, haute horology houses have been utilising enamelling in their watches, which run for tens of thousands to hundreds of thousands of dollars. The process is lengthy and tedious; each dial can take hours, if not days, to create.

 

 So, we decided to make our own! And make them available and accessible for everyone. 

 

Our process is essentially an updated version of the traditional art of Champlevé Enamelling. It is a technique which harks back to as early as the 3rd Century, and was prevalently used in jewellery and ornate boxes.

First, a metallic plate is carved and etched with the artistic details, forming troughs.

 

Vitreous coloured enamel is then pulverised, liquified and filled into the troughs. The entire dial is then fired in a kiln.

 

The annealing of the enamel creates a smooth, glossy coloured effect resembling stained glass! It is then left to cool and set.

Dials are then assembled along with the hands, crystal indices, and movement into the watch. It is secured with a caseback, and tested for water-resistance.

 

Our First Collection: Glimpses of Nature

Artemis Time Art's inaugural collection pays tribute to both the lost art of enamelling, as well as charming scenes found in nature. We have also taken effort in creating each dial to pay homage to a different traditional art style from around the world.

 

More importantly, each model is designed with a different personality in mind! You can choose your watch based on how you feel about yourself, and how you wish to express your individualism!

 

"Migration"  (Limited Edition of 188pcs) 

 NOTE: In the production model, the crane bodies will be filled with off-white enamel, like the second picture shown.

 

Inspired by the enigmatic patterns found on traditional Japanese kimonos, which are dyed using the Yūzen technique. The dance of cranes is immortalised here, depicting them in flight across a marshland. A combination of earthy hues are used here, which works beautifully in harmony with the rose gold case.  This has also been the most challenging dial for us to create and execute to date, as such it will only be made in a very limited quantity of just 188 pieces, never to be repeated.

Each Migration timepiece comes with 12 Genuine Clear Swarovski Crystals indicating the hours, along with a Denim Blue Swarovski 17-facet crystal on the crown. The timepiece will come with two straps: 

1) A Genuine leather, Saffiano calfskin strap in mocha brown

2) A Gold Milanese Mesh bracelet

Ideal for: The Traveller, The Lady who pays attention to details.

 

 

"Bee Mine"

 

 

Gold and black combinations are always a crowd-winner, and this is best exemplified in Chinese art of laquering, which flourished during the Han Dynasty. Bee Mine is a playful tribute to companionship and love, with two bees hovering around each other. The enamelling technique is used differently in this model, with deep black enamelling forming the empty spaces, framing the embossed gold details.

Each Bee Mine timepiece comes with 12 Jet Black genuine Swarovski Crystals indicating the hours, along with a Jet Black Swarovski 17-facet crystal on the crown. The timepiece will come with two straps: 

1) A Genuine leather, Saffiano calfskin strap in black

2) A Gold Milanese Mesh bracelet

Ideal for: The Lover, The Romantic, The Best Friend.

 

"Songbird"

A juxtaposition between detail and empty space, the Song Bird pays tribute to Nordic Folk Art, which makes use of simple line elements used in repetition and vibrant colours.

Each Song Bird timepiece comes with 12 Genuine Clear Swarovski Crystals indicating the hours, along with a Light Amethyst Swarovski 17-facet crystal on the crown. The timepiece will come with two straps: 

1) A Genuine leather, Saffiano calfskin strap in pastel blue

2) A Silver Milanese Mesh bracelet

Ideal for: The Creative Spirit, The Inspirational.

 

"Tigress"

 

The Jewish tradition of paper-cut marriage contracts, or Ketubah, is our source of reference for this model. Intricate details combine harmoniously to form a landscape, while the Tigress stands proudly against the green terrain.

We love the symbology of the Tigress: a wild and fierce figure, silent but not one to be trifled with.

Each Tigress timepiece comes with 12 clear genuine Swarovski Crystals indicating the hours, along with a Light Amethyst Swarovski 17-facet crystal on the crown. The timepiece will come with two straps: 

1) A Genuine leather, Saffiano calfskin strap in forest green

2) A Silver Milanese Mesh bracelet

Ideal for: The Independent one, The Wild Spirit

 

 READY TO SECURE YOUR OWN ATA TIMEPIECE?

We have several tiers of perks, as well as add-ons. Select the one you prefer on the rewards page (or scroll further up, on the right, if you are on desktop), and simply make a pledge. Your watch will be delivered in September, and way before Christmas! Whichever one you pick, you will be saving an average of nearly 35% off our retail prices.

Add-ons: Obtain additional watches at even greater discounts! After you select your first watch, you can choose additional pieces at a very enticing price.

 

NEED MORE INFORMATION?

 

1) Will the watch suit your wrist?

Pictured on a 5 1/5 inch wrist

Our watches are sized at 33mm, which means most female wrist sizes, from 4.5 inch to 7inch (11.4cm to 17.8cm) circumference, will be able to carry this elegant watch silhouette off beautifully.

 

2) Detailed Specifications

Each Artemis Time Art - Glimpses of Nature timepiece is built to the highest standards. Instead of using cheaper, unreliable movements found in most watches at this price point, we have opted to utilise high-grade Ronda Swiss movements, usually used in far-pricier brands.

The Swiss-Made Ronda Slimtech 1063 measures at only 1.9mm, allowing us to create the watch in such a slim profile. The movement delivers up to a whooping 6 YEARS of battery life using a standard 321/364 battery which comes included, and can be easily changed at any watchmaker/repair shop globally when the time comes.

Each watch case is built using surgical-grade 316L stainless steel; none of that cheap chromed plated plastic material masquerading as a metal case in most fashion watches.

The watches are individually rated to 50m of water resistance, so you can be rest assured going about your daily routine!

Worried about the fragility of our Enamel dials? No worries! We have conducted several drop tests of our watches at various heights, and we are assured that they will stand up to the occasional clumsiness.

 

 3) Warranty 

We got you fam! Every watch is covered by an International Warranty of 12 months, against all worksmanship issues. We maintain a technical workshop here in Singapore, and will be able to quickly rectify any issues arising from our manufacturing process. That said, quality control is very important to us, and each piece will undergo a rigorous inspection process, so the chances of you receiving a piece with worksmanship issues is extremely slim.

In the rare event you encounter any worksmanship issues with your watch, simply send it over to us to have it rectified! We believe in a fair and easy after-sales service experience.

Production has already begun on the watches, and we are ensuring that each piece will receive the necessary attention it requires, especially on the enamelled dials! We are looking at delivery of your watches latest by September 2021,  subsequent to a stringent quality inspection.

Each watch will undergo 3 levels of Quality Control prior to shipping out (dial inspection, movement inspection and assembly inspection), so you rest assured you will be receiving a beautiful AND functional watch!

 

 4) Shipping 

Shipping to international destinations will be via registered mail (E-Packets), with tracking. Once we have the tracking numbers, you can sit back (in gleeful anticipation) and await your package to arrive.

We are a start-up based in Singapore, founded by (surprise surprise) two young lads! We are watch lovers, and have often heard from our female friends that there is a lack of compelling, well-design and quality watches at the more affordable end of the price spectrum.

As such, we have set out to create what we perceive as ideal watches with Artemis Time Art. Of course, we had alot of feedback and help from our female friends, and we have learnt a lot about female watches through the journey!

We would love to hear from you, on any suggestions for future releases. Drop us a note via the contact from on our website: www.artemistimeart.com

Thank you for your kind support for our inaugural collection, and we hope to welcome you aboard the ATA family soon!

 

Thank you for supporting the birth of Artemis Time Art!

 

Special Acknowledgements

To our friends who have kindly supported and assisted us during the creation process:

- HY (https://instagram.com/_wanderlusts)

- Christle (https://instagram.com/meancreature)

- Ann Lin (https://instagram.com/annl8686)

- Ziling (https://instagram.com/zilingzzl)

- Jacqueline ((https://instagram.com/thblackroses)

- Yee (https://www.instagram.com/yeelurbbs)

- Katherine (https://www.instagram.com/_____katherine__tan)

- Wee Yuan (https://www.instagram.com/vyuan)

- Mabelle (https://www.instagram.com/ahbaomx)

- Clary (https://www.instagram.com/clarabxlle)

- Jingru (https://www.instagram.com/jingruus)

- Vivian (https://www.instagram.com/vivianmok_)

- Jasmine (https:/www.instagram.com/jsmine.ng)

- Janessa (https:/www.instagram.com/dragmealong)

- Ingelica (https:/www.instagram.com/lee.inge)

- Audrey (https:/www.instagram.com/sparrowonweed)

story:
The Orimei UME Packable Coat is a compact, wrinkle-resistant coat created to be  minimalist, timeless, and fashionable. The Orimei coat folds compactly into an over-the-shoulder purse and designed to aesthetically and functionally meet the modern-day woman’s everyday on-the-go needs. 

After creating one of the most crowdfunded foldable dresses in history (The Origamei Dress Collection), we are back to share our latest project with you. Due to a few road bumps in manufacturing overseas, we are proud to say that we have streamlined production to have everything designed and manufactured in our hometown of Los Angeles, California to ensure efficiency, quality control, and faster delivery.

The coats are machine wash-and-dry-friendly, making them extremely easy to care for and an ideal grab-and-go throw over jacket for any occasion.  

 

When folded, the purse has a magnetic snap button to ensure closure as well as a zippered pocket to protect your everyday essentials.

What is it really?! It's a Coat, a Purse, a Pillow, and even a Blanket! For just about any adventure life throws at you. This was designed just for YOU - You're welcome!

'

 

When you go for a night out on the town, the Orimei will be your go-to lightweight coat for just about anything! Trust us - you won't regret it. These fashionably efficient coats are designed for busy and adventurous women. 

It's as easy as 1-2-3. Simply fold inside out and fold along the seam lines , and voila - it packs into a purse and you're ready to go!

 

Roll those sleeves up! Instantly transform your look by easily rolling up the sleeves once, twice, or three times for a more relaxed look. This coat is effortlessly classy, minimal, and matches just about anything!

 

Created for the woman who's always on-the-go. Grab an Orimei coat and don't look back!

story:
Welcome to the latest innovation to hit the skiing and boarding community. The IceBRKR is a modern solution to life on the slopes, keeping you in control of how you want to stay entertained and connected. Integrating bone conduction audio and Bluetooth 5.0 MESH Intercom technology, the IceBRKR makes the skiing or boarding experience more entertaining and safe.

Benefits include:

  • Ability to answer/hang up calls
  • A Bluetooth 5.0 Intercom system (up to 18 people can pair together)
  • Listen to playlists, podcasts, or other audio media
  • Utilize a voice activated system
  • Bendable arms for a secure, comfortable fit
  • Interchangeable magnetic lenses
  • Bidirectional microphone
  • Up to 24 of continuous use

IceBRKR Goggles are the MUST have accessory for this winter season!

 

 

Don’t sacrifice on sound when you’re skiing. Whether making calls, listening to music or podcasts, or using the Bluetooth intercom technology, the state of the art sound of IceBRKR is unparalleled.  

IceBRKR delivers impeccable sound with...

  • Phone calls
  • Intercom communications
  • Conferences
  • Music
  • Voice activation systems 
  • Anything that is transmitted via sound waves.

 

The IceBRKR Prototype Works Amazingly!

Check out this demo below and watch what happens when we place the bone conduction arms onto the box!

All sound signals including voices and music are translated into vibrations. Bone conduction is a natural part of the hearing process - sound travels through our eardrums and bones simultaneously. We’ve taken the concept to the next level through the development of a suite of proprietary audio technologies and design patents.

Because bone conduction leaves your ear canals free of annoying headphones or earphones you can still hear everything that’s happening around you even as you’re swooping down the slopes listening to your favorite tunes or talking to friends on a call or via Bluetooth MESH intercom technology. 

IceBRKR can be used with our without a helmet, on top of the helmet or tucked underneath and still deliver best-in-class sound. 

If you're using the IceBRKR without a ski helmet or underneath it, the sound travels to your ear cartilage, crisp and clear.  Notice how the perfect fit allows the sound to radiate inwards without blocking your ear canal, giving you a great auditory experience while still being able to hear the world around you.

When you use the IceBRKR over your ski helmet, your helmet itself vibrates delivering the sound through the helmet shell itself giving you an incredible 360 degree sound experience,

If you're using your IceBRKR over your ski helmet the stereo sound vibrates using the helmet shell for beautiful stereo sound.

 

We’ve integrated the most modern Bluetooth 5.0 MESH intercom technology into the IceBRKR to give you the freedom to communicate whenever and wherever you need to. Originally made to be used by motorcyclists who have to maintain voice contact in the distance without taking their hands off the handlebar, and in an extremely noisy environment, IceBRKR has now made the same technology available to skiers. Easily chat with up to 18 other skiers in pairs or in groups up to 1 mile away. 

One IceBRKR recognizes compatible MESH devices, they can be paired and, in the event of a loss of contact, it automatically searches and immediately restores the connection. But don’t worry about eavesdroppers, you can isolate your conversation, even if you’ve paired with others in the past. 

The Bluetooth connection also allows the use of all the functions of your smartphone and alignment with tablets, mp3 / music players, and GPS systems from all the main brands. You not only maintain access, but through Siri, Ok Google and other voice activation systems, IceBRKR allows you to answer the phone, make calls, consult the answering machine, all hands free, so you don’t even have to remove your gloves. You can thus access your Apps, receive information from the network, feeds and communications from your social accounts.

It also allows direct connection with music tracks, playlists and podcasts, so your solo snow experience is customized no matter where your adventure takes you. In addition, IceBRKR is compatible with all your favorite apps including fitness, training, tracking, performance measurement, weather and data, WebCam, and more!

 

The durable frame is extremely flexible and adapts to the to the curves of your face and fits in all types and sizes of helmets for all-day comfort. Strap outriggers made of O-Matter for optimized balance pressure and an internal skeletal system minimizes the pressure on your nose for easy breathing. Made of ultra-light and ultra-resistant material, IceBRKR features three layers of foam, which makes it perfect for a comfortable grip. Don’t worry, though any moisture is wicked away by the triple-layer polar fleece and the IceBRKR itself is resistant to water, snow, and cold.

bONE Tech. was founded by Marco and Massimo Collini, two brothers with a great passion for skiing and motorbikes. Looking for a way to keep connected on the slopes and enjoy music while still being able to hear what’s going on around them, the two discovered bone conduction technology and realized it was the solution to their problem. With an eye towards fashion and safety, the brothers created the IceBRKR. The IceBRKR has created a new passion in them to develop and patent stylish and innovative wearable sports products dedicated to producing excellent sound using bone conduction technology. 

bONE Tech. is a lifestyle brand that creates an ultra-wearable user experience for techies, sports enthusiasts and connection-driven fashion moguls. bONE Tech. IceBRKR is proudly designed and engineered in Italy, land of the global leading eyewear brands. Our goal is to remain on the cutting edge of technology while making a sleek design unmarred by unsightly components. That way you see the fashion not the function.

story:
We are crowdfunding to expand our artisan community, create jobs and preserve the traditional skills of Balinese craftsmen for future generations.

We want to expand our artisan community by 50%, train our artisans to work with new materials, learn additional skills, and help create long term sustainable livelihoods.

Today we work with a total of 53 artisans, making a measurable impact on their livelihoods.

If, with our backers’ support we raise £20,000, we will be able to reach our initial goal and set a further milestone.

 

For every £465 raised, we can train another artisan. Here are the ways you can help:

 

 

 

 

 

 

For the last few months, we have been working in Bali with our artisan communities creating a new limited edition collection of bags and accessories exclusively for our backers.

Every piece is consciously designed to be multi-functional and to compliment the other pieces in the collection.

Due to the characteristics of the material and the weaving methods we incorporate, our bags are lightweight, flexible, and very resilient.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Founded in 2017 by Lorna Watson, a trained goldsmith and designer, with 25 years expertise in the luxury goods industry, STELAR is the realisation of a vision to re-imagine the relationships between craftsmanship and culture, community and planet.

 

 

During a trip to Indonesia in 2016, Lorna met a family of artisans in East Bali whose ancient lineage of craftsmanship and the future of their community were under threat. For Lorna this was a tragedy - one that she set out to apply her passion, energy and creative flair to reverse. Thus began our collaboration.

We co-create within these communities to re-imagine ancient skills with a collective vision that is far more exciting than a singular one. Our high quality, hand-crafted bags and accessories are rapidly becoming ‘must-haves’ in today’s international marketplace.

By honouring existing traditions and techniques, and by using locally sourced and organically grown materials, we have developed a regenerative and sustainable business model that takes care of our people and our planet.

Our artisans are custodians, protecting their skills for future generations, with the future of fashion lying, quite literally, in their hands.

 

 

 

 

By up-skilling and elevating this expertise, we are empowering a new generation of artisans to preserve techniques and traditions inherited from their forefathers. 

We support and celebrate these artisan communities whose way of life and complex ancient wisdom fosters harmony between their people, their place and the land that surrounds them.

 

 

By providing immediate income opportunities and stable work, flexibility and salaries on average 2.4 x the national living wage, we create measurable, positive impact on the livelihoods of artisans from disadvantaged communities in Bali.

 

 

Our artisans are able to stay in their communities and work from home with incomes that support them and their families. This means that they can honour commitments to their family, pay for their children’s education, optimise their natural creativity and harness the intelligence of local ecosystems that have supported them for generations.

 

 

We place the people and skills behind what we make at the heart of our venture, re-establishing a sense of value and pride within their communities and making a significant contribution to the provision of long-term sustainable livelihoods for both existing and next generation artisans.

 

 

We believe every beautifully hand-crafted item has an equally fine story behind it.

This is why every hand-crafted item is accompanied by a 5-digit unique code, connecting you to the origins of your item and the artisan who created it. Simply type your item’s code into the portal on our website to meet your artisan.

We believe that knowing where our products come from, who made them, how, and when, should be a standard, rather than a luxury. This is why we have built STELAR from the ground up, building each relationship and putting every step of our supply chain in place ourselves.

 

 

We work directly with suppliers to select our materials, minimising waste and water usage whilst maximising quality at each step. 

By applying this integrated approach, we are able to simplify logistics, minimise transportation, and lower human and environmental impact, which in turn, results in dramatically fewer CO2 emissions than traditional supply and distribution chains.

The following icons identify the sustainable characteristics of each product and can be found on the product page for every item:

 

 

Jacquard

Our jacquard items are intricately crafted using 100% cotton and are inspired by a form of craftsmanship that has existed in Bali for millennia. We use this traditional French jacquard weaving process because it is derived from the ancient Balinese dyeing technique ikat, Indonesian for ‘bind’. 

The raised warp threads in jacquard make them delicate, and because the yarn is dyed before being woven together rather than printing the pattern on, we are able to create versatile, highly specialised and eye-catching designs.

Bamboo

Organically grown and harvested by our artisan communities on their own land, bamboo grows easily and quickly, regenerates itself, and is highly durable.

Leather 

Our leather is sourced from tanneries in neighbouring Java, as a by-product of the meat industry from farms committed to the ethical treatment of animals. Organic and sustainable farming reduces deforestation and utilises eco-friendly disposal systems. After low-level chemical tanning, our leather is hand cut and hand woven on wooden frames, which eliminates the air and noise pollution that would normally result from mechanised production.

 

 

 

 

The current nature of fast-fashion demands low costs and fast turnaround, with fair working conditions and environmental concerns overlooked. As a result, we are faced with an industry that is largely unsustainable.

Consumer preferences are challenging existing business models, demanding that we ‘make much less, make it better and make it more meaningfully’

We produce design-led, quality-based styles that are cross-seasonal and made to last. Our slow fashion ethos:

Buy less, buy better.

 

 

At Stelar, we are championing a new way of thinking and of connecting people – a responsible way of doing business.

With your help, we are hoping to raise £20,000 to allow us to :

  • Invest in growing our community of artisans. We will be able to expand our community by 50%, train them to work with new materials, learn additional skills, and help create long term sustainable livelihoods for them.
  • Invest in block chain technology. This will allow us to trace the provenance of every item we create to its source, enabling us to acknowledge each craftsman, skill and material involved and measure the impact we are creating within our communities.

 

 

More on Blockchain Technology

We hope to invest £8,000 of our target money into completing the first two phases of integrating blockchain technology into our business. 

Ultimately, this process will allow us to work with specialist developers and engineers to build a more efficient and robust product tracking infrastructure. Most importantly, it will give our customers fully transparent, timestamped and verified information about the journey of their STELAR item from its source. 

Financial backing from our crowdfunding supporters will fund the initial phases of the project. This would include working with business analysts and data architects to map out a tailored design and trial mock-ups.

 

If we raise more than £20,000...

If your pledges take us beyond our target, we will be able to grow our artisan community faster, to add new weaving techniques to our ranges, to introduce innovative eco-friendly materials and to expand our product range. It will also enable us to accelerate the implementation of the  block chain technology to provide a robust platform on which to grow our unique business model long into the future.

story:
DogTelligent Closed August 8, 2016.

Introducing the worlds first all-in-one smart dog collar with Virtual Fence & Leash Technology, Health & Location Tracking, Dynamic Assisted Training, Built-in Anti Barking, 2-Way Communication, Ambient Temperature Sensors and an Integrated Vet Portal!  At under $200 and battery life up to 14 days, we are DogTelligent, and this is the Connected Collar.

Looks who's talking about the DogTelligent Connected Collar!



Dogs are loving, dogs are active, dogs are loud. But dogs are vulnerable. That's why we have leashes and collars. A dog's collar is a promise, that you will always return, that you have their best interests at heart. That you will keep them safe, healthy, and loved. It's time for a dog collar that helps you keep that promise.The Connected Collar has built-in vibration signaling and an ultrasonic whistle, like professional dog trainers use.  The DogTelligent app includes pre-programmed commands like sit, stay, down, and come that makes training easier.

The Connected Collar’s ultrasonic whistle can also be set to automatically detect and deter excessive barking.  No more yelling “STOP” at your dog or feeling embarrassed when they uncontrollably bark.  


We’d like to keep DogTelligent growing as long as possible, so here's what we’d like to do if we continue exceeding our initial goal.

STRETCH GOAL 1 - ACHIEVED!    

STRETCH GOAL 2 - ACHIEVED! 52% of dogs are overweight in the US and just 7% of owners are actually aware their dog is unhealthy.  Our integrated health monitoring helps you benchmark activity levels based on your dog’s unique breed and age; helping you to keep your dog healthy.Store and share vet records so you can easily stay up to date on vaccinations, medications and regular pet maintenance that can help your dog live a longer and healthier life.  Your vet can see your dog’s actual activity levels. These can be indicators of potential health problems.  

With the Connected Collar, all of your dog's vital information is only a swipe away.  Our multi-user app allows you to share your dog's information easily.  Know your dog is safe, while in the hands of dog sitters, friends and family members.
Our proprietary Virtual Leash and Fence Technology allows you to keep your dog safe anywhere, at any time.  With the Virtual Fence, set your home’s wifi network to be notified if your dog goes beyond the approved zone.  Activating the Virtual Leash at off-leash parks and hiking trails allows your dog freedom to roam within a safe distance.  Your dog will be signaled by a combination of whistle tones, vibrations and our unique patent pending technology that simulates a traditional “yank of the leash” in a humane and gentle way.Help ensure that if your dog is lost, you will easily be able to find them. Unlike other GPS trackers on the market, the Connected Collar leverages Bluetooth, Wifi and Cellular so you always know where your dog is located.  1 in 10 dogs (that’s about 8 million)  get lost in the US each year.  The Connected Collar includes LED Lights to help you spot them, even in the dark.


Radio:  Cellular, Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n (2.4GHz support), Bluetooth (Class 2)
Compatibility: The DogTelligent App is currently compatible with Apple iOS and Android devices. Cellular connectivity is made available through a partnership with AT&T and available in up to 150 countries. The Connected Collar is also equipped with Bluetooth and Wifi. 
Sensors: 3-Axis Accelerometer and Ambient Temperature Sensors
Speaker: Includes a High Frequency (5.8KHz to 12.4KHz) emitter for training commands (similar to a traditional dog training whistle) as well as a standard speaker for voice communication
Material: Collar: anodized aluminum, TiN coated stainless steel with flexible, water-resistant TPU
Latching Mechanism: Electromagnetic, with failsafe unlock for running out of battery or direct pull
Size Options: Small (8-14 inches), Medium (13-19 inches), Large (18-27 inches)
Battery: Built-in rechargeable lithium-ion  battery
Battery Life: Approximately 7-14 days.

The Connected Collar is our flagship product and platform for a  growing DogTelligent family of connected products. The Connected Collar is at the center of your dog's personal internet of things (IoT). We've begun development on products that are leveraging the DogTelligent platform and will make some exciting announcements soon. Our primary goal at DogTelligent is to combine beautifully designed dog products with technology that makes a difference; solving every day frustrations. 




What is the DogTelligent Connected Collar™?
Answer: The DogTelligent Connected Collar™ is a GPS Pet Tracker enabled with health monitoring and integrated training features such as ultrasonic whistles, vibration technology and virtual leash & fence technology to improve your life as well as your dogs.

How do I access my Rewards and Referral ID?  

1.  In the top right corner of the screen, do you see your name? If not, then that mean’s you aren’t logged in so you’ll want to do that first.
2.  Once you are logged in, click on our Updates tab for our campaign (In between Story and Comments).
3.  Once you are there, scroll down to our most recent post and click on the Referral Program link.
4.  This should bring you directly to the rewards page, and you should see your unique code.
5.  Within the rewards/referral page, you can find information on how to share/refer the campaign!

When will the DogTelligent Connected Collar™ ship?
Answer: Due to a high volume of pre-orders, we will prioritize shipping pre-order units with a target ship date for pre-orders as early as September of 2016.

At DogTelligent, we are passionate about our users and want to ensure you receive the best and most honest customer experience possible. We look forward to you joining the smartest community of connected dog owners in the world.

How does DogTelligent Connected Collar™ track my dog’s activity?
Answer: The DogTelligent Connected Collar™ tracks activities like running, playing, resting and walking, allowing you to have a detailed look at your dog’s activity. The Connected Collar™ captures activity data using a 3-axis accelerometer (like a jogger’s pedometer) and our algorithm identifies the behavior for you to visualize in the DogTelligent App. This tracking helps you become a more informed dog parent who provides daily, weekly and monthly activities that will lead to a healthier pet.

What is Virtual Leash and Fence Technology?
Answer: The DogTelligent Connected Collar™ is designed with many training and safety features. Our Virtual Leash and Fence Technology allows you to set specific boundaries for your dog, with parameters you set up in your DogTelligent app. When the dog reaches a boundary, the Connected Collar™ uses patent-pending technology to simulate the sensation of a leash yank, and you get an alert. For instance, if you take your dog on a walk without a leash and want to keep him/her close, the Virtual Leash technology will activate when your dog reaches your preset distance limit, say, 5 feet from your mobile device. This feature requires training.

Boundary training on your mobile device is called the Virtual Leash; on desktop computers this technology is called Virtual Fence.

How close / accurate is the GPS location?  
Answer: Position Accuracy is approximately 3 meters (less than 10 feet). Average range for all GPS technology is about 3 meters.

Where does the DogTelligent Connected Collar™ work? 
Answer: The DogTelligent Connected Collar™ is designed to work in the U.S. on America’s most reliable cellular network, and anywhere you have a Wi-Fi or Bluetooth connection.

How does data sync from the Connected Collar™ to my app and mobile device?
Answer: The DogTelligent Connected Collar™ can use Wi-Fi, Bluetooth or cellular to sync. The Connected Collar™ collects data and our app interface synthesizes that data for you, so you will receive analysis and insight into your dog’s activities. The Connected Collar™ is currently designed to sync every 30 minutes. 

If I am away from devices that sync data (Wi-Fi, Bluetooth or Cellular), will I lose that data?
Answer: The Connected Collar™ can store up to 30 days of tracking information.  Once your Connected Collar™ is back online or in range of a paired Wi-Fi, Bluetooth or cellular connection, it will automatically push all of the saved data to sync with your app.

How is the DogTelligent Connected Collar™ different from a microchip?

Answer: The Connected Collar™ is a complete Tracking, Training and Health Monitoring system that uses breakthrough GPS, Bluetooth and cellular technology to let you to see where your dog is at any time, and will alert you if your dog goes beyond your personal limits. The Connected Collar™ not only allows you, the owner, to use GPS tracking to find your dog, it also allows any helpful person who finds your dog to access your contact information via our website or mobile app. As an added benefit, the DogTelligent app contains your vet contact info, should your dog need medical attention. Traditional microchips and RFID tags, while useful as a back-up measure, are a reactive technology. Lost dogs with an embedded microship must be found and taken to a vet or shelter; hopefully the vet or shelter has the owner’s contact information.  With millions of dogs lost every year, only about 20% are returned to their owners according to the National Council on Pet Population Study and Policy.

How do I charge my Connected Collar™?
Answer: The Connected Collar™ has an internal rechargeable battery that is easily recharged with our conductive charger. With typical use, the battery should last 7 – 14 days.  

How will I know if my battery life on the Connected Collar™ is low? 
Answer: The Connected Collar™ app displays the days and hours of battery life remaining at any given time.

Is my Connected Collar™ under warranty?

Answer: The DogTelligent Connected Collar™ includes a 1-year manufacturer’s warranty from date of purchase from DogTelligent.com or 1 year from date of activation when purchased from an authorized retailer. Pet-induced damage is not covered by warranty.

Email us at info@dogtelligent.com and we will help troubleshoot any problems you might be experiencing.

Can I cancel my order?
Answer:  We are currently only accepting Pre-Orders.  Pre-Orders may be cancelled within 30 days of the order being placed on Indiegogo.  

What is the monthly service fee for the Cellular connectivity?  Every Connected Collar is equipped with GPS and Cellular technology.  Since the collar is enabled with Bluetooth and Wifi as well, it is up to each customer if they would like to activate the GPS Tracking and Cellular connectivity which requires a monthly subscription to activate.  Exact pricing for the service is yet to be determined but estimated at $4.95/mo. You can learn more about the 150 countries we will have coverage in here:
story_txt:
DogTelligent Closed August 8, 2016.Introducing the worlds first all-in-one smart dog collar with Virtual Fence & Leash Technology, Health & Location Tracking, Dynamic Assisted Training, Built-in Anti Barking, 2-Way Communication, Ambient Temperature Sensors and an Integrated Vet Portal!  At under $200 and battery life up to 14 days, we are DogTelligent, and this is the Connected Collar.Looks who's talking about the DogTelligent Connected Collar!Dogs are loving, dogs are active, dogs are loud. But dogs are vulnerable. That's why we have leashes and collars. A dog's collar is a promise, that you will always return, that you have their best interests at heart. That you will keep them safe, healthy, and loved. It's time for a dog collar that helps you keep that promise.The Connected Collar has built-in vibration signaling and an ultrasonic whistle, like professional dog trainers use.  The DogTelligent app includes pre-programmed commands like sit, stay, down, and come that makes training easier.The Connected Collar’s ultrasonic whistle can also be set to automatically detect and deter excessive barking.  No more yelling “STOP” at your dog or feeling embarrassed when they uncontrollably bark.  

We’d like to keep DogTelligent growing as long as possible, so here's what we’d like to do if we continue exceeding our initial goal.
STRETCH GOAL 1 - ACHIEVED!    

STRETCH GOAL 2 - ACHIEVED! 52% of dogs are overweight in the US and just 7% of owners are actually aware their dog is unhealthy.  Our integrated health monitoring helps you benchmark activity levels based on your dog’s unique breed and age; helping you to keep your dog healthy.Store and share vet records so you can easily stay up to date on vaccinations, medications and regular pet maintenance that can help your dog live a longer and healthier life.  Your vet can see your dog’s actual activity levels. These can be indicators of potential health problems.  
With the Connected Collar, all of your dog's vital information is only a swipe away.  Our multi-user app allows you to share your dog's information easily.  Know your dog is safe, while in the hands of dog sitters, friends and family members.Our proprietary Virtual Leash and Fence Technology allows you to keep your dog safe anywhere, at any time.  With the Virtual Fence, set your home’s wifi network to be notified if your dog goes beyond the approved zone.  Activating the Virtual Leash at off-leash parks and hiking trails allows your dog freedom to roam within a safe distance.  Your dog will be signaled by a combination of whistle tones, vibrations and our unique patent pending technology that simulates a traditional “yank of the leash” in a humane and gentle way.Help ensure that if your dog is lost, you will easily be able to find them. Unlike other GPS trackers on the market, the Connected Collar leverages Bluetooth, Wifi and Cellular so you always know where your dog is located.  1 in 10 dogs (that’s about 8 million)  get lost in the US each year.  The Connected Collar includes LED Lights to help you spot them, even in the dark.


Radio:  Cellular, Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n (2.4GHz support), Bluetooth (Class 2)Compatibility: The DogTelligent App is currently compatible with Apple iOS and Android devices. Cellular connectivity is made available through a partnership with AT&T and available in up to 150 countries. The Connected Collar is also equipped with Bluetooth and Wifi. Sensors: 3-Axis Accelerometer and Ambient Temperature SensorsSpeaker: Includes a High Frequency (5.8KHz to 12.4KHz) emitter for training commands (similar to a traditional dog training whistle) as well as a standard speaker for voice communicationMaterial: Collar: anodized aluminum, TiN coated stainless steel with flexible, water-resistant TPULatching Mechanism: Electromagnetic, with failsafe unlock for running out of battery or direct pullSize Options: Small (8-14 inches), Medium (13-19 inches), Large (18-27 inches)Battery: Built-in rechargeable lithium-ion  batteryBattery Life: Approximately 7-14 days.
The Connected Collar is our flagship product and platform for a  growing DogTelligent family of connected products. The Connected Collar is at the center of your dog's personal internet of things (IoT). We've begun development on products that are leveraging the DogTelligent platform and will make some exciting announcements soon. Our primary goal at DogTelligent is to combine beautifully designed dog products with technology that makes a difference; solving every day frustrations.

story:
I've spent a lot of time over the past few years looking at different ring designs (glow rings included), but I always felt something was missing.

I wanted to take the concept of a glow ring and not only make something unique on the inside, but something you'd want to show off to everyone you know..an exciting style both inside AND out.  

I experimented with glow rings in a few different exterior band styles, each of them had something unique about them but nothing quite hit home with what I was looking for...until I found damascus steel.  

Damascus rings are typically pretty far out of reach for most people as the price is commonly between $400 - $1,000 per ring.  After speaking with a local forge and working with the material myself over the past few months, I've come up with a more affordable and efficient method to produce these rings.  Not only that, but I am also happy to present the first ever Damascus Steel glow ring to all of our supporters on IndieGoGo!

The history of Damascus Steel alone is enough to write a book on.  We don't need an entire history lesson but it definitely deserves a brief look into its origins.

Around 500 AD, swordsmiths of the Middle East began to produce knives and swords with strength and cutting abilities unequalled by any other civilization of the time. The superiority of these weapons came from the steel that they used to fashion them. The steel was harder and could hold an edge longer than other steels. It is claimed that one of these blades could cleanly slice through a falling silk scarf. 

Europeans who saw this feat were astounded: their weapons were not capable of anything close to this. The blades of these weapons also had a characteristic wavy pattern. Since the steel was supposed to be initially created in Damascus, the steel became known as "Damascus" steel.

The standard Damascus Steel Ring is already stunning to look at by itself.  Each ring has a completely unique grain pattern that really sets it apart from any other material.

When the glow hits....it's something else entirely. The glow leaks out each side like you would expect, but it also causes the outer edges of the band to radiate....bringing out the damascus grain even in the darkest of settings.

The glow is made of a transparent resin mixed with a strontium aluminate based photoluminescent powder. 

Rewards for this campaign will come in two tiers.  Glowing and non-glowing Damascus Rings.

The beauty of Damascus steel comes from the grain pattern that is unique to each individual ring.  "Modern Damascus" is made from several types of steel and iron slices welded together to form a billet,the patterns vary depending on how the the billet is worked during forging. The billet is drawn out and folded until the desired number of layers are formed.

The rings are available in seven different glow colors: Green, Aqua, Blue, Purple, White, Yellow, and Red.

Hold the ring up to any LED light source for only a few seconds to make it glow, a UV based light source will provide a much brighter and longer lasting glow....luckily the sun does a REALLY good job of getting these beauties to glow.

The ring will glow EXTREMELY bright for about 10 minute before fading into a soft glow that will last upwards of 6 hours depending on the color.

 If you have trouble finding your ring size or you aren't sure what you measure at, this is a great resource to start with: http://findmyringsize.com/

Thank you so much for taking the time to check out this project. Check out the rewards and pledge whatever you feel comfortable with...every little bit helps. I can't wait to make this project become a reality with your help!

story:
Happy New Year!

Thank you so much for your support in 2020.

Together, we brought the Aventi A10 Titanium & the A11 Sapphire Crystal concepts to life!

 Thanks to the invaluable feedback from our Indiegogo Contributors...

Our designs have been perfected.

Many watches have been made.

and now...

Aventi has started shipping!





Our Indiegogo Campaign has ended, but you can still secure an Aventi Watch.

Every piece is individually created for the customer.

Every relationship is individually cared for.

 

Distinct materials.

Unique design.

Limited availability.


Book a Concierge appointment today.


www.aventi.com

story:
We will continue to provide the best product possible and most importantly, we will not limit our self to any one region or country, as everyone is entitled to try our technology. Like we said in our campaign use it any place, any time. By the way, we can give you the reassurance that we will ship our product for two main reasons: one we are based of Hong Kong one of the biggest ports in the world shipping products every where in the world, and we will work with the best to get the product to our backers, and two China is so close that we will be able to fix any issue with the assembly line at any time within hours. So rest assured that we will give you the best posible product available on the market. In respect to our product we have developed a product that will not only give you cold or hot at the push of a button, but we have actually taken the time to think about the person that`s going to use our product. We have created a simplistic user interaction, so that a child will know how to use our product. We have also created a more traditional style of watch, making it even more user friendly so that anyone can use it. Our interchangeable straps will give you the confidence that you need to be able to wear your Aircon Watch with any clothes you desire. Apart from all those things we think that we live in a world were wireless technology is a must, so why would you connect your watch to an ugly cable. The Aircon Watch uses a magnetically attached wireless charging that we will provide in the box. For this and many other reason even simple ones like being able to have the time and date. We will continue to develop our product, and to make it the best posible one on the market. 

Thank you so much for all the great support that you have given us and we look forward to continue. 

 

  • Life has many troubles and some of them are defined by climate. Maybe you are too hot on a summer’s day and wish you could take all your clothes off. Or, perhaps you are too cold during winter and can’t even send a text because your hands are too shaky from shivering. 

Why we can apply this to our body?

 
  • A close look at the complex systems that keep us functioning can inspire awe. Such is the case with the body's complicated temperature-regulating mechanism. This intricate apparatus balances heat production with heat loss, keeping the body at a temperature just right for optimal function. This balancing act is directed automatically and seamlessly by the hypothalamus, a small portion of the brain that serves as the command center for numerous bodily functions, including the coordination of the autonomic nervous system. Much like a thermostat regulates the temperature inside your home, the hypothalamus regulates your body temperature, responding to internal and external stimuli and making adjustments to keep the body within one or two degrees of 98.6 degrees.  Ref:1

How it works?

 
  • What if we could change the signal that our nervous system sends to the brain by using the Aircon watch to generate pulses of heat or cold. With this method we can make our body start to feel more aware of the temperatures and thus stabilize our sensations
  • According to a 2012 research conducted by Standford University, with a cooling glove, heat exchange is possible through the extremities especially the wrist and palms area. Ref:5
  • The Aircon watch maintains does temperatures, demonstrated in the test video, reaching the lowest temperature of 12 degrees Celsius and reaching a max temperature of 40 degrees Celsius. These temperatures do not disrupt the upper and lower pain threshold. what it does allow us is to reach faster surface cooling temperatures, 28 degrees Celsius or 82 F.  

 While the Aircon watch gives you the sufficient temperatures to allow your body to feel the changes, we have to remember that this pulse of heat and cold come in intervals of 15 seconds on and 15 seconds off.  

 This Method makes the battery last longer and by sending these pulses of temperature change your body can react each time as if it was a new sensation.  

 We have selected the wrist as the best possible place to use our technology, since a lot of major blood vessels and nerves are closer to the skin in this area of the body, and thus giving us the best chance to achieve the most effective temperature changes. (point, n.d.)  

 The pulse points. These areas of the body are most commonly known are very effective when trying to bring your temperature down or raising it, usually people run warm or cold water on their wrist to achieve this effect, but what we are proposing is similar to what WUSA 9 news tried during a segment earlier this year. project video thumbnail PLAY (wusa9 news, n.d.)  

Bibliography  

(n.d.). Retrieved from 

http://fruitionfitness.com/how-pulse-points-can... Kenney, W. L. (n.d.). PHYSIOLOGICAL RESPONSES TO THE THERMAL ENVIRONMENT (Vol. fourth edition). Retrieved from http://www.ilocis.org/documents/chpt42e.htm point, P. (n.d.). Retrieved from 

http://fruitionfitness.com/how-pulse-points-can... wusa9 news. (n.d.). Retrieved from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqsVFYANxgI

 

Watch Technique

 
  • The secret is in the straps, it contains a small device that has within it our ClimaCon technology. This tiny device will fit on the inner wrist in an area where the nerves are closer to the skin surface so as to allow for maximum transfer of temperature. The watch can be used during any temperature, any season or any time zone.
  • Imagine that you putting an ice cube on your pulse points (think wrists and sides of your neck) or running them under cold water will cool you down instantly. Since the blood vessels in those areas are close to the surface of your skin, the cold will bring your body temp down much quicker. Ref:6

Why does this technique work?

 
  • Abstract, Physical work, high ambient temperature and wearing protective clothing can elevate body temperature and cardiovascular strain sufficiently to degrade performance and induce heat-related illnesses. We have recently developed an Arm Immersion Cooling System (AICS) for use in military training environments and this paper will review literature supporting such an approach and provide details regarding its construction. Extremity cooling in cool or cold water can accelerate body (core temperature) cooling from 0.2 to 1.0 °C/10 min vs. control conditions, depending on the size/surface area of the extremity immersed. Arm immersion up to the elbow results in greater heat loss than hand- or foot-only immersion and may reduce cardiovascular strain by lowering heart rate by 10–25 beats/min and increase work tolerance time by up to 60%. The findings from studies in this paper support the use of AICS prototypes, which have been incorporated as part of the heat stress mitigation procedures employed in US Army Ranger Training and may have great application for sports and occupational use. ( This is an existing military products references) Ref:2

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Your place, your rules

  • Doing any outdoor activity most times depends on the temperature and the climate. On the other hand, being inside all depends on if your heater or air conditioner is on and using up electricity. The Aircon watch offers the convenience that you need by freeing you from an energy wasting air conditioner, never limiting you to the outside temperature, and all within the form of a small watch.

Office Man

No worries! As we know, there are many people wearing suits even in the summer time, or uniforms in outdoor work, now you have the solution.

 

Outdoor Lover

If you go running or outdoor photography Aircon Watch could be your best friend.

 

 

Menopause 

One of the reasons why we developed this product was to help women during menopause. Menopause often has hot flashes which can be extremely annoying to the extent where it becomes painful. But what if you could get some relief from a small device that emits a soothing cool temperature.

 

 

Why we need it in the office?

  • It may be the middle of summer, but you’d never know from looking around offices, where, on the hottest days of the year, it’s not uncommon to see workers wrapped up in sweaters at their desks. As temperatures outside rise, most corporate office buildings become hermetically sealed, air-conditioned ice cubes, forcing workers everywhere to grab a Snuggie. In a study of government office buildings, for instance, 60% of workers complained of thermal stress–that they’re too hot or too cold in their workplace. Why can’t we manage to keep offices at a comfortable temperature? Ref.2
  • Men are fine in shirt-sleeves, but the women have to wear cardigans and scarves. 
  • First, the metabolic rate varies enormously—depending on height, weight, fitness, the type of work, and of course, gender. Women usually have both lower height and weight, and a higher percentage of body fat than men. In fact modern researchers reckon women pump out about a third less heat than men do, and so don't need as much cooling. 
  • The second problem is also obvious—women tend to wear lighter clothing, and expose more skin. In an office you don't often see a man's naked knees. Ref.2

Same room different temperature

  • In the office or at home, everyone might have different temperatures.
  • Within a lot of research, we've found the answer.

Sleep Discomfort

  • Having those dreaded night sweats and you can’t turn on the air conditioner because your wife has cold hand?
  • Night Sweating and Cold Hands  
  •  If you suffer from night sweats and cold hands, you can now finally have a cozy night.

 Climbing

 

Outdoor Activities 

If you like climbing, running, biking, outdoor photography, Aircon Watch could be your best friend.

 

  •  Tested  
  • The Aircon Watch has been tested with more than a hundred people and using several prototypes. Our experienced design team has worked for more than two years in research and development, to improve Aircon Watch and reach the design and level that we are at today.

See what our beta tester say

 

 

 

 Charging connector 

5 Seconds
 
  • Aircon Watch can raise temperature in just 5 seconds, because we have improved the thermal electricity technology by using Climacon (patent pending) Technology, which is faster way to cool down the thermal system. There is a problem of the thermal pad, it releases heat when generating cold, this technology usually needs a heat sink to reduce the temperature of the pad to make it cooler. We have spent 2 years improving the reduction of heat, in order to make more efficient.

 

Global Warming  

Global warming is gradually destroying the Earth’s entire ecosystem, so why not turn that A/C off and turn on the AirCon Watch. It most definitely will help keep your pocket fuller and your body cooler.

 
 

Product Spec

  • Material of the frame: Aluminum Alloy  
  • Material of the strap: Silicone  
  • Battery type: Li-ion  
  • Battery size: 400mAh
  • Standby time: 48 hours  
  • Battery time: 4 hours for cooling mode and 8 hours of heating mode 
  • Screen type: OLED  
  • Water resistance  
  • Charging system: Contact Charging  
  • Accessories included: Magnetic charger, USB cable. 

 

 

 

 

  

  • Share our page to any of your friends or family to let them know there is new way of climate control : ) 
  • Sharing will enrich everyone with more knowledge.
  • Ana Monnar (*1954, Cuban-born, founder of Readers Are Leaders U.S.A.)

If you have any questions about business issues, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at airconwatch@hotmail.com

story_txt:
We will continue to provide the best product possible and most importantly, we will not limit our self to any one region or country, as everyone is entitled to try our technology. Like we said in our campaign use it any place, any time. By the way, we can give you the reassurance that we will ship our product for two main reasons: one we are based of Hong Kong one of the biggest ports in the world shipping products every where in the world, and we will work with the best to get the product to our backers, and two China is so close that we will be able to fix any issue with the assembly line at any time within hours. So rest assured that we will give you the best posible product available on the market. In respect to our product we have developed a product that will not only give you cold or hot at the push of a button, but we have actually taken the time to think about the person that`s going to use our product. We have created a simplistic user interaction, so that a child will know how to use our product. We have also created a more traditional style of watch, making it even more user friendly so that anyone can use it. Our interchangeable straps will give you the confidence that you need to be able to wear your Aircon Watch with any clothes you desire. Apart from all those things we think that we live in a world were wireless technology is a must, so why would you connect your watch to an ugly cable. The Aircon Watch uses a magnetically attached wireless charging that we will provide in the box. For this and many other reason even simple ones like being able to have the time and date. We will continue to develop our product, and to make it the best posible one on the market. Thank you so much for all the great support that you have given us and we look forward to continue.  Life has many troubles and some of them are defined by climate. Maybe you are too hot on a summer’s day and wish you could take all your clothes off. Or, perhaps you are too cold during winter and can’t even send a text because your hands are too shaky from shivering.  Why we can apply this to our body? A close look at the complex systems that keep us functioning can inspire awe. Such is the case with the body's complicated temperature-regulating mechanism. This intricate apparatus balances heat production with heat loss, keeping the body at a temperature just right for optimal function. This balancing act is directed automatically and seamlessly by the hypothalamus, a small portion of the brain that serves as the command center for numerous bodily functions, including the coordination of the autonomic nervous system. Much like a thermostat regulates the temperature inside your home, the hypothalamus regulates your body temperature, responding to internal and external stimuli and making adjustments to keep the body within one or two degrees of 98.6 degrees.  Ref:1How it works? 
What if we could change the signal that our nervous system sends to the brain by using the Aircon watch to generate pulses of heat or cold. With this method we can make our body start to feel more aware of the temperatures and thus stabilize our sensations
According to a 2012 research conducted by Standford University, with a cooling glove, heat exchange is possible through the extremities especially the wrist and palms area. Ref:5
The Aircon watch maintains does temperatures, demonstrated in the test video, reaching the lowest temperature of 12 degrees Celsius and reaching a max temperature of 40 degrees Celsius. These temperatures do not disrupt the upper and lower pain threshold. what it does allow us is to reach faster surface cooling temperatures, 28 degrees Celsius or 82 F.   While the Aircon watch gives you the sufficient temperatures to allow your body to feel the changes, we have to remember that this pulse of heat and cold come in intervals of 15 seconds on and 15 seconds off.   This Method makes the battery last longer and by sending these pulses of temperature change your body can react each time as if it was a new sensation.   We have selected the wrist as the best possible place to use our technology, since a lot of major blood vessels and nerves are closer to the skin in this area of the body, and thus giving us the best chance to achieve the most effective temperature changes. (point, n.d.)   The pulse points. These areas of the body are most commonly known are very effective when trying to bring your temperature down or raising it, usually people run warm or cold water on their wrist to achieve this effect, but what we are proposing is similar to what WUSA 9 news tried during a segment earlier this year. project video thumbnail PLAY (wusa9 news, n.d.)  Bibliography  (n.d.). Retrieved from http://fruitionfitness.com/how-pulse-points-can... Kenney, W. L. (n.d.). PHYSIOLOGICAL RESPONSES TO THE THERMAL ENVIRONMENT (Vol. fourth edition). Retrieved from http://www.ilocis.org/documents/chpt42e.htm point, P. (n.d.). Retrieved from http://fruitionfitness.com/how-pulse-points-can... wusa9 news. (n.d.). Retrieved from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqsVFYANxgI Watch Technique 
The secret is in the straps, it contains a small device that has within it our ClimaCon technology. This tiny device will fit on the inner wrist in an area where the nerves are closer to the skin surface so as to allow for maximum transfer of temperature. The watch can be used during any temperature, any season or any time zone.
Imagine that you putting an ice cube on your pulse points (think wrists and sides of your neck) or running them under cold water will cool you down instantly. Since the blood vessels in those areas are close to the surface of your skin, the cold will bring your body temp down much quicker. Ref:6
Why does this technique work? Abstract, Physical work, high ambient temperature and wearing protective clothing can elevate body temperature and cardiovascular strain sufficiently to degrade performance and induce heat-related illnesses. We have recently developed an Arm Immersion Cooling System (AICS) for use in military training environments and this paper will review literature supporting such an approach and provide details regarding its construction. Extremity cooling in cool or cold water can accelerate body (core temperature) cooling from 0.2 to 1.0 °C/10 min vs. control conditions, depending on the size/surface area of the extremity immersed. Arm immersion up to the elbow results in greater heat loss than hand- or foot-only immersion and may reduce cardiovascular strain by lowering heart rate by 10–25 beats/min and increase work tolerance time by up to 60%. The findings from studies in this paper support the use of AICS prototypes, which have been incorporated as part of the heat stress mitigation procedures employed in US Army Ranger Training and may have great application for sports and occupational use. ( This is an existing military products references) Ref:2          Your place, your rulesDoing any outdoor activity most times depends on the temperature and the climate. On the other hand, being inside all depends on if your heater or air conditioner is on and using up electricity. The Aircon watch offers the convenience that you need by freeing you from an energy wasting air conditioner, never limiting you to the outside temperature, and all within the form of a small watch.Office ManNo worries! As we know, there are many people wearing suits even in the summer time, or uniforms in outdoor work, now you have the solution. Outdoor LoverIf you go running or outdoor photography Aircon Watch could be your best friend.

Women usually have both lower height and weight, and a higher percentage of body fat than men. In fact modern researchers reckon women pump out about a third less heat than men do, and so don't need as much cooling. 
The second problem is also obvious—women tend to wear lighter clothing, and expose more skin. In an office you don't often see a man's naked knees. Ref.2

Within a lot of research, we've found the answer.

Night Sweating and Cold Hands

story:
Hey! It's The Pholosopher here. I am excited to announce this month's Pholosopher's Market products: 3 new SHALL NOT BE INFRINGED gun patches.

Products

In this offering, I have 3 new, AMAZING, 3-inch square patches promoting the right to bear arms: one with a Scorpion, one with a Parrot, and one with a Shadow Two, each sporting the "Shall Not Be Infringed" rallying cry.

They are 100% embroidered with hook and loop backing for easy placement on backpacks and totes.

Production

I have already produced the products and they are ready to ship once the campaign closes fully, so you can back with confidence.

​Shipping

Due to increased shipping costs and difficulties, we are currently unable to ship product internationally or to Hawaii or Alaska. We can only ship to the continental US. We do hope to be able to provide service to those areas in the future. If you support from one of those areas, we will refund your contribution in full.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't have change to spare, you can share the campaign to let others know that there are some AWESOME patches available, the purchase of which helps me produce more content educating others on the right to bear arms and human freedom!

So thank you for your support!

~Pho ^^

story:
We started Storied Hats two years ago because we couldn’t find quality hats, made from sustainable materials, in a range of designs without aggressive branding. 

After selling over 10,000 hats and receiving 99% 5-star reviews, we're really excited to launch our most versatile and most sustainable hats yet – made from used coffee grounds, cactus, algae biomass, and more. 

 

Apparel is one of the dirtiest industries. Take conventional, non-organic cotton: it's 2.4% of the world's cropland, yet uses 25% of the world’s insecticides, requires 2,700 liters of water to produce cotton for just one t-shirt, and is a major greenhouse gas emitter. We don’t want to be a part of that.

That’s why we’ve spent over a year developing these hats. We all have to be a part of the solution. 

But, for sustainability to matter, the product has to be fantastic. We LOVE how the prototypes of these hats came out. Some details that your forehead will thank you for:

story:
The GO is an ultra-slim trackable wallet coming with a stunning modern design and next-level functionality.

Traditional wallets just don't make sense anymore. For years, brands have been making the same wallet with no significant difference. Leather or canvas material wears and tears over time... unnecessary pouches and zippers create dead volume... and other brands simply fail to keep up with modern style, security, and technology.

We wanted to disrupt tradition and stand out.

GO-GETTER's are constantly on the move and this active lifestyle demands the right tools, so we turned to them to define the next generation of wallets. 

With the GO-GETTER lifestyle in mind, we wanted to create something simple, because keeping things simple is what's effective and lasts.

We designed a slim wallet that is trackable, expandable, RFID-blocking, and tied with a modern aesthetic to deliver a premium carrying experience. 

 

The GO Wallet was made to make your wallet easier to use and harder to lose. 

We partnered with Innway Technology to provide you an optional Bluetooth tracker card for your GO Wallet. Save yourself from any worries. Slip the card in your wallet and track it instantly.

7.5 mm thin and 2.5 oz light, making it ideal for those who are always on the go. Engineered to the exact size of a credit card, eliminating bulk from dead volume. 

Built with RFID-blocking aluminum to keep your cards and ID secure from modern RFID-skimming and theft. Perfect for those who are constantly on the move or traveling.

Made from premium 6061-T6 aero-grade aluminum & anodized, making it corrosion-resistant. The surface is also water, sweat, and dirt resistant, keeping your wallet in like-new condition for years. Guaranteed to not wear & tear like a traditional leather or canvas wallet.

Inner beveled edges, polished surfaces, and the bottom finger groove (perfectly shaped for your thumb) allow for a fast 'push-up' access and insertion.

Smaller and lighter than a phone to fit easily in your front pocket. Keep your GO wallet safe from pick-pockets, prevent back pain from sitting on your wallet, and grab your wallet faster than ever.

 

 

 

At GO-GETTER Co. we believe that every element of our products must be made by professionals in that industry, so we chose to partner with specialists that have a strong reputation in their field.

We've partnered with Innway Technology, a company that specializes in intelligent tracking devices, hardware, and software. At Innway, they strive to use technology through innovative ways to help you find things that matter to you the most.

 

1. Modern sleek design

  • Slim, sleek and stylish modern look to fit any occasion
  • Crafted out of highest quality material to ensure it looks incredible while offering longevity and durability

2. Beveled edges and polished surface

  • Inner beveled edges and polished surfaces allow for smooth access + insertion without damaging your cards

3. Finger groove

  • Finger groove perfectly shaped for your thumb allows for a fast 'push-up' access to your cards
  • Access your cards with swiftness and be ready to pay in seconds

4. Polyester rubber latex elastic band

  • Premium polyester rubber latex band keeps your cards snug & secure yet accessible.
  • Carry as much or as little as you need up to 15 cards without elastic stretching out
  • Replaceable band, backed by our lifetime warranty.

5. Water, sweat, and dirt resistant surface

  • Water, sweat, and dirt resistant keeping your wallet in like-new condition for years
  • Guaranteed not to wear & tear over time like a traditional leather or canvas wallet
  • Ready to withstand any activities

6. Designed in Malibu, California. USA. 

  • Designed in the city known for their beautiful beaches and home of the riches
  • Premium quality without the luxury price tag, because style shouldn't break the bank.

 

Every aspect of the GO Wallet was designed to keep up with your GO-GETTER lifestyle, making it as practical as it is stylish and up-to-date with modern tech.

Our sleek design means it slips discreetly into any front pocket, making it ideal for those who are constantly on the go.

Its minimal look provides a sophisticated yet bold style boost to your everyday living.

Our brushed and matte aero-grade aluminum build makes it durable enough for any GO-GETTER's venture and our RFID-blocking + tracking technology means you can keep your cards safe and secure when you are on the go.

We set out to create a companion to your passionate living. But more than anything, we created a simple way to define your lifestyle. 

Field-tested to the limits.

We listened to real GO-GETTER's and concluded that nothing was more important than style, convenience, and functionality. GO-GETTER's have put our wallet to the test and their feedback has perfected our wallet, here's what some of them had to say:

 

The GO Wallet comes in 8 different colors: BLK, RED, GLD, BLU, OLV, NVY, GRY, AND SLVR. For each color, you have the option to select a matte or brushed aluminum finish. Important note: brushed SLVR not available.

BLK

RED

GLD

NVY

BLU

OLV

GRY

SLVR

Every detail has been used as an opportunity to set new standards in modern design, quality, and function, ensuring it will deliver uncompromising performance in any situation. 

At the core of the GO wallet design is a premium metal frame made out of 6061-T6 space-grade aluminum and held together by an expandable elastic band, making it the most durable and versatile wallet in the market. 

It's CNC'd and shaped through aluminum extrusion to the exact size of a credit card, removing dead volume, and reinforced down to the atomic level. Once anodized, it comes out in 8 different colors and finished off with a choice of 2 textured matte or brushed finishes. We perfected the GO from the inside-out with smooth, polished surfaces and beveled edges. The GO Wallet is then officially brought to life once we laser-engrave our signature hourglass logo.

Our production process involved several amounts of prototypes and testing. We have performed extensive research to partner with the best manufacturers and engineers in the industry to help us design the best wallet possible, keep the quality of our products superior, and maintain a smooth production. We have performed pre-production runs without issues and are confident in starting production immediately once the campaign ends. 

 

 

We launched our product on Kickstarter because we wanted the freedom to run our company exactly how we want. The funds we raise on Kickstarter will make it possible for us to continue scaling our company and developing products without seeking venture capital. With the power of the Kickstarter and Indiegogo community, we can continue to do what we love: fusing style & function in everything we make. Above all, we create with the dream of fulfilling our ultimate mission: to inspire you to Create Your Reality. Thank you for riding along on this incredible journey. We'll see you at the top. 

 

 

Hit us up! We're here to quickly provide you with the info you need & answer any question you may have. Send our team an email at support@go-getterco.com or send us a message on our Facebook page. You can also click here to open up Facebook messenger immediately and send us a message. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

 

Shipping

We ship worldwide and have taken steps to ensure the lowest shipping cost. For our customers in the US, domestic US shipping is free via USPS first class mail. For our international customers, there is a $15 USD shipping fee via USPS first class mail.

International backers are responsible for customs duty/fees/VAT charges upon delivery as a result of the specific country’s local tax code. Additional info regarding duties/VAT can be found by researching your local law.

When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package. If our shipping carrier attempts to deliver to your provided destination and the package returns to our headquarter (either because you weren't there, the wrong address was provided, or you moved without telling us), it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. 

Completing your order

1. Once the campaign ends, we'll send you a survey with our pledge manager partner CrowdOx. Through this survey, you will be able to pick which color you want (if you haven't already), add any more products if you'd like, and verify your shipping address.

2. If we reach our funding goal, you will be charged for your products. If you decided to add any additional products through our CrowdOx survey, you'll be charged a couple of days later.

3. Once your survey is completed, your order is marked ready to ship.

4. We will constantly keep you updated about the status of your shipments through our campaign updates and will send you a tracking number as soon as your package is shipped to you.

Product warranty

If we can't fix/repair a manufacturing defect, we will replace the GO Wallet. Please note that scratches, damages caused by accident, neglect, lost or stolen items, and other blemishes that occur from normal everyday use will not fall under the product warranty. The GO Tracker card is not included in the product warranty.

Return policy

We offer a 30 return policy. If you are ever not 100% satisfied with the quality of our product within 30 days of receiving it, simply send it back and we will refund you the product cost, no questions asked.
