Premium polyester rubber latex band keeps your cards snug & secure yet accessible.
Carry as much or as little as you need up to 15 cards without elastic stretching out
Replaceable band, backed by our lifetime warranty.
5. Water, sweat, and dirt resistant surface

Water, sweat, and dirt resistant keeping your wallet in like-new condition for years
Guaranteed not to wear & tear over time like a traditional leather or canvas wallet
Ready to withstand any activities
6. Designed in Malibu, California. USA. 
Designed in the city known for their beautiful beaches and home of the riches
Premium quality without the luxury price tag, because style shouldn't break the bank.
 Every aspect of the GO Wallet was designed to keep up with your GO-GETTER lifestyle, making it as practical as it is stylish and up-to-date with modern tech.Our sleek design means it slips discreetly into any front pocket, making it ideal for those who are constantly on the go.Its minimal look provides a sophisticated yet bold style boost to your everyday living.Our brushed and matte aero-grade aluminum build makes it durable enough for any GO-GETTER's venture and our RFID-blocking + tracking technology means you can keep your cards safe and secure when you are on the go.We set out to create a companion to your passionate living. But more than anything, we created a simple way to define your lifestyle. Field-tested to the limits.We listened to real GO-GETTER's and concluded that nothing was more important than style, convenience, and functionality. GO-GETTER's have put our wallet to the test and their feedback has perfected our wallet, here's what some of them had to say:



 
The GO Wallet comes in 8 different colors: BLK, RED, GLD, BLU, OLV, NVY, GRY, AND SLVR. For each color, you have the option to select a matte or brushed aluminum finish. Important note: brushed SLVR not available.BLKREDGLDNVYBLU
OLVGRY
SLVREvery detail has been used as an opportunity to set new standards in modern design, quality, and function, ensuring it will deliver uncompromising performance in any situation. At the core of the GO wallet design is a premium metal frame made out of 6061-T6 space-grade aluminum and held together by an expandable elastic band, making it the most durable and versatile wallet in the market. It's CNC'd and shaped through aluminum extrusion to the exact size of a credit card, removing dead volume, and reinforced down to the atomic level. Once anodized, it comes out in 8 different colors and finished off with a choice of 2 textured matte or brushed finishes. We perfected the GO from the inside-out with smooth, polished surfaces and beveled edges. The GO Wallet is then officially brought to life once we laser-engrave our signature hourglass logo.Our production process involved several amounts of prototypes and testing. We have performed extensive research to partner with the best manufacturers and engineers in the industry to help us design the best wallet possible, keep the quality of our products superior, and maintain a smooth production. We have performed pre-production runs without issues and are confident in starting production immediately once the campaign ends.   We launched our product on Kickstarter because we wanted the freedom to run our company exactly how we want. The funds we raise on Kickstarter will make it possible for us to continue scaling our company and developing products without seeking venture capital. With the power of the Kickstarter and Indiegogo community, we can continue to do what we love: fusing style & function in everything we make. Above all, we create with the dream of fulfilling our ultimate mission: to inspire you to Create Your Reality. Thank you for riding along on this incredible journey. We'll see you at the top.   Hit us up! We're here to quickly provide you with the info you need & answer any question you may have. Send our team an email at support@go-getterco.com or send us a message on our Facebook page. You can also click here to open up Facebook messenger immediately and send us a message. We'll get back to you within 24 hours. ShippingWe ship worldwide and have taken steps to ensure the lowest shipping cost. For our customers in the US, domestic US shipping is free via USPS first class mail. For our international customers, there is a $15 USD shipping fee via USPS first class mail.International backers are responsible for customs duty/fees/VAT charges upon delivery as a result of the specific country’s local tax code. Additional info regarding duties/VAT can be found by researching your local law.When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package. If our shipping carrier attempts to deliver to your provided destination and the package returns to our headquarter (either because you weren't there, the wrong address was provided, or you moved without telling us), it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. Completing your order1. Once the campaign ends, we'll send you a survey with our pledge manager partner CrowdOx. Through this survey, you will be able to pick which color you want (if you haven't already), add any more products if you'd like, and verify your shipping address.2. If we reach our funding goal, you will be charged for your products. If you decided to add any additional products through our CrowdOx survey, you'll be charged a couple of days later.3. Once your survey is completed, your order is marked ready to ship.4. We will constantly keep you updated about the status of your shipments through our campaign updates and will send you a tracking number as soon as your package is shipped to you.Product warrantyIf we can't fix/repair a manufacturing defect, we will replace the GO Wallet. Please note that scratches, damages caused by accident, neglect, lost or stolen items, and other blemishes that occur from normal everyday use will not fall under the product warranty. The GO Tracker card is not included in the product warranty.Return policyWe offer a 30 return policy. If you are ever not 100% satisfied with the quality of our product within 30 days of receiving it, simply send it back and we will refund you the product cost, no questions asked.

story:
A lot of existing transitional lenses out there either require time to react to light (photochromic lenses) or require you to find and click a certain button. Zetta² has electrochromic technology with a motion sensor where you can control the tint level in 0.1 sec by a simple touch.

 

You don’t want to bother yourself to change the tint? That’s Fine

 Zetta² has an automatic mode which instantly recognizes the light condition of surroundings and changes the tint instantly. You can switch modes between manual to auto by putting your finger on the sensor for 3 seconds. 

 


Sunglasses should do their job. Zetta² provides 99.9% UV protection. Even with our unique tint technology, we still thought that eyes protection should be a priority for you while enjoying your favorite activities.

 

 

Zetta² uses polycarbonate lenses and Nylon TR90 Frame which are highly durable against impacts, and lightweight. We have done several safety tests such as impact-resistant and optical radiation tests to ensure our sunglasses are safe to wear and optimized for outdoor activities.

 

 

Zetta² is water resistant to sweat, rain, and splashes of water.

 

 

 

 

 

 


 




 

We will ship our product when the campaign is over. Please remind that your shipping fee may vary depending on your location and custom fees may apply . Below is an estimation of the shipping costs based on the latest information provided by logistic companies. 

UPDATE ON EUROPE SHIPPING!
There are currently delivery restriction regards to European Countries due to the lithium battery in our product. As DHL will be the ONLY option as of now shipping cost maybe fairly high, we will keep you updated once this has been resolved. 

 

 

 


We are Zetta² global team from SNRD(Second Round). SNRD is originally a brand from Spocom which is a subsidiary of OGK Group. You might not be familiar with OGK Group, but they are a major sunglasses and goggles manufacturer/supplier of Oakley and other major global brands as well. SNRD has been spending years in R&D to satisfy customers and create more opportunities to deliver value.

Our products aim towards outdoor activities mostly. We tested our products numerous times with various professional sports players to check whether it is ideal to wear them or not. We believe SNRD sunglasses distinctly differ from any other fashion sunglasses brand, because of the world-class eyewear technology driven by the OGK group with sophisticated design and fit proven by our former customers.



We provide our products to most optical shops in South Korea, including the largest online shopping sites such as Murasaki Sports, Wizwid, Hiphoper, Wconcept and so on. Zetta² is the new product that we have spent time and sweat on with new innovative technology.

We hope you love Zetta²

 

 

 

 



Risk & Challenge

As a company who loves and enjoys our work of creating sunglasses, we continuously work hard to get the product ready for Indiegogo. These are the risks that we can think of,

 Although we plan to deliver our product worldwide on a planned schedule, sometimes little crazy things happen such as customs clearance, shipment gets lost or local situations in your region. These may cause a delay.

story:
Who are you guys?

We are two long-time friends who have both been watch fanatics since were were kids. Finally, in 2017, we launched the Mission Watch Company. If you'd really like to dig into our origin story, feel free to click here. 

Why should we trust you to make a great watch?

Because this isn't our first rodeo:

  • Our first watch, the Mission 1 sold out. The Mission 1 was released in 2019, a USD $800 watch that was extremely well-received.  Our first customers can be found all over the world and that watch is now a collector's item.   
  • Our second watch, the Mission 2 (nicknamed "Scout") was released in 2020 and continues to sell. The Mission 2 can be seen on wrists all over the world. 

Why did you design the Mission 3?

Three years as a microbrand watch company, and this is our third watch.  For the Mission 3 "Solen" we wanted to create a dive watch that didn't look like every other dive watch on the market. 

We love dive watches. 

We own dive watches. 

We didn't want to make a simple copy of the other popular 200 meters dive watches. 

We managed to build that watch without straying from our Mission design aesthetic and we believe that we have built another watch that people will love to wear. Whether you're taking the Mission 3 in the water, on a hike or on a run, or just banging it around the great outdoors, this is a watch that fits your day perfectly.

We nicknamed the Mission 3 "Solen" because it's Swedish for "the sun."

After the year we've all had, wouldn't some sun on your wrist be a nice thing?

What are the specs on the Mission 3?

The Mission 3 is the largest of the three watches we at Mission Watch Company have made. It is still an excellent size for any watch enthusiast. 

  • Case: 41 mm, 316L sand-brushed stainless steel case.

  • Case thickness: 12.5mm

  • Water resistance: Warranty to 200 meters / 20 ATM. During quality control the watch successfully passed a test to 300 meters/30 ATM.    

  • Bezel: Unidirectional, vintage-inspired

  • Crystal: Flat sapphire glass.

  • Dial: Pantone “Illuminating Yellow” - 2021 Pantone Color of the Year. 

  • Dial diameter: 31.75mm

  • Lume: Luminova C3

  • Strap: Genuine leather with water-resistant stitched canvas overlay. Buckle with laser etched logo.

  • Crown: Screw-down

  • Case Back: Stainless steel screw case back with laser Mission Solen logo

  • Movement: Miyota 2015 Quartz Movement, Made in Japan 

  • Lug width: 21mm

  • Lug-to-lug: 50.5mm

Has the Mission 3 been reviewed?

Yes.  Here's a video from the Columbia Watch Society. 

Do you have any more videos we can check out?

Yes.  Check out the Mission 3 caught in the wild.

Anything else we should Know?

When you buy a Mission watch, you are joining an international family of watch lovers. We always appreciate it when you send us pics of you wearing our watch so we can share it on social media.

We are really excited to wear the Mission 3 and hope that you are too.

story:
GREAT NEWS!

Thank you very much for your initial pledges. To show our appreciation, every Early Bird backer will receive our gift set FOR FREE!  (see Updates for further details)

 

 

How Is The RMX2 Mask Revolutionary?

We are proud to introduce our newest invention: a reusable face mask made with Hydro-X: a bionic material which consists of titanium particles and upcycled performance fibers. With our top of the line nanotechnology filtration membrane, the middle layer of our mask filters 99.9% of common contaminants as small as 0.075 microns. 

 

MAIN FEATURES

Everyone knows that face masks can be uncomfortable, suffocating, and unbreathable, so we have reinvented and researched how to change this by researching new fibers to use so that the experience is enhanced greatly.

Our skin-friendly fabric is silky smooth and has excellent moisture regain properties, especially for people who have dry skin or have to wear masks for long periods of time.

 

REUSABILITY

Our mission is very simple: to create a mask that protects the wearer, and as well protect the environment. Our mask is reusable up to 200 times, as our goal is to help reduce the use of disposable masks, which is causing a great pollution problem.

 

COST COMPARISONS

 

Our mask offers high protection, and is reusable up to 200 times to reduce the use of disposable masks to reduce pollution.

 

 

USER REVIEWS

For the athletes' full review,  CLICK HERE

 

RMX2 PROTECTION

The mid-layer is our RmorX™ Nano Filtration Layer. It is an ultra-thin, nanoporous membrane that filters out 99.9% of particulate matters larger than 0.075μm (including, but not limited to: dust, smog, ash, mites, and allergens).

 

Each square millimeter of the membrane can have billions of pores, with pore diameter between 0.1μm-0.5μm, so water vapors may pass through while water droplets cannot. With 70nm membrane physical filtration, utilizing the nanoporous structure of the membrane, 99.9% of particulate matters larger than 0.075μm can be filtered. Nanoporous membrane is also waterproof, air permeable, and oil resistant.  [please scroll further down to see our nano filter certifications] 

 

 

STRUCTURE & COMPONENTS

The RMX2 is a face mask that is engineered to provide superior protection and comfort. Our mask is composed of three layers, each with its unique properties: 

 

INCREASED BREATHING SPACE

Many reusable masks in the market only care about the design of the mask, neglecting important factors such as the fabric properties. Furthermore, most cloth face masks have one problem: as the user inhales, the inner layer fabric would suck into the nose, making it hard to breathe. With our RMX2 mask, we came up with a unique nose support embedded on the inner fabric, which gives an arch to avoid the fabric from touching the nose -- giving the user extra breathing space.

 

PROBLEMS FROM WEARING MASKS

Many people are facing problems with “maskne," a term used to describe acne in the area a mask is worn. Maskne flare-up is triggered by occlusion and sweat under the mask.

Our silk-like inner layer provides excellent moisture management and skin-care properties as the fiber is composed of collagen peptide amino acid from upcycled fish scales. Its features include moisture permeability, soft and luster as silk.

DESIGN CONCEPT

It’s obvious that we now wear masks everyday: going to the grocery store, on walks and run, going on public transports. In fact, many believe that this is part of our culture now, and that mask-wearing will never go away. Our team wanted to come up with a face mask with great protection, and at the same time come up with cool designs and colors. With that in mind, we have designed eye-catching colorful camouflage patterns as part of our identity.

 

AVAILABLE COLORS

 

GOOD FOR EVERYDAY USE

 

AND FOR SPORTS TOO!

 

WHO IS MOST AT RISK?

We are all at risk from airborne contaminants. Around 91% of the world’s population lives in places where air quality levels exceed WHO (World Health Organization) limits.

 

Researchers at the University of Bristol assessed the airborne survival of contagious germs in aerosol droplets from coughs and sneezes. They can spread further and faster than you may think.

 

Lab results show that the filtration level of the RMX2 remains at a high level after 200 washes.

 

We strongly encourage the use of reusable face masks. According to the US National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) and Woods Hole Sea Grant, it is estimated that it takes approximately 450 years to decompose a disposable mask. 

 

THE IMPACT OF AIR POLLUTION

According to the World Health Organization (WHO), air pollution is a major environmental risk to health.  

 

SOURCING & MANUFACTURING

Our masks are all made in Taiwan. Our fabric suppliers are producing a variety of functional and eco-friendly fabrics as Taiwan is known to develop the latest technologies in textiles. All of our factories are carefully selected to ensure high-quality control from sample to shipment. 

 

OUR FIBER CERTIFICATIONS

All of our fabrics are tested for harmful substances. We make sure that we follow international best practices in standard-setting to ensure the quality of our products.

 

OUR NANO FILTER CERTIFICATIONS

Our filtration layer is top of the line, lab-tested, and accredited by Nelson Labs and TTRI.

 

 

WASHING INSTRUCTIONS

Our mask is reusable up to 200 times and is very easy to clean. Simply follow the washing instructions below:

 

OUR TEAM

The dedicated team spent months and months of research and testing to come up with the best possible product. Led by their Chief Scientific Consultant, Dr. Sze, who earned his Ph.D. in Physics at Johns Hopkins University -- they managed to partner up with industry leaders and innovators in nanotechnology to come up with the RMX filtration membrane. Mary, the Textile Research Lead, works with the industry’s top textile engineers and conducts cutting-edge research leading to innovations in eco-friendly fabrics.

We have been supplying to major brands such as Asics, Mizuno, A&F, and many more. In 2005, we noticed a problem in the fashion industry where most of the materials used are not eco-friendly and sustainable. So we started promoting organic materials (such as hemp, bamboo, coffee beans-made fabrics) to our clients.

 

TIMELINE

story:
The Perfect Skechbook B5. 

After the success of our first Kickstarter campaign, we received so much positive feedback and numerous requests for a larger version of The Perfect Sketchbook. In recognition of our backers’ generous support, the team is excited to introduce the new bigger and better The Perfect Sketchbook B5!.



For the complete story of our first Kickstarter campaign, click here.

The Perfect Sketchbook has been endorsed by many artists and has also been described by Huffington Post as "a sketchbook for the perfectionist". 



Complete Specification of The Perfect Sketchbook B5.

  • Size: Cover dimension: 26cm x 18cm.
  • Bind: Durable case bound. Lays flat. Proper grain flow.
  • Cover: Hard cover wrapped in recycled leather. Round corners.
  • Paper: Cold-pressed, 200 GSM Fabriano Artistico® (Traditional White-light cream) 100% cotton, mould-made, archival, tube-sized, free of animal by-products, watermarked. Both sides sized for painting. 
  • 56 Pages.
  • Ribbon & elastic band. 
  • Inner pocket at back cover.
  • Square-edged paper.
  • Deckle & hand-torn edges.
  • Personalization: For $45, $55, $110, $165, $275 & $550 perks only.
    (Please note that survey for personalization will only be send out during the making of our sketchbooks. This will be in March 2016)
How Fabriano Artistico® is made:




Tips : We set aside 900 books at special rates of $40 (without personalization) and $45 (with personalization). Multiple check-outs of these single book perks are possible on indiegogo.com



The Team: 

Erwin Lian.
(Artist and Creator of The Perfect Sketchbook)
Erwin is an artist and educator from Singapore. He travels extensively with his sketchbooks; recording visages of people he meets, places and cultures he has personally experienced. In August 2014, with the support of 881 backers, he successfully funded The Perfect Sketchbook - a pocket sized sketchbook filled with the finest watercolor paper - through Kickstarter.
(www.cherngzhi.com) 


Bynd Artisan (Collaborator & Manufacturer)
The heritage of Bynd Artisan dates back to 1945 when a book making company was set up along Mohamed Sultan Road. It was a family-run business that served a genuine need and it gradually grew beyond the boundaries of Singapore and Malaysia. Through the intervening years, the business of book-binding has changed as technology progressed. Yet at its heart, each and every book has its beginning much like in the days of old - hand-designed and prototyped by a small band of craftsmen who grew up in the trade.
Grandluxe is the parent company of Bynd Artisan.
(www.byndartisan.com)


Risks and challenges

1) Since The Perfect Sketchbook B5 is created using quality materials from all around the world, shipment of the various materials may potentially run into delays. Prices and availability of raw materials may also fluctuate. We have cushioned our budget with a modest amount to account for such events. In the event that raw materials have to be replaced (very unlikely), supporters will be updated at the soonest possible.

2) Cases of top quality paper manufacturers producing badly “sized” paper are common. While we will do our very best to ensure that all the paper we use are properly sized, there may still be situations where paper supplied to us for production is not appropriately sized and result in less than ideal outcomes when used.

3) Bynd Artisan has more than 70 years of experience in book-making. There will be regular visits paid to the manufacturing facility so that backers can be updated on the manufacturing progress accordingly.

4) While the team puts in its utmost effort in ensuring that the books are shipped on time, the shipping efficiency of local postal services at various countries are largely out of our control.

FAQs:

1. Will The Perfect Sketchbook B5 be in stores after this campaign?
This is very unlikely. Unless the demand far exceeds expectations in this campaign, producing more of The Perfect Sketchbook B5 is not yet sustainable. That’s why it’s important that you share our campaign on social media. Each of us is connected by six degrees of separation, and your ability to reach other deserving artists can help us reach retail.

2.The project has hit the target fund. Can I still back this project?
Absolutely! Hitting the target fund merely confirms production. The more funds we raise, the more books we can make and the more likely it is that we can move this towards retail. Personally, I am more interested in endorsing talented artists with the extra funds. For example, funds could be used to curate an art show with our sketchbooks. Imagine an exhibition in which the top talents can showcase their work in The Perfect Sketchbook B5.  Such an event would be spectacular.

3. Why is there different pricing for the single books? Why are some single books cheaper than the bundles?
Last year, thanks to contributions from 881 backers, The Perfect Sketchbook Pocket was funded on kickstarter.com. In recognition of our backers’ contributions, we set aside 900 books at special rates of $40 (without personalization) and $45 (with personalization). Multiple check-outs of these single book perks are possible on indiegogo.com. Earlier, a few backers wrongly informed me that multiple check-outs were impossible unless you used multiple emails. That is incorrect; I have successfully executed multiple check-outs on each perk using the same account.

4. I pledged funds and requested a personalized copy of the book. Where can I submit my personalization information?
Thank you for your pledge.  We will send out a form for you to submit your personalization information when we start making The Perfect Sketchbook B5.  Manufacturing is scheduled to occur in March 2016.

5. I donated and requested 10 books with personalization. Can I request different names/phrases/initials for those books?
Absolutely! You can personalize each book with a different name/phrase/initials. Personalization text is limited to 15 characters (including spaces).

6. Are the sketchbooks going to be all handmade?
No. Mr Chong merely demonstrated how we crafted the prototypes. Machines will be involved in the actual making of The Perfect sketchbook B5. However, page will still be hand-torn. As with our first campaign, we will document the processes involved and we will take you on a journey of bookmaking with Bynd Artisan.


Disclaimer
“Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.”

Paypal needs the above disclaimer to be displayed on the page….

Please note; We are very very confident that we will deliver to you all. 

Thank you for all your amazing support and contributions,

Erwin & Bynd Artisan

Kickstarter campaign, we received so much positive feedback and numerous
 requests for a larger version of The Perfect Sketchbook. In recognition
 of our backers’ generous support, the team is excited to introduce the 
new bigger and better The Perfect Sketchbook B5!.For the complete story of our first Kickstarter campaign,  click here.
The Perfect Sketchbook has been endorsed by many artists and has also been described by Huffington Post as "a sketchbook for the perfectionist". 





Complete Specification of The Perfect Sketchbook B5.


Size: Cover dimension: 26cm x 18cm.

Bind: Durable case bound. Lays flat. Proper grain flow.

Cover: Hard cover wrapped in recycled leather. Round corners.

Paper: Cold-pressed, 200 GSM Fabriano Artistico® (Traditional White-light cream)  100% cotton, mould-made, archival, tube-sized, free of animal by-products, watermarked. Both sides sized for painting. 

56 Pages.

Ribbon & elastic band. 
Inner pocket at back cover.
Square-edged paper.
Deckle & hand-torn edges.
Personalization: For $45, $55, $110, $165, $275 & $550 perks only.(Please note that survey for personalization will only be send out during the making of our sketchbooks. This will be in March 2016)

story:
Who Doesn’t Want A Clearer And Wider Vision?  

 

 

Fantastic Personal Cinema

MAD Gaze Vader brings entertainment to the next level!

 

Maneuver, Navigate And Unlock The Possibilities At Your Fingertips

Aside from multi-touch and voice control, another alternative – hand gesture control – will be released in December 2017. It is professional, yet fun to use with more interactions. 

 

Imagine controlling the interface like popular fictional character Tony Stark. The hand gesture control function is so fascinating that everyone needs to try!

 

 

 

SLAM Technology

SLAM (Simultaneous Localization And Mapping) is used in computer vision technologies which simultaneously keeping track of agent's real location within it. SLAM uses visual data from the physical world in shape of points to make an understanding for the machine, which jointly estimates poses and landmark positions to increase map fidelity.

 

SLAM allows machines to have an eye and understand what is around through visual input by recognizing walls, barriers and floors. It can also create a mesh of our environment to identify walls and objects in your environment allowing everything around you to be an element to interact with.  

 

Now, you can truly experience Augmented Reality, experience the powerful interaction between you, your glasses and the environment.

 

Amazing AR Gaming Experience 

With SLAM technology and a wider display, MAD Gaze Vader allows you to see and fight off waves of monsters and enemies as if they were right in front of you. It gives you a breathtaking and extraordinary modern gaming experience.

 

With hand gesture control, gaming has never been this fun. You can even invite your friends to join your squad and share this amazing gaming experience together.

 

The Best Complement To Your Drone 

Found difficulty in screen viewing while flying your drone? What you need is an advanced first-person-view (FPV) flight experience. With a transparent display, you can see the drone’s camera view under strong sunlight while simply keeping your head up. 

 

Basically It Fits Everyone 

Our core objective in the research and development of MAD Gaze Vader  is to make the product customer oriented. We understand that every individual is unique and that the product needs to be varied in terms of measurement to fit every unique self.

As MAD Gaze Vader smart glasses is a binocular viewing device, we have made lateral adjustment of the optics on Vader available to account for interpupillary distance (IPD). A correct IPD is critical to help one self to get a clear vision and at the same time to avoid uncomfortable viewing experience and eye strain. 

Focal lengths of lenses are just as important, too. No matter short-sightedness or long-sightedness, you can get corrective lens for MAD Gaze Vader from your local optical shop.

 

Extended Battery Life Is Key

We know that some applications are just more power consuming, especially the ones that require the camera, GPS or the Internet to be on. We believe that you may want a longer battery life for better endurance.

Battery capacity of Vader is increased to 1200mAh. Battery life is now extended up to 5 hours under continuous use to fulfill your actual needs and give you a better user experience.

 

Easy To Carry and Convenient To Use

MAD Gaze Vader is a new generation replacement of laptops and tablets. It is a Head-up Display (HUD) that you can simply wear for work or leisure. 

Pair With Bluetooth Device To Utilize Functionalities Better

 

 

 

 

Stay Connected

You can now receive app notifications from your phone and answer phone calls on MAD Gaze Vader through Wi-Fi.

 

MAD Gaze Vader allows you to truly multitask and not miss any piece of important information or a call on the same device.

 

More Apps And Contents Are Coming Soon

The MAD Gaze Software Team has developed some apps including utilities, games, AR and entertainment for users. Apps are already available on our MAD Store.

 

 

Developer Program

Apart from official apps, MAD Gaze Vader is also compatible with numerous third-party apps on Google Play. As MAD Gaze is based on a familiar Android development platform, developers from all over the world are welcomed to join our Developer Program and launch their apps on MAD Store for users to download. 

 

 

The Hopping Dead is a game developed by ICE Production, a member of the Developer Program. It is a first-person-view Zombie Shooting game with an excellent story setting and 3D animation.

 

 

CAMPFIRE is a location-based game where players go on adventures to discover mysterious energy sources around then all the while converting calories burnt to super power (SP). Players can form alliances in their own cities, control and breed their own avatars, and also coorporate with other players.

 

SDK For Developers

SDK is provided to developers for easy access to MAD Gaze control including multi-touch panel and buttons.

 

Haptic Feature

For a better sensation of touch to the users, haptic technology is applied on MAD Gaze Vader smart glasses. Vibrations are applied to give control feedback for better user experience.

 

Technical Specifications

 

 

 

Comparison Of MAD Gaze and Microsoft Hololens

 

Special Rewards To Indiegogo Backers

 

Timeline

 

Our Vision And Mission

The MAD Gaze team has been established since 2013. We aim to build the world’s first AR smart glasses truly for consumers.

Different from the other smart glasses, MAD Gaze smart glasses is always light weight, fashionable and easy to carry. Apart from an attractive design, MAD Gaze smart glasses is highly practical and compatible with numerous third-party apps to provide sufficient contents for users. 

We believe that a great product should also be personalized and easily adaptable for end users to enjoy better user experience. Last but not least, we believe that consumers should never settle for less. That is why MAD Gaze smart glasses is always affordable with high quality.

 

We multiply and develop our professions in augmented reality smart glasses. Every time we launch a new product, the MAD Gaze team aims to multiply the fun and satisfaction you will receive.

 

Highly Recognized By The Industry And Media

In a few years’ time, MAD Gaze has become a top-notch award-winning AR smart glasses brand worldwide.

 

 Our Team and Awards

 

Risk and Challenges

After launching Ares and X5 last year, we have already produced several runs of MAD Gaze smart glasses and have done extensive testing both from hardware and software standpoint, we have successfully delivered the products to our consumers and business clients.

We are using a standard yet stable version of Android on the current MAD Gaze. We are recruiting developers from all over the world to share their next killer app on MAD Store, and our team is also developing different apps for customers to use at the same time.

For the delivery schedule, we will try our best to stick to the original plan. If there is any potential delay, we will let you know immediately to ensure your MAD Gaze will arrive as soon as possible.

The see-through projector is mature and has already been industrialized. All the key components have already come out of production molds. Core technology in MAD Gaze is ready for high volume manufacturing using proven and expert suppliers.

The risks are therefore minimal for producing MAD Gaze in volume to deliver our Indiegogo customers.

story:
HUGE NEWS! First Prototype!!!!

We got the hand-knit sample fabrics in today and made the first prototype! The research our stellar hand-knitting team, Allie and Mirissa, did to make our prototype knit materials will allow our US-based manufacturing team to recreate the patterns of all four sweaters that made Bernie's original mittens using recycled yarn!! And we'll be making them all in our three person maker shop just outside Chicago!

 

More news! Limited edition!

We created this project based on Jen's initial announcement that she wouldn't be making mittens. We wanted the maker community to step up for her and do it right. Now that she has announced an upcoming partnership with Vermont Teddy Bear, we're converting our project to a limited run so that by the time her new designs launch we can be cheering her on! This small batch will be ready to ship soon, and there's only a few left! Get in while you can, and sign up for more great mitten updates from Jen Ellis and Vermont Teddy Bear here. For more info check out our live announcement on Good Day Chicago!

 

 

We're making Bernie mittens! America's fashion icon and senator Bernie Sanders has once again raised the bar for all of us. His bespoke, one-of-a-kind mittens, that are no longer available, have captivated the world. We're making replicas with sustainable materials and giving 1/3 of all profits to teachers via DonorsChoose in honor of the original maker, a teacher from Vermont. 

How are we going to replicate the exact mitten?

We're going to have knit fabric made based on the pictures of Bernie's mittens to recreate each of the patterns. Industrial knitting machines are used to make socks, scarves, hats, and even the materials for those original sweaters! To keep the spirit of the reclaimed sweater we will use recycled yarn! Here's a great little video about the process made by one of our possible vendors PearSox so you can get a glimpse into what that might look like. Then we'll take those four custom-made knit fabrics (the brown, tan and cream for the back of the mitten, green, white, and gray on the inside palm, blue on the top palm, and maroon on the cuff), along with a warm recycled fleece for the lining, and make them into mittens in our Chicago-area workshop. 

In the news!

John Williams from Chicago's WGN! One of Chicago's most popular radio hosts had us call in for a chat!

Fox 32 Chicago visited the shop to see the pieces of our first prototype.

Why are we doing this?

Because sharing laughter might be the most powerful way for us to unify our country.

Who We Are

My wife Jess & I founded Allegory Handcrafted Goods in 2012 with the help of a couple hundred awesome Kickstarter backers. We're a maker-business and have launched and fulfilled 16 of our own projects and consulted on numerous others. We've done several projects with reclaimed wood from various moments in American history. We work with reclaimed, recycled, and sustainable materials with a story.

Our mission is to raise the bar for what people expect from products and brands. We believe that products should be made to last, have a story you can be proud of, and have a positive impact on all the people they touch along the way. 

Now, back to the Bernie Mittens...

 

Mitten Sizing

  • Three sizes available (small, medium, large). Take your best guess initially because you can change it before we start production. Your choice at checkout here just gives us data to plan with.

  • At the close of the project, we'll provide a printable size chart so you can choose the right fit for you.

  • You'll choose your final size(s) in the post campaign survey powered by BackerKit which will be delivered by email after funding closes.

 

Manufacturing Plan & Timeline

We're fortunate to have a very experienced design team that has made every type of glove under the sun. As a result, we have experience with multiple vendors for each of the primary components of the manufacturing process. The knit exterior and fleece lining will be 100% American-made and we will be sewing the mittens themselves in our workshop just outside Chicago. Hopefully we sell enough mittens that we can add some additional makers to our team!

We're already well on our way to finalizing the pattern and securing quotes from the knit and fleece material vendors. We expect to be able to give them the go-ahead as soon as the project funds clear and we can pay their deposits. From there, they estimate they will need a month to produce the knit and fleece materials. Once the materials are complete, we'll begin the sewing in our workshop right away and will ship in batches based on when you ordered. We expect the first orders to be shipping early this spring.

 

Giving Back

Here's how we're going to manage the process of donating 1/3 of the project's profits to teachers on DonorsChoose.

  • Jen from Vermont (OG mitten maker) gets dibs. Jen, if you have a DonorsChoose project, or create one, please send it our way at service@allegorygoods.com!
  • All backers can submit projects from DonorsChoose, starting when we get confirmation that the finished mittens are en route to our warehouse.
  • We will publish a final list of donation recipients and financials from the project after all the rewards have been shipped and costs are finalized. 

 

What are Benie and Jen up to now?

Senator Sanders and Jen are not affiliated with this project, but they are both doing such cool things with this viral sensation, raising money for charity and spreading the joy!

Senator Sanders is selling some cool sweaters with the meme on them here. In a NPR interview published on January 28 he says he's raise $1.8 million for charity! So awesome!

Also, as of January 28, Jen is also starting a new venture to benefit charity with Bernie mitten themed products. Her first collaboration will be with Vermont sock maker, Darn Tough Vermont. She's raising start-up money for this new venture here. Check it out!

Now that she has announced an upcoming partnership with Vermont Teddy Bear, we're converting our project to a limited run so that by the time her new designs launch we can be cheering her on! This small batch will be ready to ship soon, and there's only a few left! Get in while you can, and sign up for more great mitten updates from Jen Ellis and Vermont Teddy Bear here. For more info check out our live announcement on Good Day Chicago!
  We're making Bernie mittens! America's fashion icon and senator Bernie Sanders has once again raised the bar for all of us. His bespoke, one-of-a-kind mittens, that are no longer available, have captivated the world. We're making replicas with sustainable materials and giving 1/3 of all profits to teachers via DonorsChoose in honor of the original maker, a teacher from Vermont. How are we going to replicate the exact mitten?We're going to have knit fabric made based on the pictures of Bernie's mittens to recreate each of the patterns. Industrial knitting machines are used to make socks, scarves, hats, and even the materials for those original sweaters! To keep the spirit of the reclaimed sweater we will use recycled yarn! Here's a great little video about the process made by one of our possible vendors PearSox so you can get a glimpse into what that might look like. Then we'll take those four custom-made knit fabrics (the brown, tan and cream for the back of the mitten, green, white, and gray on the inside palm, blue on the top palm, and maroon on the cuff), along with a warm recycled fleece for the lining, and make them into mittens in our Chicago-area workshop. In the news!John Williams from Chicago's WGN! One of Chicago's most popular radio hosts had us call in for a chat!Fox 32 Chicago visited the shop to see the pieces of our first prototype.Why are we doing this?Because sharing laughter might be the most powerful way for us to unify our country.Who We AreMy wife Jess & I founded Allegory Handcrafted Goods in 2012 with the help of a couple hundred awesome Kickstarter backers. We're a maker-business and have launched and fulfilled 16 of our own projects and consulted on numerous others. We've done several projects with reclaimed wood from various moments in American history. We work with reclaimed, recycled, and sustainable materials with a story.Our mission is to raise the bar for what people expect from products and brands. We believe that products should be made to last, have a story you can be proud of, and have a positive impact on all the people they touch along the way. Now, back to the Bernie Mittens... Mitten Sizing
Three sizes available (small, medium, large). Take your best guess initially because you can change it before we start production. Your choice at checkout here just gives us data to plan with.
At the close of the project, we'll provide a printable size chart so you can choose the right fit for you.
You'll choose your final size(s) in the post campaign survey powered by BackerKit which will be delivered by email after funding closes.
 Manufacturing Plan & TimelineWe're fortunate to have a very experienced design team that has made every type of glove under the sun. As a result, we have experience with multiple vendors for each of the primary components of the manufacturing process. The knit exterior and fleece lining will be 100% American-made and we will be sewing the mittens themselves in our workshop just outside Chicago. Hopefully we sell enough mittens that we can add some additional makers to our team!We're already well on our way to finalizing the pattern and securing quotes from the knit and fleece material vendors. We expect to be able to give them the go-ahead as soon as the project funds clear and we can pay their deposits. From there, they estimate they will need a month to produce the knit and fleece materials. Once the materials are complete, we'll begin the sewing in our workshop right away and will ship in batches based on when you ordered. We expect the first orders to be shipping early this spring. Giving BackHere's how we're going to manage the process of donating 1/3 of the project's profits to teachers on DonorsChoose.
Jen from Vermont (OG mitten maker) gets dibs. Jen, if you have a DonorsChoose project, or create one, please send it our way at service@allegorygoods.com!
All backers can submit projects from DonorsChoose, starting when we get confirmation that the finished mittens are en route to our warehouse.
We will publish a final list of donation recipients and financials from the project after all the rewards have been shipped and costs are finalized. 
 What are Benie and Jen up to now?Senator Sanders and Jen are not affiliated with this project, but they are both doing such cool things with this viral sensation, raising money for charity and spreading the joy!Senator Sanders is selling some cool sweaters with the meme on them here. In a NPR interview published on January 28 he says he's raise $1.8 million for charity! So awesome!Also, as of January 28, Jen is also starting a new venture to benefit charity with Bernie mitten themed products. Her first collaboration will be with Vermont sock maker, Darn Tough Vermont. She's raising start-up money for this new venture here. Check it out!

story:
Easily convert from high heels to flats with a snap of a button.

Transform the shoes between Stilettos, Chunkies and Flats, 3 level of heights and over 60 designs and colours

 

How does it work ? 

Slide the button to remove the heels !

 The strength of locks are tested by Satra UK. The soles are flexible and your body weight bright it down, making it flats! 

 

Review 

Watch Lucy Corsetry's thorough review of Mestrae Interchangeable Heels here 
 

 

SELECTIONS

 

Each Shoes or Boots comes with

a) 4 pairs of heels

  • Flats,
  • 3.5" Chunkies,
  • 3.5" Stilettos and
  • 2.5" Chunkies

b) A heels bag made out of pineapple fibre 

 

 

4 free pairs of interchangeable accessory heels with each purchase of shoes and boots!

Designs will be send at the end of the campaign for the selection process 

 

 

Are my high heels trying to kill me?

Re-imagine a future that bridges fashion and comfort

Read the revolutionary Interchangeable Heels technology that is changing the footwear industry  via Arianna Huffington's Thrive Global here 

 
 

The Impact

Choice

High heels has been around for over 50 years but the technology hasn't changed much . It has taken a revolution - celebrities go barefoot on red carpet, women  switch to sneakers for the obvious reasons as there are no other alternatives . Time for technology to enhance women's needs and give women the choice to be fashionable and comfortable 

 

Travel light

All you will need is to carry a bag of heels 

 

Sustainable to the environment

80bn products are manufactured every year and most of it end up in landfill. Since heels are what tends to wear out most in shoes, with Mestrae's multiple heels with one shoes,  you can wear them longer. To add on to our plight, all our heels bag are now all made out of pineapple fibre. Let’s protect our environment together

 

Size Guide 

 

About Mestrae 

Contact US 

 

***Talk to US***

  • Website 
  • Facebook
  • Instagram 
  • Twitter 

 

Read about

  • Mestrae Gives Back 
  • In the News 
  • Reviews 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

For the past months, our team has been working day and night to sort production and logistics. We work with handmade shoemakers in Malaysia with an average of 30 years experience in shoemaking skills and are looking into expanding manufacturing overseas (Europe, South America and Asia).

We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risk and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we are met with these, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you.

story:
MANILI – MAASTRICHT.AMSTERDAM.NIZZA.LISSABON.

Streetwear with European statement! That’s MANILI – and to start the streetwear brand for young people, there is nothing better than a classic denim jacket for every occasion!

  • We want to give young people streetwear with European statement!
  • Streetwear you can wear for any occasion
  • Always with a connection to the European way of living, yet not obvious but implemented in fashion components.

Streetwear for young people who want to live free, meet new people, enjoy life, like to party and wear classic streetwear.

 

 

About the Denim Jacket

Our first product is the denim jacket "European Bull". A high quality jacket (loose fit) with a nice backstick of a bull. The European stars are artfully embedded in the bull. Combined with the small accent of our statement patch “Celebrate.European.Style”.

Composition

  • high quality denim
  • 100 % cotton
  • back embroidery in the shape of a bull with the EU stars
  • Patch with the inscription "Celebrate. European. Style."
  • Patch with the Manili logo

The presented jacket is a prototype. The final product will look mostly the same. But of course a few small changes are possible.

 

 

The Story behind the "European Bull"

Origins of Europe

Our denim jacket alludes to the founding story of the European continent. According to Greek mythology, Zeus fell in love with a king's daughter named Europa. One day she was playing on the beach with a herd of bulls that Hermes, the messenger of the gods, had rounded up there.

Kidnapped by Zeus

Zeus transformed himself into a white bull, played with Europa, had her mounted on his back and kidnapped her. He swam with her to the Greek island of Crete. There he revealed himself and had three sons with her: Minos, Rhadamanthys and Sarpedon.

Processing of the Founding Legend

Our denim jacket processes this story and allows you to wear the founding legend of Europe in the form of a denim jacket.

 

 

The Story behind MANILI

The name Manili is composed of the first letters of the cities where the founding treaties of the EU were signed: MAASTRICHT.AMSTERDAM.NICE.LISBON.

We stand for young people who want to live the European feeling! We want to express this through streetwear! Wear a jacket, make a statement. Celebrate European Style!

 

 

About these two crazy Europe lovers

Manili, that's us, Elias Barth and Adrian Bär. We are two students from the south of Germany studying Economics & Communications.

Besides the products which are produced for the casual sector, it is important to us to communicate the possibilities of a European Community to young people in particular. The openness, cultural diversity, and interpersonal encounters bring young people forward, enable new discoveries and unite us all.

As a brand, we stand for openness and these values - and in doing so, we combine a fashionable streetwear style with a European statement. We want young people to come together, have fun, party and exploit the given possibilities of Europe together.

 

Where You Can Find Us

Instagram: www.instagram.com/manili.de/

Facebook: www.facebook.com/manili.de

Web: www.manili.de

story:
Shall Not Be Infringed Premium Patches

Hey! It's The Pholosopher here. I am excited to announce my first foray into producing physical products promoting a freer future for firearms culture.

I've been making videos and memes since 2016 and have even run a few Indiegogo campaigns in support of a music video and a couple of films.

Now, I am expanding my creative output to physical products that promote individual liberty and the right to bear arms.

I hope to make this a regular thing with NEW, custom patches and other special merch each month in support of my messaging work.

Products

In this first offering, I have AMAZING 3-inch square patches promoting the right to bear arms: one with an AR and one with an AK, each sporting the "Shall Not Be Infringed" rallying cry.

They are 100% embroidered with hook and loop backing for easy placement on backpacks and totes.

 

I also have a unique, 3-inch acrylic keychain featuring a chibi of my No Step on Snek cosplay character from Voluntaryist - The Comic Series.

Production

I have already produced the products and they are ready to ship once the campaign closes fully, so you can back with confidence.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't have change to spare, you can share the campaign to let others know that there are some AWESOME patches and keychains available, the purchase of which helps me produce more content educating others on the right to bear arms and human freedom!

So thank you for your support!

~Pho ^^
