story:
Available for a limited time, and significant discount on Indiegogo, this innovative, high quality hoodie is made right here in America, and is the most premium hoodie you'll ever own. It's so well-made, we guarantee it for 5-years! Ships in November

Four years ago, we launched the original Adv3nture Hoodie, an innovative hoodie that was heralded for its style, comfort and design.

 

Now we're back with TWO NEW HOODIES. With the success our brand has experienced, we're back with hoodies that are more refined, more comfortable, and have improvements to our past customers' favorite innovations.

THE ADV3NTURE HOODIE and THE CLASSIC HOODIE are hand-crafted in America, from the ground up. They start with American cotton grown in North Carolina, zippers made in Georgia, and the final product being cut and sewn in California. Our new hoodies (and as of 2020, ALL of our  products) are made by hard-working Americans, like you.

We're so proud of how well our hoodies are made that we guarantee our workmanship. If within the first five years of owning your new hoodie, it rips, tears, or the zipper breaks, we'll mend it for free. This guarantee is is applicable for domestic (USA) customers AND international customers.

Our ADV3NTURE Hoodie brings back everyone's favorite features and innovations in a more refined and durable version of our original hoodie. It's designed to be your favorite everyday hoodie with comfort, stylishness and quality at the forefront. It has innovative construction elements, like a three-panel hood, over-locking seams, and our proprietary French terry loop fabric.

Our CLASSIC Hoodie has the same silhouette as the new ADV3NTURE Hoodie, including the comfort, durability, and construction. We removed some of the innovations of from the ADV3NTURE hoodie. What we ended up with was a stylish, premium hoodie with just the right number of features and enough colors for every day of the week!

 

The ADV3NTURE Hoodie and the CLASSIC Hoodie have the same dimensions and measurements and are made with the same fabric and materials. Below is a comparison of their features.

We are offering the ADV3NTURE and CLASSIC hoodies in EIGHT colors. There are no stretch goals, where we need to raise a certain amount in this campaign before they become available. ALL colors, named after California landmarks, are available once the campaign reaches its funding goal. At the end of the campaign, you will be emailed a survey (to the email associated with your Indiegogo account) where you'll tell us the color(s) and size(s) that you'd like us to send you.

If you'd like to add additional hoodies to your pledge once the campaign is over, you can do so easily in your survey. 

Our Catalina hoodie was inspired by the blue waters around Santa Catalina, an island off the coast of Los Angeles. One of California’s Channel Islands, it's known for its wildlife, dive sites and Mt. Orizaba, its highest peak.

Our Humboldt green hood was inspired by the green hills of Humboldt county, 270 miles north of San Francisco. Humboldt County is a densely forested region with nearly 1,500,000 acres of forest land and contains dozens of national, state, and local parks. They are also know for a particular green crop, but that had nothing to do with the name... we promise.

Our Mojave color was inspired by the sands of Mojave National Preserve, the third largest of the America's National Parks. Singing sand dunes, cinder cone volcanoes, and a large Joshua tree forest are found within this 1.6-million-acre park. A visit to its canyons, mountains, and mesas will reveal long-abandoned mines, homesteads,  rock-walled military outposts, and an abandoned train depot.

This color was inspired by the wines of the Napa Valley, widely considered one of the top wine regions in the US. Visiting one of the valley's wineries every day would take over a year! More than four hundred wineries and grows many different grape varieties including Cabernet Sauvignon, Chardonnay, Merlot, Zinfandel, and other popular varietals.

Rising nearly 5,000 feet above Yosemite Valley and 8,800 feet above sea level, Half Dome is a Yosemite icon. This hoodie is a tribute to this impressive natural monument. Considered to be unclimbable in 1865, Half Dome was first summitted in 1875. The south face of Half Dome is now "conquered" by thousand of people every year.

Half Dome is the only hoodie that is not 100% cotton. There is 5% polyester woven into the outside layer of the fabric for the athletic heathered appearance. The interior of the fabric, the French terry loop that sits against the body, is 100% cotton.

This color was inspired by California's Lassen Volcanic National Park, home to steaming fumaroles, meadows freckled with wildflowers, clear mountain lakes, and numerous volcanoes. Jagged peaks tell the story of its eruptive past while hot water continues to shape the land. Lassen Volcanic offers opportunities to discover the wonder and mysteries of volcanoes and hot water for visitors willing to explore the undiscovered.

This hoodie is a tribute to the US Navy, which has a strong presence in California, and all branches of the military. Cheers to all of the brave men and women who risk their lives to protect our way of life! For all serving, and who have served, we greatly appreciate your service and sacrifice.

This hoodie is a tribute to Black Rock, a lava rock outcropping at the north end of Ka'anapali Beach. The Hawai’ian name for Black Rock is Pu’u Keka’a, and ancient Hawaiians believed that this was the place where their spirits went to jump off to join ancestors forever. This color is also a nod to our friends at Maui Brewing Company, who have been supporters of Adv3nure since the beginning. We can't wait to have a beer with you soon!

We have always taken pride creating thoughtful innovations into our garments. Over the years, we have been refining and perfecting the features of our hoodies to make them streamlined and subtle. You'll find some of your favorite features in the descriptions below, as well as some of our developments in manufacturing, which make these hoodies better than any we have made.

Our signature Beverage Pocket holds your drink, so you can keep your hands free to do other things. Hold your coffee while you walk to the dog and talk on the phone. Hold your beer while you hold your plate and a fork. Hold a baby bottle while you hold your baby. We're SURE you'll find plenty of uses for this pocket!

 

Our Thumb-Hole Mitts have been a favorite feature of the ADV3NTURE Hoodie since the beginning! Unfold the cuffs to reveal the thumb-holes and enough material to keep your hands warm. Whether you use them as drinking gloves (to keep your beverage from warming up in your hands) or to keep your hands warm as the temperature drops, try them once and you'll be hooked!  

 

Both of our hoodies convert into pillows, a feature we find constantly useful. Simply roll them up into the Three-Panel Hood, which has been designed for the pillow conversion. Whether you're a passenger on a long car ride or want a place to rest your head while camping, the pillow conversion will be more convenient than you can imagine.

The Three-Panel Hood has been design to more comfortably fit your head. Rather than a one-piece hood where the fabric is bunched to create the shape of your melon, our three-panel hood uses three components to create an incredibly comfortable head covering.

 

The Passport Pocket lets you keep your valuable, like money, your ID, phone, or your passport close to your chest. The ZigZag stitching around the pocket holds the interior pocket in place, so the contents of your pocket stay secure.

 

The split Kangaroo Pockets are held in place by over-lock stitching and bar-tack reinforced edges to ensure their durability. The openings of the pockets are angled for maximum comfort as they hold your hands and keep them warm. 

 

Inside the right kangaroo pocket is a hidden pocket inside to secure your valuable, like your keys, so they don't fall out while you're adventuring. It will give you extra confidence when carrying items around in your pockets.

 

Most independent craft breweries (which we're fans of) are canning beer rather than bottling it, but as a throwback to the bottle-openers that we used to include in our hoodies and jackets, we're including this canvas bottle-opener PATCH (similar to the ones in our flannels), so you can twist off your bottle caps without damaging the French terry loop fabric.

 

 All of the zippers on the new hoodies are metal YKK zippers, the most durable, high-quality zippers available. And, they're made right here in the USA. This includes the main zipper on the ADV3NTURE and CLASSIC hoodies, as well as the zippers on the beverage pocket and passport pocket.

 

 We've added Elbow Pads to the arms of the ADV3NTURE Hoodie for added comfort, as well as to reduce wear on the area where your hoodie will come into contact with hard surfaces. They also add a bit of style to your hoodie, so people know you mean business.

 

 It's not quite as complicated as a GPS tracker, but our return home tag, and the honesty of a good samaritan should get your hoodie back to you if you happen to leave it on one of your adventures. It also contains our pledge to plant three trees with every purchase, including the hoodie you receive from this campaign.

Here's a closer look!

 

We've made sure that all of the stitching used in our hoodies keep your hoodie intact during your adventures. We use over-lock stitching on the top of the shoulders, so they lay flat, to make the seams comfortable if you happen to be wearing a backpack.

 

 

We’ve spent nine months developing a unique fabric that we love. It’s a high-density 100% cotton French terry fabric that is pre-laundered.

Our hoodies start with 100% raw cotton grown in North Carolina, where it is combed and spun in a yarn mill. The yarn is then transported to Los Angeles, where the yarns are knitted into our proprietary French terry loop. It is then pre-washed (pre-shrunk) in our manufacturing facility. At that point, the fabric is inspected for any imperfections from the knitting or dying process. Once the fabric passes inspection, it is then ready to be cut and sewn into your new hoodie. After sewing, each hoodie is individually garment dyed for the optimal premium color.

Keeping our manufacturing domestic enables us ensure the highest quality of raw materials that are sourced for production, while allowing us to oversee the entire process to ensure high production standards through the entire process. We are also able to ensure that our high environmental standards are being maintained.

Hand-crafting our products domestically lets us keep jobs in the US, especially in a time where they’re needed most. We are incredibly proud that all of our apparel is made by hard-working Americans.

As you likely know, it costs more to manufacture products in the USA than it does overseas. That's true. It costs 2-3 times the amount to make our hoodies domestically than it would cost to make the same hoodie internationally. The reason for this comes down to what people are paid to make the product. It is also reflected in the salaries that people are paid to produce the raw materials.

So why make our products here, when we could save money making them there? For us, the increased costs are worth the benefits of domestic manufacturing. Not only are we able to produce a better product and be able to monitor our environmental impact, but we're keeping jobs in the USA, especially in these times when they're needed most.

Because we have moved production to the US, we will be able to reduce the time between the conclusion of this Indiegogo campaign and the day you receive your hoodie. In the past, with our overseas manufacturers, it has take 140-160 days from when we place the order to when the orders were shipped to backers -- much of this time with the product being spent in transit. We've now reduced that time to less than 90 days.

Our Indiegogo launched on August 21st and will conclude on September 18th. Once you get your survey, kindly respond to it ASAP. We will need them back before September 29th, so we can begin production on September 30th This will enable us to send your hoodie out to you by November 16th.

Being an environmentally conscious brand means we understand the importance of the environment and our affect on it. We are actively taking steps to reduce our carbon footprint by utilizing domestic raw materials and planting three trees to offset our environmental impact.

The "3" in our name represents the three trees that we plant with every purchase, including this Indiegogo campaign.

We are proud to partner with Green Forests Work, a non-profit that plants trees in the Appalachian region in areas that have been deforested due to mining. Even if you don't back our campaign, we encourage you to donate to GreenForestsWork.org and support their important work!

To find the size that best suits you, take your favorite hoodie and lay it on a flat surface. Compare the measurements of your hoodie with the measurements below. If washed properly (was cold and lay flat to dry) your hoodie should not shrink more than 1-2%.

In addition to the standard sizes XS-2XL, we are offering BIG & TALL sizes. This includes TALL sizes in Large and X-Large, as well as 3X-5XL. These sizes require new patterns to be created, as well as extra fabric in the manufacturing, and extra shipping charges, due to the additional weight. If you order a BIG & TALL size, you will have to pay an additional charge when you receive your survey. Those ordering TALL sizes will be required to pay an additional $10. Those ordering 3X-5XL will be required to pay an additional $15.

 

The additional shipping charges added to your pledge for international orders does not include duties, taxes, customs VAT, or any other fees that may be charged by your country. Unfortunately, there are too many variables for us to properly calculate any additional charges. We are sorry for any inconvenience.
story_txt: Available for a limited time, and significant discount on Indiegogo, this innovative, high quality hoodie is made right here in America, and is the most premium hoodie you'll ever own. It's so well-made, we guarantee it for 5-years! Ships in NovemberFour years ago, we launched the original Adv3nture Hoodie, an innovative hoodie that was heralded for its style, comfort and design. Now we're back with TWO NEW HOODIES. With the success our brand has experienced, we're back with hoodies that are more refined, more comfortable, and have improvements to our past customers' favorite innovations.THE ADV3NTURE HOODIE and THE CLASSIC HOODIE are hand-crafted in America, from the ground up. They start with American cotton grown in North Carolina, zippers made in Georgia, and the final product being cut and sewn in California. Our new hoodies (and as of 2020, ALL of our  products) are made by hard-working Americans, like you.We're so proud of how well our hoodies are made that we guarantee our workmanship. If within the first five years of owning your new hoodie, it rips, tears, or the zipper breaks, we'll mend it for free. This guarantee is is applicable for domestic (USA) customers AND international customers.Our ADV3NTURE Hoodie brings back everyone's favorite features and innovations in a more refined and durable version of our original hoodie. It's designed to be your favorite everyday hoodie with comfort, stylishness and quality at the forefront. It has innovative construction elements, like a three-panel hood, over-locking seams, and our proprietary French terry loop fabric.Our CLASSIC Hoodie has the same silhouette as the new ADV3NTURE Hoodie, including the comfort, durability, and construction. We removed some of the innovations of from the ADV3NTURE hoodie. What we ended up with was a stylish, premium hoodie with just the right number of features and enough colors for every day of the week! The ADV3NTURE Hoodie and the CLASSIC Hoodie have the same dimensions and measurements and are made with the same fabric and materials. Below is a comparison of their features.We are offering the ADV3NTURE and CLASSIC hoodies in EIGHT colors. There are no stretch goals, where we need to raise a certain amount in this campaign before they become available. ALL colors, named after California landmarks, are available once the campaign reaches its funding goal. At the end of the campaign, you will be emailed a survey (to the email associated with your Indiegogo account) where you'll tell us the color(s) and size(s) that you'd like us to send you.If you'd like to add additional hoodies to your pledge once the campaign is over, you can do so easily in your survey. Our Catalina hoodie was inspired by the blue waters around Santa Catalina, an island off the coast of Los Angeles. One of California’s Channel Islands, it's known for its wildlife, dive sites and Mt. Orizaba, its highest peak.Our Humboldt green hood was inspired by the green hills of Humboldt county, 270 miles north of San Francisco. Humboldt County is a densely forested region with nearly 1,500,000 acres of forest land and contains dozens of national, state, and local parks. They are also know for a particular green crop, but that had nothing to do with the name... we promise.Our Mojave color was inspired by the sands of Mojave National Preserve, the third largest of the America's National Parks. Singing sand dunes, cinder cone volcanoes, and a large Joshua tree forest are found within this 1.6-million-acre park. A visit to its canyons, mountains, and mesas will reveal long-abandoned mines, homesteads,  rock-walled military outposts, and an abandoned train depot.This color was inspired by the wines of the Napa Valley, widely considered one of the top wine regions in the US. Visiting one of the valley's wineries every day would take over a year! More than four hundred wineries and grows many different grape varieties including Cabernet Sauvignon, Chardonnay, Merlot, Zinfandel, and other popular varietals.Rising nearly 5,000 feet above Yosemite Valley and 8,800 feet above sea level, Half Dome is a Yosemite icon. This hoodie is a tribute to this impressive natural monument. Considered to be unclimbable in 1865, Half Dome was first summitted in 1875. The south face of Half Dome is now "conquered" by thousand of people every year.Half Dome is the only hoodie that is not 100% cotton. There is 5% polyester woven into the outside layer of the fabric for the athletic heathered appearance. The interior of the fabric, the French terry loop that sits against the body, is 100% cotton.This color was inspired by California's Lassen Volcanic National Park, home to steaming fumaroles, meadows freckled with wildflowers, clear mountain lakes, and numerous volcanoes. Jagged peaks tell the story of its eruptive past while hot water continues to shape the land. Lassen Volcanic offers opportunities to discover the wonder and mysteries of volcanoes and hot water for visitors willing to explore the undiscovered.This hoodie is a tribute to the US Navy, which has a strong presence in California, and all branches of the military. Cheers to all of the brave men and women who risk their lives to protect our way of life! For all serving, and who have served, we greatly appreciate your service and sacrifice.This hoodie is a tribute to Black Rock, a lava rock outcropping at the north end of Ka'anapali Beach. The Hawai’ian name for Black Rock is Pu’u Keka’a, and ancient Hawaiians believed that this was the place where their spirits went to jump off to join ancestors forever. This color is also a nod to our friends at Maui Brewing Company, who have been supporters of Adv3nure since the beginning. We can't wait to have a beer with you soon!We have always taken pride creating thoughtful innovations into our garments. Over the years, we have been refining and perfecting the features of our hoodies to make them streamlined and subtle. You'll find some of your favorite features in the descriptions below, as well as some of our developments in manufacturing, which make these hoodies better than any we have made.Our signature Beverage Pocket holds your drink, so you can keep your hands free to do other things. Hold your coffee while you walk to the dog and talk on the phone. Hold your beer while you hold your plate and a fork. Hold a baby bottle while you hold your baby. We're SURE you'll find plenty of uses for this pocket! Our Thumb-Hole Mitts have been a favorite feature of the ADV3NTURE Hoodie since the beginning! Unfold the cuffs to reveal the thumb-holes and enough material to keep your hands warm. Whether you use them as drinking gloves (to keep your beverage from warming up in your hands) or to keep your hands warm as the temperature drops, try them once and you'll be hooked!   Both of our hoodies convert into pillows, a feature we find constantly useful. Simply roll them up into the Three-Panel Hood, which has been designed for the pillow conversion. Whether you're a passenger on a long car ride or want a place to rest your head while camping, the pillow conversion will be more convenient than you can imagine.The Three-Panel Hood has been design to more comfortably fit your head. Rather than a one-piece hood where the fabric is bunched to create the shape of your melon, our three-panel hood uses three components to create an incredibly comfortable head covering. The Passport Pocket lets you keep your valuable, like money, your ID, phone, or your passport close to your chest. The ZigZag stitching around the pocket holds the interior pocket in place, so the contents of your pocket stay secure. The split Kangaroo Pockets are held in place by over-lock stitching and bar-tack reinforced edges to ensure their durability. The openings of the pockets are angled for maximum comfort as they hold your hands and keep them warm.  Inside the right kangaroo pocket is a hidden pocket inside to secure your valuable, like your keys, so they don't fall out while you're adventuring. It will give you extra confidence when carrying items around in your pockets. Most independent craft breweries (which we're fans of) are canning beer rather than bottling it, but as a throwback to the bottle-openers that we used to include in our hoodies and jackets, we're including this canvas bottle-opener PATCH (similar to the ones in our flannels), so you can twist off your bottle caps without damaging the French terry loop fabric.  All of the zippers on the new hoodies are metal YKK zippers, the most durable, high-quality zippers available. And, they're made right here in the USA. This includes the main zipper on the ADV3NTURE and CLASSIC hoodies, as well as the zippers on the beverage pocket and passport pocket.  We've added Elbow Pads to the arms of the ADV3NTURE Hoodie for added comfort, as well as to reduce wear on the area where your hoodie will come into contact with hard surfaces. They also add a bit of style to your hoodie, so people know you mean business.  It's not quite as complicated as a GPS tracker, but our return home tag, and the honesty of a good samaritan should get your hoodie back to you if you happen to leave it on one of your adventures. It also contains our pledge to plant three trees with every purchase, including the hoodie you receive from this campaign.Here's a closer look! We've made sure that all of the stitching used in our hoodies keep your hoodie intact during your adventures. We use over-lock stitching on the top of the shoulders, so they lay flat, to make the seams comfortable if you happen to be wearing a backpack.  We’ve spent nine months developing a unique fabric that we love. It’s a high-density 100% cotton French terry fabric that is pre-laundered.Our hoodies start with 100% raw cotton grown in North Carolina, where it is combed and spun in a yarn mill. The yarn is then transported to Los Angeles, where the yarns are knitted into our proprietary French terry loop. It is then pre-washed (pre-shrunk) in our manufacturing facility. At that point, the fabric is inspected for any imperfections from the knitting or dying process. Once the fabric passes inspection, it is then ready to be cut and sewn into your new hoodie. After sewing, each hoodie is individually garment dyed for the optimal premium color.Keeping our manufacturing domestic enables us ensure the highest quality of raw materials that are sourced for production, while allowing us to oversee the entire process to ensure high production standards through the entire process. We are also able to ensure that our high environmental standards are being maintained.Hand-crafting our products domestically lets us keep jobs in the US, especially in a time where they’re needed most. We are incredibly proud that all of our apparel is made by hard-working Americans.As you likely know, it costs more to manufacture products in the USA than it does overseas. That's true. It costs 2-3 times the amount to make our hoodies domestically than it would cost to make the same hoodie internationally. The reason for this comes down to what people are paid to make the product. It is also reflected in the salaries that people are paid to produce the raw materials.So why make our products here, when we could save money making them there? For us, the increased costs are worth the benefits of domestic manufacturing. Not only are we able to produce a better product and be able to monitor our environmental impact, but we're keeping jobs in the USA, especially in these times when they're needed most.Because we have moved production to the US, we will be able to reduce the time between the conclusion of this Indiegogo campaign and the day you receive your hoodie. In the past, with our overseas manufacturers, it has take 140-160 days from when we place the order to when the orders were shipped to backers -- much of this time with the product being spent in transit. We've now reduced that time to less than 90 days.Our Indiegogo launched on August 21st and will conclude on September 18th. Once you get your survey, kindly respond to it ASAP. We will need them back before September 29th, so we can begin production on September 30th This will enable us to send your hoodie out to you by November 16th.Being an environmentally conscious brand means we understand the importance of the environment and our affect on it. We are actively taking steps to reduce our carbon footprint by utilizing domestic raw materials and planting three trees to offset our environmental impact.The "3" in our name represents the three trees that we plant with every purchase, including this Indiegogo campaign.We are proud to partner with Green Forests Work, a non-profit that plants trees in the Appalachian region in areas that have been deforested due to mining. Even if you don't back our campaign, we encourage you to donate to GreenForestsWork.org and support their important work!To find the size that best suits you, take your favorite hoodie and lay it on a flat surface. Compare the measurements of your hoodie with the measurements below. If washed properly (was cold and lay flat to dry) your hoodie should not shrink more than 1-2%.In addition to the standard sizes XS-2XL, we are offering BIG & TALL sizes. This includes TALL sizes in Large and X-Large, as well as 3X-5XL. These sizes require new patterns to be created, as well as extra fabric in the manufacturing, and extra shipping charges, due to the additional weight. If you order a BIG & TALL size, you will have to pay an additional charge when you receive your survey. Those ordering TALL sizes will be required to pay an additional $10. Those ordering 3X-5XL will be required to pay an additional $15. The additional shipping charges added to your pledge for international orders does not include duties, taxes, customs VAT, or any other fees that may be charged by your country. Unfortunately, there are too many variables for us to properly calculate any additional charges. We are sorry for any inconvenience.

story:
[Stretch Goals Updates]:

Stretch goals reached:

-20.000 Eur: 800N puncture resistance will be availabe as an optional, thanks to a Dyneema® fabric internal layer. This is a first-in-the-world for HEMA gloves.

All backers and preorders have will be gifted standard 350N puncture resistance in their gloves at no extra cost to repalce the detacheble Sidesword Badass Design that was merged into the glove itelf.

___________________________________________________________________________

[FAQs]

-Size and colour will be asked for at the end of the campaign. More info coming soon. Item options are just for my reference presently.

-Optional Designs are detachable, so you can use them just to enhance the WeaponMaster® Gauntlets when needed. Longsword Badass Design will give extra hit attenuation on knuckles and fingers, LongCuff Design will add an extended cuff.

___________________________________________________________________________

Story

First of all, let me introduce myself a bit to those who don't already know me.

I am  Dario Alberto Magnani from Italy, better known as Thokk. You may have heard my nickname before, because other products have been named after me, but don't worry if you haven't.

I am an HEMA instructor, practicing since 2008.

My association, the "Società dei Vai", works with several institutional realities to grow the culture and knowledge about Medieval and Renaissance history and Historical European Martial Arts.

But it's not me that matters here, so let's go back to the WeaponMaster® Gauntlets!

These will be the first realtively affordable and yet totally protective gauntlets for Armed Martial Arts, which include HEMA, HMB, Kendo, Kali and many others. Anyone using a weapon simulator will benefit from using them.

The fingers will move independently and always be protected from hits, no matter what.

The fingers will move independently and always be protected from hits, no matter what.

story:
SLEEVZ Advantage

The ONLY FACE MASK MADE FOR EYEWEAR

1) No more fogging with eyewear

2) More comfortable 

3) More breathable

4) No more pressure on ears and face 

5) Versatile - Quickly transitioning from a face covering/shield to a face mask

6) No more mask fatigue and fidgeting

7) Antimicrobial and moisture wicking layer (goodbye maskne)

8) Extra protection with pocket for optional filter

9) Washable/Reusable

10) Unique and Futuristic Design

11) User Friendly 

12) Fitness friendly

14) Hearing Aid Friendly

15) Beverage friendly

16) Beard Friendly 

17) Great for Hunting and Fishing 

18) And when Covid is over use it as a sun shield for anti-aging ;)

We all know the standard face masks are not enjoyable to wear, especially if you wear glasses.    We have designed a face mask that works with eyewear and not against it.   We just want to make it more comfortable, breathable and easier to do so (without the annoying fog).   

_____________________________

Did you know?  

You should be wearing eyewear to protect your eyes from viruses because they are just as susceptible as your nose and mouth.  If you aren’t one the 61% of the world that wears prescription eyewear SLEEVZ goes perfect with sunglasses, blue light, and safety glasses.  Be smart and protect your entire T-zone.   

_______________________________

It's Simple to get your SLEEVZ

 

 

Then just put in payment info and shipping info and your done!      

___________________

How SLEEVZ Works 

Step 1 Simply slide the SLEEVZ on to the arms of your eyewear

Step 2 Mold nose grip to nose

Step 3 Pull back SLEEVZ so mask sits comfortably on cheekbones 

You can stop here for Face Covering Option... OR 

Step 4 Engage magnets under chin (see video below) 

 

____________________

 

Extra protection?  Yes please

Our SLEEVZ mask has 2 layers but did you know our design allows for any filter on the market? 

Get the extra protection you want with SLEEVZ.  

_______________________________________

 

SLEEVZ is the perfect mask for... 

 

Exercising

From Running to Yoga and everything in between this is the mask you want to be wearing.  

Trust us.

 

A Night Out On The Town

 Yes, you can even eat and drink with it on. 

 

 

It's the best mask on the market.  Hands down.

____________________________________

SLEEVZ in the News

Check out some of the coverage SLEEVZ is getting below: 

https://www.al.com/business/2020/09/mountain-brook-couple-marketing-anti-fog-mask-for-glasses.html

https://www.wbrc.com/2020/09/04/ala-couple-designs-mask-prevent-glasses-fogging-up/

https://www.bizjournals.com/birmingham/news/2020/09/08/birmingham-couple-creates-new-face-mask-for.html

https://bhamnow.com/2020/09/09/2-birmingham-companies-creating-unique-custom-face-masks/

https://magazine.promomarketing.com/article/alabama-couple-invents-face-mask-that-prevents-eyeglass-fog/

What Development Stage are we in?

PRODUCTION

We have been moving as quickly and methodically to get to this point.   We have made 100s of mask samples to get to where we are today.   We are happy to say we have finally perfected the design and are expecting to start production the first or second week of September.  

 

What It All Comes Down To

We would like to raise $5000 to ramp up production and boost our marketing campaign.    Your support is needed in reaching this goal.   Every dollar counts and matters.    We have an exciting journey ahead and would love if you would be a part of it by contributing to our campaign AND of course we can GUARANTEE you will be satisfied with your SLEEVZ mask.   

The Impact

At the end of the day, it sucks to wear a mask, but it's necessary.   We all need to be wearing masks these days to be safe and courteous of others.   SLEEVZ is setting out to change the mask game and make it much safer, easier and more fun.   Without your support this might be the beginning of an end, but we sure hope not as we truly believe in this product and it's ability to make life easier for those that wear a mask (especially with eyewear) AND shall we mention, we have several other patent pending designs related that we would like to have the opportunity to share, but we have to start somewhere.   Stay tuned! 

Risks & Challenges

The face mask industry has grown exponentially since COVID came about.   One of our greatest challenges is the amount of competition in the marketplace.   We do have a unique mask in the way that the patent-pending design interacts with eyewear but it will be imperative to have a strong marketing campaign to showcase our SLEEVZ advantage.     Another challenge entering the market is the speed of ramping up.    We have been in discussions with several production companies and are confident the partner we have chosen to move forward with on this journey will be able to ramp up quickly.     

Team 

 

A husband and wife team that have diverse backgrounds.  Scott Joe works in the metal recycling industry and Julie worked in solar energy for over 10 years before having their 18 month old little girl, both have a desire to make the world a better place. Two very driven individuals, that's all we can say for now. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

Spread the word and SHARE, SHARE, SHARE!    We need your help to get the word out there.

Use the Indiegogo share tools!  Share on Facebook, Instagram and everywhere.

 

Return Policy: Due to the nature of this product, all sales are final.

Disclaimers:  

This is a non-medical mask.   

Consult your doctor before using if you have pre-existing conditions or medical issues where magnets could cause issues.      

This product could be choking hazard if magnets are removed from pockets.

story:
- Will my game of golf improve if I get a Bagolf bag? : We are not so presumptuous as to think that it will, but we try our best to ensure that all you need to do is to focus on your game!!

- How many clubs may I put in a Bagolf bag? : There are 15 dividers for 14 clubs and 1 umbrella. Each club has its own divider

- I have oversize grips, may I use the Bagolf bag anyway? : Yes, the Bagolf bag accommodates grips of all sizes (up to 32 mm in diameter - 35 mm for putters).

-  Are the magnets harmful? : The magnets are not harmful.. Some studies, however, recommend that people with pacemakers be cautious.

- Does my product require any specific maintenance? : Bagolf products do not require any specific maintenance, but your kind attention :-)

- Are Bagolf products protected by copyright laws? : Yes, Bagolf is a registered trademark; many designs and patents are registered too. Bagolf is and will always be UNIQUE


http://www.bagolf.com

http://www.facebook.com/bagolfconcept

:-)- Are Bagolf products protected by

story:
HCK3R™ gloves by ARXTEC are next-gen patent-pending all-season smart gloves lined with SLVRTEC™, a naturally antibacterial pure silver lining. Protect your hands, keep them germ-free while you enjoy a wide range of everyday activities.

The Perfect Everyday Gloves

Do you take pictures, create videos, and face-time family and friends? Are you driven to explore urban jungles or luscious mountain landscapes? Or maybe you just need to work on your devices from anywhere. We created the perfect go anywhere, do anything gloves designed to take on all of your adventures!

Long-Lasting & Durable  

HCK3R™ Gloves were engineered with protection and comfort in mind. Built and tested to out-last and out-perform alternative gloves on the market.

We have tested HCK3R™ gloves in climates ranging from 29°F-79°F. There is a thin layer of microfleece so they can keep your hands warm in colder temperatures. Glove moisture works to activate more antibacterial strength through the ionization process of the silver.

The Power Of Silver

HCK3R™ gloves are made with SLVRTEC™ 99.9% pure silver lining.

Sustainable Solution

The environmental pollution caused by discarded disposable gloves and masks everywhere has serious consequences. Nitrile gloves can take decades to hundreds of years to biodegrade. Using HCK3R™ gloves can help prevent the environmental waste of single-use nitrile/vinyl gloves.

How is HCK3R Different? 

  

                                       

Everyday Use Cases

Whether you are taking a trip to work, on a long flight, or going on an outdoor adventure — you can rest assured that HCK3R™ gloves will keep your hands clean and safe. 

All-Day Clean + Comfort

Regular disposable gloves easily rip and are usually only good for single-use. With HCK3R™ gloves you can take them with you anywhere in a convenient travel bag. HCK3R™  gloves will make keeping your hands clean a breeze. 

 

 

Exclusive IGG Discounts

 

Hey guys, thanks again for your patience and understanding with orders/any size or shipping issues, we are doing our absolute best to take care of everyone. I just wanted to share with you updated care instructions for the gloves as I realized this slipped through the cracks amidst the chaos of getting your orders out.

 

Glove Care Instructions:

1. Wash by hand in cold water (do not machine wash). You can also use hand sanitizer wipes for the outside of gloves for a faster clean. The inside will always stay clean because of the self-cleaning properties of the silver. 

2. If you decide to wash them, use neutral laundry detergent, do not use softener or drift agent

3. Air dry or low heat tumble dry, avoid direct sunlight

 

Shipping Information

HCK3R currently ships worldwide. We offer friendly shipping to the USA, Canada, EU, UK, Japan, Australia and more!

Shipping will be charged after the campaign is over via our pledge manager software. You will be able to update your shipping address, choose and add extras to your order, and more. 

Below you can find the shipping estimates for all HCK3R rewards.

 

 

Meet The Founder

Benjamin Zuiker is a technology entrepreneur and award-winning director. Arxtec was founded to develop intelligent design solutions for a brighter future. Learn more at arxtecdesign.com

story:
LIMITED NUMBERS AVAILABLE FOR IMMEDIATE DELIVERY - Check Out Perks for Details. 

 
Inspiration Behind My BSM-Art Collection.

 

When our farm boutique was closed due to the pandemic, I used this time and channel it to something positive.  As we now plan to focus more on online sales, I designed exclusive products for our online boutique.  We hope through Indiegogo, Imelda Roberts' B S M-ART Wear, will expand its network of supporters and friends to make this a successful project.
 
 

 

 
The amazing creatures like birds remind me of many positive feelings - to fly free and be where your heart wants to be, to embrace the joy of possibility, to fly and weather the storm to reach your dreams.  It is a symbol of freedom, fearlessness, and resilience. Their music sends a message of joy, love, and peace.  Take this versatile bag at work or in your travel. 
 
 
 
The unique Zebra symbolizes freedom and individuality.  At the same time, zebras are known to always be part of the zeal or group of zebras to protect each other and be a part of the community.  The group is also known as dazzle fitting for its unique dazzling features only found in this awesome animal. As such, I named this bag, the Dazzling Zebras.
 
 
 
 
The Graceful Giraffes Love Bag reflects upon the wild.  Known as the "Gentle Giant," it stands as a symbol of foresight, grace and unique individuality. 
 
 

In summer, I spend time saving Monarchs in our farm and setting them free once they are ready to fly. It always gives me a sense of purpose that I can care for these lovely creatures. I also enjoy watching Monarchs kissing lovely roses and other flowers. It is no wonder that some of my designs showcase this beautiful beloved butterfly. It is known as a symbol of transformation, sweetness of life, and positive light.

Like the Dazzling Zebras bag, each bag in Imelda's Love Bag Collection contains similar features.  It is not just a bag - it is an artful bag with essential accessories for the new normal. This set includes a UV sterilizer, hand sanitizer, extra long strap, matching gaiter scarf, and more!  It is a stylish bag you will be proud to wear. 

 

From nature inspiration and photos of flowers and butterflies I took at our farm, I captured vibrant colors, calming ambiance, delicate flowers and soothing nature as reflected in my Nature-Inspired Reversible Clutch Bag with Matching Scarf and Face Mask Set.  

This comes in four designs as shown above.  

Travel has given me immense pleasure to experience different places.  Inspired by my song, Perfect State of Mind, these clutch bag sets showcase states I've lived & loved.

With a desire to share my positive thoughts about the world I live, I designed four state-inspired set to share my care for the community where I live, work and play  - Washington, DC, Maryland, and Virginia. The Statue of Liberty of New York reminding us of freedom and the vast possibilities in our country. It is a state where I was humbled to receive the Ellis Island Medal of Honor.

 

Blue Dreams USA Farm Boutique specializes in artisan quality nature-inspired products. I designed these embroidered non-medical face coverings reflecting the lyrics of my song, Blue Dreams in My Heart, showcasing lavenders and roses we grow in our farm. To me, these designs come with meaningful inspiration showcasing lovely flowers, butterflies, birds and bees in our farm.

 

As part of my special limited edition, signature collection is my wish for FAITH, LOVE AND HOPE as captured in these printed face masks.  I am also hoping for a sunny lovely Spring Summer season as captured in the second set of printed face masks below.  

 

 

A GIFT THAT CARES - To mark the care and quality of my work, my LOVE Bag Collection, Nature and State-Inspired Clutch Bag Sets come in lovely gift boxes that you can also use as storage box.  I hope even men who are looking for special unique gifts for the special lady in their lives will find my collection worthy of gift-giving.

Jeff and Imelda, Co-Owners of Blue Dreams USA Boutique, have extensive management and product development experience gained in their current roles.  

Imelda is the President and Chief Creative Officer of Blue Dreams USA.  She is the creator of Imelda Roberts B SM Art Wear Collection.  She has many years of design experience having been involved in various product designs and development projects at Blue Dreams USA Boutique.  She also brings over 20 years of senior management experience gained from employment with nonprofit, private and government agencies.  A published author, songwriter and a multi-awarded professional, she is also the first Filipina-American to win the Ellis Island Medals of Honor.  

Jeff has over 26 years contracts and management experience with large corporations before assuming his roles as Chief Operating Officer of Blue Dreams USA.

 

Thank you for supporting my new signature collection, BSM-Art Wear.

Check out our Instagram and Facebook pages for new photos of customers sharing their photos wearing BSM-Art Wear.  We are delighted that our backers and supporters are happy with their perks.  We will continue to post photos with permission from our backers.

Check out our Instagram and Facebook pages for new photos of customers sharing their photos wearing BSM-Art Wear.  We are delighted that our backers and supporters are happy with their perks.  We will continue to post photos with permission from our backers.

story:
Finding a running partner who can challenge you and commit to your training regimen is the key to maximizing your workouts — but it’s near impossible!



 

Train harder with a running partner anytime and anywhere.

The Ghost Pacer is the next-generation outdoor workout. The world's first set of mixed-reality glasses projects a hologram you can race against outdoors in real-time! Get

Built FOR runners BY runners, Ghost Pacer is the on-demand workout partner that will give you the competitive edge you need to crush your goals! 



Running is inspiring. It’s challenging. It’s motivating. But it can be frustrating when you pour hours, days and weeks into workouts… only to not see any improvement.

Running with a partner can unlock each workout’s full potential.

But it can be hard — especially now — to find that stronger partner who can push you without being too fast and demotivating. And organizing long-term regular workouts with them can be nearly impossible!


Tired of having to keep track of time in your head or relying on someone to try to record precise lap times? Your time and energy should be spent on beating those records, not trying to keep track of them.

The Ghost Pacer is always ready to join you on a run. To push your pace. To push you past your limits. And push you to perform at your best!

Not only does the Ghost Pacer provide an HD display of your time, speed, and distance among other things, but all you have to do is put it on and run.

 

With a pinpoint GPS, a state of the art accelerometer, and compatibility with smartwatches, all your data can be consolidated and easily accessible with the Ghost Pacer App, you can train on your own time with no worries.

Just set up your avatar quickly, and try to catch up with them as you run on your route. The faster you go, the closer you’ll get to them!

Ready? Go!




Forget about looking down at your smartwatch, or taking out your phone. The sleek and lightweight Ghost Pacer is designed to fully adapt to your running experience so that you forget it’s there.





The Ghost Pacer shows you your live running stats without needing to keep your eyes off of the prize. A quick momentary focus of the eye brings them into view instantly, without having to tilt your head or look away from what’s ahead of you.




And with its built-in GPS tracking, you’ll never run off course — whether you’re running alongside your avatar, or following the onscreen directions.






Immerse yourself in your running experience — the Ghost Pacer is so light that you won’t even realize it’s there. At just 90 grams (~3oz), the Ghost Pacer is the only mixed-reality headset in the world that is light enough to wear while running.

You’ll appreciate the lightness even on your longer ultra-marathons, as the Ghost Pacer can keep you going for up to 6 hours.

Shaped like a streamlined pair of sports sunglasses, only you will experience the Ghost Pacer as you run past your competition and leave them in the dust!
 









 

You no longer have to wait for the Perfect Workout Partner!

Keep it simple with a constant target pace. Or pull up an old workout from the app and run against your own varying pace. You can even run against your friends or anyone sharing runs on Strava!

The Ghost Pacer never quits! With 6 hours of battery life, your running partner will consistently maintain the perfect pace. 


Get immediate visual feedback when you run as The Ghost Pacer helps you adjust your speed to get back on track. As you slow down, Ghost Pacer will gain distance — an awakening that drive to push harder!

By helping you keep on pace, you’ll maximize the value of each run and improve results. Run after run. And with Ghost Pacer by your side, it will be that much easier to chase down your goals. One step at a time.






 

Ever wonder how you would pair against Usain Bolt in the 100 meter?

Expand your running horizons and set goals based on your favorite runners or classic olympic athletes. From sprints to ultra marathons, harness the power of Strava to get access to an endless library of real runs from across the globe.

See how you compare to the runners in your area!









 














 

Use the Vimazi RunCrush app together with the Ghost Pacer Pro app to see daily suggested workouts and routes tailored specifically to your fitness profile and goals!


Developed at Vimazi with the guidance of world-class, professional running coaches, the Ghost Pacer Pro avatar is calibrated to dynamically change its pace along your route to help you optimize your workout and improve consistently over time.

The more you run with the Ultimate Running Partner, the better it learns your habits and paves your road to victory! 








A LOT of factors go into your performance, and it’s not always easy to know when to push harder or pull back.

That’s why, with the Ghost Pacer Pro, you will be able to connect your glasses with the heart rate sensors in most popular smartwatches! The Advanced Ghost Pacer Pro app will fine-tune your training sessions to keep you in the optimal zone.




 

 The Ghost Pacer Pro avatar will change its speed in real-time to ensure your heart rate and exertion levels are within optimal ranges every step of the way!

Please note, however, that you do NOT need a smartwatch to be able to use the Ghost Pacer Pro — only to access this particular feature. Please see our FAQ section for the full list of compatible watches









 

Designing a useful mixed reality experience and fitting it into a streamlined pair of glasses that you can comfortably wear while running was not easy.

Years went into developing and compressing what started as 5 pounds of hardware and optics into a sleek pair of glasses that wouldn’t weigh you down — but lift you up.


Today, after thousands of hours of work, the results speak for themselves — the Ghost Pacer remains the only headset in the world with its mixed reality capabilities that is still light enough to wear while running.
 





 

The Ghost Pacer relies on 3 major features to bring your 3D running companion to life:
 





 












































 

 





 

The summer of 2017 was frustrating. By August, despite running almost every day for three months, I was no faster than I was at the beginning of the summer. I realized that what I needed was the competitive edge I got from racing alongside one of my faster friends. But with everyone busy all the time, we could never quite get our schedules to line up.

After yet another subpar workout, I had a thought- what if we could somehow build the ultimate training partner? One that I could train with on my schedule that would still help me get the competitive benefits of training with a partner. And that’s how the idea of the Ghost Pacer was born- a pair of glasses that project a holographic training partner that runners could run with anywhere, at any time. Not only would it improve my time, it would make each workout that much more effective.

At every step of the way, we have been advised by experts in both running and technology, helping ensure that we deliver the best product possible. And now, three years and countless solder burns later, we are ready to launch on Kickstarter and bring the Ghost Pacer to the world. Please back us today, and get the most effective and reliable workout partner the world has ever seen.

- AR Bhatti (CEO of Ghost Pacer)




















 







 



 


Risks and challenges

As we prepare to deliver the Ghost Pacer, we are continuing to work very closely with our advisors who have delivered products like the Hololens and Emotiv headset. They are guiding us down the process of getting our product into your hands as well as ensuring transparency along the way should any challenges arise. Manufacturing: We are working with suppliers to ensure a strong pipeline of components and are optimizing our BOM for manufacturing efficiency. However, unpredictable effects from the COVID-19 pandemic may cause delays in the manufacturing process outside of our control. We have worked to mitigate this risk by lining up manufacturers ahead of time and working with our advisors who have already brought multiple hardware products to market. Shipping: We have already mapped out the shipping, warehousing, and distribution and will work with reputable global shipping providers and 3PL services to optimize the time from factory to mailbox. Again, we will do our best to mitigate any unpredicted delays in real time and communicate with you should these occur. Certifications: We are planning to finalize FCC and CE certifications soon. We have worked to keep our product within proper parameters such that we do not anticipate this being a problem.

Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ

We have worked to keep our product within proper parameters such that we do not anticipate this being a problem.Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ

story:
Amulet Technology Limited is dedicated to reduce both the infected population and environmental pollution caused by the massive usage of  disposable face masks by launching our first product PX-0 Guardian Mask in the year of 2020. Our business has been initiated by the philosophy and purposes of converting the innovative ideas, creative designs and new technologies into electronic products with practical impacts to human world. 

The pandemic outbreak has not only brought us threats, but also a lesson on the importance of health risk prevention. Shortage of face masks due to panic purchase warns us the insufficient sustainability of the current production approach, resulting in the failure of meeting the global demand and the more serious environmental problem with the indecomposable wastes derived from the mask consumption.

Amulet Technology Limited determines to create a reusable face mask with inspiration from the air purification technology. The new product is designed with an effective purification function, which is different from the traditional filter-type mask.

UV purification was our initial design concept with possible technology application, however, was later rejected due to the inconvenience usage in a bulky size with a great voltage demand. Based on the initial idea, a new R&D direction has then been explored.

“Is it possible to apply photocatalytic purification technology into face mask design?” Yes, photocatalytic purification which requires comparatively less electricity power has become our alternative effective solution. With a lighter size longer battery life, the convenience and endurance are greatly enhanced. 

Amulet has successfully obtained the patent for the photocatalytic-purified face mask. We sincerely hope that our reusable masks can be progressively brought on stream and to the market, to further contribute to the society and public health security. Amulet believes in the power of technology, and aims to make the best use of it to reverse the vicious cycle, hence to achieve a sustainable public health and environmental development.

 

Outpost

Amulet-designed mask serves as the first line of photocatalytic purification. The double-filter feature effectively isolates the air droplets and PM2.5 suspended particles, the design is also user-friendly for removal, cleaning and replacement. 

 

Core

The defensive core is the exclusive "Photocatalyst Air Purifying Device" of the Amulet Guardian masks. Amulet pioneered the application of the new photocatalytic purification technology to the product, generating photo-generated electrons and photo-generated holes in the process of optical reactions.The passing substances then undergo a redox reaction, decomposing and cleaning air with our lightweight and environmental-friendly product. 

*Engineered to Certification and FFP3 & N99 Filtration Standard

Discovery in Photocatalysis

How photocatalytic work?

 

 

 

Air Exhaust

The disinfected air flows in through the one-way air valve, preventing air backflow. The exhaled air will then be purified in the air purifying system. 

 

 

 

Color and Appearance

Aiming to create a more trendy and attractive appearance for daily usage, Amulet has designed different colors and patterns for the masks to fulfill the customer preferences. 

 

Size

Total weight : ~150g

 

Below highlights the product features:

  • Double-filter design for PM 2.5 exposure reduction
  • Engineered to Certification and FFP3 & N99 Filtration Standard
  • Washable filter for large particles and droplets barrier
  • Photocatalyst air purifying device design for each outlet and inlet tube
  • One-way air valve in each outlet and inlet tube for reliable prevention of air backflow
  • Voltage display device to ensure optimal functioning
  • Fault alarm on photocatalytic air purifying device to ensure effective functioning
  • External battery for prolonged usage
  • Antibacterial materials used
  • Adjustable ribber rim joints to fit different face shapes.

 

* Design illustration is only for reference purpose. Final appearance may vary due to product enhancement.

 

Demonstration Video

 

Progress

Initial Design - It is too bulky

 

Redesign a lite version

 

Building 3D model

 

Building prototype

story:
Why we have created Pix Mini

Last year we launched our first product: Pix Backpack. It has been an absolute game changer for the industry of backpacks. Pix Backpack has been reviewed by top YouTube bloggers and featured on dozens of media. Everyone loved our product and we received great feedback. However, many backers have continuously asked for the same kind of backpack, only for kids. We made it happen and hope you'll love it as much as we do!

Draw right on your backpack. The integrated in-app image editor allows you to create animations and display them on the ambient screen of the backpack. Each little box on the app corresponds to a specific pixel which can be adjusted in terms of color so that you can make up your own pixel art. 

The only limit is your imagination!

Kids can also share animations with their friends. Simply hit the SHARE button and exchange your pixel art with other Pix Mini owners. The animation will appear on your friend’s backpack within a matter of seconds. 

Shine together with your friends!

 

Make friends with Pix Mini

Pix Mini is the first backpack that helps you socialize. By displaying self-made artworks on the backpack, your child can communicate his personal interests to his peers. It is a great way to find friends and express your individuality. 

Make your kid known as "that kid with the cool tech backpack!"

Develop your child's thinking

The Pix Mini app offers brain-stimulating games designed to test memory and cognitive capabilities of your child. When you play on your backpack, logical thinking turns into an interactive activity. Simply press controllers on your phone device and treat your backpack as the playing screen. 

 

Make your child safer

The glowing animation will make your child clearly visible on the road. The geolocation feature will allow parents to see their kids on the map. Additionally, there is an alarm function that goes off whenever a child moves too far away from the backpack. 

Pix Mini is controlled from a free Pix app that can be installed on any iOS/Android smartphone device. The user-friendly interface enables your child to effectively operate the backpack and apply all of the functionalities with ease.  

 

Watch this short video that demonstrates how to use it: 

 It is still a backpack! 

In addition to the cool features of Pix Mini, it is still a practical backpack that enables your kid to carry all of the school essentials. The trendy design of the backpack will highlight your kid’s style and maintain his confidence on every single walk to school.

Pix Mini is a convenient backpack that could be also worn casually and sustain an active lifestyle of a kid. Moreover, it could be easily worn in the event of rain or snow, as the ambient screen stays resistant to low temperature and water splashes.  

Timeline

The Pix Story

Pix is a consumer electronics startup with a young team of professionals who believe that users should be both the creators and innovators of the product. That’s why, less than a year ago, we released the first smart backpack for adults. The product has been a major success as we managed to hit the total funding of $338,000 on both Indiegogo & Kickstarter. However, after receiving numerous requests to also make one for children, we made a smaller, lighter backpack with a whole bundle of cool perks relevant for kids. That’s how we ended up with Pix Mini. 

The Pix Philosophy

Pix connects portability with the creativity. Our mission is to make people happy while they’re on the go. All people are different and have a common need to express their personality through their looks. That’s why we give it to our consumers and let them to decide what they want to wear. We believe that personal looks should reflect our personality and serve as a way to communicate our views to the world. That’s why we strive our excellence to make the most customizable backpacks ever made.

 

Our Team

 

Social Network Links

We know that not everyone will be able to afford Pix Mini. So even if you can’t donate a dollar or make a purchase, you can still help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of. We rely on all of our Pix fans!

story:
Short Summary

We are Chad & Ashley McLetchie, co-founders of The Viribus Brand! The goal with Viribus is to create a brand that inspires confidence in those who wear our clothing and to remind you that you are not alone. You have Viribus within you, you are strong, and you are part of so many other people that share the same vision we do.

Name and Meaning: Viribus - Latin phrase: "With all one's might". Word translations: Strength, might, power.
Our Vision: Inspire Confidence. Celebrate Diversity.
Our Mission Statement: To help embolden humanity with life-inspiring products and experiences.

This campaign is important to us because it's something we've always wanted to find in our lives, and this brand is something we want to create to touch lives and inspire others across the world. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Let's break it down. We need to raise funds in order to make an inventory purchase of sweaters. We're estimating about $6,000-7,000 for inventory, which would get us a decent initial set-up of inventory. An additional $1,000 goes towards equipment, storage, and some software expenses, then the remaining funds go towards our marketing budget.

What we're offering you is the chance to buy a hoodie(s), with some discounts for the first few people, and an awesome hoodie combo that includes stickers, a lanyard, and one of our Viribus hoodies!

If we don't meet our entire goal, we will scale back our inventory order and make a smaller purchase. If we surpass our goal, additional funds will go towards increased inventory and increased marketing.

 

The Impact

We're trying to be a brand that gives back and is actively involved in our community. This is why we've partnered with three non-profit organizations. Each has a different focus and we hope that at least one will resonate with you.

  1. Jack.org - Jack.org is Canada's only charity training and empowering young leaders to revolutionize mental health in every province and territory. We do this through three globally-recognized programs: Talks, Chapters, and Summits.
  2. Halton Women's Place - Halton Women’s Place is an organization providing shelter and crisis services for physically, emotionally, financially, and sexually abused women and their dependent children and is dedicated to ending violence against women and their children.
  3. Local Foodbank Organization - In process of securing partnership.

While you help support a Canadian brand, you're also helping local Canadians get the help they need. Everyone has their own struggles that they battle each and every day that we don't always know about. We want to do our best to help make a difference in the lives of Canadians across the country.

We're offering you the ability to stay comfy, while also supporting a charity of your choice. Together, we can make a difference. 5% of the proceeds from each sweater order will go to a charity of your choice.

 

Risks & Challenges

This is new for us, so let's break down some of our challenges and how we aim to overcome them.

  • Not raising enough funds
    • We have decided to choose the flexible funding option that way if we don't meet our goal, we can still collect funds. Now, if we don't meet our goal, we still intend on launching this brand. We will scale down our initial inventory purchase, and ensure we still have room for marketing that way we can still fulfill orders, have additional inventory to sell via our website, and have a marketing budget to grow our brand awareness.
  • A large investment
    • A risk that we're taking is, well, starting this business in general. We both have put a lot of personal funds and savings into this business, and there's always the possibility that we could lose it all. But with this in mind, we've done our due diligence, conducted research, and used our networks and resources to ensure we're operating as efficiently as possible while ensuring the high-quality service and products we want to provide. We are both dedicated to this project and will do whatever we can to achieve success.
  • COVID-Delays
    • Another challenge is COVID-related delays from our suppliers. From the orders we've previously made, and having serious talks with our suppliers, we have every reason to believe that we'll be able to meet our shipment goals and have everything ready to go within a month of the end of this campaign. We aim to have everything shipped by the end of May, and to your doorstep within a week or two of shipping.
  • Storage for inventory
    • Something we've had to consider is if we order, say, 200 hoodies, where do we put all of that? Our basement office can only hold so many, maybe about 50-75. We've built into our budget money to go towards a small storage locker here in town where we can keep most of our inventory and shipping supplies. That way we can keep a small amount of inventory in the office then ship and refill inventory as needed.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? No problem, we can still use your help! Here are some ways you can help:

  • Tell your neighbour!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Help get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
  • Like, share, comment, and follow us on social media! @TheViribusBrand

Thank you for taking the time to read this, and we truly appreciate any and all support!
