We are both dedicated to this project and will do whatever we can to achieve success.

COVID-DelaysAnother challenge is COVID-related delays from our suppliers. From the orders we've previously made, and having serious talks with our suppliers, we have every reason to believe that we'll be able to meet our shipment goals and have everything ready to go within a month of the end of this campaign. We aim to have everything shipped by the end of May, and to your doorstep within a week or two of shipping.

Storage for inventorySomething we've had to consider is if we order, say, 200 hoodies, where do we put all of that? Our basement office can only hold so many, maybe about 50-75. We've built into our budget money to go towards a small storage locker here in town where we can keep most of our inventory and shipping supplies. That way we can keep a small amount of inventory in the office then ship and refill inventory as needed.


 

Other Ways You Can Help
Can't contribute? No problem, we can still use your help! Here are some ways you can help:

Tell your neighbour!
Use the Indiegogo share tools!
Help get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
Like, share, comment, and follow us on social media! @TheViribusBrand

Thank you for taking the time to read this, and we truly appreciate any and all support!

story:
Arrow Smartwatch for iOS & Android.

Everything you'd expect in a high-end watch while integrating a rotatable HD camera, reimagining how you use wearable tech.

 

Finally, the luxury of leaving your smart phone in your pocket or backpack while never missing a spontaneous photo or video opportunity.

Arrow is feature-loaded without the rotatable HD camera but with integrated photo and video, it revolutionizes and reimagines the way you'll use a smartwatch.

  • Photo & Video — 360° camera bezel with directional mic captures spontaneous photos or videos naturally, in seconds.
  • Sharing & Editing — Transfer photos/videos to app, edit preset filters and store to memory.
  • Fitness & Health — Built-in sensors track your fitness goals.
  • Alerts & Notifications — Receive basic notifications and more.

 

► Arrow Smartwatch Overview.

 

Engineered for business, fitness, iOT, media and hands-free functionality, designed to be convenient and match your style.

Functionality Overview

Get Silicone Band Arrow - Save $140

Get Leather Band Arrow for $179   —  Get Steel Band Arrow for $199

► Media Reviews from the Experts.

Since revealing our concept in late 2014, Arrow Smartwatch has earned the attention of 100's of publications.

 

"A camera on a watch hasn’t made sense until now... Arrow’s approach sounds sensible with rotating bezel cutting down awkwardness experienced on devices like the original Galaxy Gear" — DIGITAL TRENDS

"They've used the Indiegogo platform to fund and launch the first-ever smart watch to be equipped with a 360 degree, rotatable 5-megapixel camera and microphone that allows wearers to shoot HD photography and videos entirely from the wrist, without having to reach for a camera or phone." —  FORBES

"It's capable of doing all the things we expect from a smartwatch - navigation, messaging, and alerts...the standout feature is 360 degree rotating camera and microphone." — STUFF MAGAZINE

"The convenience of simply lifting your wrist and pushing a button seems more natural to me than pulling something from your pocket, finding the app, and capturing an image" — FSTOPPERS

► Photo, Video, Editing & Sharing Features.

Arrow Smartwatch gives you the freedom to twist the bezel, point the camera and capture photos or videos from your wrist.

HD PHOTO & VIDEO CAMERA

Whether you’re hiking a mountain, traveling for business, or out with friends the Arrow Smartwatch is your companion in capturing special moments and living your life without fumbling for your phone, yet alone unlocking it.

Press the red button on the Arrow Smartwatch casing to activate the camera and the 1.39" OLED screen will display a real-time image preview with a choice for photo or video. Rotate the bezel in any direction and instantly capture 5MP Photos and 1080P video.

360° ROTATING CAMERA BEZEL

The HD camera is stylishly integrated into the bezel of the watch at the perfect angle, allowing you to easily take selfies, photographs and videos in any direction imaginable. With this revolutionary hardware innovation, no longer do you need to contort your wrist into awkward positions or fumble for your phone. 

Our patented final design allows you to rotate a single lens, at any angle with the ability to preview your image in real-time as the display digitally reorients itself towards the user during rotation. With this form factor, you can easily take a selfie and then rotate the camera in any direction.

EDITING & SHARING 

The Arrow's 8GB on board memory stores every photo and video you take and makes it easy to transfer multimedia directly to your phone's Arrow App. From the app, quickly and easily save to your camera roll.

DIRECTIONAL AUDIO & VIDEO

Arrow Smartwatch optimally records audio and video by leveraging its wrist mounted microphone and camera on a rotating bezel.

Unlike most smartphones, Arrow Smartwatch's microphone is configured next to the camera lens allowing it to record "directional sound" no matter what direction the camera is turned.

PHOTO & VIDEO STORAGE

By integrating 8GB of internal storage, Arrow Smartwatch can save photos/videos locally so it's not reliant on your smartphone or Wi-Fi.

Free up internal memory on your watch by transferring photos & videos to the Arrow App.

The internal 8GB memory also stores music, allowing wireless connectivity from Arrow to Bluetooth headphones or speakers so you can listen without reliance on Wi-Fi or a smartphone.

Get Silicone Band Arrow - Save $140

Get Leather Band Arrow for $179   —  Get Steel Band Arrow for $199

► Superior Connectivity.

 

 

REAL TIME NOTIFICATIONS

Stay up to date and never miss an important update by syncing your Calendar, Email, Social Media, Text Message, and other apps while connected to Bluetooth.

With Arrow Wear OS, which is Android 5.1 based, Arrow allows you to sync via Bluetooth to your smartphone operating system and receive alerts from your Android or iOS smartphone.

Get Silicone Band Arrow - Save $140

Get Leather Band Arrow for $179   —  Get Steel Band Arrow for $199

► Health, Media & Software Features.

Track fitness activity and more. 

HEALTH & FITNESS TRACKING

Automatically track and compile your physical activity as part of your overall health goals with Arrow's built-in fitness tracker.

iOS & ANDROID APP

The Arrow Smartwatch Smartphone App will be available for download on iOS or Android in the Google Play or Apple Store.

The Arrow App provides direct access to the content stored in your Gallery. Scroll through the Gallery to search through all of your captured content. Easily save to your camera roll, send it by text to friends or upload to social media.

  • OLED Watchfaces — Change the appearance of your watch face by selecting from preset themes or customize your own.
  • Live Weather — Set your watch to display the weather in your current location or customize Arrow to your most frequented locations so you swipe through each.

Get Silicone Band Arrow - Save $140

Get Leather Band Arrow for $179   —  Get Steel Band Arrow for $199

► Choose Your Arrow Watch Strap.

Prices increase, instantly SAVE $150 off Arrow's retail price by selecting your watch strap and reserving now.

 

► Arrow Smartwatch Technical Specifications.

Check out the hardware, software, connectivity and design that makes the Arrow Smartwatch so special.

HARDWARE

  • Compatibility: iOS & Android Smartphones
  • CPU: MTK6580 quad core 1.3GHZ
  • Memory: ROM 8GB + RAM 1GB
  • Display: 1.39" OLED 400px x 400px resolution
  • Camera: 5MP Photo, 1080P HD Video
  • Sensors: Pedometer, Accelorometer, GPS
  • Battery: 480mAh 
    • Charging Time: 2 hours
    • Normal usage time: 1 day
  • Extras: Vibration Motor, Microphone

SOFTWARE

  • Operating System: Arrow Wear OS, based on Android 5.1 OS
  • Smartphone App: Arrow Smarwatch iOS + Android
  • Supported Languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Polish, Turkish, Arabic, Persian, Russian, Hebrew, Korean, Thai, Japanese, Chinese

CONNECTIVITY

  • Wireless: Bluetooth 4.2 + WiFi

DESIGN

  • Watch Case: 52mm
  • Thickness: 17mm
  • Band: 26mm strap
  • IP Rating: IP65, which means Arrow is dust proof and wash-down capable.
  • Band: Silicone, Leather, Stainless Steel

 

Get Silicone Band Arrow - Save $140

Get Leather Band Arrow for $179   —  Get Steel Band Arrow for $199

► Arrow Smartwatch Manufacturing Timeline.

We've come a long, long way since our initial concept in 2014 and now only have a few last steps until delivery!

 

As you can see, we have worked hard to bring the Arrow Smartwatch to you! The camera quality and software represented in this video are for prototyping and testing only. Backers will receive the Arrow Smartwatch with a 5mp camera and Arrow Wear OS as advertised on the campaign page. It is our mission to bring you an innovative and state-of-the-art Smartwatch with an amazing multimedia experience.

PRODUCTION & DELIVERY TIMELINE

Learn what we've completed and what is in process of being completed for each step within our production timeline.

☑ = Completed | ☐ = In Progress

☑ PHASE ONE — Product Review & Factory Engagement

Completed on April 1st of 2016 with approvals on estimated material cost/quantity, tentative production timeline, engineer verifications and factory selection with the green light to move forward on Design & Prototyping. 

☑ Product Quotation — Estimate of materials required and cost to produce Arrow.

☑ Production Timeline — Factory and Arrow agree on tentative production schedule.

☑ Engagement Agreement — Prospective manufacturing factory agrees to production.

☑ Engineering Expert Verification — Lead engineer verifies ability to produce Arrow.

☑ PHASE TWO — Design Blueprints & Prototyping

Completed in December 2016 with approvals on 2D/3D files, initial prototype, blueprint, certifications and final design with the green light to move forward on Tooling, First Article Inspection and Sample Testing.

☑ Product 3D Files — Engineers have 2D and 3D file blueprint to build first prototype.

☑ First Prototype Made — Head Engineer creates first prototype from design blueprint.

☑ First Prototype Works — Test, review and approval on first working prototype.

☑ Final Design Confirmed — Prototype approved with no major future design changes to the hardware. 

☑ PHASE THREE — Tooling, FA Inspection & Testing

Started in July 2017 and started to get approvals on tooling, samples, material quantity, cost, assembly process and third party certifications with green light to move forward on Shipping & Packaging Development. 

☑ Tooling Development — Sample moldings are completed for Arrow Watch

☑ Bill of Materials — Sample approved with detailed material quote for mass production.

☑ Sample Delivery — 100 watches produced to review, improve and optimize assembly.

☑ Assembly & Quality Process — Arrow assembly steps created and optimized for quality.

☑ Product Certification — Third party engineer experts approve Arrow quality and process.

☑ PHASE FOUR — Shipping Package Development

Scheduled to start Package Development in November 2017 with an estimated timeline of 10-30 days for designing, sizing, drop-testing and production.

☑ Package Test Approval — Box looks good, fits product, ships well and passes drop test.

☑ Package Sample Delivery — Box is approved by Arrow for production.

☑ PHASE FIVE — Pilot Production & Quality Inspection

Arrow is scheduled to start Pilot Production & Delivery in December 2017 with an estimated timeline of 30-45 days for material preparation, product inspection and quality tests.

☑ Material Preparation — 300 units made with final manufacturing and assembly specs.

☑ Inspection & Quality — Final production quality test approved and workers trained.

☐ PHASE SIX — Mass Production & Backer Delivery

Scheduled to start Mass Production in March 2018 with an estimated timeline of 30-60 days for inspection, production line worker training, backer surveys, and order shipments.

☑ Third Party Inspection — Workers, materials and process ready for mass production.

☐ Prepare Shipments — Backers complete delivery survey for shipping to fulfill orders.

☐ Backer Fulfilled — Arrow Smartwatch shipments start to arrive at backers addresses.

Get Silicone Band Arrow - Save $140

Get Leather Band Arrow for $179   —  Get Steel Band Arrow for $199

 

► Frequently Asked Questions

How long is the battery life?

Arrow has a battery capacity of 480mAh, and is designed to function for up to 20 hours with normal use; Your actual battery life may vary depending on your particular user case.

Does Arrow work with both iOS and Android?

Arrow is compatible with both smartphones with iOS 8.0+ and Android 5.1+ OS, but supporting features may be a bit different.

Does Arrow have standalone 3G/4G connectivity?

At the moment no.  However, you can connect Arrow to a WIFI network.

How can I charge Arrow?

With each Arrow, you will receive a wireless magnetic charge enabled dock along with a USB charging cable. Charging time is around two hours.

What is the strap width and length? What if I have big/small wrists?

Our silicon strap is 26mm width and 248mm length (buckles included); leather strap is 26mm width and 258mm length (buckles included), and steel strap is 26mm width and 208mm length. The strap is designed easily to change with any other of your favorite watch straps.

You can easily adjust the size of the band to fit a smaller wrist. For those that order the Black edition, extra links will also be provided for those with bigger wrist sizes.

Is NFC available for Arrow?

Arrow does not support NFC.

Will I be able to view notifications in other languages?

You will be able to view notifications in other languages, including English, Chinese, Hebrew, Russian, Arabic, etc., however the operating system is currently only available in English.

What is the video quality?

1080p HD.

How many Megapixels is the camera?

5mp.

Is the Arrow waterproof?

Arrow is not waterproof, but it does have a rating of IP65, which means Arrow is dust proof and wash-down capable.

Get Silicone Band Arrow - Save $140

Get Leather Band Arrow for $179   —  Get Steel Band Arrow for $199
story_txt:
Arrow Smartwatch for iOS & Android.
Everything you'd expect in a high-end watch while integrating a rotatable HD camera, reimagining how you use wearable tech. Finally, the luxury of leaving your smart phone in your pocket or backpack while never missing a spontaneous photo or video opportunity.Arrow is feature-loaded without the rotatable HD camera but with integrated photo and video, it revolutionizes and reimagines the way you'll use a smartwatch.

Photo & Video — 360° camera bezel with directional mic captures spontaneous photos or videos naturally, in seconds.


Sharing & Editing — Transfer photos/videos to app, edit preset filters and store to memory.


Fitness & Health — Built-in sensors track your fitness goals.


Alerts & Notifications — Receive basic notifications and more.

 
► Arrow Smartwatch Overview.
 Engineered for business, fitness, iOT, media and hands-free functionality, designed to be convenient and match your style.Functionality OverviewGet Silicone Band Arrow - Save $140Get Leather Band Arrow for $179   —  Get Steel Band Arrow for $199
► Media Reviews from the Experts.
Since revealing our concept in late 2014, Arrow Smartwatch has earned the attention of 100's of publications. "A camera on a watch hasn’t made sense until now... Arrow’s approach sounds sensible with rotating bezel cutting down awkwardness experienced on devices like the original Galaxy Gear" — DIGITAL TRENDS"They've used the Indiegogo platform to fund and launch the first-ever smart watch to be equipped with a 360 degree, rotatable 5-megapixel camera and microphone that allows wearers to shoot HD photography and videos entirely from the wrist, without having to reach for a camera or phone." —  FORBES"It's capable of doing all the things we expect from a smartwatch - navigation, messaging, and alerts...the standout feature is 360 degree rotating camera and microphone." — STUFF MAGAZINE"The convenience of simply lifting your wrist and pushing a button seems more natural to me than pulling something from your pocket, finding the app, and capturing an image" — FSTOPPERS
► Photo, Video, Editing & Sharing Features.
Arrow Smartwatch gives you the freedom to twist the bezel, point the camera and capture photos or videos from your wrist.HD PHOTO & VIDEO CAMERAWhether you’re hiking a mountain, traveling for business, or out with friends the Arrow Smartwatch is your companion in capturing special moments and living your life without fumbling for your phone, yet alone unlocking it.Press the red button on the Arrow Smartwatch casing to activate the camera and the 1.39" OLED screen will display a real-time image preview with a choice for photo or video. Rotate the bezel in any direction and instantly capture 5MP Photos and 1080P video.360° ROTATING CAMERA BEZELThe HD camera is stylishly integrated into the bezel of the watch at the perfect angle, allowing you to easily take selfies, photographs and videos in any direction imaginable. With this revolutionary hardware innovation, no longer do you need to contort your wrist into awkward positions or fumble for your phone. Our patented final design allows you to rotate a single lens, at any angle with the ability to preview your image in real-time as the display digitally reorients itself towards the user during rotation. With this form factor, you can easily take a selfie and then rotate the camera in any direction.EDITING & SHARING The Arrow's 8GB on board memory stores every photo and video you take and makes it easy to transfer multimedia directly to your phone's Arrow App. From the app, quickly and easily save to your camera roll.DIRECTIONAL AUDIO & VIDEOArrow Smartwatch optimally records audio and video by leveraging its wrist mounted microphone and camera on a rotating bezel.Unlike most smartphones, Arrow Smartwatch's microphone is configured next to the camera lens allowing it to record "directional sound" no matter what direction the camera is turned. PHOTO & VIDEO STORAGEBy integrating 8GB of internal storage, Arrow Smartwatch can save photos/videos locally so it's not reliant on your smartphone or Wi-Fi.Free up internal memory on your watch by transferring photos & videos to the Arrow App.The internal 8GB memory also stores music, allowing wireless connectivity from Arrow to Bluetooth headphones or speakers so you can listen without reliance on Wi-Fi or a smartphone.Get Silicone Band Arrow - Save $140Get Leather Band Arrow for $179   —  Get Steel Band Arrow for $199
► Superior Connectivity.
  REAL TIME NOTIFICATIONSStay up to date and never miss an important update by syncing your Calendar, Email, Social Media, Text Message, and other apps while connected to Bluetooth.With Arrow Wear OS, which is Android 5.1 based, Arrow allows you to sync via Bluetooth to your smartphone operating system and receive alerts from your Android or iOS smartphone.Get Silicone Band Arrow - Save $140Get Leather Band Arrow for $179   —  Get Steel Band Arrow for $199
► Health, Media & Software Features.
Track fitness activity and more. HEALTH & FITNESS TRACKINGAutomatically track and compile your physical activity as part of your overall health goals with Arrow's built-in fitness tracker.iOS & ANDROID APPThe Arrow Smartwatch Smartphone App will be available for download on iOS or Android in the Google Play or Apple Store.The Arrow App provides direct access to the content stored in your Gallery. Scroll through the Gallery to search through all of your captured content. Easily save to your camera roll, send it by text to friends or upload to social media.

OLED Watchfaces — Change the appearance of your watch face by selecting from preset themes or customize your own.


Live Weather — Set your watch to display the weather in your current location or customize Arrow to your most frequented locations so you swipe through each.

Get Silicone Band Arrow - Save $140Get Leather Band Arrow for $179   —  Get Steel Band Arrow for $199
► Choose Your Arrow Watch Strap.
Prices increase, instantly SAVE $150 off Arrow's retail price by selecting your watch strap and reserving now. 
►  Arrow Smartwatch Technical Specifications.
Check out the hardware, software, connectivity and design that makes the Arrow Smartwatch so special.HARDWARE

Compatibility: iOS & Android Smartphones

CPU: MTK6580 quad core 1.3GHZ

Memory: ROM 8GB + RAM 1GB

Display: 1.39" OLED 400px x 400px resolution

Camera: 5MP Photo, 1080P HD Video

Sensors: Pedometer, Accelorometer, GPS

Battery: 480mAh 
Charging Time: 2 hours
Normal usage time: 1 day



Extras: Vibration Motor, Microphone
SOFTWARE

Operating System: Arrow Wear OS, based on Android 5.1 OS

Smartphone App: Arrow Smarwatch iOS + Android

Supported Languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Polish, Turkish, Arabic, Persian, Russian, Hebrew, Korean, Thai, Japanese, Chinese
CONNECTIVITY
Wireless: Bluetooth 4.2 + WiFiDESIGN

Watch Case: 52mm

Thickness: 17mm

Band: 26mm strap

IP Rating: IP65, which means Arrow is dust proof and wash-down capable.

Band: Silicone, Leather, Stainless Steel

story:
GLOW. A Magnificent Convergence Of Reality And Imagination.

Finally, our latest series is here: GLOW. 

Another ground-breaking launch only a year after our release of Vader in 2018. We have always been wanting to make mixed reality (MR) smart glasses just like GLOW- lightweight, stylish and super portable- we are getting closer to our ideal.

 

Simply Plug & Play.

Our latest MR smart glasses, GLOW, is a new replacement of tablets and laptops. It is a binocular mixed reality glasses in a hybrid form. By simply plugging and playing, you can connect GLOW  to your Android phone via USB-C display port – it is SUPER EASY. You can control your phone and view what’s on it right on the MR glasses. Keep your head straight and your hands free from your phone!

 

Light. Foldable. Portable. 

As a binocular MR smart glasses, GLOW is lightweight: 75g only. You can wear it for any usage, and GLOW will never get in the way of things! More importantly, it's foldable and you can put it in your pocket.

 

Royal Fit for Everyone. 

Comfort and style are always our big considerations. We want our MR smart glasses to fit perfectly on everyone and anyone. In fact, GLOW is designed to fit your interpupillary distance (IPD) better to avoid fatigue or nausea. Here is the good news: you don’t need to adjust the displays anymore because we have already done that for you, just to make it easier for you.

 

Big Screen, Small Device. 

GLOW is not just compact and lightweight. It also projects sharp and clear images. You can now play games or watch movies on GLOW with the utmost visual quality.

 

Pocket-Sized Personal Cinema

Anytime, Anywhere. At Your Convenience.

 

3D Viewing Experience. Get The Most Out Of GLOW.

Yes. GLOW is also a 3D-enabled MR smart glasses. Other than 2D contents, you may also watch 3D movies and enjoy the stunning viewing experience on this compact gadget.

 

Live In The Moment. Play In The Moment. 

What's better than playing games on a large and crisp display? Playing games on a large and crisp display and controlling all movements with hand gestures as if you are living in the actual environment!

 

Spatial Computing. You Can't Miss This. 

With extensive and sophisticated tracking system, you can use SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) and hand gesture controls on GLOW, which brings you an extraordinary MR experience.

It Is More Than Just Entertainment. It Is Practical.  

GLOW is a hands-free device that allows you to multitask. You can pair it with bluetooth joystick for gaming or a keyboard for work.

GLOW is your best companion assistant that you can manipulate multi-features at a time and be notified instantly without missing a text or a call. 

 

Long Battery Autonomy Makes Your Life Easy.

Since battery supply of GLOW relies on the connected Android phone, it can last up to 5 hours for continuous use. Plus, you don't need to charge for an additional device anymore.

 

Content Abundance. Get Whatever You Want. 

MAD Gaze Software Team is constantly developing apps including utilities, games, MR and entertainment for users. Apps are already available on our MAD Store and more features are coming. Aside from MAD official apps, GLOW is also compatible with ample third-party apps on Google Play. 

 

Developer Community. Be One Of The First!

As MAD Gaze is based on a familiar Android development platform, it is easy to build apps based on our MR glasses. Developers from all over the world are welcomed to join our Developer Community and launch their next killer app on MAD Store for users to download. Join MAD Gaze Developer Community today!

MAD Gaze Accredited Developer Partners

Introducing you two of our Accredited Developer Partners - Shadow Factory and Fight4Dream, who are developing contents based on our MR smart glasses.Their work is very impressive and is highly recognized by the industry. Here are some example of their work. 

Shadow Factory is a full service production company specializing in content development, post-production, immersive media, technology and app development, and digital strategy headquartered in Hong Kong with offices in Los Angeles and Toronto. They produce state-of-the-art, story-driven experiences and offer new and exciting ways to engage audiences. An outstanding team equipped with extensive skill sets and the latest digital toolkits, they are at the forefront of all your content needs.

FIGHT4DREAM (F4D) is an award-winning VR/AR game development studio based in Hong Kong established in 2013. F4D aim for connecting people all over the world, delivering joys. They offer brand-new products and experience across cultural boundaries through the media of Virtual Reality/Augmented Reality. They develop and promote unique, brilliant and marvelous VR/AR contents and services with passion and profession including games, IPs, LBE and arcade experience, business applications and eSports, etc.

 

Free SDK For Developers.

SDK is provided to developers for easy access to MAD Gaze control. 

Technical Specifications

 

High Compatibility For More Flexibility.

You may also stream contents from your phones, tablets or computers and view it on GLOW glasses.

 

Comes In 6 Colors. Perfect Match With Your Outfit.

 

Premium Display. GLOW Plus.

GLOW Plus comes with the same stylish design and has a larger angle elevated from 45ºFOV (90" from 3m) Prism to 53º FOV (118" from 3m) Combined Lightguide from USD 399 only!

 

GLOW Plus uses Micro OLED display with 1080p resolution which gives you a true frameless visual experience. You can immerse yourself into the AR contents seamlessly.

Since there are more work to be done, the target delivery of GLOW Plus will be 3 months after delivering GLOW.

You All Deserve A Pair Of High Value MR Smart Glasses.

MAD Gaze aims to bring innovations to everyone at an inexpensive and reasonable price because you deserve it. Why pay extra?

Timeline  

Our Vision and Mission

MAD Gaze is one of the best MR smart glasses brand worldwide. We are a group of people with diversified background but passionately share the same dream, dedication and mission to create something awesome for the future.

MAD Gaze delivers the highest standards of excellence and integrity. We aim to build the best MR glasses with the best specifications across the board: light-weight, vogue design, high-quality display and compatible with numerous devices and third-party apps.

We care most on the user experience and believe that consumers should never settle for less. That’s why MAD Gaze smart glasses are all affordable and with the highest quality. We keep our promise to our customers.

 

As Seen In... 

Our Team and Awards

MAD Gaze is one of the best MR smart glasses brand worldwide, and we are a group of people although with very diversified background but share the same dream and mission, and dedicated to create something awesome for the future.

Meet Us at CES 2020, Las Vegas, NV.

MAD Gaze will be at the Consumer Electronics Show from Jan 7-10, 2020. Please visit us at Booth # 21523, LVCC South Hall 1, Level G Tech East and try our latest MR smart glasses.

Stay Tuned And Be The First To Hear From Us

story:
Presented by Kapok Knot and Vegan Fashion Week™, two brands that care about people, the Earth, and animal welfare

 

 

TL;DR

  1. The world’s most comfortable vegan jacket that cuddles you with warmth and coziness

  2. Kapok, a plant fiber that’s powering our insulation - it is lightweight, breathable, and hypoallergenic

  3. Presented by Kapok Knot and Vegan Fashion Week™, two brands that care about people, the Earth, and animal welfare

  4. Japanese quality, service, and efficiency. Our products are ready to be produced in your choice of color and size

  5. Loved by more than 1,700 customers around the globe and more than 50,000 geese saved from being harmed

 

Introducing “Vegan Haori Jacket”, the world’s most cozy and stylish vegan jacket made from plant-based fibers

 

 

 

 

You can rock this jacket whether you need warmth and comfort while reading a book at home or going out for a drink with your friends. The “Vegan Haori Jacket” will give you comfort and style wherever you are. 

 

 

Goose Approved

Kapok Knot’s Ethical Down Kapok™ sheet is the future of not only cruelty-free fashion but also gives you the ability to have down warmth with less puff.
In our survey of 30 geese*, the results were unanimous that they prefer you wear a jacket lined with plant fibers instead of their feathers, especially if the warmth and comfort isn’t compromised.

*When questioned, we assumed they were honking with approval. No geese were harmed in the survey

 

 

While staying true to the look of the traditional jacket, the “Vegan Haori Jacket” updates it with its lightweight plant based down that is warm, fashionable, and sustainably made.

  Kapok Knot’s Vegan Haori Jacket will showcase a fashionable and sustainable option as you look to bring a little bit of your cozy home when venturing outside.

 

Made in Japan

What does "Made in Japan" mean?

  • Quality is of the utmost importance
  • Not your average factory. No mass production here, we're hand sewing these jackets because we care about the final product
  • Slow fashion. The Haori jacket is made to last. Not just from a material standpoint but also from a fashion perspective.
  • Fair wages. Every worker is skilled in sewing our jackets from scratch and we take pride in hiring passionate people and providing a safe environment to work in.
     

 

 

Commercializing kapok has been a challenge for many because of its short fibers. Through many years of research and development, Kapok Knot has successfully innovated kapok into thin sheets that are easy-to-sew, breathable, and as warm as a traditional down. They are called “Ethical Down Kapok™”

 

 

 

 

Look at how fluffy and soft the kapok fibers are!
It’s 1/8th of the weight of cotton because they are so hollow

 

 

 

Because of the hollow fibers, kapok is breathable. It absorbs moisture while transforming that into heat, or warmth. Excess moisture is let out so you don’t have to worry about mold forming.

By combining recycled polyester to our kapok fibers, we invented “Ethical Down Kapok™”. Made with kapok fibers and recycled polyester, our Ethical Down Kapok™ are 5mm thin sheets that are easy-to-sew, breathable, and as warm as a traditional down. With this insulation, we are able to produce lightweight AND warm jackets that are ethically made and sustainable.

 

 

Kapok is a fiber grown from trees. Meaning that we don’t have to cut down any trees and we can keep harvesting them.

We partner with a kapok tree farm based in Indonesia. If we’re able to grow the kapok business, we can help our Indonesian community grow their economy and stay eco-friendly.

 

 

 

Vegan Haori Jacket Features

  1. So comfortable that you forget you’re wearing a jacket

  2. Our insulation is filled with kapok so it’s lightweight and warm

  3. Ethical, sustainable, and vegan fashion

 

 

 

 

Our Ethical Down Kapok™ sheet is the key to producing lightweight and warm jacket. While our jackets are as warm as traditional geese down jackets, the weight of each jacket is different.

  • Traditional geese down jacket = 1 kilograms or 2.2lbs
  • Vegan Haori Jacket = 700 grams or 1.5lbs 

Our Vegan Haori Jacket weighs about as your pillow or a one bunch of bananas.
 

 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Jordan Mixson, @the_sockateur

(Black, Size - L, 190cm or 6'3", Perfect fit)

"This Haori Jacket is truly elegantly well made and something I definitely will be mixing
and celebrating culture as it’s intended by Japanese artisans."

 

Ada daSilva, @adadotcomdotau

(Black, Size - L, 167cm or 5'6", Oversized style)

JungAa Anh, @janaliceain

(Black, Size - M, 168cm or 5'6", Slightly Oversized style)

Kapok Knot Staff

(Black, Size - XS, 152cm or 5'1", Slightly Oversized style)

Kapok Knot Staff

(Black, Size - XS, 156cm or 5'3", Perfect fit)

 

 

 
 
Founded by Kishow Fukai, Kapok Knot is a Japanese fashion start-up with a vision to use sustainable kapok fibers to provide an eco-friendly alternative to a traditional down. Kishow discovered the abundance of kapok in Indonesia and was convinced this could be a transformative solution — for people in search of stylish and functional clothing, workers who needed meaningful work and fair pay, and an industry in need of environmentally friendly materials.
 
 

Kapok Knot Logo

The Kapok Knot logo is a Mizuhiki knot. This ancient Japanese art form uses a knotted obi cord to adorn gifts and symbolizes a long-lasting hope for continued good will. And that’s exactly what we wish for our planet, our Kapok Knot partners, and you. Your Kapok Knot jacket is delivered to you, marked with a unique Kapok Knot logo, completing the long journey from kapok farm to your closet.

 
 
Founded by Creative Director, Emmanuelle Rienda, Vegan Fashion Week™ is the world’s leading ethical fashion movement. VFW explores the challenges surrounding ecological and climate change through the lenses of fashion, ethics, sustainability and innovation. Kapok Knot and Vegan Fashion Week™ share core values that emphasize sustainable alternatives for a better world. We are excited to be collaborating on this Indiegogo campaign to present an exciting innovation that we believe is a game changer in the fashion industry and a compassionate solution to protect animals from harmful practices.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Instagram

 
Any questions or comments? Email us. 
support@kapok-knot.com

story:
Hi I am Adam a British father of two, living in Stockholm. I have a passion for entrepreneurship, product design and anything super cool that can make your life much easier.  

OQ is 20 X smaller than your average eyewear case.

Cases are just too big and bulky to carry comfortably. NOT designed for the modern day lifestyle.

Prescription glasses and sunglasses are expensive! Looking through a pair of scratched lenses is not only annoying but potentially dangerous.

A hand made, stylish lens protector that’s so small it can be carried on your keys, or in the smallest of bags. Never again feel stressed about scratching your favourite pair of eyewear!

I will offer different colours including - green, grey, blue, black, white, pink, beige. You will be able to choose the colours after this campaign when I send out a survey through backerkit. 

By helping me bring this project to life you'll not only be supporting a budding entrepreneur but also helping revolutionise eyewear protection across the globe. It's time they had a revamp and OQ is here to make sure it happens. 

I am off to a good start but hope to raise 100,000 USD. The money will be used to help build the brand, create a seamless supply chain and order the first few batches of OQ's.

I am happy to offer EARLY BIRD prices for the first 100 backers.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We don't really have any risks or challenges with this product. The production is already set up and ready to go. The expert seamstress has the perfect team to help me fulfil this project on time.

SHIPPING

All shipping will be charged through BackerKit after the campaign is finished. This is because I will be offering extras and add ons the the project. Plus I will want to offer the cheapest shipping possible and this may mean shipping many items to one country (the. US for example) and using their local post to fulfil. 

I have added an image below for the estimated cost of shipping for each country. 

Other Ways You Can Help

It would be amazing if you can help spread the word and bring OQ to people you think would love the product as much as we do.

story:
The Broadcast t-shirt is a revolutionary digital t-shirt that allows you to customize your slogan and image as often as you like. It’s the first wearable, commercially available, a programmable digital t-shirt designed for you to break the boundaries of your digital creativity. 

 

 

 

The Broadcast t-shirt consists of tiny LED's that connect with the accompanying app to give you complete control over what you wish to say. The only limit is your own imagination. Here's how it works.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Broadcast Wear lets you choose your slogan for the day. Let the world know what you are feeling – from blue to exuberant!

 

 

 

Broadcast Wear is the world's first touch enabled t-shirt.

 

The t-shirts used in the product shots and video are prototypes. Our production versions will be more polished and finished to our exact high standards.

We will contact all contributors after the campaign to ask for your preference in colour, style and size.

After purchase you will have the following options:

  • Round neck or a collar. 
  • LED panel either on the front or the back. 
  • Multiple colour options. 
  • Multiple sizes available (see a bigger size chart here).

Broadcast is not just a t-shirt. It is a beautiful combination of hardware that software that works seamlessly with your smartphone to bring out the magic of a programmable t-shirt that responds to your touch. You can now change slogans and designs as many times as you want to, without worrying about the LEDs touching your body. The app is available for iOS and Android phones.

 

 

A company can place an order for Broadcast for its employees, and they can be programmed to display the company’s live Twitter feed. This is a wonderful way of integrating social media and generating awareness.

For businesses, Broadcast offers a unique advertising opportunity. Companies can have people wear the t-shirt with their slogan. The text can move and attract more eyeballs. Companies can have celebrities wear Broadcast with their (companies) slogans, thereby creating a BTL channel of promotion.

Large companies often host conferences that are attended by hundreds of employees. Broadcast comes with an API integration that can help companies ensure that all the t-shirts of their employees display the same content simultaneously. The content can change according to requirement. But, essentially, will be related to the company.

 

Thank you very much, we have now reached all of our stretch goals!

 

Dear Broadcast fans, we have just added an exciting new stretch goal to our campaign. To reach the goal we need your help to spread the word on Brodcast to your friends and family - and we want to reward all of you who are helping us! 

Here's how it works:

Use the share buttons on our campaign page (found from the top of the page) to spread the word and your referrals will automatically be tracked by Indiegogo. For every $1 your friends spend on the campaign you will be able to spend your Broadcast points on Broadcast rewards. 

Remember to tag @broadcastwear and use the hashtag #WearYourMind, #crowdfunding, #technology and #WearableTech.

Broadcast Wearables is a Hyderabad, India, based startup that focuses on bringing technology into the world of fashion. We believe in creating paradigm-shifting ideas; we believe in disruption; we believe in the penetrating power of technology. We love everything that can be done by touch, and have created the world’s first touch - enabled t-shirt! 

Founded by a couple of people passionate about technology, and built by a team that eats and sleeps technology, Broadcast Wear is here to disrupt the market as you know it.

 

Who are we? We, at Broadcast, are a bunch of technology enthusiasts who love trying out new things. As engineers, we strive to come up with new ways to make people’s lives better, to integrate technology into everyday things. And that is why we created the Broadcast t-shirt - it creates a new paradigm in the world of technology and fashion. 

We realized that, while wearables are ruling the market, not much has been done to integrate technology with apparel. But getting everything together was not easy. It was important for us to find people who were equally passionate about technology. Broadcast Wear is led by Ayyappa Nagubandi, a serial entrepreneur and a technology buff who has worked with the likes of World Bank.

 

We all wear clothes. We wear them all day, every day. Our clothes change according to the occasion – office demands a formal attire, a discotheque demands a snazzy outfit, and a casual coffee or date demands just a pair of jeans and a t-shirt. 

All the clothes we wear look the same – from the time we buy them to the time we throw them out. What if you had a t-shirt that could change according to what’s on your mind?

Broadcast is a t-shirt that changes slogans according to what’s on your mind! All you have to do in type in your slogan (or design) in the accompanying app, and watch it reflect on the t-shirt.

We want to offer you a blank canvas so that you can speak your mind in a totally new way.

 

The t-shirt is ready. We want your support to be able to go to production and make this dream a reality. With your support and backing on this campaign, we plan to manufacture Broadcast t-shirts on a large scale. This means, it will reduce the cost of production, and will also reduce the cost of the t-shirt. You have the power to make this possible; to bring technology to every household. Every backer is special, and every supporter counts.

We have a manufacturing partner, and we are quite ahead with the app. We also know that creating groundbreaking products can be affected by unforeseen delays at any point in time. And so, after considering all possible external factors and taking into account the advice given by experienced innovators, we have come up with a quite a conservative delivery date. Our goal is to deliver Broadcast t-shirt well within the delivery date, but we will keep you updated should any circumstances beyond our control come up. 

Creating Broadcast t-shirt has been one ginormous challenge, and we are excited to see Broadcast t-shirt happen. That is why, in order to ensure Broadcast t-shirt reaches you on time, we will have stationed a team with our manufacturing partners. 

Broadcast's app is at a stage where we can share it with a Beta testing group, who will use the app, connect it with the t-shirt in real time via online streaming, and provide us with their feedback. Our competent app development team, which works in-house, is constantly looking for ways to make the app work better with the t-shirt till the time comes for shipping. This means you will have a t-shirt that is more refined and that works in the best possible way!

If you are interested in featuring our story, you can find everything you need in this LINK, including a press release and photos. 

For media inquiries, please contact hello@broadcastwear.com.

 

What designs of the t-shirt are available?

You can choose from a round neck or a collar and you can either have the LED panel at the front of the shirt or the back.

What colours of the t-shirt are available?

We have multiple colour options to choose from. See colour options from this LINK. 

What colours work the best?

Except maybe white and gray, all the colors work very well.  We have 15 colour options for you to choose from. We will contact all contributors after the campaign to ask for your preference.

What sizes of the t-shirt are available?

Sizes available are XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL, XXXL & XXXXL. We will contact all contributors after the campaign to ask for your preference.

How many LED's are in the panel?

The panel has 32 columns and 30 rows. There is a total of 960 LED's.

Each LED is separated by about 7 mm.

The width of the LED panel is about 224mm and height is about 210mm.
 

How will I know about flash sales?

If you've bought a Broadcast t-shirt then you'll be notified via email. You can also follow us on our Facebook and Twitter pages to make sure you stay in the loop.

Can you wash the t-shirt in a washing machine?

The t-shirt cannot be washed in a washing machine. It has to be hand washed or sent for dry cleaning. With each t-shirt, we will send instructions on how to wash and dry your garment.

Is it possible to create animations?

It is possible to create the animations. You will have to login to the website to create the animations and send it to your phone. Alternatively, you can view the various animations shared within the community and save the one you like on your phone. 

How long is the battery life?

The battery life is 4 hours. It will be a rechargeable battery and you can charge the same using a USB cable that we will give along with the t-shirt.

Can you tell me a little more about the double-panel shirt? How does that work with the app?

The user will have the option to send the same text/image to both the panels or have the option to send different text/images to front and back panels.
If the user wants to keep one text/image for a long time say front, he can do so and only keep updating the back panel.

Another option is to keep changing the front panel and integrate the Twitter for the back panel so that the tweets just scroll in the back panel. These are just some of the ideas.

When will the t-shirts be shipped?

We're expecting to ship to our backers at the beginning of November 2016. If there are any changes we will keep you updated.

I made a mistake in my shipping address. How can I fix it?

Go to "My contributions" then click on "View Order Details" and then you can choose "UPDATE ADDRESS".

Any other questions, please contact: hello@broadcastwear.com

This means you will have a t-shirt that is more refined and that works in the best possible way!If you are interested in featuring our story, you can find everything you need in this LINK, including a press release and photos. For media inquiries, please contact hello@broadcastwear.com.
 
What designs of the t-shirt are available?
You can choose from a round neck or a collar and you can either have the LED panel at the front of the shirt or the back.
What colours of the t-shirt are available?
We have multiple colour options to choose from. See colour options from this LINK. 
What colours work the best?
Except maybe white and gray, all the colors work very well.  We have 15 colour options for you to choose from. We will contact all contributors after the campaign to ask for your preference.
What sizes of the t-shirt are available?
Sizes available are XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL, XXXL & XXXXL. We will contact all contributors after the campaign to ask for your preference.
How many LED's are in the panel?
The panel has 32 columns and 30 rows. There is a total of 960 LED's.
Each LED is separated by about 7 mm.
The width of the LED panel is about 224mm and height is about 210mm.
 
How will I know about flash sales?
If you've bought a Broadcast t-shirt then you'll be notified via email. You can also follow us on our Facebook and Twitter pages to make sure you stay in the loop.Can you wash the t-shirt in a washing machine?The t-shirt cannot be washed in a washing machine. It has to be hand washed or sent for dry cleaning. With each t-shirt, we will send instructions on how to wash and dry your garment.Is it possible to create animations?It is possible to create the animations. You will have to login to the website to create the animations and send it to your phone. Alternatively, you can view the various animations shared within the community and save the one you like on your phone. How long is the battery life?The battery life is 4 hours. It will be a rechargeable battery and you can charge the same using a USB cable that we will give along with the t-shirt.Can you tell me a little more about the double-panel shirt? How does that work with the app?The user will have the option to send the same text/image to both the panels or have the option to send different text/images to front and back panels.If the user wants to keep one text/image for a long time say front, he can do so and only keep updating the back panel.Another option is to keep changing the front panel and integrate the Twitter for the back panel so that the tweets just scroll in the back panel. These are just some of the ideas.When will the t-shirts be shipped?We're expecting to ship to our backers at the beginning of November 2016. If there are any changes we will keep you updated.I made a mistake in my shipping address. How can I fix it?Go to "My contributions" then click on "View Order Details" and then you can choose "UPDATE ADDRESS".Any other questions, please contact: hello@broadcastwear.com
